definition: "Easy of access or approach; approachable; as  an accessible town or mountain an accessible person."
simplified_definition: When something is accessible it means anyone can use it or get it very easily.

definition: "To render fit  suitable or correspondent; to adapt; to conform; as to accommodate ourselves to circumstances."
simplified_definition: You accommodate when you change something that fixes an existing problem.

definition: "To complete  as time or distance."
simplified_definition: If you accomplish something, you succeed in doing it.

definition: "To finish; to kill."
simplified_definition: If you achieve something, you succeed in doing it or cause it to happen by working really hard.

definition: "A piece of land  containing  square rods or   square yards or   square feet. This is the English statute acre. That of the United States is the same. The Scotch acre was about . of the English and the Irish . of the English."
simplified_definition: An acre is a very large area of land about the size of a football field.

definition: "To make suitable; to fit  or suit; to adjust; to alter so as to fit for a new use;  sometimes followed by to or for."
simplified_definition: When a plant or animal has adapted to a place it means it can live in that place well.

definition: "To become  in some respects different; to vary; to change; as the weather alters almost daily; rocks or minerals alter by exposure."
simplified_definition: When something has been changed from what it used to be, you say it has been altered.

definition: "The sum total of two or more sums or quantities; the aggregate; the whole quantity; a totality; as  the amount of  and  is ; the amount of a bill; the amount of this year's revenue."
simplified_definition: The amount of something is how much there is of it.

definition: "To subject to analysis; to resolve  into its elements; to separate into the constituent parts  for the purpose of an examination of each separately; to examine in such a manner as to ascertain the elements or nature of the thing examined; as to analyze a fossil substance; to analyze a sentence or a word; to analyze an action to ascertain its morality."
simplified_definition: If you analyze something, you look at each part to make sure it all fits together and makes sense.

definition: "To place at anchor; to secure by an anchor; as  to anchor a ship."
simplified_definition: If an object is anchored, it is tied or connected to something that keeps it from moving around.

definition: "To raise the value of; to increase the market price of;  opposed to depreciate."
simplified_definition: If you appreciate a thing, you understand why it is good or important.

definition: "An extent of surface; a tract of the earth's surface; a region; as  vast uncultivated areas."
simplified_definition: An area is a piece of land that is used for a specific activity.

definition: "To persuade by reasons; as  to argue a man into a different opinion."
simplified_definition: If someone argues with another person, they speak loudly to each other about something they disagree on.

definition: "To put in proper order; to dispose  in the manner intended or best suited for the purpose; as troops arranged for battle."
simplified_definition: If you arrange things, you put them in a place or location.

definition: "The adaptation of a composition to voices or instruments for which it was not originally written."
simplified_definition: When you make an arrangement you agree with someone that you will get something done.

definition: "To form  as the elementary sounds; to utter in distinct syllables or words; to enunciate; as to articulate letters or language."
simplified_definition: When you articulate your ideas or feelings, you use words to say them out loud.

definition: "To fix or determine the rate or amount of."
simplified_definition: When you assess a person or thing, you think carefully about them in order to make an opinion about them.

definition: "A fortress or fortified town  on the frontier of a country commanding an avenue of approach."
simplified_definition: A barrier does not allow something to move from one place to the other

definition: "To censure; to express disapprobation of; to find fault with; to reproach."
simplified_definition: When you blame a person or thing for something bad, you are saying they did this bad thing or caused it to happen.

definition: "With a sudden leap; suddenly."
simplified_definition: When something bounces, it moves up and down, again and again.

definition: "A goodhumored  slowwitted fellow;  usually said of an elderly man."
simplified_definition: A buffer protects something from getting hurt or stops two things from hurting each other.

definition: "To erect or construct  as an edifice or fabric of any kind; to form by uniting materials into a regular structure; to fabricate; to make; to raise."
simplified_definition: If you build something, you put different items together to make something new.

definition: "To adjust for purpose; to adapt by forethought or calculation; to fit or prepare by the adaptation of means to an end; as  to calculate a system of laws for the government and protection of a free people."
simplified_definition: If you calculate a number or amount, you find the answer from information that you already learned in math.

definition: "To seize or take possession of by force  surprise or stratagem; to overcome and hold; to secure by effort."
simplified_definition: When you capture someone or something, you catch them and don't let them leave or won't let go.

definition: "To utter with a melodious voice; to sing."
simplified_definition: A chant is made up of words that you say over and over again

definition: "To verify  to guard to make secure by means of a mark token or other check; to distinguish by a check; to put a mark against  after comparing with an original or a counterpart in order to secure accuracy; as to check an account; to check baggage."
simplified_definition: If you check something, you make sure that it is correct.

definition: "To make a selection; to decide."
simplified_definition: If you choose something from several things that are available, you pick the one you really want to have.

definition: "Pertaining to a city or state  or to a citizen in his relations to his fellow citizens or to the state; within the city or state."
simplified_definition: Someone who is civil is nice to you but not friendly.

definition: "In the game of casino  to play a card which will take two or more cards whose aggregate number of pips equals those of the card played."
simplified_definition: If you combine things, you put them together.

definition: "To impart; to bestow; to convey; as  to communicate a disease or a sensation; to communicate motion by means of a crank."
simplified_definition: When you communicate with someone, you are sharing information by speaking it out loud or writing it on paper.

definition: "To contend emulously; to seek or strive for the same thing  position or reward for which another is striving; to contend in rivalry as for a prize or in business; as tradesmen compete with one another."
simplified_definition: When you compete for something, you try to keep someone else from getting the thing you want.

definition: "Computation."
simplified_definition: When you compute a number or amount, you find the answer by using math to add or subtract.

definition: "To put under conditions; to require to pass a new examination or to make up a specified study  as a condition of remaining in one's class or in college; as to condition a student who has failed in some branch of study."
simplified_definition: Conditions are all the things that affect the way we do things or the way something happens.

definition: "To think seriously; to make examination; to reflect; to deliberate."
simplified_definition: If you consider something, you think carefully about it.

definition: "To put together the constituent parts of  in their proper place and order; to build; to form; to make; as  to construct an edifice."
simplified_definition: If you construct something you build it or make it by putting all the different parts together.

definition: "To waste away slowly."
simplified_definition: When you consume something, you use it, eat it, or drink it.

definition: "To set in opposition  or over against in order to show the differences between or the comparative excellences and defects of; to compare by difference or contrariety of qualities; as to contrast the present with the past."
simplified_definition: If you contrast items, you find the differences between them.

definition: "To give or use one's power or influence for any object; to assist."
simplified_definition: If you contribute to something, you give or add to make it better.

definition: "A duplicate book  register or account kept to correct or check another account or register; a counter register."
simplified_definition: When you control something dangerous or unsafe, you stop it from getting worse or spreading to other places.

definition: "To make a crease or mark in  as by folding or doubling."
simplified_definition: Creases are lines that are made in cloth or paper when it is crushed or folded.

definition: "To invest with a new form  office or character; to constitute; to appoint; to make; as to create one a peer."
simplified_definition: When you create something, you make it for the first time.

definition: "Subject of discussion."
simplified_definition: When you debate what you should do, you think or talk about the different ways that you might do it before you choose the way you will actually do it.

definition: "To determine; to form a definite opinion; to come to a conclusion; to give decision; as  the court decided in favor of the defendant."
simplified_definition: If you decide to do something, you choose to do it after thinking about all the possibilities.

definition: "The wane of the moon."
simplified_definition: When something decreases it becomes smaller in size or amount.

definition: "To inscribe or address  as to a patron."
simplified_definition: When someone has dedicated themselves to something, they have spent a lot of time and effort to it because it is important to them.

definition: "To take away; to deduct; to subtract; as  to deduce a part from the whole."
simplified_definition: If you deduce something, you figure out it is true because of other things that you know to be true.

definition: "To ward or fend off; to drive back or away; to repel."
simplified_definition: If you defend someone or something, you do everything you can to protect them from harm.

definition: "To bring to a conclusion  as a question or controversy; to settle authoritative or judicial sentence; to decide; as the court has determined the cause."
simplified_definition: When you are determined to do something, you make a choice to do it.

definition: "To ascertain by diagnosis; to diagnosticate. See Diagnosticate."
simplified_definition: When someone or something is diagnosed with a sickness or problem, their sickness or problem has been identified.

definition: "To be unsuited; to have unfitness; as  medicine sometimes disagrees with the patient; food often disagrees with the stomach or the taste."
simplified_definition: If you disagree with what someone says, you do not think what they say is true or correct.

definition: "To change the place of; to remove from the usual or proper place; to put out of place; to place in another situation; as  the books in the library are all displaced."
simplified_definition: People wo are displaced have had to move from where they lived without wanting to move.

definition: "Rent off; torn asunder; severed; disrupted."
simplified_definition: When an activity is disrupted it means something happened to stop the activity or keep it from happening as it usually would.

definition: "To separate by definition of terms or logical division of a subject with regard to difference; as  to distinguish sounds into high and low."
simplified_definition: When you distinguish between two things, you look at what makes them different from each other.

definition: "To throw into disorder or confusion; to derange; to interrupt the settled state of; to excite from a state of rest."
simplified_definition: When you disturb someone or something, you make them mad by interrupting what they are doing.

definition: "To draw off by degrees; to cause to flow gradually out or off; hence  to cause the exhaustion of."
simplified_definition: When a liquid drains it flows or moves from one place to another.

definition: "To inhabit."
simplified_definition: If you dwell somewhere, you live there.

definition: "To exalt; to ennoble; to dignify; as  to elevate the mind or character."
simplified_definition: When land is elevated it is higher than other land that is close to it.

definition: "To enter into conflict; to join battle; as  the armies engaged in a general battle."
simplified_definition: If you engage in something, you take part in it. If you engage someone else in something, you keep the person interested in it.

definition: "To be raised up; to grow larger; as  a debt enhances rapidly by compound interest."
simplified_definition: If you enhance something, you make the thing better.

definition: "A valuing or rating by the mind  without actually measuring weighing or the like; rough or approximate calculation; as an estimate of the cost of a building or of the quantity of water in a pond."
simplified_definition: If you estimate something, you guess about its amount or size without trying to be exact

definition: "To fix the value of; to rate; to appraise."
simplified_definition: If you evaluate something or someone, you think carefully in order to make a judgement or opinion about them.

definition: "To interrogate as in a judicial proceeding; to try or test by question; as  to examine a witness in order to elicit testimony a student to test his qualifications a bankrupt touching the state of his property etc."
simplified_definition: When you examine something, you look at it carefully.

definition: "The state of existing or being; actual possession of being; continuance in being; as  the existence of body and of soul in union; the separate existence of the soul; immortal existence."
simplified_definition: When something is in existence it is real and a part of our world.

definition: "Introduced from a foreign country; not native; extraneous; foreign; as  an exotic plant; an exotic term or word."
simplified_definition: Something that is exotic is different and special because it comes from another country.

definition: "To make plain  manifest or intelligible; to clear of obscurity; to expound; to unfold and illustrate the meaning of; as to explain a chapter of the Bible."
simplified_definition: If you explain something, you describe it using many details so someone can understand.

definition: "One who explores; also  an apparatus with which one explores as a diving bell."
simplified_definition: An explorer is someone who goes to new places or countries to learn about them.

definition: "The utmost point or verge; that part which terminates a body; extremity."
simplified_definition: The extreme end of a place means that it is very far away from the starting point.

definition: "To fix firmly; to make fast; to secure  as by a knot lock bolt etc.; as to fasten a chain to the feet; to fasten a door or window."
simplified_definition: When you fasten something you tie it to something else with string or you tape it to something else

definition: "Proceeding from  or appointed by fate or destiny; necessary; inevitable."
simplified_definition: When an illness or an accident causes someone to die we say it was fatal.

definition: "Anything broad and limber that hangs loose  or that is attached by one side or end and is easily moved; as the flap of a garment."
simplified_definition: If a bird flaps its wings, his wings move quickly up and down.

definition: "To stuff; to lard; to farce."
simplified_definition: The force of something tells us how strong it is

definition: "To give form or shape to; to frame; to construct; to make; to fashion."
simplified_definition: If you form something, you create it or shape it.

definition: "A portion; a fragment."
simplified_definition: A fraction of something is a small amount or piece of it.

definition: "To cause to be; to bring into life."
simplified_definition: If you generate something, you bring it into being or cause it to be.

definition: "To seize; to lay fast hold of; to attack at close quarters: as  to grapple an antagonist."
simplified_definition: If you grapple with someone, you take hold of them and struggle with them, as part of a fight.

definition: "Having a keen desire for anything; vehemently desirous; eager to obtain; avaricious; as  greedy of gain."
simplified_definition: Someone who is greedy wants to have more things than he or she needs or more than what is fair to have.

definition: "The act or result of guiding; the superintendence or assistance of a guide; direction; government; a leading."
simplified_definition: When someone gives you guidance they help you by telling you what you should do.

definition: "The natural abode  locality or region of an animal or plant."
simplified_definition: The habitat of an animal or plant is the place where they usually live or grow in.

definition: "Containing sensible moisture; damp; moist; as  a humidair or atmosphere; somewhat wet or watery; as humid earth; consisting of water or vapor."
simplified_definition: When the air around us is hot and wet, we say that it is humid.

definition: "To bring in from abroad; to introduce from without; especially  to bring  into a place or country from a foreign country in the transactions of commerce;  opposed to export. We import teas from China coffee from Brasil etc."
simplified_definition: When you import, you buy things from another country to sell them in your country.

definition: "To disprove or make void; to refute."
simplified_definition: If you improve something, you make it better.

definition: "To form into one whole; to make entire; to complete; to renew; to restore; to perfect."
simplified_definition: If you integrate something, you combine it with other things to create a new whole.

definition: "To act upon each other; as  two agents mutually interact."
simplified_definition: When you interact with someone, you talk to the them while spending time together.

definition: "To act as an interpreter."
simplified_definition: If you interpret something, you figure out what you think it means.

definition: "A mutual sight or view; a meeting face to face; usually  a formal or official meeting for consultation; a conference; as the secretary had an interview with the President."
simplified_definition: When someone interviews you for a job they ask you questions to see if you are able to do that job.

definition: "To lead or bring in; to conduct or usher in; as  to introduce a person into a drawingroom."
simplified_definition: When you introduce one person to another, you tell them each other's names, so that they can get to know each other.

definition: "The penetrating of one rock  while in a plastic or metal state into the cavities of another."
simplified_definition: When someone or something enters into a space where it is not welcomed or wanted it is an intrusion.

definition: "Tending to invade; characterized by invasion; aggressive."
simplified_definition: When something that is not wanted spreads very quickly and it is hard to stop from going everywhere you say it is invasive.

definition: "The act of investigating; the process of inquiring into or following up; research; study; inquiry  esp. patient or thorough inquiry or examination; as the investigations of the philosopher and the mathematician; the investigations of the judge the moralist."
simplified_definition: When someone does an investigation, they try to find out what really happened or what is the truth.

definition: "The act of isolating  or the state of being isolated; insulation; separation; loneliness."
simplified_definition: You feel isolated when you feel alone and without friends or help.

definition: "A kind of frock for children."
simplified_definition: When you jam something you push into something in a rough way.

definition: "To expose to loss or injury; to risk; to jeopard."
simplified_definition: When you jeopardize a place or thing you do something that can hurt, damage, or detroy it.

definition: "The travel or work of a day."
simplified_definition: When you go on a journey it means you take a trip and go from one place to another.

definition: "A person appointed to decide in atrial of skill  speed etc. between two or more parties; an umpire; as a judge in a horse race."
simplified_definition: If you judge something, you give your opinion about it.

definition: "To pronounce free from guilt or blame; to declare or prove to have done that which is just  right proper etc.; to absolve; to exonerate; to clear."
simplified_definition: To justify a decision, action, or idea means to show that it is fair and needed.

definition: "An alliance or combination of two or more nations  parties or persons for the accomplishment of a purpose which requires a continued course of action as for mutual defense or for furtherance of commercial religious or political interests etc."
simplified_definition: A league is a group that has come together to do something or to share information about things that are of interest to all of those in the group.

definition: "Time at one's command  free from engagement; convenient opportunity; hence convenience; ease."
simplified_definition: Leisure is the time when you are not working and you can relax and do things that you like.

definition: "A strip forming the woven border or selvedge of cloth  particularly of broadcloth and serving to strengthen it; hence a strip of cloth; a fillet."
simplified_definition: To list several things means to write or say them one after another, usually in a specific order.

definition: "To designate the site or place of; to define the limits of; as  to locate a public building; to locate a mining claim; to locate  a land warrant."
simplified_definition: If you locate something or someone, you find out where they are.

definition: "To marry; to give in marriage."
simplified_definition: If something of a certain color or design matches another thing, they have the same color or design.

definition: "A step or definite part of a progressive course or policy; a means to an end; an act designed for the accomplishment of an object; as  political measures; prudent measures; an inefficient measure."
simplified_definition: If something measures a particular length, width, or amount, that is its size expressed in numbers.

definition: "Moderately wet; damp; humid; not dry; as  a moist atmosphere or air."
simplified_definition: A place or thing that is moist is a little wet.

definition: "Something which stands  or remains to keep in remembrance what is past; a memorial."
simplified_definition: A monument is often made of stone and is built to remind people of an important person or of something important that happened in history.

definition: "Omission if attention or civilities; slight; as  neglect of strangers."
simplified_definition: When you neglect something, you don’t take care of it the way you should.

definition: "Possessing eminence  elevation dignity etc.; above whatever is low mean degrading or dishonorable; magnanimous; as a noble nature or action; a noble heart."
simplified_definition: Some one who is noble is admired because they share with others and are good to others.

definition: "To make known; to declare; to publish; as  to notify a fact to a person."
simplified_definition: When you notify someone you tell them something in writing.

definition: "To express as what has been noticed; to utter as a remark; to say in a casual or incidental way; to remark."
simplified_definition: If you observe something, you watch it happen or look closely to see what will happen.

definition: "To arrange or constitute in parts  each having a special function act office or relation; to systematize; to get into working order;  applied to products of the human intellect or to human institutions and undertakings as a science a government an army a war etc."
simplified_definition: If you organize things, you put them in a certain order or plan them in a specific way.

definition: "To get the better of; to surmount; to conquer; to subdue; as  to overcome enemies in battle."
simplified_definition: To overcome is be able to handle a problem well.

definition: "To flow over; to cover woth  or as with water or other fluid; to spread over; to inundate; to overwhelm."
simplified_definition: When a river has overflowed, the water fills to the top and spills over the edges of the river.

definition: "To look down upon from a place that is over or above; to look over or view from a higher position; to rise above  so as to command a view of; as to overlook a valley from a hill."
simplified_definition: When you overlook something you don’t see it.

definition: "A restatement of a text  passage or work expressing the meaning of the original in another form generally for the sake of its clearer and fuller exposition; a setting forth the signification of a text in other and ampler terms; a free translation or rendering;  opposed to metaphrase."
simplified_definition: If you paraphrase something you say it in a different way or using different words.

definition: "To partake of; to share in; to receive a part of."
simplified_definition: If you participate in an activity, you take part in it.

definition: "Anything cut or formed to serve as a guide to cutting or forming objects; as  a dressmaker's pattern."
simplified_definition: When you make a pattern you repeat the design over and over again.

definition: "To use persuasion; to plead; to prevail by persuasion."
simplified_definition: If you persuade someone to do something, you get them to do it by giving them good reasons for doing it.

definition: "A draught or form; properly  a representation drawn on a plane as a map or a chart; especially a top view as of a machine or the representation or delineation of a horizontal section of anything as of a building; a graphic representation; a diagram."
simplified_definition: If you plan something, you decide in advance what you are going to do.

definition: "To tell or declare beforehand; to foretell; to prophesy; to presage; as  to predict misfortune; to predict the return of a comet."
simplified_definition: When you predict something, you say what you think will happen.

definition: "To bring an indictment against ."
simplified_definition: If you present something, you show it or give it to someone.

definition: "A place in which game  fish etc. are preserved for purposes of sport or for food."
simplified_definition: If you preserve a place or thing you do what is needed to save it or protect it from damage.

definition: "To come before the usual time."
simplified_definition: When you do everything you can to make sure that something bad doesn't happen, you are preventing it from happening.

definition: "To extend;  applied to a line  surface or solid; as to produce a side of a triangle."
simplified_definition: If you produce something, you make it or you create it.

definition: "To modify or qualify with respect to quantity; to fix or express the quantity of; to rate."
simplified_definition: A quantity is an amount or how much there is of something.

definition: "To dispose in a classified or in systematic order; to arrange regularly; as  to range plants and animals in genera and species."
simplified_definition: A range includes all the different things that are in the same category or group.

definition: "A calling back; a revocation."
simplified_definition: If you recall something, you remember it and think about it.

definition: "To enter an obligation of record before a proper tribunal; as  A B recognized in the sum of twenty dollars."
simplified_definition: If you recognize someone or something, you know who that person is or what that thing is by looking at it.

definition: "Testimony; witness; attestation."
simplified_definition: If you record something, you make a written, audio, or video version of it that can be looked at or listened to in the future.

definition: "To affect nicety or subtilty in thought or language."
simplified_definition: If you refine something, you make small changes to make it better, clearer, or more specific.

definition: "Shelter or protection from danger or distress."
simplified_definition: If you take refuge somewhere, you go to a safe place to protect yourself from getting hurt.

definition: "To deny  as a request demand invitation or command; to decline to do or grant."
simplified_definition: When you refuse to do something you tell others that you will not do it.

definition: "One of the grand districts or quarters into which any space or surface  as of the earth or the heavens is conceived of as divided; hence in general a portion of space or territory of indefinite extent; country; province; district; tract."
simplified_definition: A region is a large piece of land that is different from other parts of land around it.

definition: "The act of opening the exhaust port to allow the steam to escape."
simplified_definition: If a person or animal is locked up and you set them free into the world, you are releasing them.

definition: "To make a report  or response in respect of a matter inquired of a duty enjoined or information expected; as the committee will report at twelve o'clock."
simplified_definition: If you report something that has happened, you tell people about it.

definition: "To tell again."
simplified_definition: If you retell a story, you write it or tell it again in a different way from the first time you heard it.

definition: "To make payment or atonement; to atone."
simplified_definition: When something satisfies you it means you got everything that you needed.

definition: "To cause to become completely penetrated  impregnated or soaked; to fill fully; to sate."
simplified_definition: When land is saturated it is very, very wet.

definition: "Taken from a number by preferance; picked out as more valuable or exellent than others; of special value or exellence; nicely chosen; selected; choice."
simplified_definition: If you select something, you choose it from a number of things of the same kind.

definition: "An indefinite number of terms succeeding one another  each of which is derived from one or more of the preceding by a fixed law called the law of the series; as an arithmetical series; a geometrical series."
simplified_definition: When you have more than one of the same thing and they come one after another it is called a series.

definition: "To become calm; to cease from agitation."
simplified_definition: When a person or animal has settled into a place, they will live there for a long time.

definition: "The pubes; the sharebone."
simplified_definition: If you share something that you have with someone, you give some of it to them or let them use it.

definition: "To wrinkle  bend or curl; to shrivel; hence to contract into a less extent or compass; to gather together; to become compacted."
simplified_definition: When something shrinks in size, it gets smaller.

definition: "A solution; an explanation."
simplified_definition: If you solve something, you find an answer or a solution for a problem.

definition: "The rising from the ground  or beginning of a stream of water or the like; a spring; a fountain."
simplified_definition: A source is the person, place or thing that gives you something.

definition: "Condition of prosperity or grandeur; wealthy or prosperous circumstances; social importance."
simplified_definition: If you state something, you say or write it in a clear and specific way.

definition: "The act of building; the practice of erecting buildings; construction."
simplified_definition: Something that has been built by people is a structure.

definition: "Sly in design; artful; cunning; insinuating; subtile;  applied to persons; as  a subtle foe."
simplified_definition: Something subtle needs to be looked at carefully to be seen.

definition: "To comprise in  or reduce to a summary; to present briefly."
simplified_definition: If you summarize something, you give a brief description about it.

definition: "A falling on and seizing  as the prey of a rapacious bird; the act of swooping."
simplified_definition: When something swoops, it moves quickly through the air toward the ground.

definition: "An assemblage of objects arranged in regular subordination  or after some distinct method usually logical or scientific; a complete whole of objects related by some common law principle or end; a complete exhibition of essential principles or facts arranged in a rational dependence or connection; a regular union of principles or parts forming one entire thing; as a system of philosophy; a system of government; a system of divinity; a system of botany or chemistry; a military system; the solar system."
simplified_definition: When you do something by always following the same plan or set of rules, you are using a system.

definition: "Of or pertaining to all or any of the Territories of the United States  or to any district similarly organized elsewhere; as Territorial governments."
simplified_definition: When you say an animal is territorial, you mean that it will protect its home from other animals trying to enter it.

definition: "of Think"
simplified_definition: A thought is an idea you have in your mind.

definition: "To use threats  or menaces; also to have a threatening appearance."
simplified_definition: When something is threatened, it is in danger of being hurt or damaged.

definition: "To suffer to be  or to be done without prohibition or hindrance; to allow or permit negatively by not preventing; not to restrain; to put up with; as to tolerate doubtful practices."
simplified_definition: You tolerate something when you can deal with it even if it is difficult, painful, or uncomfortable.

definition: "To be changed in form; to be metamorphosed."

Aardvarks live in southern and central Africa. Although they are sometimes called anteaters, aardvarks are not closely related to any other kind of mammal.

simplified_definition: a large reptile with short legs, a long body and tail, and a long, wide snout. Alligators are protected by thick skin with many hard bumps. They live in rivers, lakes, swamps, and other bodies of water in the southeast United States and in China. They usually eat insects, fish, turtles, snakes, birds, and other water animals, but have been known to attack small land mammals. They are closely related to crocodiles. Chinese alligators are endangered because their habitat is being changed by people.

definition: "The metallic base of alumina. This metal is white  but with a bluish tinge and is remarkable for its resistance to oxidation and for its lightness having a specific gravity of about .. Atomic weight .. Symbol Al."
simplified_definition: the British spelling of "aluminum," a strong, light, silver metal that does not easily rust.

definition: "See Aluminium."
simplified_definition: a strong, light, silver metal that does not easily rust. Aluminum is a chemical element.

definition: "Constancy during a certain period  or regularly at stated intervals; invariably; uniformly;  opposed to sometimes or occasionally."
simplified_definition: at all times; without stopping; forever.

definition: "The first person singular of the verb be  in the indicative mode present tense. See Be."
simplified_definition: a form of the verb "be" that is present tense and used with the pronoun "I."

definition: "A person attached to a particular pursuit  study or science as to music or painting; esp. one who cultivates any study or art from taste or attachment without pursuing it professionally."
simplified_definition: one who does something only for enjoyment rather than for money.

definition: "To bewilder; to stupefy; to bring into a maze."
simplified_definition: to surprise greatly or fill with wonder; astonish.

definition: "Frenzy; madness."
simplified_definition: wonder; great surprise.

definition: "of Amaze"
simplified_definition: causing great surprise or wonder.

definition: "One of a fabulous race of female warriors in Scythia; hence  a female warrior."
simplified_definition: the longest river in South America. It flows from the Andes mountains in Peru across northern Brazil to the Atlantic Ocean.

definition: "Alt. of Embassador"
simplified_definition: a person who is sent by the government of one country to be its official representative in another country.

definition: "A yellowish translucent resin resembling copal  found as a fossil in alluvial soils with beds of lignite or on the seashore in many places. It takes a fine polish and is used for pipe mouthpieces beads etc. and as a basis for a fine varnish. By friction it becomes strongly electric."
simplified_definition: a hard, yellow or brown material that is used to make jewelry. It is a fossil that comes from the resin of pine trees.

definition: "Having the faculty of using both hands with equal ease."
simplified_definition: able to use both the left and right hands with equal skill.

definition: "Doubtful or uncertain  particularly in respect to signification; capable of being understood in either of two or more possible senses; equivocal; as an ambiguous course; an ambiguous expression."
simplified_definition: having more than one possible meaning.

definition: "The act of going about to solicit or obtain an office  or any other object of desire; canvassing."
simplified_definition: a strong desire to become famous, rich, or to reach a goal.

definition: "Springing from  characterized by or indicating ambition; showy; aspiring; as an ambitious style."
simplified_definition: having or showing a strong desire to succeed; having ambition.

definition: "To go at the easy gait called an amble;  applied to the horse or to its rider."
simplified_definition: to walk at a slow, easy pace.

definition: "A field hospital  so organized as to follow an army in its movements and intended to succor the wounded as soon as possible. Often used adjectively; as an ambulance wagon; ambulance stretcher; ambulance corps."
simplified_definition: a vehicle used to carry ill or injured people to a hospital.

definition: "To station in ambush with a view to surprise an enemy."
simplified_definition: a surprise attack made from a hidden place.

definition: adv.   n." "An expression used at the end of prayers and meaning So be it. At the end of a creed it is a solemn asseveration of belief. When it introduces a declaration it is equivalent to truly verily."
simplified_definition: a word used at the end of a prayer or statement to mean "may it be so."

definition: "To change or modify in any way for the better"
simplified_definition: to change or add to a law, contract, or other document.

definition: "An alteration or change for the better; correction of a fault or of faults; reformation of life by quitting vices."
simplified_definition: an official change made to a bill, law, or other document.

definition: "Compensation for a loss or injury; recompense; reparation."
simplified_definition: something given or paid to make up for a wrong done to a person or group.

definition: "A native of America;  originally applied to the aboriginal inhabitants  but now applied to the descendants of Europeans born in America and especially to the citizens of the United States."
simplified_definition: of or having to do with the United States, or its people or language.

definition: "A purple color in a nobleman's escutcheon  or coat of arms."
simplified_definition: a purple gem used in jewelry. Amethyst is a kind of quartz.

definition: "Possessing sweetness of disposition; having sweetness of temper  kindheartedness etc. which causes one to be liked; as an amiable woman."
simplified_definition: having or showing a friendly manner.

definition: "In the midst or middle of; surrounded or encompassed by; among."
simplified_definition: among or surrounded by.

definition: "Alt. of Amid"
simplified_definition: in the middle of; among; amid.

definition: "Wrong; faulty; out of order; improper; as  it may not be amiss to ask advice."
simplified_definition: in the wrong way.

definition: "A gaseous compound of hydrogen and nitrogen  NH with a pungent smell and taste:  often called volatile alkali and spirits of hartshorn."
simplified_definition: the gas with a strong smell that is formed by combining nitrogen and hydrogen. Ammonia is used to make refrigerators cold and in making fertilizers.

definition: "Military stores  or provisions of all kinds for attack or defense."
simplified_definition: the objects fired from any weapon, or material that can be exploded. Bullets, bombs, and gunpowder are types of ammunition.

definition: "Forgetfulness; also  a defect of speech from cerebral disease in which the patient substitutes wrong words or names in the place of those he wishes to employ."
simplified_definition: partial or complete loss of memory as a result of an injury to the brain, illness, or shock.

definition: "A rhizopod. common in fresh water  capable of undergoing many changes of form at will. See Rhizopoda."
simplified_definition: a tiny living thing made of only one cell. Amoebas move by changing their shape. They eat by wrapping their bodies around their food. Amoebas live in fresh and salt water, soil, and in animals. Most kinds of amoebas can only be seen through a microscope.

definition: "Alt. of Amongst"
simplified_definition: in the middle of or included with.

definition: "Conjoined  or associated with or making part of the number of; in the number or class of."
simplified_definition: among.

definition: "The sum total of two or more sums or quantities; the aggregate; the whole quantity; a totality; as  the amount of  and  is ; the amount of a bill; the amount of this year's revenue."
simplified_definition: measure; quantity.

definition: "A word used to describe the character    or ."
simplified_definition: a sign . It is used in place of the word "and."

definition: "Of or pertaining to the Amphibia; as  amphibian reptiles."
simplified_definition: a small animal that spends part of its life cycle in water and part of its life cycle on land. Amphibians hatch in water and breathe with gills. Then they develop lungs so the adults can breathe air. Amphibians are coldblooded animals with skeletons inside their bodies. Frogs, toads, and salamanders are amphibians.

definition: "Having the ability to live both on land and in water  as frogs crocodiles beavers and some plants."
simplified_definition: able to live both on land and in water.

definition: "Alt. of Amphitheatre"
simplified_definition: an oval or round building with seats rising in rows from an open, central area. Amphitheaters are used for sports and other public events.

definition: "Anything resembling an amphitheater in form; as  a level surrounded by rising slopes or hills or a rising gallery in a theater."
simplified_definition: a spelling of "amphitheater" used in Canada and Britain. See "amphitheater" for more information.

definition: "Large; great in size  extent capacity or bulk; spacious; roomy; widely extended."
simplified_definition: large in size, amount, or space; as much or more than is needed.

definition: "One who or that which amplifies."
simplified_definition: an electronic device used to make sound louder.

definition: "To render larger  more extended or more intense and the like;  used especially of telescopes microscopes etc."
simplified_definition: to make larger or greater.

definition: "To cut off "
simplified_definition: to cut off, especially by surgery.

definition: "To muse; to mediate."
simplified_definition: to hold the interest of in a pleasant way; entertain.

definition: "The state of being amused; pleasurable excitement; that which amuses; diversion."
simplified_definition: something that amuses or entertains; fun.

definition: "Giving amusement; diverting; as  an amusing story."
simplified_definition: producing laughter; funny.

definition: "If;  a word used by old English authors."
simplified_definition: a suffix that means "from," "belongs to," or "lives in."

definition: "A large South American snake of the Boa family   which lives near rivers and preys on birds and small mammals. The name is also applied to a similar large serpent  of Ceylon."
simplified_definition: a very large snake found in South America. Anacondas are not poisonous but kill other animals by squeezing them until they cannot breathe. Anacondas can grow to over twenty feet long.

definition: "A morbid condition in which the blood is deficient in quality or in quantity."
simplified_definition: another spelling of anemia.

definition: "Alt. of Analyser"
simplified_definition: a spelling of "analyze" used in Canada and Britain. See "analyze" for more information.

definition: "A resolution of anything  whether an object of the senses or of the intellect into its constituent or original elements; an examination of the component parts of a subject each separately as the words which compose a sentence the tones of a tune or the simple propositions which enter into an argument. It is opposed to synthesis."
simplified_definition: a careful study of the parts of something in order to understand more about the whole.

definition: "One who analyzes; formerly  one skilled in algebraical geometry; now commonly one skilled in chemical analysis."
simplified_definition: someone trained or skilled in a particular type of analysis.

definition: "To subject to analysis; to resolve  into its elements; to separate into the constituent parts  for the purpose of an examination of each separately; to examine in such a manner as to ascertain the elements or nature of the thing examined; as to analyze a fossil substance; to analyze a sentence or a word; to analyze an action to ascertain its morality."
simplified_definition: to separate into parts for close study; examine and explain.

definition: "An anarch; one who advocates anarchy of aims at the overthrow of civil government."
simplified_definition: a person who believes in, desires, or tries to realize a society or state without a government.

definition: "Absence of government; the state of society where there is no law or supreme power; a state of lawlessness; political confusion."
simplified_definition: a complete lack of government or law within a country or society.

definition: "Of or relating to anatomy or dissection; as  the anatomic art; anatomical observations."
simplified_definition: of or relating to the structure of a plant or animal.

definition: "A treatise or book on anatomy."
simplified_definition: the parts of a living thing and how they fit together.

definition: "One from whom an estate has descended;  the correlative of heir."
simplified_definition: a person from whom one is descended and who lived several generations ago.

definition: "To place at anchor; to secure by an anchor; as  to anchor a ship."
simplified_definition: a heavy object that is dropped from a boat or ship by a cable to keep the vessel from moving.

definition: "A small fish  about three inches in length of the Herring family  caught in vast numbers in the Mediterranean and pickled for exportation. The name is also applied to several allied species."
simplified_definition: a small fish that is related to the herring and is used for food. Anchovies are found mostly in warm ocean waters.

definition: "Dignified  like an aged man; magisterial; venerable."
simplified_definition: very old; existing for many years.

definition: "It is sometimes  in old songs a mere expletive."
simplified_definition: with; also; along with; as well as.

definition: "Pertaining to the Andes."
simplified_definition: of, located in, or resembling the Andes.

definition: "A utensil for supporting wood when burning in a fireplace  one being placed on each side; a firedog; as a pair of andirons."
simplified_definition: one of a pair of metal structures that holds logs in a fireplace.

definition: "Resembling a man."
simplified_definition: a robot or machine having human characteristics.

definition: "A particular or detached incident or fact of an interesting nature; a biographical incident or fragment; a single passage of private life."
simplified_definition: a short tale about a funny or interesting event.

definition: "An instrument for measuring the force or velocity of the wind; a wind gauge."
simplified_definition: an instrument that measures the speed and force of the wind.

definition: "The sea anemone. See Actinia  and Sea anemone."
simplified_definition: a type of plant related to the buttercup that has large white, blue, purple, or red flowers.

definition: "Alt. of Anesthetic"
simplified_definition: loss of consciousness or feeling in the body produced by drugs.

definition: "Same as Anaesthesia  Anaesthetic."
simplified_definition: a drug that causes numbness in the body or loss of consciousness.

definition: "Over again; another time; in a new form; afresh; as  to arm anew; to create anew."
simplified_definition: once more; again.

definition: "Attendant spirit; genius; demon."
simplified_definition: a spiritual being who acts as a servant or messenger of God. Angels are often represented as human figures with wings and a halo.

definition: "To excite to anger; to enrage; to provoke."
simplified_definition: a strong emotion brought on by a person or thing that causes one great pain or trouble.

definition: "To try to gain by some insinuating artifice; to allure."
simplified_definition: the figure made by two lines coming from a single point.

definition: "A fabric made from the wool of the Angora goat."
simplified_definition: a country on the western coast of Africa. Luanda is the capital of Angola.

definition: "A city of Asia Minor  which has given its name to a goat  a cat etc."
simplified_definition: any of various animals that have long silky hair, such as a cat, rabbit, or goat.

definition: "Sharp; keen; stimulated."
simplified_definition: feeling or showing anger .

definition: "Extreme pain  either of body or mind; excruciating distress."
simplified_definition: terrible pain or suffering of the mind or body.

definition: "Relating to an angle or to angles; having an angle or angles; forming an angle or corner; sharpcornered; pointed; as  an angular figure."
simplified_definition: made up of, having, or forming one or more angles.

definition: "Consisting of the flesh of animals; as  animal food."
simplified_definition: one of a large group of living things that can move around by themselves to find food. Animals eat plants, funguses, or other animals. Birds, reptiles, fish, amphibians, mammals, insects, snails, and worms are some of the major kinds of animals.

definition: "Endowed with life; alive; living; animated; lively."
simplified_definition: to bring to life.

definition: "Endowed with life; full of life or spirit; indicating animation; lively; vigorous."
simplified_definition: full of activity, spirit, or excitement.

definition: "One who  or that which animates; an animater."
simplified_definition: a person who creates or helps to create animated cartoons.

definition: "Mere spiritedness or courage."
simplified_definition: strong dislike or behavior that shows strong dislike.

definition: "The joint which connects the foot with the leg; the tarsus."
simplified_definition: the joint between the leg and the foot; the part of the leg just above the foot.

definition: "An ornament or a fetter for the ankle; an ankle ring."
simplified_definition: a short sock that reaches just above the ankle.

definition: "Something annexed or appended; as  an additional stipulation to a writing a subsidiary building to a main building; a wing."
simplified_definition: to add or attach to something larger.

definition: "Annihilated."
simplified_definition: to destroy completely.

definition: "The celebration which takes place on an anniversary day."
simplified_definition: the date each year that is the same date on which a wedding or other important event happened.

definition: "To pronounce; to declare by judicial sentence."
simplified_definition: to make known; declare.

definition: "The act of announcing  or giving notice; that which announces; proclamation; publication."
simplified_definition: a public or formal statement.

definition: "One who announces."
simplified_definition: a person who presents programs or reads advertisements on radio or television.

definition: "A feeling of discomfort or vexation caused by what one dislikes; also  whatever causes such a feeling; as to work annoy."
simplified_definition: to bother or disturb with irritating behavior.

definition: "That which annoys."
simplified_definition: the act of disturbing or irritating.

definition: "of Annoy"
simplified_definition: feeling somewhat angry or irritated.

definition: "A Mass for a deceased person or for some special object  said daily for a year or on the anniversary day."
simplified_definition: happening once every year.

definition: "Yearly; year by year."
simplified_definition: once a year; yearly.

definition: "To make void or of no effect; to nullify; to abolish; to do away with;  used appropriately of laws  decrees edicts decisions of courts or other established rules permanent usages and the like which are made void by component authority."
simplified_definition: to make  no longer valid under the law.

definition: "To smear or rub over with oil or an unctuous substance; also  to spread over as oil."
simplified_definition: to honor or make holy by applying oil as part of a religious ceremony.

definition: "Nameless; of unknown name; also  of unknown or unavowed authorship; as an anonymous benefactor; an anonymous pamphlet or letter."
simplified_definition: having an unknown name or identity.

definition: "One more  in addition to a former number; a second or additional one similar in likeness or in effect."
simplified_definition: being one more just like the others; an additional.

definition: "To be or act by way of compliance  fulfillment reciprocation or satisfaction; to serve the purpose; as gypsum answers as a manure on some soils."
simplified_definition: a reply.

definition: "A hymenopterous insect of the Linnaean genus Formica  which is now made a family of several genera; an emmet; a pismire."
simplified_definition: a suffix that means causing or doing an action.

definition: "A remedy for acidity of the stomach  as an alkali or absorbent."
simplified_definition: a substance people take to settle an upset stomach. Antacids work by reducing the strength of the acids that cause the upset.

definition: "Opposition of action; counteraction or contrariety of things or principles."
simplified_definition: a state of being enemies, or a strong feeling against someone or something.

definition: "One who contends with another  especially in combat; an adversary; an opponent."
simplified_definition: a person who fights against another; an enemy or competitor.

definition: "To act in opposition."
simplified_definition: to make an enemy of.

definition: "Opposite to the northern or arctic pole; relating to the southern pole or to the region near it  and applied especially to a circle distant from the pole � . Thus we say the antarctic pole circle ocean region current etc."
simplified_definition: the land or seas at or near the South Pole; Antarctica or the Antarctic Ocean .

definition: "One of several species of edentates and monotremes that feed upon ants. See Antbear  Pangolin Aardvark and Echidna."
simplified_definition: a mammal that uses its long, sticky tongue to eat ants and termites. True anteaters have no teeth, are furry, and live in Central or South America. They are related to armadillos and sloths. Other kinds of mammals that eat ants are also sometimes called anteaters, but they are not related to American anteaters.

definition: "Presumptive; as  an antecedent improbability."
simplified_definition: the word or group of words that a pronoun refers to. In "The girls ate their dessert first," "girls" is the antecedent of "their."

definition: "One of a group of ruminant quadrupeds  intermediate between the deer and the goat. The horns are usually annulated or ringed. There are many species in Africa and Asia."
simplified_definition: an animal with horns, a long neck, long legs, and hooves. Antelopes are known for their fast running. Antelopes are mammals that eat plants and chew their cud. The smallest kind of antelope is only one foot tall; the largest antelope is six feet tall at the shoulder. Gazelles, gnus, and impalas are all antelopes. Most antelopes live in Africa; some also live in Asia.

definition: "A movable  articulated organ of sensation attached to the heads of insects and Crustacea. There are two in the former and usually four in the latter. They are used as organs of touch and in some species of Crustacea the cavity of the ear is situated near the basal joint. In insects they are popularly called horns and also feelers. The term in also applied to similar organs on the heads of other arthropods and of annelids."
simplified_definition: a metal device that sends or receives radio or television signals.

definition: "To celebrate with anthems."
simplified_definition: a song of praise or patriotism.

definition: "That part of the stamen containing the pollen  or fertilizing dust which when mature is emitted for the impregnation of the ovary."
simplified_definition: the part of a flower's stamen that bears pollen.

definition: "A mound thrown up by ants or by termites in forming their nests."
simplified_definition: a pile of earth made by ants as they dig their underground nest. Anthills are found near the nest entrance.

definition: "A discourse on flowers."
simplified_definition: a collection of written works, such as poems or stories. An anthology can be written by one or by several authors.

definition: "A hard  compact variety of mineral coal of high luster differing from bituminous coal in containing little or no bitumen in consequence of which it burns with a nearly non luminous flame. The purer specimens consist almost wholly of carbon. Also called glance coal and blind coal."
simplified_definition: a hard, shiny coal that burns with little flame or smoke.

definition: "A microscopic  bacterial organism  resembling transparent rods. "
simplified_definition: an infectious, often fatal disease. Anthrax usually infects sheep or cattle, but can infect humans as well.

definition: "The science of the structure and functions of the human body."
simplified_definition: the scientific study of humankind. People who study anthropology learn about the origins and development of human beings and their societies and customs.

definition: "A prefix meaning against  opposite or opposed to contrary or in place of;  used in composition in many English words. It is often shortened to ant; as antacid antarctic."
simplified_definition: a prefix that means "against" or "opposed to."

definition: "To foretaste or foresee; to have a previous view or impression of; as  to anticipate the pleasures of a visit; to anticipate the evils of life."
simplified_definition: to look forward to; expect.

definition: "Previous view or impression of what is to happen; instinctive prevision; foretaste; antepast; as  the anticipation of the joys of heaven."
simplified_definition: the act or process of anticipating.

definition: "To fortify or preserve by an antidote."
simplified_definition: a substance that stops poison from working or cures a disease.

definition: "Old; ancient; of genuine antiquity; as  an antique statue. In this sense it usually refers to the flourishing ages of Greece and Rome."
simplified_definition: from or made in a time long ago.

definition: "Alt. of Antiseptical"
simplified_definition: a substance or drug that kills germs that cause disease or decay.

definition: "Alt. of Antitoxine"
simplified_definition: an antibody formed in the body to act against a specific poison.

definition: "The entire horn  or any branch of the horn of a cervine animal as of a stag."
simplified_definition: one of a pair of bony growths on the head of most kinds of deer. Male elk, moose, and whitetailed deer all grow antlers with branches or prongs. Deer grow new antlers every year. Caribou and reindeer are the only deer that have antlers on both the males and the females.

definition: "A word of opposite meaning; a counterterm;  used as a correlative of synonym."
simplified_definition: a word that has the opposite meaning of another word.

definition: "To form or shape on an anvil; to hammer out; as  anviled armor."
simplified_definition: a heavy metal block with a flat top on which heated metal objects are hammered into shapes.

definition: "A state of restlessness and agitation  often with general indisposition and a distressing sense of oppression at the epigastrium."
simplified_definition: a feeling of being worried, nervous, or afraid that something will happen.

definition: "Earnestly desirous; as  anxious to please."
simplified_definition: feeling worried, nervous, or afraid about something uncertain.

definition: "Some  of whatever kind quantity or number; as are there any witnesses present are there any other houses like it"
simplified_definition: one or some, no matter which or how many.

definition: "Any one out of an indefinite number of persons; anyone; any person."
simplified_definition: any person; anyone.

definition: "In any way or manner whatever; at any rate; in any event."
simplified_definition: in any way at all.

definition: "One taken at random rather than by selection; anybody. "
simplified_definition: any person; anybody.

definition: "In any measure; anywise; at all."
simplified_definition: any thing, happening, or subject whatever.

definition: "Alt. of Anyways"
simplified_definition: in any case; anyhow; no matter what happens.

definition: "In any place."
simplified_definition: to or in any place or direction; at any place.

definition: "The great artery which carries the blood from the heart to all parts of the body except the lungs; the main trunk of the arterial system."
simplified_definition: the main artery of the body. The aorta carries blood from the left side of the heart to all parts of the body except the lungs.

definition: "In two or more parts; asunder; to piece; as  to take a piece of machinery apart."
simplified_definition: away from each other in time or space; at or to a distance; separated.

definition: "A room in a building; a division in a house  separated from others by partitions."
simplified_definition: a room or set of rooms used as living space.

definition: "Want of feeling; privation of passion  emotion or excitement; dispassion;  applied either to the body or the mind. As applied to the mind it is a calmness indolence or state of indifference incapable of being ruffled or roused to active interest or exertion by pleasure pain or passion."
simplified_definition: lack of interest or feeling.

definition: "A dupe."
simplified_definition: a mammal in the group of primates, which includes chimpanzees, gibbons, gorillas, and orangutans. Apes do not have tails. They have very flexible hands and feet. Apes range in size from three to six feet tall, and they can weigh up to  pounds. Apes live in the forests in Africa and Asia.

definition: "The diameter of the exposed part of the object glass of a telescope or other optical instrument; as  a telescope of fourinch aperture."
simplified_definition: a narrow opening.

definition: "The tip  top point or angular summit of anything; as the apex of a mountain spire or cone; the apex or tip of a leaf."
simplified_definition: the highest point; tip.

definition: "One of the genus Aphis; an aphidian."
simplified_definition: a small insect that eats by sucking the juices of plants. Aphids have soft bodies and move slowly.

definition: "The Greek goddess of love  corresponding to the Venus of the Romans."
simplified_definition: the goddess of love and beauty in Greek mythology. In Roman mythology, Aphrodite is called Venus.

definition: "Each by itself; by the single one; to each; as the share of each; as  these melons cost a shilling apiece."
simplified_definition: for or from each one; each.

definition: "A deity among the Greeks and Romans. He was the god of light and day   of archery prophecy medicine poetry and music etc. and was represented as the model of manly grace and beauty;  called also Phebus."
simplified_definition: the god of light, music, poetry, and healing in Greek and Roman mythology. Apollo was also the god of prophecy. People travelled to his shrine at Delphi to ask questions about future events.

definition: "Alt. of Apologetical"
simplified_definition: expressing or wanting to express regret, as for an error or an offense.

definition: "To defend."
simplified_definition: to say that one is sorry.

definition: "An acknowledgment intended as an atonement for some improper or injurious remark or act; an admission to another of a wrong or discourtesy done him  accompanied by an expression of regret."
simplified_definition: a statement that one is sorry for something.

definition: "A brief letter dimissory sent by a court appealed from to the superior court  stating the case etc.; a paper sent up on appeals in the admiralty courts."
simplified_definition: one of the first twelve disciples of Jesus Christ.

definition: "The mark  used to denote that a word is contracted  and as a sign of the possessive singular and plural; as a boy's hat boys' hats. In the latter use it originally marked the omission of the letter e."
simplified_definition: a punctuation mark . It is used to show where one or more letters or numbers have been left out. "Wouldn't" for "would not" and "'" for "" use apostrophes this way.

definition: "Terror; dismay."
simplified_definition: to cause to feel shock or horror.

definition: "of Apparatus"
simplified_definition: tools or equipment made for a particular task.

definition: "External clothing; vesture; garments; dress; garb; external habiliments or array."
simplified_definition: clothing.

definition: "An heir apparent."
simplified_definition: easily seen or plain.

definition: "To make application for the removal of  from an inferior to a superior judge or court for a rehearing or review on account of alleged injustice or illegality in the trial below. We say  the cause was appealed from an inferior court."
simplified_definition: an earnest request for help.

definition: "To become visible to the apprehension of the mind; to be known as a subject of observation or comprehension  or as a thing proved; to be obvious or manifest."
simplified_definition: to come into view; become visible.

definition: "The act of appearing or coming into sight; the act of becoming visible to the eye; as  his sudden appearance surprised me."
simplified_definition: the act or an instance of coming into view or appearing.

definition: "To make quiet; to calm; to reduce to a state of peace; to still; to pacify; to dispel ; as  to appease the tumult of the ocean or of the passions; to appease hunger or thirst."
simplified_definition: to cause to become calmer by meeting demands.

definition: "Inflammation of the vermiform appendix."
simplified_definition: a painful infection of the appendix.

definition: "Any literary matter added to a book  but not necessarily essential to its completeness and thus distinguished from supplement which is intended to supply deficiencies and correct inaccuracies."
simplified_definition: a section at the end of a book or magazine article that gives more information.

definition: "Tendency; appetency."
simplified_definition: a desire to eat.

definition: "Readiness in learning; docility; aptness."

definition: "Fit for plowing or tillage;  hence  often applied to land which has been plowed or tilled."

simplified_definition: any curved line; anything shaped like a bow or curve.

simplified_definition: a row of arches connected to form a passageway.

definition: "Relating to archaeology  or antiquities; as archaeological researches."
simplified_definition: of or relating to archaeology. Archaeology is the study of human life as it existed a very long time ago.

definition: "One versed in archaeology; an antiquary."
simplified_definition: a scientist who works in the field of archaeology, the study of past human life and culture.

simplified_definition: the study of past human life. An archaeologist digs up and then studies objects such as pottery, tools, and buildings.

definition: "Of or characterized by antiquity or archaism; antiquated; obsolescent."

definition: "A chief bishop; a church dignitary of the first class  who superintends the conduct of the suffragan bishops in his province  and also exercises episcopal authority in his own diocese."

definition: "Alt. of Archeological"

definition: "A bowman  one skilled in the use of the bow and arrow."
simplified_definition: a person who uses a bow and arrow.

definition: "The Grecian Archipelago  or Aegean Sea separating Greece from Asia Minor. It is studded with a vast number of small islands."
simplified_definition: a group of islands.

definition: "A contriver  designer or maker."
simplified_definition: a person who designs buildings and directs their construction.

definition: "Construction  in a more general sense; frame or structure; workmanship."

definition: "The place in which public records or historic documents are kept."

definition: "A warm waterproof overshoe."

definition: "The present indicative plural of the substantive verb to be; but etymologically a different word from be  or was. Am art are and is all come from the root as."
simplified_definition: a form of the verb "be" that is present tense and used with the pronouns "you," "we," or "they." It is also used with plural nouns.

definition: "An extent of surface; a tract of the earth's surface; a region; as  vast uncultivated areas."
simplified_definition: a place or region.

definition: "Any place of public contest or exertion; any sphere of action; as  the arenaof debate; the arena of life."

definition: "A form a government  in which the supreme power is vested in the principal persons of a state or in a privileged order; an oligarchy."
simplified_definition: a class of people who have a high social position because of the family they are born into. Members of the aristocracy are usually richer and have more privileges than other members of society.

definition: "A large flatboat used on Western American rivers to transport produce to market."

definition: "An inlet of water from the sea."
simplified_definition: the part of the human body between the shoulder and the wrist.

definition: "A fleet of armed ships; a squadron. Specifically  the Spanish fleet which was sent to assail England a. d. ."
simplified_definition: a large group of ships armed for battle.

definition: "Any edentate animal if the family Dasypidae  peculiar to America. The body and head are incased in an armor composed of small bony plates. The armadillos burrow in the earth seldom going abroad except at night. When attacked they curl up into a ball presenting the armor on all sides. Their flesh is good food. There are several species one of which  is found as far north as Texas. See Peba Poyou Tatouay."
simplified_definition: a mammal whose body is protected by hard, bony plates. Armadillos live in Central and South America, and the southern United States. Some kinds of armadillos are only six inches long; other kinds grow up to four feet in length. They eat mostly insects and are related to sloths and anteaters.

definition: "Any equipment for resistance."

definition: "A chair with arms to support the elbows or forearms."

definition: "The hollow beneath the junction of the arm and shoulder; the axilla."

simplified_definition: the condition or quality of being arrogant; having too much pride or belief in one's superiority.

simplified_definition: having or showing too much pride; behaving as though one is more important than others.

definition: "A missile weapon of offense  slender pointed and usually feathered and barbed to be shot from a bow."
simplified_definition: a thin pointed rod that is shot from a bow.

definition: "A public establishment for the storage  or for the manufacture and storage of arms and all military equipments whether for land or naval service."
simplified_definition: a building used for storing weapons and ammunition.

definition: "One of the elements  a solid substance resembling a metal in its physical properties but in its chemical relations ranking with the nonmetals. It is of a steelgray color and brilliant luster though usually dull from tarnish. It is very brittle and sublimes at � Fahrenheit. It is sometimes found native but usually combined with silver cobalt nickel iron antimony or sulphur. Orpiment and realgar are two of its sulphur compounds the first of which is the true arsenicum of the ancients. The element and its compounds are active poisons. Specific gravity from . to .. Atomic weight . Symbol As."
simplified_definition: a poisonous substance that is one of the chemical elements. It can be either grayish white, yellow, or black.

definition: "Hence: Any continuous or ramified channel of communication; as  arteries of trade or commerce."

simplified_definition: a plant like a tall thistle with a flower head made up of thick leaves. The head of the artichoke is eaten as a vegetable.

definition: "Alt. of Artistical"

definition: "Than."

definition: "To move upward; to mount; to go up; to rise;  opposed to descend."

definition: "The act of rising; motion upward; rise; a mounting upward; as  he made a tedious ascent; the ascent of vapors from the earth."

definition: "To render  certain; to cause to feel certain; to make confident; to assure; to apprise."

definition: "sing. of Ashes."
simplified_definition: a tree that is related to the olive tree. It has seeds that look like wings and leaves of more than one part.

definition: "Affected by shame; abashed or confused by guilt  or a conviction or consciousness of some wrong action or impropriety."

definition: "On shore or on land; on the land adjacent to water; to the shore; to the land; aground ;  sometimes opposed to aboard or afloat."
simplified_definition: to or onto the shore.

definition: "On  or to one side; out of a straight line course or direction; at a little distance from the rest; out of the way; apart."

definition: "Awry; askance; asquint; oblique or obliquely;  sometimes indicating scorn  or contempt or entry."
simplified_definition: not straight; crooked.

definition: "In the sleep of the grave; dead."
simplified_definition: sleeping.

definition: "A genus of perennial plants belonging to the natural order Liliaceae  and having erect much branched stems and very slender branchlets which are sometimes mistaken for leaves. Asparagus racemosus is a shrubby climbing plant with fragrant flowers. Specifically: The Asparagus officinalis a species cultivated in gardens."
simplified_definition: a plant related to the lily, whose young shoots are cooked and eaten as a vegetable. The shoots are shaped like spears with scaly leaves at the tip.

definition: "The influence of the stars for good or evil; as  an ill aspect."
simplified_definition: a part or element.

definition: "Of or pertaining to the aspen  or resembling it; made of aspen wood."

definition: "To cover with asphalt; as  to asphalt a roof; asphalted streets."

definition: "The act of aspirating; the pronunciation of a letter with a full or strong emission of breath; an aspirated sound."

definition: "To desire with eagerness; to seek to attain something high or great; to pant; to long;  followed by to or after  and rarely by at; as to aspire to a crown; to aspire after immorality."
simplified_definition: to want strongly; have as an aim .

definition: "A quadruped of the genus Equus   smaller than the horse and having a peculiarly harsh bray and long ears. The tame or domestic ass is patient slow and surefooted and has become the type of obstinacy and stupidity. There are several species of wild asses which are swiftfooted."
simplified_definition: a mammal with long legs and hooves that is closely related to the horse. A donkey is a domestic ass. Asses look like horses but are smaller and have longer ears. Wild asses live in Africa and Asia and are in danger of becoming extinct.

definition: "One who kills  or attempts to kill by surprise or secret assault; one who treacherously murders any one unprepared for defense."

definition: "An assassination  murder or murderous assault."
