definition: "A violent onset or attack with physical means  as blows weapons etc.; an onslaught; the rush or charge of an attacking force; onset; as to make assault upon a man a house or a town."
simplified_definition: a violent physical or verbal attack.

definition: "To liken; to compare."
simplified_definition: to gather into a group.

definition: "A collection of inanimate objects."
simplified_definition: a group of people gathered together, usually for a specific purpose.

definition: "The act of assenting; the act of the mind in admitting or agreeing to anything; concurrence with approval; consent; agreement; acquiescence."
simplified_definition: to agree .

definition: "To maintain or defend  as a cause or a claim by words or measures; to vindicate a claim or title to; as to assert our rights and liberties."
simplified_definition: to state with force or confidence.

definition: "Positive; affirming confidently; affirmative; peremptory."
simplified_definition: forward or aggressive in speech or action.

definition: "To fix or determine the rate or amount of."
simplified_definition: to look at and try to discover the quality or degree of ; evaluate; estimate.

definition: "Any article or separable part of one's assets."
simplified_definition: something useful or valuable.

definition: "To appoint; to allot; to apportion; to make over."
simplified_definition: to set apart or give out for a particular use.

definition: "An allotting or an appointment to a particular person or use; or for a particular time  as of a cause or causes in court."
simplified_definition: an assigned task, such as a job or lesson.

definition: "To become similar or like something else."
simplified_definition: of immigrants or the like, to become absorbed into a new cultural group.

definition: "To be present as a spectator; as  to assist at a public meeting."
simplified_definition: to give aid or support to.

definition: "An assistant or helper; a body of helpers."
simplified_definition: the act of giving aid or support.

definition: "Helping; lending aid or support; auxiliary."
simplified_definition: a person who gives help, aid, or assistance.

definition: "Anything closely or usually connected with another; an concomitant."
simplified_definition: to connect with something else in one's mind.

definition: "The act of associating  or state of being associated; union; connection whether of persons of things."
simplified_definition: a group of people joined together for a common purpose or by a shared interest.

definition: "of Assort"
simplified_definition: of different kinds or sorts, collected together; variety.

definition: "A collection containing a variety of sorts or kinds adapted to various wants  demands or purposes; as an assortment of goods."
simplified_definition: a collection of different sorts of things; variety.

definition: "To be arrogant or pretentious; to claim more than is due."
simplified_definition: to suppose  to be true without knowing the actual facts; take for granted.

definition: "The act of assuming  or taking to or upon one's self; the act of taking up or adopting."
simplified_definition: something that is supposed or believed without questioning. For example, if you ask someone whether she is allowed to watch TV during dinner, you have made an assumption that there is a TV in her house. Assumptions are ideas people have that are not based on proven facts. An assumption can be correct or incorrect.

definition: "Insurance; a contract for the payment of a sum on occasion of a certain event  as loss or death."
simplified_definition: a statement meant to give confidence.

definition: "To declare to  solemnly; to assert to  with the design of inspiring belief or confidence."
simplified_definition: to say to with force or conviction.

definition: "A genus of herbs with compound white or bluish flowers; starwort; Michaelmas daisy."
simplified_definition: a plant with white, pink, blue, or purple flowers. The flowers are made up of many narrow petals around a yellow center.

definition: "The figure of a star  thus  used in printing and writing as a reference to a passage or note in the margin to supply the omission of letters or words or to mark a word or phrase as having a special character."
simplified_definition: a sign . It is used to show that there is other information on the page that explains the information where the sign is placed.

definition: "A starlike body; esp. one of the numerous small planets whose orbits lie between those of Mars and Jupiter;  called also planetoids and minor planets."
simplified_definition: a small, rocky, planetlike body that circles the sun and is mostly found between the orbits of Jupiter and Mars. The size of an asteroid can vary from very tiny to six hundred miles across.

definition: "A disease  characterized by difficulty of breathing  recurring at intervals accompanied with a wheezing sound a sense of constriction in the chest a cough and expectoration."
simplified_definition: a disease of the lungs that makes it difficult to breathe. Asthma is often caused by an allergy.

definition: "Stirring; in a state of activity or motion; out of bed."
simplified_definition: in action; moving.

definition: "To stun; to render senseless  as by a blow."
simplified_definition: to fill with great surprise or amazement.

definition: "The condition of one who is stunned. Hence: Numbness; loss of sensation; stupor; loss of sense."
simplified_definition: great surprise or amazement.

definition: "of Astone"
simplified_definition: to cause surprise or wonder; amaze.

definition: "Out of the right  either in a literal or in a figurative sense; wandering; as to lead one astray."
simplified_definition: off the right or known path or course.

definition: "With one leg on each side  as a man when on horseback; with the legs stretched wide apart; astraddle."
simplified_definition: over or upon and with a leg on each side of.

definition: "See Bacterium."
simplified_definition: microscopic organisms that often play a role in the decay of living things, the process of fermentation, and sometimes in causing disease. Bacteria are each made up of only one cell, but different kinds of bacteria can take different shapes. These organisms live in all parts of the earth including oceans, deserts, glaciers, hot springs, and in the bodies of most living things. While some kinds of bacteria are dangerous, most kinds are useful because they help in the digestion of food, in the making of soil, in the creation of medicines, and in many other natural processes.

definition: "A microscopic vegetable organism  belonging to the class Algae usually in the form of a jointed rodlike filament and found in putrefying organic infusions. Bacteria are destitute of chlorophyll and are the smallest of microscopic organisms. They are very widely diffused in nature and multiply with marvelous rapidity both by fission and by spores. Certain species are active agents in fermentation while others appear to be the cause of certain infectious diseases. See Bacillus."
simplified_definition: singular form of "bacteria." Bacteria are tiny living things made up of one cell each. Bacteria live in most living things and in all parts of the earth. Most bacteria are useful to people, but some are harmful because they can cause disease.

simplified_definition: an outdoor party at which meat and vegetables are cooked over an open fire.

definition: "To shave and dress the beard or hair of."
simplified_definition: a person whose job is to shave, trim, or style hair and beards.

definition: "Mere; alone; unaccompanied by anything else; as  a bare majority."
simplified_definition: wearing no clothing or covering; naked.

definition: "On the bare back of a horse  without using a saddle; as to ride bareback."
simplified_definition: on the back of a horse or donkey without a saddle.

definition: "With the feet bare; without shoes or stockings."
simplified_definition: with nothing on the feet.

definition: "Merely; only."
simplified_definition: only just; hardly.

definition: "An agreement between parties concerning the sale of property; or a contract by which one party binds himself to transfer the right to some property for a consideration  and the other party binds himself to receive the property and pay the consideration."
simplified_definition: an agreement that contains the terms of a transaction or exchange.

definition: "A pleasure boat; a vessel or boat of state  elegantly furnished and decorated."
simplified_definition: a large, long boat with a flat bottom used for carrying freight.

definition: "A word which has no accent marked on the last syllable  the grave accent being understood."
simplified_definition: the range of the male voice that is between tenor and bass.

definition: "One of the elements  belonging to the alkaline earth group; a metal having a silverwhite color and melting at a very high temperature. It is difficult to obtain the pure metal from the facility with which it becomes oxidized in the air. Atomic weight . Symbol Ba. Its oxide called baryta."
simplified_definition: a chemical element. Barium is usually found in compounds with other elements.

definition: "Alt. of Barque"
simplified_definition: the outside cover of the trunks, branches, and roots of woody plants.

definition: "A valuable grain  of the family of grasses genus Hordeum used for food and for making malt from which are prepared beer ale and whisky."
simplified_definition: a plant that is like grass and whose grains are used to make food.

definition: "A child.  See Bairn."
simplified_definition: a large farm building used to shelter animals or store equipment or crops.

definition: "Any cirriped crustacean adhering to rocks  floating timber ships etc. esp.  the sessile species  and  the stalked or goose barnacles . See Cirripedia and Goose barnacle."
simplified_definition: a small sea animal that attaches its shell to rocks, the bottom of ships, docks, and other objects in shallow parts of the ocean. Barnacles float freely in the ocean when they are young. They develop shells with sharp edges as adults. Barnacles are kinds of crustaceans.

definition: "A yard belonging to a barn."
simplified_definition: a yard or fenced area next to a barn.

definition: "An instrument for determining the weight or pressure of the atmosphere  and hence for judging of the probable changes of weather or for ascertaining the height of any ascent."
simplified_definition: an instrument that measures the pressure of the atmosphere and is used to predict the weather.

definition: "A husband; as  baron and feme husband and wife."
simplified_definition: a nobleman by birth of a particular rank.

definition: "A baron's wife; also  a lady who holds the baronial title in her own right; as the Baroness BurdettCoutts."
simplified_definition: a noblewoman of a particular rank by birth or by marriage.

definition: "To live or lodge in barracks."
simplified_definition: a building where soldiers live for a short amount of time.

definition: "Alt. of Barracouata"
simplified_definition: a fish that lives in warm ocean water and has a long body. Barracuda are fierce hunters.

definition: "An artificial bar or obstruction placed in a river or water course to increase the depth of water; as  the barrages of the Nile."
simplified_definition: a great number of things coming one after another very quickly.

definition: "A solid drum  or a hollow cylinder or case; as the barrel of a windlass; the barrel of a watch within which the spring is coiled."
simplified_definition: a round container with a flat top and bottom and bulging sides, often made of wood boards and metal hoops.

definition: "Not producing vegetation  or useful vegetation; rile."
simplified_definition: not able to produce or support growth.

definition: "A fortification  made in haste of trees earth palisades wagons or anything that will obstruct the progress or attack of an enemy. It is usually an obstruction formed in streets to block an enemy's access."
simplified_definition: a structure that is put up quickly for protection or to block the way.

definition: "A fortress or fortified town  on the frontier of a country commanding an avenue of approach."
simplified_definition: something that blocks the way such as a fence or wall.

definition: "A support having handles  and with or without a wheel on which heavy or bulky things can be transported by hand. See Handbarrow and Wheelbarrow."
simplified_definition: a flat frame used for carrying a load. A barrow has two handles at each end or handles at one end and a wheel at the other; wheelbarrow.

definition: "To traffic or trade  by exchanging one commodity for another in distinction from a sale and purchase in which money is paid for the commodities transferred; to truck."
simplified_definition: to trade services or things for other services or things without using money.

definition: "An imitation  in pottery of natural basalt; a kind of black porcelain."
simplified_definition: a dark, heavy rock that is created by lava flowing from volcanoes.

definition: "An apron."
simplified_definition: that on which something stands or rests; foundation.

definition: "A game of ball  so called from the bases or bounds  which designate the circuit which each player must endeavor to make after striking the ball."
simplified_definition: a game played with a bat and ball by two teams of nine players each, the object being to score runs by advancing runners around four bases.

definition: "The outer wall of the ground story of a building  or of a part of that story when treated as a distinct substructure. .) Hence: The rooms of a ground floor collectively."
simplified_definition: the space in a building that is underground or partly underground.

definition: "Very modest  or modest excess; constitutionally disposed to shrink from public notice; indicating extreme or excessive modesty; shy; as a bashful person action expression."
simplified_definition: shy with people; timid.

definition: "Relating to a base; performing the office of a base in a salt."
simplified_definition: of, forming, or at the basis; main.

definition: "An isolated or circumscribed formation  particularly where the strata dip inward on all sides toward a center;  especially applied to the coal formations called coal basins or coal fields."
simplified_definition: an open, shallow bowl used to hold water for washing.

definition: "The foundation of anything; that on which a thing rests."
simplified_definition: something that supports and is needed by all the other parts; starting point or foundation.

definition: "To lie in warmth; to be exposed to genial heat."
simplified_definition: to lie in a warm, calm place.

definition: "A vessel made of osiers or other twigs  cane rushes splints or other flexible material interwoven."
simplified_definition: a container made of materials such as wood strips, grass, or straw that are woven or laced together.

definition: "Deep or grave in tone."
simplified_definition: the part of music that requires the lowest range of pitch, or sounds made in the low range.

definition: "The largest of the different kinds of drums  having two heads and emitting a deep grave sound. See Bass a."
simplified_definition: a large drum that makes a low, booming sound.

definition: "A stringed instrument of the viol family  used for playing bass. See d Bass n. and Violoncello."
simplified_definition: see "double bass."

definition: "A wind instrument of the double reed kind  furnished with holes which are stopped by the fingers and by keys as in flutes. It forms the natural bass to the oboe clarinet etc."
simplified_definition: a large woodwind instrument. The bassoon has a long wooden body attached to a curved, metal tube with a mouthpiece at its end.

definition: "To sew loosely  or with long stitches;  usually that the work may be held in position until sewed more firmly."
simplified_definition: to sew with long, loose stitches. Basting lets one put together the pieces of a garment to see how it fits before the final sewing.

definition: "To use a bat  as in a game of baseball."
simplified_definition: a small mammal that flies. Bats have small bodies and large wings covered with skin. Most bats eat at night, when they use sound to find and catch flying insects. Bats are found in most parts of the world. There are around one thousand kinds of bats. Their wingspans range from less than two inches to more than five feet. Some kinds of bats live in large colonies that roost in caves or in a section of forest.

definition: "The quantity of bread baked at one time."
simplified_definition: an amount of something or a number of similar things grouped or considered as a whole.

definition: "The act of exposing the body  or part of the body for purposes of cleanliness comfort health etc. to water vapor hot air or the like; as a cold or a hot bath; a medicated bath; a steam bath; a hip bath."
simplified_definition: the act of washing or soaking something in order to clean, refresh, or heal.

definition: "To wash by immersion  as in a bath; to subject to a bath."
simplified_definition: to give a bath to; wash.

definition: "An ordinary with its ends cut off  borne sinister as a mark of bastardy and containing one fourth in breadth of the bend sinister;  called also bastard bar. See Bend sinister."
simplified_definition: a thin rod or stick used by a conductor in leading an orchestra.

definition: "A body of troops; esp. a body of troops or an army in battle array."
simplified_definition: a large group of soldiers, made up of several companies.

definition: "To beat with successive blows; to beat repeatedly and with violence  so as to bruise shatter or demolish; as to batter a wall or rampart."
simplified_definition: the person who stands in to bat the ball in baseball, softball, or cricket.

definition: "The box in which the stamps for crushing ore play up and down."
simplified_definition: a device that makes electricity by using chemical reactions. Batteries are used to power many things, including cars, flashlights, toys, and watches.

definition: "Fertile. See Battel  a."
simplified_definition: a fight between two armed persons or forces during a war.

definition: "pl. The whole parapet  consisting of alternate solids and open spaces. At first purely a military feature afterwards copied on a smaller scale with decorative features as for churches."
simplified_definition: a wall along the top of a castle, fort, or tower that has openings for people to shoot through.

definition: "To cry out with a loud  full sound; to cry with vehemence as in calling or exultation; to shout; to vociferate."
simplified_definition: to cry loudly or strongly; wail.

definition: "A kind of mahogany obtained from Campeachy Bay."
simplified_definition: a part of a sea or lake that cuts into a coastline and is partly surrounded by land.

definition: "A pointed instrument of the dagger kind fitted on the muzzle of a musket or rifle  so as to give the soldier increased means of offense and defense."
simplified_definition: a weapon like a knife attached to the front end of a rifle for use in close fighting.

definition: "An inlet from the Gulf of Mexico  from a lake or from a large river sometimes sluggish sometimes without perceptible movement except from tide and wind."
simplified_definition: a stream that moves slowly through a swamp or marsh. Bayous are found in the southern United States.

definition: "Alt. of Bazar"
simplified_definition: an outdoor street market made up of rows of little shops or stalls where people buy and sell things.

definition: "To exist in a certain manner or relation   whether as a reality or as a product of thought; to exist as the subject of a certain predicate that is as having a certain attribute or as belonging to a certain sort or as identical with what is specified  a word or words for the predicate being annexed; as to be happy; to be here; to be large or strong; to be an animal; to be a hero; to be a nonentity; three and two are five; annihilation is the cessation of existence; that is the man."
simplified_definition: symbol of the chemical element beryllium.

definition: "To run or drive  upon a beach; to strand; as  to beach a ship."
simplified_definition: the land at the edge of a lake, ocean, or other body of water. A beach slopes gently toward the water and usually has sand or pebbles.

definition: "A signal fire to notify of the approach of an enemy  or to give any notice commonly of warning."
simplified_definition: a signal of light or radio waves that guides or warns ships or aircraft.

definition: "A prayer."
simplified_definition: a small, round object made of material such as glass, wood, or plastic. A bead has a small hole through its center so it can be put on a string to make necklaces or to decorate clothing.

definition: "A small hound  or hunting dog twelve to fifteen inches high used in hunting hares and other small game. See Illustration in Appendix."
simplified_definition: a breed of dog. Beagles are small dogs with short legs, drooping ears, and smooth fur that is usually black, tan, and white.

definition: "The long projecting sucking mouth of some insects  and other invertebrates as in the Hemiptera."
simplified_definition: the hard, curved mouth part of a bird; bill.

definition: "A large drinking cup  with a wide mouth supported on a foot or standard."
simplified_definition: an open glass container with a flat bottom and a pouring spout. Beakers are used by chemists and other scientists.

definition: "The pole of a carriage."
simplified_definition: a long, strong piece of wood or metal used to support floors, ceilings or roofs.

definition: "The popular name of other vegetable seeds or fruits  more or less resembling true beans."
simplified_definition: the seed or seed pod of certain plants. Many kinds of beans are eaten as a vegetable.

definition: "To press;  with on or upon  or against."
simplified_definition: a large furry mammal with a short tail. Bears are omnivorous; they may eat plants, honey, insects, fish, and small mammals. There are several kinds of bears, including black bears, brown bears, grizzly bears, and polar bears.

definition: "To deprive of the gills;  used only of oysters and similar shellfish."
simplified_definition: the hair growing on a man's face.

definition: "of Bear"
simplified_definition: the way a person acts, behaves, stands, or walks.

definition: "A game at cards similar to loo."
simplified_definition: any animal other than a human, especially a mammal with four legs.

definition: "Abominable; as  beastly weather."
simplified_definition: of or like a beast in appearance or manner.

definition: "A stroke; a blow."
simplified_definition: to hit again and again.

definition: "Tried; practiced."
simplified_definition: used by many people; much traveled.

definition: "Having the qualities which constitute beauty; pleasing to the sight or the mind."
simplified_definition: delightful to see, hear, or experience; lovely to the senses; having beauty.

definition: "To make or render beautiful; to add beauty to; to adorn; to deck; to grace; to embellish."
simplified_definition: to make beautiful.

definition: "A particular grace  feature ornament or excellence; anything beautiful; as the beauties of nature."
simplified_definition: the quality of being pleasant to the senses or beautiful; loveliness.

definition: "A hat  formerly made of the fur of the beaver but now usually of silk."
simplified_definition: a large rodent, up to four feet long, with thick brown fur and a wide flat tail. Beavers use their long front teeth to cut down trees for food and to build dams and lodges . They use the dams to keep water around their lodges. Beavers live in North America, Europe, and Asia.

definition: "of Become"
simplified_definition: past tense of "become."

definition: "By or for the cause that; on this account that; for the reason that."
simplified_definition: for the reason that.

definition: "To make a significant sign to; hence  to summon as by a motion of the hand."
simplified_definition: to signal to come using a motion of the head or hands.

definition: "To suit or be suitable to; to be congruous with; to befit; to accord with  in character or circumstances; to be worthy of or proper for; to cause to appear well;  said of persons and things."
simplified_definition: to grow or come to be.

definition: "Appropriate or fit; congruous; suitable; graceful; befitting."
simplified_definition: pleasant or attractive looking.

definition: "To dress or prepare the surface of stone) so as to serve as a bed."
simplified_definition: a piece of furniture used for resting or sleeping.

definition: "A bed and its furniture; the materials of a bed  whether for man or beast; bedclothes; litter."
simplified_definition: blankets, sheets, pillows, and other coverings for a bed.

definition: "A pan for warming beds."
simplified_definition: a shallow pan used as a toilet by a person who cannot get out of bed.

definition: "of Bedraggle"
simplified_definition: dirty, wet, or limp from having wandered or been dragged through mud and water.

definition: "Room in a bed."
simplified_definition: a room used for sleeping.

definition: "The side of a bed."
simplified_definition: the space beside a bed, especially of a sick person.

definition: "A bedquilt; a counterpane; a coverlet."
simplified_definition: a covering for a bed.

definition: "The time to go to bed."
simplified_definition: the usual time when a person goes to bed or is supposed to go to bed.

definition: "p. p. of Be;  used for been."
simplified_definition: an insect with a hairy body, four wings, and sometimes a stinger. Some kinds of bees live in social groups, and some live alone. Many bees drink nectar from flowers.

definition: "A tree of the genus Fagus."
simplified_definition: a tree that has smooth, gray bark and nuts that people can eat.

definition: "Applied colloquially to human flesh."
simplified_definition: meat from a cow or steer.

definition: "A steak of beef; a slice of beef broiled or suitable for broiling."
simplified_definition: a slice of beef for frying or broiling.

definition: "A hive for a swarm of bees. Also used figuratively."
simplified_definition: a shelter in which bees live.

definition: "The past participle of Be. In old authors it is also the pr. tense plural of Be. See st Bee."
simplified_definition: past participle of "be."

definition: "A fermented liquor made from any malted grain  but commonly from barley malt with hops or some other substance to impart a bitter flavor."
simplified_definition: an alcoholic drink made of hops and malt.

definition: "The wax secreted by bees  and of which their cells are constructed."
simplified_definition: the wax made by bees in building their honeycombs.

definition: "A biennial plant of the genus Beta  which produces an edible root the first year and seed the second year."
simplified_definition: a plant whose leaves and fleshy dark red root can be eaten.

definition: "To extend over and beyond the base or support; to overhang; to jut."
simplified_definition: an insect with a pair of hard front wings that covers a pair of thin wings. There are many different kinds of beetles. Japanese beetles, ladybugs, and fireflies are beetles.

definition: "To come to pass; to happen."
simplified_definition: to take place; happen.

definition: "Preceding in time; earlier than; previously to; anterior to the time when;  sometimes with the additional idea of purpose; in order that."
simplified_definition: at an earlier time; in the past.

definition: "In a state of anticipation ore preoccupation; in advance;  often followed by with."
simplified_definition: ahead of time; at an earlier time.

definition: "To act as a friend to; to favor; to aid  benefit or countenance."
simplified_definition: to be or act as a friend to.

definition: "To ask to be appointed guardian for  or to ask to have a guardian appointed for."
simplified_definition: to ask a favor of; to plead for.

definition: "of Begin"
simplified_definition: past tense of "begin."

definition: "To cause to seem very poor and inadequate."
simplified_definition: a person who begs as a way to meet basic needs such as food and clothing.

definition: "To trace or lay the foundation of; to make or place a beginning of."
simplified_definition: to do the first step in a process; start.

definition: "of Begin"
simplified_definition: the first part of something.

definition: "A genus of plants  mostly of tropical America many species of which are grown as ornamental plants. The leaves are curiously onesided and often exhibit brilliant colors."
simplified_definition: a tropical plant with bright flowers in many colors. The leaves are often streaked or spotted.

definition: "p. p. of Begin."
simplified_definition: past participle of "begin."

definition: "Advantage; favor; stead; benefit; interest; profit; support; defense; vindication."
simplified_definition: support; aid .

definition: "To carry; to conduct; to comport; to manage; to bear;  used reflexively."
simplified_definition: to act or function in a certain way.

definition: "Manner of behaving  whether good or bad; mode of conducting one's self; conduct; deportment; carriage;  used also of inanimate objects; as the behavior of a ship in a storm; the behavior of the magnetic needle."
simplified_definition: the way a person acts or behaves.

definition: "To sever the head from; to take off the head of."
simplified_definition: to cut off the head of.

definition: "imp.  p. p. of Behold."
simplified_definition: past tense and past participle of "behold."

definition: "Backward in time or order of succession; past."
simplified_definition: in or at the back of; on the other side of.

definition: "To have in sight; to see clearly; to look at; to regard with the eyes."
simplified_definition: to see or observe.

definition: "Debeige."
simplified_definition: the color that comes from mixing tan and gray paint.

definition: "Since; inasmuch as."
simplified_definition: the state or fact of living or existing.

definition: "of Belate"
simplified_definition: too late; tardy.

definition: "To issue with spasmodic force or noise."
simplified_definition: to release gas from the stomach through the mouth in a noisy burst; burp.

definition: "A movable tower erected by besiegers for purposes of attack and defense."
simplified_definition: a tower of a church or other building in which a bell is hung; bell tower.

definition: "A persuasion of the truths of religion; faith."
simplified_definition: a strong opinion.

definition: "To exercise belief in; to credit upon the authority or testimony of another; to be persuaded of the truth of  upon evidence furnished by reasons arguments and deductions of the mind or by circumstances other than personal knowledge; to regard or accept as true; to place confidence in; to think; to consider; as to believe a person a statement or a doctrine."
simplified_definition: to accept as honest or true.

definition: "To make bellmouthed; as  to bell a tube."
simplified_definition: a hollow metal cup that makes a ringing sound when struck.

definition: "A nation or state recognized as carrying on war; a person engaged in warfare."
simplified_definition: having a fighting character; aggressive.

definition: "A loud resounding outcry or noise  as of an enraged bull; a roar."
simplified_definition: to make the deep, loud cry of a bull.

definition: "An instrument  utensil or machine which by alternate expansion and contraction or by rise and fall of the top draws in air through a valve and expels it through a tube for various purposes as blowing fires ventilating mines or filling the pipes of an organ with wind."
simplified_definition: a bag that can be expanded to draw air in and squeezed to force air out. Bellows are used to blow air on a fire or produce sound on a musical instrument.

definition: "To swell and become protuberant  like the belly; to bulge."
simplified_definition: the front of a person or underside of an animal; stomach.

definition: "To be deserved by."
simplified_definition: to have a proper or appropriate location.

definition: "That which belongs to one; that which pertains to one; hence  goods or effects."
simplified_definition: the condition of being comfortable and friendly with others.

definition: "In court or tribunal of inferior jurisdiction; as  at the trial below."
simplified_definition: in or to a lower place; beneath.

definition: "To shear  as the buttocks and tails of sheep."
simplified_definition: a strip of cloth, leather, or other material worn around the waist.

definition: "A long seat  differing from a stool in its greater length."
simplified_definition: a long seat for two or more people.

definition: "same as caisson disease. Usually referred to as the bends."
simplified_definition: to cause to take on a curved or angled form, or a different form.

definition: "In a lower place; underneath."
simplified_definition: in a lower place; below.

definition: "Conferring benefits; useful; profitable; helpful; advantageous; serviceable; contributing to a valuable end;  followed by to."
simplified_definition: having a good or favorable effect; helpful.

definition: "A theatrical performance  a concert or the like the proceeds of which do not go to the lessee of the theater or to the company but to some individual actor or to some charitable use."
simplified_definition: an object, action, or sum of money that improves someone's life; aid.

definition: "The language spoken in Bengal."
simplified_definition: a language spoken mainly in eastern India and Bangladesh.

definition: "Strongly inclined toward something  so as to be resolved determined set etc.;  said of the mind character disposition desires etc. and used with on; as to be bent on going to college; he is bent on mischief."
simplified_definition: not straight.

definition: "A member of a race somewhat resembling the Arabs  but often classed as Hamitic who were formerly the inhabitants of the whole of North Africa from the Mediterranean southward into the Sahara and who still occupy a large part of that region;  called also Kabyles. Also the language spoken by this people."
simplified_definition: a group of languages spoken by many people in northern Africa, especially in the countries of Morocco and Algeria.

definition: "A fourwheeled carriage  having a sheltered seat behind the body and separate from it invented in the th century at Berlin."
simplified_definition: the capital city of Germany. Between  and  the city was divided into East Berlin and West Berlin. For most of that time the Berlin Wall, a concrete and wire barrier, separated East and West Berlin.

definition: "Any small fleshy fruit  as the strawberry mulberry huckleberry etc."
simplified_definition: any of several small, juicy fruits that do not have a pit, such as the strawberry, raspberry, or blueberry.

definition: "An allotted place; an appointment; situation or employment."
simplified_definition: a shelf or bunk for sleeping on a ship or train.

definition: "A metallic element found in the beryl. See Glucinum."
simplified_definition: a hard, light, gray substance that is one of the chemical elements. Beryllium is sometimes combined with other elements to form an alloy. It is also used in building rockets.

definition: "To ask or entreat with urgency; to supplicate; to implore."
simplified_definition: to make an important or urgent request to; beg.

definition: "To occupy; to employ; to use up."
simplified_definition: to attack from all sides; besiege.

definition: "At the side of; on one side of."
simplified_definition: next to; at the side of.

definition: "Alt. of Beside"
simplified_definition: also; in addition.

definition: "To beset or surround with armed forces  for the purpose of compelling to surrender; to lay siege to; to beleaguer; to beset."
simplified_definition: to surround with soldiers in order to attack or capture.

definition: "Most intimately; most thoroughly or correctly; as  what is expedient is best known to himself."
simplified_definition: superlative of "good."

definition: "To lay up in store; to deposit for safe keeping; to stow; to place; to put."
simplified_definition: to give as a gift or award .

definition: "To stake or pledge upon the event of a contingent issue; to wager."
simplified_definition: to agree to pay if one's guess about some future event is wrong.

definition: "To deliver into the hands of an enemy by treachery or fraud  in violation of trust; to give up treacherously or faithlessly; as an officer betrayed the city."
simplified_definition: to help the enemy of; commit treason.

definition: "Greater in amount; larger; more."
simplified_definition: comparative of "good."

definition: "In intermediate relation to  in respect to time quantity or degree; as between nine and ten o'clock."
simplified_definition: in the area that separates.

definition: "Liquid for drinking; drink;  usually applied to drink artificially prepared and of an agreeable flavor; as  an intoxicating beverage."
simplified_definition: any liquid for drinking, except water or medicine.

definition: "To be on one's guard; to be cautious; to take care;  commonly followed by of or lest before the thing that is to be avoided."
simplified_definition: to be careful or wary .

definition: "To lead into perplexity or confusion  as for want of a plain path; to perplex with mazes; or in general to perplex or confuse greatly."
simplified_definition: to confuse or puzzle.

definition: "To gain an ascendency over by charms or incantations; to affect  by witchcraft or sorcery."
simplified_definition: to enchant or cast a spell over with magic or as if with magic.

definition: "Further away; at a distance; yonder."
simplified_definition: past the farthest side of; farther on than; later than.

definition: "In most branches of science bi in composition denotes two  twice or doubly; as bidentate twotoothed; biternate doubly ternate etc."
simplified_definition: a prefix that means "two" or "both."

definition: "To incline to one side; to give a particular direction to; to influence; to prejudice; to prepossess."
simplified_definition: a line diagonal to the grain of a woven cloth.

definition: "Alt. of Bibbe"
simplified_definition: a piece of cloth tied under the chin. A bib is worn by babies to protect the clothing during a meal.

definition: "A book with an authoritative exposition of some topic  respected by many who are experts in the field."
simplified_definition: the main sacred writings of Judaism and Christianity. The writings of Judaism are made up of the Old Testament, while those of Christianity are made up of both the Old and New Testaments.

definition: "Pertaining to  or derived from the Bible; as biblical learning; biblical authority."
simplified_definition: of or in the Bible.

definition: "A history or description of books and manuscripts  with notices of the different editions the times when they were printed etc."
simplified_definition: a list of titles about a certain subject.

definition: "A muscle having two heads or origins;  applied particularly to a flexor in the arm  and to another in the thigh."
simplified_definition: the large muscle at the front of the upper arm that bends the elbow.

definition: "A wrangle; also  a noise as in angry contention."
simplified_definition: to quarrel about something that does not matter.

definition: "One of the two doublepointed teeth which intervene between the canines  and the molars  on each side of each jaw. See Tooth n."
simplified_definition: a tooth ending in two points.

definition: "A light vehicle having two wheels one behind the other. It has a saddle seat and is propelled by the rider's feet acting on cranks or levers."
simplified_definition: a light vehicle with two wheels, one behind the other, a small seat, and handlebars for steering. Pedals make the wheels move.

definition: "imp.  p. p. of Bid."
simplified_definition: to say to.

definition: "Happening  or taking place once in two years; as a biennial election."
simplified_definition: happening every second year.

definition: "Alt. of Bigg"
simplified_definition: large in size, number, or weight.

definition: "The Rocky Mountain sheep ."
simplified_definition: a wild sheep found in the Rocky Mountains of North America. The male has large, curved horns; the female has short, straight horns. They are also called Rocky Mountain sheep.

definition: "A nest of wild bees  wasps or ants; a swarm."
simplified_definition: a short form of "bicycle" or "motorcycle."

definition: "A yellow  or greenish viscid fluid usually alkaline in reaction secreted by the liver. It passes into the intestines where it aids in the digestive process. Its characteristic constituents are the bile salts and coloring matters."
simplified_definition: a bitter, yellowish liquid made in the liver. Bile helps to digest fats.

definition: "Containing  or consisting of two languages; expressed in two languages; as a bilingual inscription; a bilingual dictionary."
simplified_definition: able to speak two languages well.

definition: "To charge or enter in a bill; as  to bill goods."
simplified_definition: a written list showing the cost of items bought or services provided.

definition: "A piece of thick plank  armed with iron plates and fixed on the bow or fore channels of a vessel for the bill or fluke of the anchor to rest on."
simplified_definition: a large board for displaying outdoor advertisements, often seen next to highways.

definition: "A game played with ivory balls o a clothcovered  rectangular table bounded by elastic cushions. The player seeks to impel his ball with his cue so that it shall either strike  two other balls or drive another ball into one of the pockets with which the table sometimes is furnished."
simplified_definition: a game played with long sticks and hard balls on a special table covered with cloth. Players use a stick to hit the balls against each other and into pockets along the edges of the table.

definition: "According to the French and American method of numeration  a thousand millions or    ; according to the English method a million millions or     . See Numeration."
simplified_definition: the number that is equal to one thousand times one million; ,,,.

definition: "A great wave or flood of anything."
simplified_definition: a large wave in the ocean; swell.

definition: "A box  frame crib or inclosed place used as a receptacle for any commodity; as a corn bin; a wine bin; a coal bin."
simplified_definition: a container or space for storing things such as wood, certain foods, or coal. Bins are also used for storing things that will be discarded later.

definition: "Compounded or consisting of two things or parts; characterized by two ."
simplified_definition: having two parts or components.

definition: "To place under legal obligation to serve; to indenture; as  to bind an apprentice;  sometimes with out; as bound out to service."
simplified_definition: to tie together or fasten tightly with a rope or cord.

definition: "One who binds; as  a binder of sheaves; one whose trade is to bind; as a binder of books."
simplified_definition: a large, sturdy notebook cover that contains a device for holding loose papers.

definition: "Having two eyes."
simplified_definition: a device that uses lenses and mirrors to make objects look larger. Binoculars are used with both eyes at once.

definition: "Biographical writings in general."
simplified_definition: the written story of the facts and events of a person's life.

definition: "Of or relating to biology."
simplified_definition: of or having to do with biology.

definition: "A student of biology; one versed in the science of biology."
simplified_definition: a scientist who specializes in biology. Biology is the study of living things, such as plants, animals, cells, and bacteria.

definition: "The science of life; that branch of knowledge which treats of living matter as distinct from matter which is not living; the study of living tissue. It has to do with the origin  structure development function and distribution of animals and plants."
simplified_definition: the science that studies the growth and life processes of living things.

definition: "To whip with a birch rod or twig; to flog."
simplified_definition: a tree or shrub with hard wood and smooth bark that can be peeled off.

definition: "Hence: To seek for game or plunder; to thieve."
simplified_definition: an animal with two wings, two feet, and a body covered with feathers. Most birds can fly. Birds are warmblooded animals with skeletons inside their bodies. Birds lay eggs with hard shells. Robins, eagles, chickens, and ostriches are a few of the many kinds of birds.

definition: "Origin; beginning; as  the birth of an empire."
simplified_definition: the act or fact of being born.

definition: "The day in which any person is born; day of origin or commencement."
simplified_definition: the calendar day and month of one's birth, usually celebrated each year as that date occurs.

definition: "Some peculiar mark or blemish on the body at birth."
simplified_definition: a mark or mole on the skin present from birth.

definition: "The town  city or country where a person is born; place of origin or birth in its more general sense."
simplified_definition: the place of birth or origin of a person, idea, or movement.

definition: "Any right  privilege or possession to which a person is entitled by birth such as an estate descendible by law to an heir or civil liberty under a free constitution; esp. the rights or inheritance of the first born."
simplified_definition: a right, privilege, or property to which one is entitled by birth.

definition: "A kind of unraised bread  of many varieties plain sweet or fancy formed into flat cakes and bakes hard; as ship biscuit."
simplified_definition: a small, roundshaped bread for one person made with baking powder or baking soda instead of yeast. Biscuits are not usually sweet.

definition: "To divide into two equal parts."
simplified_definition: to cut or split into two equal parts.

definition: "An old name for a woman's bustle."
simplified_definition: a clergyman who holds a high position in certain Christian churches. A bishop is often in charge of a group of churches.

definition: "The aurochs or European bison."
simplified_definition: a very large mammal with a large head, humped shoulders, and short curved horns. Bison used to roam the plains of North America in large herds, but they were hunted until they were almost extinct. North American bison are also called buffalo, but they are not related to the true buffalo of Africa and Asia. Bison have hooves and are closely related to cattle. Bison eat only plants and chew their cud.

definition: "of Bite"
simplified_definition: past tense and a past participle of "bite."

definition: "A blank on the edge or corner of a page  owing to a portion of the frisket or something else intervening between the type and paper."
simplified_definition: to cut or pierce with the teeth.

definition: "of Bite"
simplified_definition: a past participle of "bite."

definition: "To make bitter."
simplified_definition: having a sharp, bad taste that is neither sour nor salty.

definition: "To make black and shining  as boots or a stove by applying blacking and then polishing with a brush."
simplified_definition: the color of the night sky; the darkest color.

definition: "A dungeon or dark cell in a prison; a military lockup or guardroom;  now commonly with allusion to the cell  in a fort at Calcutta  into which  English prisoners were thrust by the nabob Suraja Dowla on the night of June   and in which  of the prisoners died before morning from lack of air."
simplified_definition: a region or body in space with gravity so strong that neither light nor matter can escape it. Scientists believe that black holes form when very large stars collapse.

definition: "The fruit of several species of bramble ; also  the plant itself. Rubus fruticosus is the blackberry of England; R. villosus and R. Canadensis are the high blackberry and low blackberry of the United States. There are also other kinds."
simplified_definition: a dark purple or black berry that is made up of many large seeds.

definition: "In England  a species of thrush  a singing bird with a fin note; the merle. In America the name is given to several birds as the Quiscalus versicolor or crow blackbird; the Agelaeus phoeniceus or redwinged blackbird; the cowbird; the rusty grackle etc. See Redwing."
simplified_definition: a common songbird, the males of which are black or mostly black. Crows and grackles are blackbirds.

definition: "A broad board painted black  or any black surface on which writing drawing or the working of mathematical problems can be done with chalk or crayons. It is much used in schools."
simplified_definition: a smooth, hard panel for writing on with chalk; chalkboard. Blackboards are often made of slate and have a dark color.

definition: "To grow black or dark."
simplified_definition: to make black; make dark.

definition: "Black rent  or rent paid in corn flesh or the lowest coin a opposed to """"white rent"""" which paid in silver."
simplified_definition: money demanded from someone by another person who threatens to give out information that would harm that person.

definition: "A smith who works in iron with a forge  and makes iron utensils horseshoes etc."
simplified_definition: a person who forges and shapes iron. Blacksmiths soften the iron with heat and use hammers and anvils to form it into various items.

definition: "A bag or sac in animals  which serves as the receptacle of some fluid; as the urinary bladder; the gall bladder;  applied especially to the urinary bladder either within the animal or when taken out and inflated with air."
simplified_definition: an organ inside the body that collects urine. The bladder gets larger when it fills and smaller when it becomes empty.

definition: "Properly  the leaf or flat part of the leaf of any plant especially of gramineous plants. The term is sometimes applied to the spire of grasses."
simplified_definition: the cutting part of a knife, sword, scissors, or saw.

definition: "To censure; to express disapprobation of; to find fault with; to reproach."
simplified_definition: to place responsibility on for a mistake or fault.

definition: "The point aimed at in a target  marked with a white spot; hence the object to which anything is directed."
simplified_definition: without marks or writing.

definition: "To take the wind out of the sails of  by sailing to windward of her."
simplified_definition: a thick piece of material used on a bed for warmth or worn as clothing.

definition: "To sound loudly and somewhat harshly."
simplified_definition: to sound loudly and harshly.

definition: "A violent gust of wind."
simplified_definition: a powerful and sudden gust or stream.

definition: "A stream of gas or vapor emitting light and heat in the process of combustion; a bright flame."
simplified_definition: a bright flame or light.

definition: "To make white  or whiter; to remove the color or stains from; to blanch; to whiten."
simplified_definition: to make white or lighter in color by using a chemical or sunlight.

simplified_definition: a group of benches in rows that are placed one above another. Bleachers are used to seat people at indoor and outdoor sports events.

definition: "Cold and cutting; cheerless; as  a bleak blast."
simplified_definition: bare, cold, or not protected from the weather.

definition: "A plaintive cry of  or like that of a sheep."
simplified_definition: the sound made by a goat, sheep, or calf.

definition: "imp.  p. p. of Bleed."
simplified_definition: the past tense and past participle of "bleed."

definition: "To draw money from ; to induce to pay; as  they bled him freely for this fund."
simplified_definition: to lose blood.

definition: "To mark with deformity; to injure or impair  as anything which is well formed or excellent; to mar or make defective either the body or mind."
simplified_definition: to damage or spoil the perfection of.

definition: "One who  or that which blends; an instrument as a brush used in blending."
simplified_definition: a machine used to prepare liquid foods by chopping and mixing at high speeds.

simplified_definition: to make holy by religious ritual.

definition: "of Bless"
simplified_definition: an act of one who blesses, or the words spoken as part of such an act.

definition: "of Blow"
simplified_definition: past tense of "blow."

definition: "A rashlike eruption on the human skin."
simplified_definition: a plant disease that destroys parts or all of a plant.

definition: "To deprive partially of vision; to make vision difficult for and painful to; to dazzle."
simplified_definition: not able to see; having no sight.

definition: "To cover the eyes of  as with a bandage; to hinder from seeing."

definition: "Boughs cast where deer are to pass  to turn or check them."
simplified_definition: to close and open the eyes very quickly.

definition: "One who  or that which blinks."

definition: "Orig.  blithesomeness; gladness; now the highest degree of happiness; blessedness; exalted felicity; heavenly joy."
simplified_definition: very great happiness.

definition: "A gale of piercingly cold wind  usually accompanied with fine and blinding snow; a furious blast."

simplified_definition: a solid piece of hard material, such as wood or concrete, with flat sides.

simplified_definition: a fort or building with openings for weapons to fire through, formerly built of heavy wood boards.

definition: "Alt. of Blonde"

definition: "The juice of anything  especially if red."

simplified_definition: the spilling of blood through injury or violence.

simplified_definition: red and irritated because of enlarged blood vessels.

definition: "Eager to shed blood; cruel; sanguinary; murderous."
simplified_definition: eager to cause or interested in acts of bloodshed; cruel.

definition: "Containing or resembling blood; of the nature of blood; as  bloody excretions; bloody sweat."
simplified_definition: covered with or leaking blood.

definition: "The opening of flowers in general; the state of blossoming or of having the flowers open; as  the cherry trees are in bloom."
simplified_definition: a flower; blossom.

definition: "To put forth blossoms or flowers; to bloom; to blow; to flower."
simplified_definition: the flower of a plant which forms a seed or fruit.

simplified_definition: a piece of paper used to soak up ink or to protect a writing surface.

simplified_definition: a piece of clothing worn on the upper body, usually by women and girls. A blouse is similar to a shirt, but it may have more detailed sewing or more decoration, or it may be made of a fancier fabric such as satin or silk. A blouse is worn with either a skirt or pants.

definition: "To spread by report; to publish; to disclose."

simplified_definition: a nostril in the top of the head of a whale, dolphin, or porpoise. The blowhole is used to breathe.

definition: "of Blow"
simplified_definition: swollen or bloated; inflated.

simplified_definition: the color of a clear sky; the color between green and violet on the color spectrum.

definition: "The common jay of the United States . The predominant color is bright blue."
simplified_definition: a common jay bird of eastern North America. A blue jay has a crest on its head and a bright blue upper body with white and black markings on its wings and tail.

definition: "The berry of several species of Vaccinium  an ericaceous genus differing from the American huckleberries in containing numerous minute seeds instead of ten nutlets. The commonest species are V. Pennsylvanicum and V. vacillans. V. corymbosum is the tall blueberry."
simplified_definition: a small round berry that is blue in color and can be eaten.

definition: "A small song bird   very common in the United States and in the north one of the earliest to arrive in spring. The male is blue with the breast reddish. It is related to the European robin."
simplified_definition: a small, blue North American songbird. Males usually have a reddish breast.

simplified_definition: a fish that lives in mild Atlantic waters of the North and South American coast. Bluefish are blue and are caught for sport or food.

definition: "See under Print."
simplified_definition: a print of a drawing that shows a building plan. Blueprints usually have white lines on a blue background.

definition: "Having a broad  flattened front; as the bluff bows of a ship."
simplified_definition: a hill or shore with steep sides.

definition: "A gross error or mistake  resulting from carelessness stupidity or culpable ignorance."
simplified_definition: a silly or careless mistake.

definition: "A fencer's foil."
simplified_definition: having a dull edge or point; not sharp.

definition: "A moral stain or blot."
simplified_definition: to cause to run together or become confused.

definition: "To utter suddenly and unadvisedly; to divulge inconsiderately; to ejaculate;  commonly with out."
simplified_definition: to say suddenly and without thought .

definition: "A red or reddish color; a rosy tint."
simplified_definition: to become red in the face because of shame or embarrassment.

definition: "To talk with noisy violence; to swagger  as a turbulent or boasting person; to act in a noisy tumultuous way; to play the bully; to storm; to rage."
simplified_definition: to blow in a strong and noisy way.

definition: "A large and powerful serpent of tropical America  sometimes twenty or thirty feet long. See Illustration in Appendix."
simplified_definition: a large snake that lives in the tropical areas of Central and South America. Boa constrictors are pale brown with darker marks and are not poisonous. They kill their prey by winding around it and squeezing it until it cannot breathe.

definition: "The uncastrated male of swine; specifically  the wild hog."
simplified_definition: a male pig used for breeding.

definition: "To approach; to accost; to address; hence  to woo."
simplified_definition: a flat, cut piece of wood; plank.

definition: "To vaunt one's self; to brag; to say or tell things which are intended to give others a high opinion of one's self or of things belonging to one's self; as  to boast of one's exploits courage descent wealth."
simplified_definition: to talk with too much pride; brag.

definition: "To go or row in a boat."
simplified_definition: a small, open vehicle for traveling on water.

definition: "A house for sheltering boats."
simplified_definition: a small building or shed built near or partly over the water's edge and used to store boats.

definition: "To strike with a quick  light blow; to tap."
simplified_definition: to make a quick or jerky movement up and down.

definition: "A small pin  or cylinder formerly of bone now most commonly of wood used in the making of pillow lace. Each thread is wound on a separate bobbin which hangs down holding the thread at a slight tension."
simplified_definition: a spool on which thread or yarn is wound for use in sewing or weaving.

definition: "An American singing bird . The male is black and white; the female is brown;  called also  ricebird reedbird and Boblincoln."
simplified_definition: a black, yellow, and white North American songbird that is named for its cry. Bobolinks move from one region to another during certain times of the year.

definition: "Alt. of Bobsleigh"
simplified_definition: a long racing sled with two separate sets of runners, a steering wheel, and brakes.

definition: "The common quail of North America ;  so called from its note."
simplified_definition: a brown and white North American bird that is named for its call. Bobwhites are a kind of quail.

definition: "Bid or bidden."
simplified_definition: to serve as a sign about the future; show ahead of time.

definition: "Having a body or material form; physical; corporeal; consisting of matter."
simplified_definition: of or relating to the human body.

definition: "The real  as opposed to the symbolical; the substance as opposed to the shadow."
simplified_definition: all the physical material that makes up a person or animal, including limbs, organs, tissue, and other parts.

definition: "Retinue; attendance; following."
simplified_definition: a person whose job is to protect another person or a group of people from harm.

definition: "To sink  as into a bog; to submerge in a bog; to cause to sink and stick as in mud and mire."
simplified_definition: an area of soft, wet earth; marsh.

definition: "A hard  painful inflamed tumor which on suppuration discharges pus mixed with blood and discloses a small fibrous mass of dead tissue called the core."
simplified_definition: a swollen, painful sore that is filled with pus. A boil is an infection caused by bacteria.

definition: "A vessel in which any thing is boiled."
simplified_definition: a tank used to heat and store a supply of water.

definition: "To be or become bold."
simplified_definition: brave; daring.

definition: "The pod or capsule of a plant  as of flax or cotton; a pericarp of a globular form."
simplified_definition: the seed pod of plants, such as cotton.

definition: "A city of Italy which has given its name to various objects."
simplified_definition: a sausage made of several meats and spices.

definition: "the perforated plate in a punching machine on which anything rests when being punched."
simplified_definition: a pillow shaped like a cylinder.

definition: "To discuss or argue privately  and for practice as cases at law."
simplified_definition: a metal or wooden bar on a door that slides into an opening in the frame. When the bolt is inserted into the frame, the door stays closed.

definition: "A great noise; a hollow sound."
simplified_definition: a metal shell filled with explosives. A bomb destroys a target by being thrown at or dropped on it.

definition: "See Bombardo."
simplified_definition: to attack with bombs, cannon fire, or artillery.

definition: "In a state of servitude or slavery; captive."
simplified_definition: something that joins, ties, or fastens together.

definition: "Villenage; tenure of land on condition of doing the meanest services for the owner."
simplified_definition: the condition of being forced to serve another; slavery.

definition: "Two or four pieces of bone held between the fingers and struck together to make a kind of music."
simplified_definition: the hard tissue that forms the skeleton of a person or animal.

definition: "A large fire built in the open air  as an expression of public joy and exultation or for amusement."
simplified_definition: a large fire built outside for celebration or warmth.

definition: "To take off the bonnet or cap as a mark of respect; to uncover."
simplified_definition: a cloth hat that is fastened beneath the chin with ribbons. Bonnets were once worn by women but are now worn mainly by babies.

definition: "A premium given for a loan  or for a charter or other privilege granted to a company; as the bank paid a bonus for its charter."
simplified_definition: a payment added to a person's regular pay as a reward for hard work.

definition: "Having large or prominent bones."
simplified_definition: having to do with or looking like bone.

definition: "A collection of sheets of paper  or similar material blank written or printed bound together; commonly many folded and bound sheets containing continuous printing or writing."
simplified_definition: sheets of paper bound together between two covers. These pages can be blank or can have writing, printing, or pictures on them.

definition: "A case with shelves for holding books  esp. one with glazed doors."
simplified_definition: a set of shelves for holding books.

definition: "One who keeps accounts; one who has the charge of keeping the books and accounts in an office."
simplified_definition: the person who keeps the financial records for a business.

definition: "The art of recording pecuniary or business transactions in a regular and systematic manner  so as to show their relation to each other and the state of the business in which they occur; the art of keeping accounts. The books commonly used are a daybook cashbook journal and ledger. See Daybook Cashbook Journal and Ledger."
simplified_definition: the practice of keeping records of the money taken in and paid out by a business.

definition: "A little book."
simplified_definition: a small book with paper covers; pamphlet.

definition: "Something placed in a book to guide in finding a particular page or passage; also  a label in a book to designate the owner; a bookplate."
simplified_definition: a strip of leather, ribbon, or paper placed between pages to mark a place in a book.

definition: "A shelf to hold books."
simplified_definition: a shelf for books.

definition: "A store where books are kept for sale;  called in England a bookseller's shop."
simplified_definition: A bookstore is a store that sells mainly books.

definition: "Any larva of a beetle or moth  which is injurious to books. Many species are known."
simplified_definition: a person who loves to study and read books.

definition: "To make a hollow sound  as of waves or cannon."
simplified_definition: a long pole that stretches the bottom of a boat's sail and holds it in place.

definition: "A very singular missile weapon used by the natives of Australia and in some parts of India. It is usually a curved stick of hard wood  from twenty to thirty inches in length from two to three inches wide and half or three quarters of an inch thick. When thrown from the hand with a quick rotary motion it describes very remarkable curves according to the shape of the instrument and the manner of throwing it often moving nearly horizontally a long distance then curving upward to a considerable height and finally taking a retrograde direction so as to fall near the place from which it was thrown or even far in the rear of it."
simplified_definition: a curved wooden stick that can be thrown so that it will return to the thrower. Boomerangs are used as hunting weapons by Australian aborigines.

definition: "The woody portion flax  which is separated from the fiber as refuse matter by retting braking and scutching."
simplified_definition: something that is a help or benefit.

definition: "To lift or push from behind ; to push up; hence  to assist in overcoming obstacles or in making advancement."
simplified_definition: to raise to a higher position by pushing from below.

definition: "The metal casing and flange fitted about a pipe where it passes through a roof."
simplified_definition: a covering for the foot and all or some of the leg. Boots are usually made of leather or rubber.

definition: "A half boot or short boot."
simplified_definition: a baby's soft sock.

definition: "A house or shed built of boards  boughs or other slight materials for temporary occupation."
simplified_definition: a closed place or stall that has room for one person or a small group.

definition: "That which is seized by violence or obtained by robbery  especially collective spoil taken in war; plunder; pillage."
simplified_definition: riches or goods stolen or taken from people in war; loot

definition: "To approach; to come near to; to verge."
simplified_definition: edge; boundary.

definition: "The size of a hole; the interior diameter of a tube or gun barrel; the caliber."
simplified_definition: to make a hole in with a tool such as a drill.

definition: "of Bore"
simplified_definition: feeling tired or restless because of having to do something that is not interesting.

definition: "The realm of bores; bores  collectively."
simplified_definition: the state of being bored or of not feeling interested.

definition: "A hole made by boring."
simplified_definition: dull; not interesting or exciting.

definition: "An elementary substance  not metallic in its nature which is present in all organic compounds. Atomic weight ..
