definition: "One of the Carnivora."
simplified_definition: an animal that eats the flesh of other animals.

definition: "Eating or feeding on flesh. The term is applied:  to animals which naturally seek flesh for food  as the tiger dog etc.;  to plants which are supposed to absorb animal food;  to substances which destroy animal tissue as caustics."
simplified_definition: eating the flesh of animals.

definition: "One of the long  sweet succulent pods of the carob tree which are used as food for animals and sometimes eaten by man;  called also St. John's bread carob bean and algaroba bean."
simplified_definition: a tree of the Mediterranean that has long, flat pods with a sweet pulp and hard seeds.

definition: "Alt. of Carrol"
simplified_definition: a song of joy, especially a Christmas song.

definition: "An artificer who works in timber; a framer and builder of houses  ships etc."
simplified_definition: a person who builds or repairs houses and other things made of wood.

definition: "A heavy woven or felted fabric  usually of wool but also of cotton hemp straw etc.; esp. a floor covering made in breadths to be sewed together and nailed to the floor as distinguished from a rug or mat; originally also a wrought cover for tables."
simplified_definition: a heavy fabric covering for floors.

definition: "The act or manner of conducting measures or projects; management."
simplified_definition: a vehicle with wheels that is covered or enclosed and is used for carrying people.

definition: "One who  or that which carries or conveys; a messenger."
simplified_definition: a person who carries or brings something.

definition: "The esculent root of cultivated varieties of the plant  usually spindleshaped and of a reddish yellow color."
simplified_definition: a plant that produces an orange root that is eaten as a vegetable.

definition: "A tract of land  over which boats or goods are carried between two bodies of navigable water; a carrying place; a portage."
simplified_definition: to take from one place to another; bear or support while moving; transport.

definition: "An open twowheeled pleasure carriage."
simplified_definition: a large wagon with two wheels pulled by animals and used to carry a heavy load.

definition: "A translucent  elastic tissue; gristle."
simplified_definition: a tough, white tissue that forms part of the skeleton of humans and other animals. Cartilage is not as stiff as bone. Cartilage is found in the ear, nose, and joints.

definition: "Pasteboard for paper boxes; also  a pasteboard box."
simplified_definition: a box made of thick paper or of plastic made to hold one particular type of product.

definition: "A large pictorial sketch  as in a journal or magazine; esp. a pictorial caricature; as the cartoons of """"Puck."
simplified_definition: a drawing or series of drawings that make people laugh or think; comic strip. Cartoons often have words to show what a character is thinking or saying or to help explain what is happening.

definition: "A complete charge for a firearm  contained in or held together by a case capsule or shell of metal pasteboard or other material."
simplified_definition: a case shaped like a tube that holds gunpowder and a bullet.

definition: "To lay out; to contrive; to design; to plan."
simplified_definition: to form or write by cutting.

definition: "The act or art of one who carves."
simplified_definition: the work or result of cutting and shaping wood, stone, or other material.

definition: "A fall of water over a precipice  as in a river or brook; a waterfall less than a cataract."
simplified_definition: a steep waterfall or series of small waterfalls.

definition: "To propose hypothetical cases."
simplified_definition: an instance or example of something.

definition: "A Chinese coin."
simplified_definition: money in the form of bills or coins, or payment in such form.

definition: "A tree  of the same family which the sumac. It is native in tropical America  but is now naturalized in all tropical countries. Its fruit a kidneyshaped nut grows at the extremity of an edible pearshaped hypocarp about three inches long."
simplified_definition: a tropical American evergreen tree. A gum used in medicine is obtained from the bark.

definition: "To put away or reject; to disregard."
simplified_definition: a person whose job is to take the money when a customer pays for something.

definition: "A casket; a small box for jewels."
simplified_definition: a large, strong barrel used for holding wine or other liquids

definition: "A small chest or box  esp. of rich material or ornamental character as for jewels etc."
simplified_definition: a box in which a dead person is buried; coffin.

definition: "A small round dish with a handle  usually of porcelain."
simplified_definition: a dish, often deep and covered, in which food can be baked and served.

definition: "To vomit."
simplified_definition: to throw or fling.

definition: "Highly carbonized iron  the direct product of the blast furnace;  used for making castings and for conversion into wrought iron and steel. It can not be welded or forged is brittle and sometimes very hard. Besides carbon it contains sulphur phosphorus silica etc."
simplified_definition: a mixture of iron and carbon, with other materials added to make it either hard and brittle or soft and strong.

definition: "See Castanets."
simplified_definition: one of a pair of wooden or ivory instruments that are partly hollowed out. They are held in the hand and clicked together to the rhythms of Spanish dance music.

definition: "To move the castle to the square next to king  and then the king around the castle to the square next beyond it for the purpose of covering the king."
simplified_definition: a large, strong building where a noble lived with his family and servants. Many castles were built long ago to defend the people inside against attacks.

definition: "One who receives relief for a night in a parish to which he does not belong; a vagrant."
simplified_definition: happening by chance; not planned.

definition: "That which comes without design or without being foreseen; contingency."
simplified_definition: a person in the armed forces who is killed, wounded, or missing in action.

definition: "To bring to the cathead; as  to cat an anchor. See Anchor."
simplified_definition: a small, furry mammal with whiskers, short ears, and a long tail. Cats, also called house cats, are often kept as pets or to catch mice and rats.

definition: "Catalogue."
simplified_definition: an organized list of things such as book titles, goods for sale, or other items. Catalogs usually give a short description of each item on the list.

definition: "A kind of raft or float  consisting of two or more logs or pieces of wood lashed together and moved by paddles or sail;  used as a surf boat and for other purposes on the coasts of the East and West Indies and South America. Modified forms are much used in the lumber regions of North America and at lifesaving stations."
simplified_definition: a boat with two hulls joined side by side.

definition: "An engine somewhat resembling a massive crossbow  used by the ancient Greeks and Romans for throwing stones arrows spears etc."
simplified_definition: an ancient weapon used to throw objects, such as large stones or arrows, at an enemy.

definition: "A great fall of water over a precipice; a large waterfall."
simplified_definition: a large waterfall.

definition: "An event producing a subversion of the order or system of things; a final event  usually of a calamitous or disastrous nature; hence sudden calamity; great misfortune."
simplified_definition: an event that brings great harm, suffering, or loss to a large area or many people; terrible disaster.

definition: "Of a pertaining to a catastrophe."
simplified_definition: causing great and terrible destruction, hardship, or distress; disastrous.

definition: "An American bird   allied to the mocking bird and like it capable of imitating the notes of other birds but less perfectly. Its note resembles at times the mewing of a cat."
simplified_definition: a dark gray North American songbird. One of its calls is like the sound a cat makes.

definition: "To spread by  or as by infecting; to communicate."
simplified_definition: to get control of ; capture.

definition: "The player who stands behind the batsman to catch the ball."
simplified_definition: the player who is behind the batter at home plate in baseball or softball. The catcher catches balls thrown by the pitcher.

definition: "Captivating; alluring."
simplified_definition: likely to infect or be passed on to another.

definition: "Alt. of Catsup"
simplified_definition: another spelling of ketchup.

definition: "One of the highest classes to which the objects of knowledge or thought can be reduced  and by which they can be arranged in a system; an ultimate or undecomposable conception; a predicament."
simplified_definition: a particular section of a main group; class.

definition: "A provider; a purveyor; a caterer."
simplified_definition: to supply food or other service.

definition: "The larval state of a butterfly or any lepidopterous insect; sometimes  but less commonly the larval state of other insects as the sawflies which are also called false caterpillars. The true caterpillars have three pairs of true legs and several pairs of abdominal fleshy legs  armed with hooks. Some are hairy others naked. They usually feed on leaves fruit and succulent vegetables being often very destructive Many of them are popularly called worms as the cutworm
simplified_definition: the larva, or middle life stage, of a moth or butterfly. Caterpillars are round and long like worms, but have six legs. They may be brightly colored.

definition: "A name given in the United States to various species of siluroid fishes; as  the yellow cat ; the bind cat ; the mud cat  the stone cat ; the sea cat  etc. This name is also sometimes applied to the wolf fish. See Bullhrad."
simplified_definition: a fish with no scales and a large head, found mostly in fresh water. Catfish have long feelers around the mouth that look like a cat's whiskers.

definition: "Emanating from the chair of office  as of a pope or bishop; official; authoritative."
simplified_definition: the main church of a bishop's district.

definition: "An adherent of the Roman Catholic church; a Roman Catholic."
simplified_definition: having to do with the Roman Catholic Church.

definition: "A table sauce made from mushrooms  tomatoes walnuts etc."
simplified_definition: another spelling of ketchup.

definition: "A tall rush or flag  growing in marshes  with long flat leaves and having its flowers in a close cylindrical spike at the top of the stem. The leaves are frequently used for seating chairs making mats etc. See Catkin."
simplified_definition: a tall plant with long, flat leaves that grows in wet places. Cattails have long, brown, fuzzy flower spikes.

definition: "Quadrupeds of the Bovine family; sometimes  also including all domestic quadrupeds as sheep goats horses mules asses and swine."
simplified_definition: large mammals raised on farms or ranches for their milk or meat. Female cattle are called cows. Male cattle are called steers or bulls. Young cattle are called calves. The ox and the yak are kinds of cattle.

definition: "of Catch"
simplified_definition: past tense and past participle of "catch."

definition: "An annual variety of Brassica oleracea  or cabbage of which the cluster of young flower stalks and buds is eaten as a vegetable."
simplified_definition: a plant that bears a large head of firm white flowers that can be eaten. Cauliflower is related to the cabbage plant.

definition: "See Calk."
simplified_definition: to fill in cracks with putty or tar to keep air or water from leaking through.

definition: "That which produces or effects a result; that from which anything proceeds  and without which it would not exist."
simplified_definition: something or someone that brings about a result or effect.

definition: "Alt. of Causey"
simplified_definition: a raised road or path across water or land that is wet.

definition: "To give notice of danger to; to warn; to exhort  to take heed."
simplified_definition: close attention and care; the act of being careful and alert.

definition: "Attentive to examine probable effects and consequences of acts with a view to avoid danger or misfortune; prudent; circumspect; wary; watchful; as  a cautious general."
simplified_definition: taking care to avoid danger or trouble; careful.

definition: "That part of military force which serves on horseback."
simplified_definition: soldiers who fight on horseback or from tanks or helicopters.

definition: "A hollow place in the earth  either natural or artificial; a subterraneous cavity; a cavern; a den."
simplified_definition: a natural hole or hollow in the earth. Many caves have openings in a hillside or cliff.

definition: "A large  deep hollow place in the earth; a large cave."
simplified_definition: a large cave.

definition: "Hollowness."
simplified_definition: a hollow place or hole.

definition: "The cry made by the crow  rook or raven."
simplified_definition: the cry of the crow or raven, or any harsh call that sounds like this.

definition: "To come to an end; to stop; to leave off or give over; to desist; as  the noise ceased."
simplified_definition: to stop or come to an end.

definition: "The name of several evergreen trees. The wood is remarkable for its durability and fragrant odor."
simplified_definition: an evergreen tree of the pine family that bears cones. Cedars have strong wood with a sweet smell.

definition: "A mark placed under the letter c  to show that it is to be sounded like s as in facade."
simplified_definition: a mark . It is placed under certain letters to change that letter's pronunciation in French, where "ç" has the sound of "s."

definition: "of Ceil"
simplified_definition: the top inside surface of a room.

definition: "To extol or honor in a solemn manner; as  to celebrate the name of the Most High."
simplified_definition: to make special or honor with gifts, parties, or activities.

definition: "The act  process or time of celebrating."
simplified_definition: the act of honoring or celebrating.

definition: "Celebration; solemnization."
simplified_definition: a person who is famous.

definition: "A plant of the Parsley family   of which the blanched leafstalks are used as a salad."
simplified_definition: a plant with crisp, pale green stalks that are eaten as a vegetable. Celery leaves and seeds are used as seasoning.

definition: "A native of China."
simplified_definition: of or having to do with the sky or outer space.

definition: "To place or inclose in a cell."
simplified_definition: a tiny unit of plant or animal life, having a nucleus and surrounded by a very thin membrane.

definition: "A room or rooms under a building  and usually below the surface of the ground where provisions and other stores are kept."
simplified_definition: a room or rooms built underground, usually beneath a building.

definition: "A contraction for Violoncello."
simplified_definition: a large musical instrument with four strings. The cello is in the violin family but has a deeper tone than the violin.

definition: "A substance composed essentially of gun cotton and camphor  and when pure resembling ivory in texture and color but variously colored to imitate coral tortoise shell amber malachite etc. It is used in the manufacture of jewelry and many small articles as combs brushes collars and cuffs;  originally called xylonite."
simplified_definition: a plastic that burns easily. Celluloid is used for motion picture film.

definition: "The substance which constitutes the essential part of the solid framework of plants  of ordinary wood linen paper etc. It is also found to a slight extent in certain animals as the tunicates. It is a carbohydrate n isomeric with starch and is convertible into starches and sugars by the action of heat and acids. When pure it is a white amorphous mass. See Starch Granulose Lignin."
simplified_definition: the main element of plant tissue, used in making paper, cellophane, and fabrics.

definition: "The Celsius thermometer or scale  so called from Anders Celsius a Swedish astronomer who invented it. It is the same as the centigrade thermometer or scale."
simplified_definition: relating to a temperature scale on which water freezes at zero degrees and boils at one hundred degrees; centigrade.

definition: "To become cemented or firmly united; to cohere."
simplified_definition: a powder made of clay and limestone that becomes hard when water is added. Cement is used as a building material.

definition: "A place or ground set apart for the burial of the dead; a graveyard; a churchyard; a necropolis."
simplified_definition: a place where the dead are buried; graveyard.

definition: "One of two magistrates of Rome who took a register of the number and property of citizens  and who also exercised the office of inspector of morals and conduct."
simplified_definition: an official who decides what art, movies, or books may be published. A censor works for a government, religion, or other organization, and promotes its ideas.

definition: "An official registration of the number of the people  the value of their estates and other general statistics of a country."
simplified_definition: an official count of the people who live in a country or other area. A census is also used to collect information about these people, such as their job, age, or sex.

definition: "A hundred; as  ten per cent the proportion of ten parts in a hundred."
simplified_definition: a unit of money used in many countries, including the United States and Canada. A cent is equal to a hundredth part of the standard national currency.

definition: "A fabulous being  represented as half man and half horse."
simplified_definition: a creature in Greek mythology that has the head, arms, and chest of a man and the trunk and legs of a horse.

definition: "The celebration of the hundredth anniversary of any event; a centenary."
simplified_definition: having to do with a one hundredth anniversary.

definition: "A principal or important point of concentration; the nucleus around which things are gathered or to which they tend; an object of attention  action or force; as a center of attaction."
simplified_definition: the point that is the same distance from all points on the outside line or surface of something; exact middle.

definition: "Consisting of a hundred degrees; graduated into a hundred divisions or equal parts."
simplified_definition: see "Celsius."

definition: "Alt. of Centimetre"
simplified_definition: a unit of length equal to one hundredth of a meter or . inch.

definition: "Relating to the center; situated in or near the center or middle; containing the center; of or pertaining to the parts near the center; equidistant or equally accessible from certain points."
simplified_definition: in the center or being the center.

definition: "See Center."
simplified_definition: a spelling of "center" used in Canada and Britain. See "center" for more information.

definition: "A hundred; as  a century of sonnets; an aggregate of a hundred things."
simplified_definition: a unit of time equal to one hundred years.

definition: "Of or pertaining to pottery; relating to the art of making earthenware; as  ceramic products; ceramic ornaments for ceilings."
simplified_definition: of or having to do with objects made of baked clay.

definition: "Of or pertaining to the grasses which are cultivated for their edible seeds  or to their seeds or grain."
simplified_definition: any plant whose grains are used for food, such as wheat, oats, rice, or rye.

definition: "A sign or prodigy; a portent."
simplified_definition: a formal act or series of acts done in a particular way to honor a special occasion.

definition: "The daughter of Saturn and Ops or Rhea  the goddess of corn and tillage."
simplified_definition: the goddess of farming in Roman mythology. In Greek mythology, Ceres is called Demeter.

definition: "Certainty."
simplified_definition: sure; positive; having no doubt.

definition: "Without doubt or question; unquestionably."
simplified_definition: without doubt or question.

definition: "Clearness; freedom from ambiguity; lucidity."
simplified_definition: the state of being sure or confident.

definition: "A written testimony to the truth of any fact; as  certificate of good behavior."
simplified_definition: a statement on paper that shows or proves that certain facts are true.

definition: "One of the Cetacea."
simplified_definition: a kind of mammal that lives in the water and has front limbs that look like paddles and back limbs that do not show. Whales, porpoises, and dolphins are all cetaceans.

definition: "See Shad."
simplified_definition: a country in central Africa. N'djamena is the capital of Chad.

definition: "Iron links bolted to the side of a vessel to bold the deadeyes connected with the shrouds; also  the channels."
simplified_definition: a row of links, usually made of metal, that are joined together and used to pull, hold, or fasten something.

definition: "To place in a chair."
simplified_definition: a piece of furniture for one person to sit on. A chair has four legs, a back, and sometimes arms.

definition: "One whose business it is to cary a chair or sedan."
simplified_definition: a man who is in charge of a meeting or committee.

definition: "To rub or mark with chalk."
simplified_definition: a soft, white limestone that comes mostly from tiny sea shells.

definition: "To censure; to blame."
simplified_definition: an invitation to enter into a fight or other contest of skill.

definition: "That part of the bore of a piece of ordnance which holds the charge  esp. when of different diameter from the rest of the bore;  formerly in guns made smaller than the bore but now larger esp. in breechloading guns."
simplified_definition: a room.

definition: "A lizardlike reptile of the genus Chamaeleo  of several species found in Africa Asia and Europe. The skin is covered with fine granulations; the tail is prehensile and the body is much compressed laterally giving it a high back."
simplified_definition: a lizard that is able to change its skin color to match its environment.

definition: "A light wine  of several kinds originally made in the province of Champagne in France."
simplified_definition: a white wine with bubbles originally made in the Champagne region of France.

definition: "To furnish with a champion; to attend or defend as champion; to support or maintain; to protect."
simplified_definition: a person or animal that has taken first place in a contest or game; winner.

definition: "State of being champion; leadership; supremacy."
simplified_definition: one or more contests held to decide the champion.

definition: "To take the chances of; to venture upon;  usually with it as object."
simplified_definition: the quality of happening by accident and without being planned or predicted.

definition: "A judicial court of chancery  which in England and in the United States is distinctively a court with equity jurisdiction."
simplified_definition: the head of state in Austria or Germany.

definition: "A movable parapet  serving to support fascines to cover pioneers."
simplified_definition: a single light fixture that hangs from the ceiling and holds several lights. A chandelier is often used for decoration as well as for lighting a room. Some chandeliers are very large and found only in very formal rooms. Originally, chandeliers held real candles.

definition: "A passing from one phase to another; as  a change of the moon."
simplified_definition: to make different; alter the content or form of.

definition: "of Change"
simplified_definition: becoming different; shifting; varying.

definition: "The deeper part of a river  harbor strait etc. where the main current flows or which affords the best and safest passage for vessels."
simplified_definition: a long, narrow body of water that joins two larger bodies of water.

definition: "To utter with a melodious voice; to sing."
simplified_definition: a song that is sung on the same note or the same few notes throughout.

definition: "Any confused or disordered collection or state of things; a confused mixture; confusion; disorder."
simplified_definition: a state, condition, or place of complete confusion or disorder.

definition: "One of the jaws or the fleshy covering of a jaw;  commonly in the plural  and used of animals and colloquially of human beings."
simplified_definition: a man or boy; fellow.

definition: "An association of workmen in a printing office."
simplified_definition: a small building, or a room in a larger building, used for worship.

definition: "An ecclesiastic who has a chapel  or who performs religious service in a chapel."
simplified_definition: a member of the clergy who leads religious services and does counseling for a military unit, a hospital, or other group.

definition: "The jaws  or the fleshy parts about them. See Chap."
simplified_definition: leather clothing worn over pants, especially by cowboys, to protect the legs while riding horseback.

definition: "A meeting of certain organized societies or orders."
simplified_definition: one of the main parts of a book. Chapters are usually numbered or given a title.

definition: "A unique or extraordinary individuality; a person characterized by peculiar or notable traits; a person who illustrates certain phases of character; as  Randolph was a character; Caesar is a great historical character."
simplified_definition: all those things that make a person, place, or thing different from others.

definition: "The integral part  of a logarithm."
simplified_definition: having to do with a typical or special quality of a person, group, action, or thing.

definition: "To make distinct and recognizable by peculiar marks or traits; to make with distinctive features."
simplified_definition: to describe the particular character or qualities of; give certain characteristics to.

definition: "Impure carbon prepared from vegetable or animal substances; esp.  coal made by charring wood in a kiln retort etc. from which air is excluded. It is used for fuel and in various mechanical artistic and chemical processes."
simplified_definition: the solid, black form of carbon made by burning wood or other matter in a space with very little oxygen.

definition: "To assume as a bearing; as  he charges three roses or; to add to or represent on; as he charges his shield with three roses or."
simplified_definition: to give a responsibility or duty to.

definition: "of Charge"
simplified_definition: carrying electrical energy.

definition: "A twowheeled car or vehicle for war  racing state processions etc."
simplified_definition: a vehicle with two wheels used in ancient times. A chariot was pulled by horses and driven from a standing position. It was used in wars, races, and other public events.

definition: "A charitable institution  or a gift to create and support such an institution; as Lady Margaret's charity."
simplified_definition: something given to a person or persons in need.

definition: "To use magic arts or occult power; to make use of charms."
simplified_definition: the ability to attract, delight, and please.

definition: "of Charm"
simplified_definition: full of charm; pleasant; attractive.

definition: "A sheet of paper  pasteboard or the like on which information is exhibited esp. when the information is arranged in tabular form; as an historical chart."
simplified_definition: a sheet that gives information in the form of a graph or table.

definition: "A written evidence in due form of things done or granted  contracts made etc. between man and man; a deed or conveyance."
simplified_definition: an official document given by a government or ruler to a business or other group. The charter explains the group's rights and responsibilities.

definition: "The part of a cannon from the reenforce or the trunnions to the swell of the muzzle. See Cannon."
simplified_definition: to follow with the goal of catching; run after.

definition: "A deep opening made by disruption  as a breach in the earth or a rock; a yawning abyss; a cleft; a fissure."
simplified_definition: a deep crack in the earth's surface.

definition: "A traversing base frame  or movable railway along which the carriage of a barbette or casemate gun moves backward and forward. "
simplified_definition: the frame that supports the body and engine in a vehicle.

definition: "To talk in a light and familiar manner; to converse without form or ceremony; to gossip."
simplified_definition: to talk in a friendly or easy manner.

definition: "Noise made by collision of the teeth  as in shivering."
simplified_definition: to speak rapidly and without saying anything important.

definition: "A bargain; a purchase; cheapness."
simplified_definition: having a low price.

definition: "To beguile."
simplified_definition: a person who acts in a dishonest way in order to gain something.

definition: "To verify  to guard to make secure by means of a mark token or other check; to distinguish by a check; to put a mark against  after comparing with an original or a counterpart in order to secure accuracy; as to check an account; to check baggage."
simplified_definition: a test or search to make sure that something is correct or in order.

definition: "Checkerwork."
simplified_definition: one of the disks used as a game piece in checkers. Checkers is a game played by two people. Each player has twelve pieces to move over a board divided into sixtyfour squares of two alternating colors.

definition: "A board with sixtyfour squares of alternate color  used for playing checkers or draughts."
simplified_definition: a surface marked into sixtyfour squares of two alternating colors. It is used as a game board for checkers or chess.

definition: "A game  called also daughts played on a checkerboard by two persons each having twelve men  which are moved diagonally. The game is ended when either of the players has lost all his men or can not move them."
simplified_definition: a game played by two people. Each player has twelve pieces to move over a board divided into sixtyfour squares of two alternating colors.

definition: "The side of the face below the eye."
simplified_definition: either side of the face between the nose and the ear.

definition: "To chirp  as a young bird."
simplified_definition: to make a peeping sound; chirp.

definition: "To be in any state or temper of mind."
simplified_definition: glad feelings; happiness.

definition: "Having or showing good spirits or joy; cheering; cheery; contented; happy; joyful; lively; animated; willing."
simplified_definition: full of cheer; happy.

definition: "A low courtesy;  so called on account of the cheese form assumed by a woman's dress when she stoops after extending the skirts by a rapid gyration."
simplified_definition: a food made by pressing together a mass of soft, thick soured milk solids.

definition: "A species of leopard  tamed and used for hunting in India. The woolly cheetah of South Africa is C. laneus."
simplified_definition: a large, wild cat of Africa and southern Asia that has solid black spots on its fur. Cheetahs have long legs and are the fastest animal on land. Sometimes they are trained for hunting game.

definition: "Same as Chief."
simplified_definition: a cook in charge of a hotel or restaurant kitchen.

definition: "Pertaining to chemistry; characterized or produced by the forces and operations of chemistry; employed in the processes of chemistry; as  chemical changes; chemical combinations."
simplified_definition: of or having to do with the science of chemistry.

definition: "A person versed in chemistry or given to chemical investigation; an analyst; a maker or seller of chemicals or drugs."
simplified_definition: one who is active or expert in the field of chemistry.

definition: "That branch of science which treats of the composition of substances  and of the changes which they undergo in consequence of alterations in the constitution of the molecules which depend upon variations of the number kind or mode of arrangement of the constituent atoms. These atoms are not assumed to be indivisible but merely the finest grade of subdivision hitherto attained. Chemistry deals with the changes in the composition and constitution of molecules. See Atom Molecule."
simplified_definition: the science that studies the form and function of basic elements and their compounds.

definition: "To treat with tenderness and affection; to nurture with care; to protect and aid."
simplified_definition: to value with great love and care.

definition: "A tree or shrub of the genus Prunus  bearing a fleshy drupe with a bony stone;"
simplified_definition: a small, round fruit that grows on a tree. It is red, yellow, or purple in color and has a hard pit in the center.

definition: "A species of brome grass  which is a troublesome weed in wheat fields  and is often erroneously regarded as degenerate or changed wheat; it bears a very slight resemblance to oats and if reaped and ground up with wheat so as to be used for food is said to produce narcotic effects;  called also cheat and Willard's bromus."
simplified_definition: a board game played by two people in which each player has sixteen pieces, and the object is to trap the opponent's king.

definition: "A large box of wood  or other material having like a trunk a lid but no covering of skin leather or cloth."
simplified_definition: the upper front part of the body between the neck and waist.

definition: "A tough  lustrous reddish white metal of the iron group not easily fusible and somewhat magnetic. Atomic weight .. Symbol Co."

definition: "A beverage. See Sherry cobbler  under Sherry."

definition: "To set on one side in a pert or jaunty manner."

definition: "A bird of the Parrot family  of the subfamily Cacatuinae having a short strong and much curved beak and the head ornamented with a crest which can be raised or depressed at will. There are several genera and many species; as the broadcrested  the sulphurcrested  etc. The palm or great black cockatoo of Australia is Microglossus aterrimus."
simplified_definition: a crested parrot that is mostly white. There are several kinds of cockatoos. They are found in Australia and in some South Pacific islands.

definition: "The dome of a heating furnace."
simplified_definition: a small animal with a soft body and a hard shell shaped like a heart. Cockles are mollusks with two hinged shells that open and close. They are kinds of clams. People sometimes eat cockles.

definition: "In yachts and other small vessels  a space lower than the rest of the deck which affords easy access to the cabin."

definition: "A beverage made of brandy  whisky or gin iced flavored and sweetened."

definition: "Alt. of Cocoa palm"
simplified_definition: a powder made by grinding the dried seeds of the cacao tree and removing the fat.

definition: "A small bag or pouch."

definition: "A covered pot in which coffee is prepared  or is brought upon the table for drinking."

definition: "A ring or round flange upon  surrounding or against an object and used for restraining motion within given limits or for holding something to its place or for hiding an opening around an object; as a collar on a shaft used to prevent endwise motion of the shaft; a collar surrounding a stovepipe at the place where it enters a wall. simplified_definition: the part of a piece of clothing that goes around the neck. It is sometimes folded over.

definition: "To strike or dash against each other; to come into collision; to clash; as  the vessels collided; their interests collided."
