definition: "The transparent part of the coat of the eyeball which covers the iris and pupil and admits light to the interior. See Eye."
simplified_definition: the clear part of the eyeball's outer coating. The cornea covers the iris and pupil.

definition: "An edge or extremity; the part farthest from the center; hence  any quarter or part."
simplified_definition: the place where two lines or surfaces meet to form an angle.

definition: "An obsolete rude reed instrument   of the oboe family."
simplified_definition: a brass wind instrument that is like a trumpet but smaller.

definition: "A genus of grasses bearing spikes of flowers resembling the cornucopia in form."
simplified_definition: the mythical horn of a goat that had an endless supply of food; horn of plenty. The cornucopia is used as a symbol of having plenty to eat.

definition: "The pomp or assembly at a coronation."
simplified_definition: the ceremony at which a king or queen is crowned.

definition: "Alt. of Corporale"
simplified_definition: an officer in the U.S. Army, Air Force, or Marine Corps who is ranked below sergeant and above private first class.

definition: "A body politic or corporate  formed and authorized by law to act as a single person and endowed by law with the capacity of succession; a society having the capacity of transacting business as an individual."
simplified_definition: a group of people allowed by law to do certain things as if they were one person.

definition: "A body or code of laws."
simplified_definition: a branch of the military that does a special kind of work.

definition: "A human body in general  whether living or dead;  sometimes contemptuously."
simplified_definition: a dead human body.

definition: "A minute particle; an atom; a molecule."
simplified_definition: a cell that moves freely in the blood. Red and white blood cells are corpuscles.

definition: "A pen for animals; esp.  an inclosure made with wagons by emigrants in the vicinity of hostile Indians as a place of security for horses cattle etc."
simplified_definition: an area with a fence around it. Corrals are used to keep horses and cattle from wandering away.

definition: "To make right; to bring to the standard of truth  justice or propriety; to rectify; as to correct manners or principles."
simplified_definition: to fix the mistakes in; change to make right.

definition: "An allowance made for inaccuracy in an instrument; as  chronometer correction; compass correction."
simplified_definition: the act of making something correct.

definition: "In a correct manner; exactly; acurately; without fault or error."
simplified_definition: in the correct or proper way; without error.

definition: "To be like something else in the dimensions and arrangement of its parts;  followed by with or to; as  concurring figures correspond with each other throughout."
simplified_definition: to agree; match .

definition: "Mutual adaptation  relation or agreement of one thing to another; agreement; congruity; fitness; relation."
simplified_definition: agreement or similarity between or among things.

definition: "One who carries on commercial intercourse by letter or telegram with a person or firm at a distance."
simplified_definition: a person who writes letters to another, especially over a period of time.

definition: "The covered way lying round the whole compass of the fortifications of a place."
simplified_definition: a hall or passageway.

definition: "To consume; to wear away; to prey upon; to impair."
simplified_definition: to cause to wear away slowly.

definition: "The action or effect of corrosive agents  or the process of corrosive change; as the rusting of iron is a variety of corrosion."
simplified_definition: the act or condition of being worn or eaten away slowly.

definition: "To become vitiated; to lose putity or goodness."
simplified_definition: not honest; wicked.

definition: "The act of changing  or of being changed for the worse; departure from what is pure simple or correct; as a corruption of style; corruption in language."
simplified_definition: activity that is not honest, especially secret, illegal activity.

definition: "The waist or bodice of a lady's dress; as  a low corsage."
simplified_definition: a small bunch of flowers worn by a woman at the shoulder, waist, or on the wrist.

definition: "Any external application intended to beautify and improve the complexion."
simplified_definition: a preparation used on the face or body to make the person wearing it look more attractive. Lipstick, nail polish, and powder are cosmetics.

definition: "Alt. of Cosmical"
simplified_definition: of or relating to the universe.

definition: "The theory or description of the universe  as a system displaying order and harmony."
simplified_definition: the universe considered as a whole.

definition: "of Cost"
simplified_definition: the amount of money charged or paid for something.

definition: "Of great cost; expensive; dear."
simplified_definition: of high cost or value.

definition: "A character dress  used at fancy balls or for dramatic purposes."
simplified_definition: the type of clothing worn in a particular place or time or by members of a particular group.

definition: "See Cozy."
simplified_definition: another spelling of cozy.

definition: "A small house; a cottage or hut."
simplified_definition: a small bed that folds up.

definition: "A small house; a cot; a hut."
simplified_definition: a small house.

definition: "To go on prosperously; to succeed."
simplified_definition: a plant that makes soft, white fibers. These fibers are used to make thread or cloth.

definition: "The American wood rabbit ;  also called Molly cottontail."
simplified_definition: a kind of rabbit that has brown or gray fur and a fluffy white tail. Cottontails live in North and South America.

definition: "An American tree of the genus Populus or poplar  having the seeds covered with abundant cottonlike hairs; esp. the P. monilifera and P. angustifolia of the Western United States."
simplified_definition: a North American tree of the poplar family. Cottonwoods grow quickly and bear seeds surrounded by fiber that looks like cotton.

definition: "To transfer  from the wire cloth mold to a felt blanket  for further drying."
simplified_definition: a piece of indoor furniture made for a number of people to sit on at the same time; sofa.

definition: "An American feline quadruped   resembling the African panther in size and habits. Its color is tawny without spots; hence writers often called it the American lion. Called also puma panther mountain lion and catamount. See Puma."
simplified_definition: a common name for a puma, a large wild cat with tan fur. Cougars live in many parts of North and South America. They are carnivorous mammals. They are also called mountain lions or panthers.

definition: "To expel air  or obstructing or irritating matter from the lungs or air passages in a noisy and violent manner."
simplified_definition: to release air noisily from the lungs. A cough results from illness or from breathing in foreign matter.

definition: "Was  should be or would be able capable or susceptible. Used as an auxiliary in the past tense or in the conditional present."
simplified_definition: used to express that there was ability to do something in the past, or that an action or state was possible in the past.

definition: "An assembly of men summoned or convened for consultation  deliberation or advice; as a council of physicians for consultation in a critical case."
simplified_definition: a group of persons gathered together to discuss or make decisions about public matters. For example, a city council may make laws for or give advice on how to run a city.

definition: "Examination of consequences; exercise of deliberate judgment; prudence."
simplified_definition: help or advice given by an authority or wise person.

definition: "of Counsel"
simplified_definition: the activity of meeting and talking regularly with someone who can give advice and support in a particular area of life.

definition: "One who counsels; an adviser."
simplified_definition: a person who gives advice, especially as a job.

definition: "To reckon; to rely; to depend;  with on or upon."
simplified_definition: to list or name one by one in order to find the total.

definition: "An encounter."
simplified_definition: a prefix that means "opposite to."

definition: "One who pretends to be what he is not; one who personates another; an impostor; a cheat."
simplified_definition: made to look like something real in order to cheat people.

definition: "A thing may be applied to another thing so as to fit perfectly  as a seal to its impression; hence a thing which is adapted to another thing or which supplements it; that which serves to complete or complement anything; hence a person or thing having qualities lacking in another; an opposite."
simplified_definition: someone or something that is just like or similar to another.

definition: "The wife of an earl in the British peerage  or of a count in the Continental nobility; also a lady possessed of the same dignity in her own right. See the Note under Count."
simplified_definition: a woman married to a count or earl.

definition: "Incapable of being counted; not ascertainable; innumerable."
simplified_definition: very great in number; not able to be counted.

definition: "Rural regions  as opposed to a city or town."
simplified_definition: a large area of land where people live under the same government or have the same culture; nation.

definition: "An inhabitant or native of a region."
simplified_definition: a person who lives in or was born in the same country as oneself.

definition: "A particular rural district; a country neighborhood."
simplified_definition: a rural area or areas .

definition: "A woman born  or dwelling in the country as opposed to the city; a woman born or dwelling in the same country with another native or inhabitant."
simplified_definition: a woman from the same country as oneself.

definition: "An earldom; the domain of a count or earl."
simplified_definition: one of several sections into which a U.S. state is divided.

definition: "To come together as male and female; to copulate."
simplified_definition: two things of the same kind or that go together in some way.

definition: "A section of a ticket  showing the holder to be entitled to some specified accomodation or service as to a passage over a designated line of travel a particular seat in a theater or the like."
simplified_definition: a small, printed slip of paper that gives someone a discount, admission to a performance, or a chance to win a prize.

definition: "The heart; spirit; temper; disposition."
simplified_definition: the ability to face fear or danger; bravery.

definition: "Possessing  or characterized by courage; brave; bold."
simplified_definition: brave.

definition: "A series of motions or acts arranged in order; a succession of acts or practices connectedly followed; as  a course of medicine; a course of lectures on chemistry."
simplified_definition: progress from one point to another; movement.

definition: "To invite by attractions; to allure; to attract."
simplified_definition: an open space surrounded by buildings or walls; courtyard.

definition: "Of courtlike manners; pertaining to  or expressive of courtesy; characterized by courtesy; civil; obliging; well bred; polite; affable; complaisant."
simplified_definition: being polite or showing good manners.

definition: "An act of civility  respect or reverence made by women consisting of a slight depression or dropping of the body with bending of the knees."
simplified_definition: good manners or politeness.

definition: "A court or inclosure attached to a house."
simplified_definition: a yard surrounded by buildings or walls.

definition: "A title formerly given by a king to a nobleman  particularly to those of the council. In English writs etc. issued by the crown it signifies any earl."
simplified_definition: the son or daughter of an aunt or uncle.

definition: "A boy or man of any age or station."
simplified_definition: a small bay in a shoreline of a sea, lake, or river.

definition: "To remove from remembrance; to put away; to remit."
simplified_definition: to put or spread something over or on.

definition: "of Cover"
simplified_definition: something that covers or hides.

definition: "To wish for with eagerness; to desire possession of;  used in a good sense."
simplified_definition: to wish to have very much; envy.

definition: "A wedge  or brake to check the motion of a machine or car; a chock."
simplified_definition: the adult female of cattle.

definition: "To make timorous; to frighten."
simplified_definition: a person who does not have the courage to face danger, pain, or something difficult.

definition: "Want of courage to face danger; extreme timidity; pusillanimity; base fear of danger or hurt; lack of spirit."
simplified_definition: a lack of bravery to work through danger, pain, or other difficult things.

definition: "Wanting courage; basely or weakly timid or fearful; pusillanimous; spiritless."
simplified_definition: of or like a coward.

definition: "One of the marauders who  in the Revolutionary War infested the neutral ground between the American and British lines and committed depredations on the Americans."
simplified_definition: a man who herds and takes care of cattle. Cowboys work on ranches and often ride horses.

definition: "The hide of a cow."
simplified_definition: the skin and hair of a cow, or leather made from the skin of a cow.

definition: "One who works with another; a coperator."
simplified_definition: one of two or more people who work together; fellow worker.

definition: "A carnivorous animal   allied to the dog found in the western part of North America;  called also prairie wolf. Its voice is a snapping bark followed by a prolonged shrill howl."
simplified_definition: a North American mammal that is closely related to dogs, foxes, and wolves. Coyotes have a pointed nose and ears and a bushy tail. They hunt small animals, and they also sometimes eat plants.

definition: "A wadded covering for a teakettle or other vessel to keep the contents hot."
simplified_definition: warm and snug in a comfortable way.

definition: "A crab apple;  so named from its harsh taste."
simplified_definition: an animal with a wide, flat body covered by a hard shell. Crabs have ten legs, including a pair of claws, eyes on short stalks, and antennae. Most kinds of crabs live in the ocean and eat many kinds of food. Crabs are crustaceans, which are a kind of arthropod. The biggest crabs are larger than any other arthropod.

definition: "To burst or open in chinks; to break  with or without quite separating into parts."
simplified_definition: to break apart with a snapping sound.

definition: "A pair of fluted rolls for grinding caoutchouc."
simplified_definition: a thin, hard biscuit.

definition: "A condition produced in certain porcelain  fine earthenware or glass in which the glaze or enamel appears to be cracked in all directions making a sort of reticulated surface; as Chinese crackle; Bohemian crackle."
simplified_definition: to make a series of small snapping noises.

definition: "A machine on rockers  used in washing out auriferous earth;  also called a rocker."
simplified_definition: a baby's bed set on rockers.

definition: "A vessel; vessels of any kind;  generally used in a collective sense."
simplified_definition: a suffix that means "skill or practice in the use of."

definition: "One skilled in some trade or manual occupation; an artificer; a mechanic."
simplified_definition: a person who works at a craft or skilled trade; artisan.

definition: "Possessing dexterity; skilled; skillful."
simplified_definition: sly or cunning.

definition: "To make crude preparation for a special occasion  as an examination by a hasty and extensive course of memorizing or study."
simplified_definition: to fill with more than can be easily held.

definition: "To form on a cramp; as  to cramp boot legs."
simplified_definition: a sharp pain in a muscle that suddenly becomes tight.

definition: "A red  acid berry much used for making sauce etc.; also the plant producing it  The high cranberry or cranberry tree is a species of Viburnum  and the other is sometimes called low cranberry or marsh cranberry to distinguish it."
simplified_definition: a shrub that bears a sour, red berry, or the berry itself. Cranberries grow in wet ground in North America.

definition: "An iron arm with horizontal motion  attached to the side or back of a fireplace for supporting kettles etc. over a fire."
simplified_definition: a tall wading bird with long legs and a long neck and bill. A whooping crane is one kind of crane.

definition: "Any bend  turn or winding as of a passage."
simplified_definition: a device that moves things in a circle. Cranks have a lever attached at a right angle to the end of an arm that moves in a circle. Cranks are turned by hand or by another arm that connects to the lever.

definition: "Unsteady; easy to upset; crank."
simplified_definition: in a bad mood; grouchy.

definition: "To break in pieces violently; to dash together with noise and violence."
simplified_definition: to strike violently while riding or moving.

definition: "To pack in a crate or case for transportation; as  to crate a sewing machine; to crate peaches."
simplified_definition: a box for packing and shipping made of wood or other material.

definition: "The basinlike opening or mouth of a volcano  through which the chief eruption comes; similarly the mouth of a geyser about which a cone of silica is often built up."
simplified_definition: a hollow area shaped like the inside of a bowl. The mouth of a volcano is a crater, and the moon has many craters on its surface.

definition: "To call for  as a gratification; to long for; hence to require or demand; as the stomach craves food."
simplified_definition: to need or desire very much.

definition: "Alt. of Crayfish"
simplified_definition: another form of crayfish.

definition: "To have a sensation as of insect creeping over the body; as  the flesh crawls. See Creep v. i. ."
simplified_definition: to move along, usually slowly, with one's body very close to the ground or other surface; creep.

definition: "Any crustacean of the family Astacidae  resembling the lobster but smaller and found in fresh waters. Crawfishes are esteemed very delicate food both in Europe and America. The North American species are numerous and mostly belong to the genus Cambarus. The blind crawfish of the Mammoth Cave is Cambarus pellucidus. The common European species is Astacus fluviatilis."
simplified_definition: a small animal with a hard, jointed shell that lives in fresh water. Crayfish are crustaceans and are closely related to lobsters.

definition: "To sketch  as with a crayon; to sketch or plan."
simplified_definition: a colored stick or pencil made of wax. A crayon is used for drawing and coloring.

definition: "Broken  weakened or dissordered in intellect; shattered; demented; deranged."
simplified_definition: having a mental illness; insane.

definition: "To produce a creaking sound with."
simplified_definition: to make or move with a grinding or squeaking noise.

definition: "A delicacy of several kinds prepared for the table from cream  etc. or so as to resemble cream."
simplified_definition: the part of whole milk that contains fat. Butter is made from cream.

definition: "Full of  or containing cream; resembling cream in nature appearance or taste; creamlike; unctuous."
simplified_definition: having the taste, color, or texture of cream.

definition: "To make a crease or mark in  as by folding or doubling."
simplified_definition: a fold or dent made by heat or pressure.

definition: "To invest with a new form  office or character; to constitute; to appoint; to make; as to create one a peer."
simplified_definition: to bring into being.

definition: "The act of constituting or investing with a new character; appointment; formation."
simplified_definition: the act of creating or of causing something to exist.

definition: "Having the power to create; exerting the act of creation."
simplified_definition: able to make or do something new or with imagination.

definition: "A person who owes his rise and fortune to another; a servile dependent; an instrument; a tool."
simplified_definition: a living person or animal.

definition: "Reputation derived from the confidence of others; esteem; honor; good name; estimation."
simplified_definition: the quality or condition of being able to be believed or trusted.

definition: "One who gives credit in business matters; hence  one to whom money is due;  correlative to debtor."
simplified_definition: someone to whom money is owed.

definition: "A definite summary of what is believed; esp.  a summary of the articles of Christian faith; a confession of faith for public use; esp. one which is brief and comprehensive."
simplified_definition: a set of beliefs held by a person or group.

definition: "Any turn or winding."
simplified_definition: a member of a group of American Indian peoples formed from groups who lived in Alabama and Georgia, but are now mostly in Oklahoma.

definition: "To move or behave with servility or exaggerated humility; to fawn; as  a creeping sycophant."
simplified_definition: to move with the body close to the ground; crawl.

definition: "Crawly; having or producing a sensation like that caused by insects creeping on the skin."
simplified_definition: of or causing a feeling of anxiety, fear, or disgust similar to that which might be produced by something crawling on one's skin.

definition: "Same as Crape."
simplified_definition: a thin cloth with a wrinkled surface.

definition: "of Creep"
simplified_definition: past tense and past participle of "creep."

definition: "A gradual increase in the strength and fullness of tone with which a passage is performed."
simplified_definition: an increase in loudness or force in a piece of music.

definition: "A symbol of Artemis  or Diana."
simplified_definition: the shape of the moon when it looks to us like a narrow arc. The moon appears as a crescent in its first and last quarters.

definition: "The ornamental finishing which surmounts the ridge of a roof  canopy etc."
simplified_definition: a tuft of feathers, bone, or fur on an animal's head, or something that looks like this. The comb of a rooster is one kind of crest.

definition: "of Crow"
simplified_definition: a group of people who work together.

definition: "A structure of logs to be anchored with stones;  used for docks  pier dams etc."
simplified_definition: a bed with high sides for a baby or young child.

definition: "A low stool."
simplified_definition: an insect that is related to a grasshopper. It has long antennae and strong hind legs for jumping. The male makes a chirping noise by rubbing his front wings together.

definition: "of Cry"
simplified_definition: past tense and past participle of "cry."

definition: "Gross violation of human law  in distinction from a misdemeanor or trespass or other slight offense. Hence also any aggravated offense against morality or the public welfare; any outrage or great wrong."
simplified_definition: something a person does that is against the law.

definition: "Guilty of crime or sin."
simplified_definition: of or having to do with crime.

definition: "To dye with crimson or deep red; to redden."
simplified_definition: the color that comes from mixing red and a small amount of purple paint.

definition: "A winding or turn; wrinkle; sinuosity."
simplified_definition: to make small ripples or wrinkles in.

definition: "One who creeps  halts or limps; one who has lost or never had the use of a limb or limbs; a lame person; hence one who is partially disabled."
simplified_definition: a person or animal that cannot use a part of its body because of a disease or injury.

definition: "That change in a disease which indicates whether the result is to be recovery or death; sometimes  also a striking change of symptoms attended by an outward manifestation as by an eruption or sweat."
simplified_definition: the point or moment just before a very important change.

definition: "Curled with the ripple of the water."
simplified_definition: firm but breaking easily into pieces.

definition: "Crisp; brittle; as  a crispy pie crust."
simplified_definition: easily broken or crumbled, as fried or baked foods such as fresh potato chips or newlybaked crackers,

definition: "With opposition or hindrance; at cross purposes; contrarily; as  things go crisscross."
simplified_definition: with two or more lines crossing each other.

definition: "An act of criticism; a critique."
simplified_definition: anyone who judges or evaluates.

definition: "Inclined to criticise or find fault; fastidious; captious; censorious; exacting."
simplified_definition: likely to find fault.

definition: "The rules and principles which regulate the practice of the critic; the art of judging with knowledge and propriety of the beauties and faults of a literary performance  or of a production in the fine arts; as dramatic criticism."
simplified_definition: the act of judging what is good or bad in something.

definition: "A critical examination or estimate of a work of literature or art; a critical dissertation or essay; a careful and through analysis of any subject; a criticism; as  Kant's """"Critique of Pure Reason."
simplified_definition: a written evaluation of a work of art or literature.

definition: "The coarse  harsh sound uttered by a frog or a raven or a like sound."
simplified_definition: to make a low, hoarse sound with the voice.

definition: "A kind of knitting done by means of a hooked needle  with worsted silk or cotton; crochet work. Commonly used adjectively."
simplified_definition: needlework made with a hooked needle that pulls the thread or yarn in a pattern of connected loops.

definition: "A large reptile of the genus Crocodilus  of several species. They grow to the length of sixteen or eighteen feet and inhabit the large rivers of Africa Asia and America. The eggs laid in the sand are hatched by the sun's heat. The best known species is that of the Nile . The Florida crocodile  is much less common than the alligator and has longer jaws. The name is also sometimes applied to the species of other related genera as the gavial and the alligator."
simplified_definition: a large reptile that is found in tropical swamps. It has a thick, tough skin, a long tail, and a long, pointed snout.

definition: "Like  or pertaining to the crocodile; characteristic of the crocodile."
simplified_definition: a reptile of the group that includes the crocodile. Alligators and caimans are crocodilians.

definition: "A genus of iridaceous plants  with pretty blossoms rising separately from the bulb or corm. C. vernus is one of the earliest of springblooming flowers; C. sativus produces the saffron and blossoms in the autumn."
simplified_definition: a small plant that blooms in early spring with one colorful flower.

definition: "A bishop's staff of office. Cf. Pastoral staff."
simplified_definition: something bent, curved, or hooked.

definition: "of Crook"
simplified_definition: bent, curved, or twisting.

definition: "The top  end or highest part of anything especially of a plant or tree."
simplified_definition: plants grown on a farm.

definition: "To lay or draw something  as a line across; as to cross the letter t."
simplified_definition: an upright line or pole with a horizontal one across it.

definition: "A weapon  used in discharging arrows formed by placing a bow crosswise on a stock."
simplified_definition: a bow on a wooden stock. Crossbows shoot arrows when someone pulls a trigger.

definition: "See Strabismus."
simplified_definition: a condition in which one or both eyes turn toward each other.

definition: "The act of making the sign of the cross."
simplified_definition: a place where two roads, routes, or railroad tracks cross each other.

definition: "A road that crosses another; an obscure road intersecting or avoiding the main road."
simplified_definition: the place where two roads cross one another; intersection.

definition: "A stanchion or post of wood or iron  with two arms for supporting a boom spare yards etc.;  called also crane and crutch."
simplified_definition: the place where two long, straight parts, such as legs or tree branches, come together.

definition: "To bend  or cause to bend as in humility or fear."
simplified_definition: to lower the body close to the ground by bending the legs. A cat about to pounce crouches, as does a person getting ready to run in a race.

definition: "The hinder part or buttocks of certain quadrupeds  especially of a horse; hence the place behind the saddle."
simplified_definition: a disease in children that causes coughing and difficult breathing.

definition: "To utter a sound expressive of joy or pleasure."
simplified_definition: a shiny black bird known for its shrill, harsh cry. Crows are often seen looking for food.

definition: "A box or perch near the top of a mast  esp. in whalers to shelter the man on the lookout."
simplified_definition: a small platform near the top of a ship's mast. A person stands in the crow'snest to see what is happening on and around the ship.

definition: "A bar of iron sharpened at one end  and used as a lever."
simplified_definition: a heavy, metal bar or rod with a flattened and bent end. A crowbar is used to lift or pry things.

definition: "To press or drive together; to mass together."
simplified_definition: a large number of people gathered together.

definition: "of Crowd"
simplified_definition: very full, or too full, of things or people.

definition: "The rounding  or rounded part of the deck from a level line."
simplified_definition: a covering for the head often made of gold or silver and decorated with jewels. Kings and queens wear crowns.

definition: "Severe; trying or searching  as if bringing to the cross; decisive; as a crucial test."
simplified_definition: very important; deciding the success or failure of something.

definition: "Having  or displaying superficial and undigested knowledge; without culture or profundity; as a crude reasoner."
simplified_definition: natural; raw.

definition: "Causing  or fitted to cause pain grief or misery."
simplified_definition: willing to cause pain or suffering; showing no mercy.

definition: "The attribute or quality of being cruel; a disposition to give unnecessary pain or suffering to others; inhumanity; barbarity."
simplified_definition: the state or characteristic of being cruel.

definition: "A voyage made in various directions  as of an armed vessel for the protection of other vessels or in search of an enemy; a sailing to and fro as for exploration or for pleasure."
simplified_definition: to travel for pleasure in a ship.

definition: "One who  or a vessel that cruises;  usually an armed vessel."
simplified_definition: a fast ship of medium size. Cruisers are used in wars.

definition: "The soft part of bread."
simplified_definition: a tiny piece that breaks or falls from baked goods.

definition: "To break into small pieces; to cause to fall in pieces."
simplified_definition: to break or crush into bits or crumbs.

definition: "Full of crumb or crumbs."
simplified_definition: not good at all; not pleasing or of high quality; junky.

definition: "To draw or press into wrinkles or folds; to crush together; to rumple; as  to crumple paper."
simplified_definition: to press or crush and cause wrinkles.

definition: "To chew with force and noise; to craunch."
simplified_definition: to chew with a crackling noise; crush by biting.

definition: "A Portuguese coin. See Crusado."
simplified_definition: any of the wars between European Catholics and Middle Eastern Muslims between  and . During these wars, the Catholics tried to take territory away from the Muslims.

definition: "To overcome completely; to subdue totally."
simplified_definition: to cause to lose shape or become flat by pressing or squeezing very hard.

definition: "The hard exterior or surface of bread  in distinction from the soft part or crumb; or a piece of bread grown dry or hard."
simplified_definition: the slightly hard, baked dough on the outside of bread, pies, and other baked things.

definition: "An animal belonging to the class Crustacea."
simplified_definition: an animal with a hard, jointed shell. Crustaceans live in fresh or salt water. There are many kinds of crustaceans, including crabs, crayfish, lobsters, and shrimps. Crustaceans are kinds of arthropods.

definition: "A staff with a crosspiece at the head  to be placed under the arm or shoulder to support the lame or infirm in walking."
simplified_definition: a support used to help injured people walk. A crutch is a pole with a padded top that rests under the arm.

definition: "A word or phrase caught up by a party or faction and repeated for effect; as  the party cry of the Tories."
simplified_definition: to make a loud shout or yell .

definition: "The glass over the dial of a watch case."
simplified_definition: a piece of a certain substance that is made when the substance changes from a liquid to a solid. In becoming solid, as when water turns to ice, this type of substance takes on a structure that has a repeating pattern of flat surfaces. These flat surfaces reflect light and can make the substance sparkle when looked at from different directions.

definition: "To cause to form crystals  or to assume the crystalline form."
simplified_definition: to change into or cause to become crystals.

definition: "A young animal  esp. the young of the bear."
simplified_definition: the young offspring of some carnivorous mammals, such as the bear, lion, and wolf.

definition: "A native or an inhabitant of Cuba."
simplified_definition: of or having to do with Cuba or its culture or people.

definition: "To raise to the third power; to obtain the cube of."
simplified_definition: a solid figure with six square faces all the same size.

definition: "A curve of the third degree."
simplified_definition: having form in three dimensions.

definition: "A bird belonging to Cuculus  Coccyzus and several allied genera of many species."
simplified_definition: a bird of Europe and America with a slim body and a long tail. A cuckoo's color can range from gray to brown. Some cuckoos have a call that sounds like their name.

definition: "A creeping plant  and its fruit of several species of the genus Cucumis esp. Cucumis sativus the unripe fruit of which is eaten either fresh or picked. Also similar plants or fruits of several other genera. See below."
simplified_definition: a long fruit shaped like a cylinder with hard green skin and white flesh. Cucumbers are grown as food and are eaten raw.

definition: "A portion of tobacco held in the mouth and chewed; a quid."
simplified_definition: food that certain animals such as cows bring up from the first stomach to chew again.

definition: "A close embrace."
simplified_definition: to hold and hug in a tender and loving way.

definition: "The tail; the end of a thing; especially  a taillike twist of hair worn at the back of the head; a queue."
simplified_definition: a long, thin stick with a narrow tip, used to hit the ball in the game of pool or billiards.

definition: "To fight; to scuffle; to box."
simplified_definition: to hit or slap with an open hand.

definition: "The kitchen or cooking department."
simplified_definition: a particular type of cooking, especially that of a particular region, or the food in general that is prepared in this way.

definition: "One accused of  or arraigned for a crime as before a judge."
simplified_definition: a person who is charged with or is guilty of doing something wrong.

definition: "To direct special attention to; to devote time and thought to; to foster; to cherish."
simplified_definition: to make fit for growing plants by plowing, weeding, or adding fertilizer.

definition: "Bestowal of time or attention for selfimprovement or for the benefit of others; fostering care."
simplified_definition: the act of preparing and improving.

definition: "One who cultivates; as  a cultivator of the soil; a cultivator of literature."
simplified_definition: a machine or hand tool that prepares soil for planting by loosening the soil and removing weeds.

definition: "Of or pertaining to culture."
simplified_definition: of or relating to culture.

definition: "The act of  or any labor or means employed for training disciplining or refining the moral and intellectual nature of man; as the culture of the mind."
simplified_definition: the language, customs, ideas, and art of a particular group of people.

definition: "Burdensome or hindering  as a weight or drag; embarrassing; vexatious; cumbrous."
simplified_definition: difficult to hold or carry because of size, shape, or weight.

definition: "One of the four principal forms of clouds. SeeCloud."
simplified_definition: a large, fluffy, white cloud with a flat bottom.

definition: "Pretty or pleasing; as  a cunning little boy."
simplified_definition: skill used in a sly or tricky way.

definition: "The contents of such a vessel; a cupful."
simplified_definition: a small container used for drinking.

definition: "To collect  as into a cupboard; to hoard."
simplified_definition: a cabinet with shelves for food, dishes, or other items.

definition: "As much as a cup will hold."
simplified_definition: the amount that fills one cup; cup.

definition: "The god of love  son of Venus; usually represented as a naked winged boy with bow and arrow."
simplified_definition: the god of love in Roman mythology.

definition: "A frame or wall round the mouth of a well; also  a frame within a well to prevent the earth caving in."
simplified_definition: a raised rim where a street meets the edge of the sidewalk.

definition: "The edible flower head of certain brassicaceous plants  as the broccoli and cauliflower."
simplified_definition: a soft, thick substance taken from milk. Curds can be eaten or made into cheese.

definition: "To thicken; to congeal."
simplified_definition: to turn into curd.

definition: "Act of healing or state of being healed; restoration to health from disease  or to soundness after injury."
simplified_definition: something that makes a sick person healthy or well.

definition: "A utensil for covering the fire."
simplified_definition: a rule or law that sets a time after which everyone must be off the street and inside for the night. Curfews sometimes apply only to a particular group, such as young people.

definition: "That which is curious  or fitted to excite or reward attention."
simplified_definition: the desire to learn or know.

definition: "Exhibiting care or nicety; artfully constructed; elaborate; wrought with elegance or skill."
simplified_definition: eager to learn or know.

definition: "To shape  into a curve."
simplified_definition: to make into coils or rings.

definition: "Curling or tending to curl; having curls; full of ripples; crinkled."
simplified_definition: having curls or tending to curl.

definition: "The acid fruit or berry of the Ribes rubrum or common red currant  or of its variety the white currant."
simplified_definition: a small raisin with no seeds.

definition: "Fluency; readiness of utterance."
simplified_definition: the money that is used in a country.

definition: "Running or moving rapidly."
simplified_definition: of or happening in the present time.

definition: "In a current manner; generally; commonly; as  it is currently believed."
simplified_definition: at the present time; now.

definition: "A race course; a place for running."
simplified_definition: the courses offered at a school or in a particular area of study.

definition: "To bring great evil upon; to be the cause of serious harm or unhappiness to; to furnish with that which will be a cause of deep trouble; to afflict or injure grievously; to harass or torment."
simplified_definition: a statement of a wish that something bad will happen to someone or something.

definition: "Any part of a mathematical instrument that moves or slides backward and forward upon another part."
simplified_definition: a movable marker on a computer screen. The cursor shows where to click on an icon or where letters or numbers can be typed in.

definition: "Characterized by excessive brevity; short; rudely concise; as  curt limits; a curt answer."
simplified_definition: rudely short or brief in speech.

definition: "A hanging screen intended to darken or conceal  and admitting of being drawn back or up and reclosed at pleasure; esp. drapery of cloth or lace hanging round a bed or at a window; in theaters and like places a movable screen for concealing the stage."
simplified_definition: a piece of cloth hung in a window or other opening to shut out light or to cover something.

definition: "Same as Courtesy  an act of respect."
simplified_definition: a gesture of the body that shows respect made by bending the knees and lowering the body slightly. A curtsy is usually made by women and girls.

definition: "A line described according to some low  and having no finite portion of it a straight line."
simplified_definition: a line that bends smoothly in one direction without any straight parts or angles.

definition: "of Curve"
simplified_definition: having the shape of a curve; not straight or angular.

definition: "A riotous kind of dance  formerly common at weddings;  called also cushion dance."
simplified_definition: a pillow or pad that one sits on or leans on for comfort. Some cushions are used for decoration.

definition: "A mixture of milk and eggs  sweetened and baked or boiled."
simplified_definition: a cooked dessert made with eggs, milk, and sugar.

definition: "One who has care or custody  as of some public building; a keeper or superintendent."
simplified_definition: a person who is responsible for taking care of someone or something.

definition: "State of being guarded and watched to prevent escape; restraint of liberty; confinement; imprisonment."
simplified_definition: the legal right to take care of and control someone or something.

definition: "To make familiar; to accustom."
simplified_definition: a way of acting that is usual or accepted for a person or a social group.

definition: "A book containing laws and usages  or customs; as the Customary of the Normans."
simplified_definition: done as a custom; usual.

definition: "A lewd woman."
simplified_definition: a person who buys products or services.

definition: "To move or make off quickly."
simplified_definition: to pierce, slice, or open with a sharp tool such as a knife, ax, saw, or scissors.

definition: "Clever; sharp; shrewd; ingenious; cunning."
simplified_definition: pretty, charming, or adorable.

definition: "The outermost skin or pellicle of a plant  found especially in leaves and young stems."
simplified_definition: the tough, dead skin along the bottom edge and sides of the fingernails and toenails.

definition: "A short  heavy curving sword used in the navy. See Curtal ax."
simplified_definition: a short, thick sword with one cutting edge and a curved blade.

definition: "A small  light onehorse sleigh."
simplified_definition: something that cuts, or someone whose job it is to cut things.

definition: "The act or process of making an incision  or of severing felling shaping etc."
simplified_definition: something that has been cut from something else.

definition: "A bicycle or tricycle  or other light velocipede."
simplified_definition: a circle of events that repeats in a regular pattern.

definition: "A violent storm  often of vast extent characterized by high winds rotating about a calm center of low atmospheric pressure. This center moves onward often with a velocity of twenty or thirty miles an hour."
simplified_definition: a storm with very strong winds that turn around a center of low pressure in the atmosphere.

definition: "A portable forge  used by tinkers etc."
simplified_definition: a giant in Greek mythology who has only one eye, in the middle of his forehead.

definition: "A young swan."
simplified_definition: a young swan.

definition: "A solid body which may be generated by the rotation of a parallelogram round one its sides; or a body of rollerlike form  of which the longitudinal section is oblong and the cross section is circular."
simplified_definition: a solid figure with a shape similar to that of a can, a round flat cake, or a round tube with closed ends. A cylinder has parallel circular faces joined by one curved face.

definition: "Having the form of a cylinder  or of a section of its convex surface; partaking of the properties of the cylinder."
simplified_definition: in the shape of a cylinder.

definition: "A musical instrument used by the ancients. It is supposed to have been similar to the modern kettle drum  though perhaps smaller."
simplified_definition: a percussion instrument that is round and made of metal. Cymbals are played by striking a pair of them together or hitting one with a drumstick or brushes.

definition: "A coniferous tree of the genus Cupressus. The species are mostly evergreen  and have wood remarkable for its durability."
simplified_definition: an evergreen tree that has tiny leaves like scales.

definition: "A thin  transparent stuff the same as or corresponding to crape. It was either white or black the latter being most common and used for mourning."
simplified_definition: a country on an island in the Mediterranean Sea near the coast of Turkey. Nicosia is the capital of Cyprus.

definition: "A small capsule or sac of the kind in which many immature entozoans exist in the tissues of living animals; also  a similar form in Rotifera etc."
simplified_definition: a small pouch within body tissue that is filled with fluid or air. Some cysts are connected with serious disease, but most are not harmful at all.

definition: "The substance of the body of a cell  as distinguished from the karyoplasma or substance of the nucleus."
simplified_definition: the thick liquid substance that holds all the parts that are inside a cell.

definition: "A king; a chief; the title of the emperor of Russia."
simplified_definition: the title of male Russian rulers before .

definition: "The title of the empress of Russia."
simplified_definition: the wife of a czar.

definition: "The nominal of the second tone in the model major scale   or of the fourth tone in the relative minor scale of C  or of the key tone in the relative minor of F."
simplified_definition: the fourth letter of the English alphabet.

definition: "A skillful hand; a dabster; an expert."
simplified_definition: to pat or press lightly.

definition: "To wet by little dips or strokes; to spatter; to sprinkle; to moisten; to wet."
simplified_definition: to wet by splashing or dipping.

definition: "One of a breed of small dogs with short crooked legs  and long body;  called also badger dog. There are two kinds the roughhaired and the smoothhaired."
simplified_definition: a German breed of dog. Dachshunds have long bodies, very short legs, and drooping ears.

definition: "Father;  a word sometimes used by children."
simplified_definition: father.

definition: "Diminutive of Dad."
simplified_definition: father.

definition: "A plant of the genus Narcissus . It has a bulbous root and beautiful flowers  usually of a yellow hue. Called also daffodilly daffadilly daffadowndilly daffydowndilly etc."
simplified_definition: a plant with tall stems and bright yellow or white flowers shaped like bells. Daffodils grow from bulbs and appear in the spring.

definition: "A short weapon used for stabbing. This is the general term: cf. Poniard  Stiletto Bowie knife Dirk Misericorde Anlace."
simplified_definition: a short, pointed weapon like a sword, with two sharp edges.

definition: "Every day; day by day; as  a thing happens daily."
simplified_definition: happening or done every day.

definition: "Requiring dainties. Hence: Overnice; hard to please; fastidious; squeamish; scrupulous; ceremonious."
simplified_definition: small, pretty, and delicate.

definition: "That department of farming which is concerned in the production of milk  and its conversion into butter and cheese."
simplified_definition: a place where milk is stored and butter and cheese are made.

definition: "The high or principal table  at the end of a hall at which the chief guests were seated; also the chief seat at the high table."
simplified_definition: a raised platform for speakers or the seating of special guests.

definition: "The whiteweed   the plant commonly called daisy in North America;  called also oxeye daisy. See Whiteweed."
simplified_definition: a plant that has flowers with white, pink, or yellow petals around a yellow center.

definition: "A trough or spout to carry off water  as from a pump."
simplified_definition: a valley.

definition: "Of or pertaining to Dalmatia."
simplified_definition: a breed of dog. Dalmatians are large dogs that have short white hair with black or brown spots.

definition: "To shut up; to stop up; to close; to restrain."
simplified_definition: a wall built across a river or stream to keep the water from flowing and to raise the water level behind it.

definition: "Injury or harm to person  property or reputation; an inflicted loss of value; detriment; hurt; mischief."
simplified_definition: harm or injury that makes something less useful or valuable.

definition: "A mistress of a family  who is a lady; a woman in authority; especially a lady."
simplified_definition: a title of honor given by a British king or queen to a woman who has done something important.

definition: "To render damp; to moisten; to make humid  or moderately wet; to dampen; as to damp cloth."
simplified_definition: slightly wet; not completely dry.

definition: "To become damp; to deaden."
simplified_definition: to make moist or slightly wet.

definition: "A tune by which dancing is regulated  as the minuet the waltz the cotillon etc."
simplified_definition: to move the feet and body in a rhythmic way, usually to music.

definition: "One who dances or who practices dancing."
simplified_definition: someone who is dancing or whose profession is dancing.

definition: "A wellknown plant of the genus Taraxacum  bearing large yellow compound flowers and deeply notched leaves."
simplified_definition: a common plant with bright yellow flowers and leaves with points along the edges. Dandelion leaves can be eaten raw or cooked as vegetables, and wine is sometimes made from the flowers.

definition: "A scurf which forms on the head  and comes off in small or particles."
simplified_definition: a thin white crust of dead skin that forms on the scalp and is shed in flakes.

definition: "A sloop or cutter with a jigger on which a lugsail is set."
simplified_definition: very fine; pleasing; excellent.

definition: "A native  or a naturalized inhabitant of Denmark."
simplified_definition: a person who was born in or is a citizen of Denmark.

definition: "To endanger."
simplified_definition: a chance or likelihood that something bad or harmful may happen; peril; risk.

definition: "Causing danger; ready to do harm or injury."
simplified_definition: likely to cause harm; not safe.

definition: "To cause to dangle; to swing  as something suspended loosely; as to dangle the feet."
simplified_definition: to hang or swing loosely.

definition: "Belonging to the Danes  or to their language or country."
simplified_definition: of or having to do with Denmark, or its people or language.

definition: "To have adequate or sufficient courage for any purpose; to be bold or venturesome; not to be afraid; to venture."
simplified_definition: to be brave enough or careless enough to do something.

definition: "A reckless fellow. Also used adjectively; as  daredevil excitement."
simplified_definition: a person who puts himself or herself in danger by doing daring or dangerous things.

definition: "of Dare"
simplified_definition: the quality of being bold and willing to take risks; courage.

definition: "Foreboding evil; gloomy; jealous; suspicious."
simplified_definition: having little or no light.

definition: "To grow or darker."
simplified_definition: to cause to be dark or darker.

definition: "The absence of light; blackness; obscurity; gloom."
simplified_definition: lack of light.

definition: "One dearly beloved; a favorite."
simplified_definition: a person who is loved very much by the person speaking.

definition: "To mend as a rent or hole  with interlacing stitches of yarn or thread by means of a needle; to sew together with yarn or thread."
simplified_definition: to mend by weaving thread or yarn over a hole in cloth.

definition: "A fish; the dace. See Dace."
simplified_definition: a short arrow thrown with the hand or shot from a gun.

definition: "A sudden check; abashment; frustration; ruin; as  his hopes received a dash."
simplified_definition: to throw or toss with great force so as to break.

definition: "A screen at the bow af a steam launch to keep off the spray;  called also sprayboard."
simplified_definition: a panel below the windshield in a car or other vehicle. Dashboards have dials, controls, and spaces for keeping things.

definition: "See Datum."
simplified_definition: facts, figures, or other pieces of information that can be used to learn about something. The word "data" is the plural form of "datum," but is often used with a singular verb.

definition: "To have beginning; to begin; to be dated or reckoned;  with from."
simplified_definition: a particular day or point in time.

definition: "of Date"
simplified_definition: having a date.

definition: "To smear with soft  adhesive matter as pitch slime mud etc.; to plaster; to bedaub; to besmear."
simplified_definition: to smear or cover with something soft and sticky, such as paint.

definition: "A term of address indicating parental interest."
simplified_definition: a person's female child.

definition: "The wife of one's son."
simplified_definition: the wife of one's son.

definition: "A dawdler."
simplified_definition: to waste time; be slow.

definition: "To began to give promise; to begin to appear or to expand."
simplified_definition: the first daylight that appears in the morning; daybreak.

definition: "The time of light  or interval between one night and the next; the time between sunrise and sunset or from dawn to darkness; hence the light; sunshine."
simplified_definition: the period between sunrise and sunset.

definition: "The time of the first appearance of light in the morning."
simplified_definition: the first daylight in the morning; dawn.

definition: "A vain fancy speculation; a reverie; a castle in the air; unfounded hope."
simplified_definition: something similar to a dream but one that occurs when one is awake. A daydream comes from the imagination and often contains pleasant thoughts and fantasies.

definition: "The light of day as opposed to the darkness of night; the light of the sun  as opposed to that of the moon or to artificial light."
simplified_definition: the light of the day.

definition: "The time during which there is daylight  as distinguished from the night."
simplified_definition: the time between dawn and evening.

definition: "To stupefy with excess of light; with a blow  with cold or with fear; to confuse; to benumb."
simplified_definition: to stun by a blow or shock.

definition: "To bewilder or surprise with brilliancy or display of any kind."
simplified_definition: to make almost blind with too much bright light.

definition: "A prefix from Latin de down  from away; as in debark decline decease deduct decamp. In words from the French it is equivalent to Latin disapart away; or sometimes to de. Cf. Dis. It is negative and opposite in derange deform destroy etc. It is intensive in deprave despoil
simplified_definition: abbreviation of "Delaware."

definition: "An officer in Christian churches appointed to perform certain subordinate duties varying in different communions. In the Roman Catholic and Episcopal churches  a person admitted to the lowest order in the ministry subordinate to the bishops and priests. In Presbyterian churches he is subordinate to the minister and elders and has charge of certain duties connected with the communion service and the care of the poor. In Congregational churches he is subordinate to the pastor and has duties as in the Presbyterian church."
simplified_definition: a clergyman in certain Christian churches.

definition: "Bringing death; deadly."
simplified_definition: no longer alive.

definition: "To deprive of gloss or brilliancy; to obscure; as  to deaden gilding by a coat of size."
simplified_definition: to make less painful or intense.

definition: "Extremely."
simplified_definition: able to cause death.

definition: "Unwilling to hear or listen; determinedly inattentive; regardless; not to be persuaded as to facts  argument or exhortation;  with to; as deaf to reason."
simplified_definition: not able to hear, or not able to hear well.

definition: "To make deaf; to deprive of the power of hearing; to render incapable of perceiving sounds distinctly."
simplified_definition: to cause to become deaf.

definition: "Wood of the pine or fir; as  a floor of deal."
simplified_definition: to take specific action about something, especially a problem .

definition: "One who distributes cards to the players."
simplified_definition: a person whose job is to buy and sell.

definition: "of Deal"
simplified_definition: past tense and past participle of "deal."

definition: "Of disagreeable things and antipathies."
simplified_definition: much loved.

definition: "Manner of dying; act or state of passing from life."
simplified_definition: the end of life in any living thing, or the end of the life of a particular individual.

definition: "Subject of discussion."
simplified_definition: a discussion between two people or groups who disagree on an important subject.

definition: "To charge with debt;  the opposite of  and correlative to credit; as to debit a purchaser for the goods sold."
simplified_definition: an amount of money taken out of or owed on an account, or the record of that amount.

definition: "Rubbish  especially such as results from the destruction of anything; remains; ruins."
simplified_definition: scattered pieces left after something has been destroyed.

definition: "An action at law to recover a certain specified sum of money alleged to be due."
simplified_definition: something owed to another person.

definition: "One who owes a debt; one who is indebted;  correlative to creditor."
simplified_definition: a person who owes a debt to another.

definition: "A beginning or first attempt; hence  a first appearance before the public as of an actor or public speaker."
simplified_definition: a person's first appearance on stage, in concert, or on film.

definition: "A group or division of ten; esp.  a period of ten years; a decennium; as a decade of years or days; a decade of soldiers; the second decade of Livy."
simplified_definition: a unit of time equal to ten years.

definition: "A plane figure having ten sides and ten angles; any figure having ten angles. A regular decagon is one that has all its sides and angles equal."
simplified_definition: a figure with ten sides and ten angles.

definition: "One who decants liquors."

definition: "To cause to decay; to impair."
simplified_definition: to rot or become rotted.

definition: "of Decease"
simplified_definition: no longer alive; dead.

definition: "An attempt or disposition to deceive or lead into error; any declaration  artifice or practice which misleads another or causes him to believe what is false; a contrivance to entrap; deception; a wily device; fraud."
simplified_definition: the act of lying or cheating.

definition: "To deprive by fraud or stealth; to defraud."
simplified_definition: to cause to believe something that is not true; trick or fool.

definition: "Fig.: With reference to the end of the year and to the winter season; as  the December of his life."
simplified_definition: the twelfth month of the year. December has thirtyone days. Winter begins in December for people who live north of the equator.

definition: "Moderate  but competent; sufficient; hence respectable; fairly good; reasonably comfortable or satisfying; as a decent fortune; a decent person."
simplified_definition: proper or suitable.

definition: "The state of being deceived or misled."
simplified_definition: the act of causing someone to believe something that is not true.

definition: "To determine; to form a definite opinion; to come to a conclusion; to give decision; as  the court decided in favor of the defendant."
simplified_definition: to settle, choose, or solve.

definition: "Falling off  or subject to fall or be shed at a certain season or a certain stage or interval of growth as leaves  in autumn or as parts of animals such as hair teeth antlers etc.; also shedding leaves or parts at certain seasons stages
simplified_definition: having leaves that drop off each year.

definition: "Of or pertaining to decimals; numbered or proceeding by tens; having a tenfold increase or decrease  each unit being ten times the unit next smaller; as decimal notation; a decimal coinage."
simplified_definition: based on the number ten.

definition: "To stamp; to detect; to discover."
simplified_definition: to change from a code into ordinary language.

definition: "Cutting off; division; detachment of a part."
simplified_definition: the act or result of making up one's mind.

definition: "Marked by promptness and decision."
simplified_definition: able to make firm decisions or end arguments.

definition: "To cover; to overspread."
simplified_definition: the floor on a ship or boat. Sometimes a ship has several decks at different levels.

definition: "That part of the process in which the plaintiff sets forth in order and at large his cause of complaint; the narration of the plaintiff's case containing the count  or counts. See Count n. ."
simplified_definition: the act of declaring or making something known.

definition: "To state the plaintiff's cause of action at law in a legal form; as  the plaintiff declares in trespass."
simplified_definition: to announce in a formal way.

definition: "To bend downward; to bring down; to depress; to cause to bend  or fall."
simplified_definition: to refuse to do, in a polite way.

definition: "To become resolved or returned from existing combinations; to undergo dissolution; to decay; to rot."
simplified_definition: to decay.

definition: "To deck with that which is becoming  ornamental or honorary; to adorn; to beautify; to embellish; as to decorate the person; to decorate an edifice; to decorate a lawn with flowers; to decorate the mind with moral beauties; to decorate a hero with honors."
simplified_definition: to make more beautiful by adding decorations or designs.

definition: "The act of adorning  embellishing or honoring; ornamentation."
simplified_definition: an act of decorating.

definition: "Suited to decorate or embellish; adorning."
simplified_definition: adding to how attractive a thing is visually.

definition: "Anything intended to lead into a snare; a lure that deceives and misleads into danger  or into the power of an enemy; a bait."
simplified_definition: something used to attract animals or people into danger. Wooden decoys in the shape of birds or animals are often used by hunters to lead animals into a trap.

definition: "The wane of the moon."
simplified_definition: to become less or smaller.

definition: "To make decrees;  used absolutely."
simplified_definition: an official order or decision by a ruler or government.

definition: "To inscribe or address  as to a patron."
simplified_definition: to set apart for a special use or purpose.

definition: "An address to a patron or friend  prefixed to a book testifying respect and often recommending the work to his special protection and favor."
simplified_definition: the ceremony of opening something newly built, such as a building, a park, or a ship.

definition: "To take away  separate or remove in numbering estimating or calculating; to subtract;  often with from or out of."
simplified_definition: to subtract from another amount or sum.

definition: "Act or process of deducing or inferring."
simplified_definition: something that is subtracted or deducted.

definition: "Fact; reality;  whence we have indeed."
simplified_definition: an act or action.

definition: "Of penetrating or farreaching intellect; not superficial; thoroughly skilled; sagacious; cunning."
simplified_definition: having great space below or behind a certain point; reaching far down or back; not shallow.

definition: "To make darker or more intense; to darken; as  the event deepened the prevailing gloom."

definition: "A quadruped of the genus Canis  esp. the domestic dog ."

Dogs are mammals, closely related to coyotes, foxes, and wolves. There are many kinds or breeds of dogs, with a wide range of sizes and appearances. Some dogs are bred for special jobs, such as herding sheep. Dogs are often kept as pets.

definition: "Sirius  a star of the constellation Canis Major or the Greater Dog and the brightest star in the heavens;  called also Canicula and in astronomical charts  Canis Majoris. See Dog days."

definition: "The Cornus  a genus of large shrubs or small trees the wood of which is exceedingly hard and serviceable for many purposes."

simplified_definition: the fifth largest planet in our solar system and the third in distance from the sun.

definition: "Made of earth; made of burnt or baked clay  or other like substances; as an earthen vessel or pipe."
simplified_definition: made up of earth, soil, or dirt.

definition: "In the manner of the earth or its people; worldly."
simplified_definition: having to do with the earth; of this world.

definition: "A shaking  trembling or concussion of the earth due to subterranean causes often accompanied by a rumbling noise. The wave of shock sometimes traverses half a hemisphere destroying cities and many thousand lives;  called also earthdin earthquave and earthshock."
simplified_definition: a shaking or other movement of part of the earth's surface. It is caused by movement deep within the earth. Earthquakes can cause the ground to split.

definition: "A mean  sordid person; a niggard."
simplified_definition: a long worm made up of many segments that loosens the soil by making tunnels.

definition: "Satisfaction; pleasure; hence  accommodation; entertainment."
simplified_definition: freedom from pain, worry, or hard work.

definition: "A frame  of wood serving to hold a canvas upright  or nearly upright for the painter's convenience or for exhibition."
simplified_definition: a stand for holding an artist's canvas, blackboard, or sign.

definition: "Without shaking or jolting; commodiously; as  a carriage moves easily."
simplified_definition: without effort, pain, or trouble.

definition: "The eastern parts of the earth; the regions or countries which lie east of Europe; the orient. In this indefinite sense  the word is applied to Asia Minor Syria Chaldea Persia India China etc.; as the riches of the East; the diamonds and pearls of the East; the kings of the East."
simplified_definition: the direction in front of a person facing the rising sun.

definition: "An annual church festival commemorating Christ's resurrection  and occurring on Sunday the second day after Good Friday. It corresponds to the pasha or passover of the Jews and most nations still give it this name under the various forms of pascha pasque paque or pask."
simplified_definition: a Christian holiday to celebrate that Jesus Christ returned to life after he died. Easter is held every spring on the Sunday after the first full moon between March  and April .

definition: "Coming from the east; as  it was easterly wind."
simplified_definition: of or toward the east.

definition: "Going toward the east  or in the direction of east; as an eastern voyage."
simplified_definition: in, to, from, or having to do with the east.

definition: "Alt. of Eastwards"
simplified_definition: toward the east.

definition: "Free from constraint  harshness or formality; unconstrained; smooth; as easy manners; an easy style."
simplified_definition: not hard or difficult.

definition: "To make one's way slowly."
simplified_definition: to put into the mouth, chew, and swallow.

definition: "of Eat"
simplified_definition: "Eaten" is the past participle of "eat."

definition: "To stand under the eaves  near a window or at the door of a house to listen and learn what is said within doors; hence to listen secretly to what is said in private."
simplified_definition: to listen to other people talk without letting them know.

definition: "The European bunting."
simplified_definition: the flowing of the tide away from the land to the sea; ebb tide.

definition: "A hard  heavy and durable wood which admits of a fine polish or gloss. The usual color is black but it also occurs red or green."
simplified_definition: a hard black wood that comes from tropical Asian trees.

definition: "Not having the same center;  said of circles  ellipses spheres etc. which though coinciding either in whole or in part as to area or volume have not the same center;  opposed to concentric."
simplified_definition: not behaving or thinking in an ordinary or accepted way; odd; peculiar.

definition: "To send back ; to repeat in sound; to reverberate."
simplified_definition: the repeating of a sound caused by the bouncing of sound waves from a surface.

definition: "The loss  usually temporary or partial of light brilliancy luster honor consciousness etc.; obscuration; gloom; darkness."
simplified_definition: the blocking from view of the sun, a moon, or a planet by another heavenly body. In an eclipse of the sun, the sun is hidden from earth's view by the moon passing between the sun and the earth.

definition: "Alt. of Economical"
simplified_definition: having to do with the money system.

definition: "Pertaining to the household; domestic."
simplified_definition: using only a small amount; without waste; frugal.

definition: "Political economy; the science of the utilities or the useful application of wealth or material resources. See Political economy  under Political."
simplified_definition: the study of how goods and services are produced and distributed.

definition: "One who economizes  or manages domestic or other concerns with frugality; one who expends money time or labor judiciously and without waste."
simplified_definition: a person who is an expert in the study of economics.

definition: "To manage with economy; to use with prudence; to expend with frugality; as  to economize one's income."
simplified_definition: to spend less money; lower expenses; be economical.

definition: "The management of domestic affairs; the regulation and government of household matters; especially as they concern expense or disbursement; as  a careful economy."
simplified_definition: the careful use of money, resources, and means of production.

definition: "Having the color or appearance of unbleached stuff  as silk linen or the like."
simplified_definition: a pale yellowish or grayish tan color. Ecru is the color of old lace.

definition: "To fill ecstasy  or with rapture or enthusiasm."
