definition: "A current of water or air moving in a circular direction; a whirlpool."
simplified_definition: a small current of water, air, fog, or dust that spins against the main current.

definition: "The garden where Adam and Eve first dwelt; hence  a delightful region or residence."
simplified_definition: the garden where the first humans lived, according to the Old Testament in the Bible; Garden of Eden.

definition: "Any sharp terminating border; a margin; a brink; extreme verge; as  the edge of a table a precipice."
simplified_definition: a line where two surfaces meet.

definition: "With the edge towards anything; in the direction of the edge."
simplified_definition: with the edge forward or outward.

definition: "Having some of the forms  such as drapery or the like too sharply defined."
simplified_definition: nervous or impatient; on edge.

definition: "Fit to be eaten as food; eatable; esculent; as  edible fishes."
simplified_definition: able to be eaten as food; safe.

definition: "To superintend the publication of; to revise and prepare for publication; to select  correct arrange etc. the matter of for publication; as to edit a newspaper."
simplified_definition: to correct, cut, add to, or change with the goal of producing a finished piece of writing or a film.

definition: "The whole number of copies of a work printed and published at one time; as  the first edition was soon sold."
simplified_definition: one of a series of printings of the same published work.

definition: "One who edits; esp.  a person who prepares superintends revises and corrects a book magazine or newspaper etc. for publication."
simplified_definition: a person who reads and corrects materials for publication.

definition: "A leading article in a newspaper or magazine; an editorial article; an article published as an expression of the views of the editor."
simplified_definition: an article in a newspaper, or a statement on television, that gives an opinion or point of view.

definition: "To bring  or guide the powers of  as a child; to develop and cultivate whether physically mentally or morally but more commonly limited to the mental activities or senses; to expand strengthen and discipline as the mind a faculty etc. ; to form and regulate the principles and character of; to prepare and fit for any calling or business by systematic instruction; to cultivate; to train; to instruct; as
simplified_definition: to provide knowledge, training, and guidance to.

definition: "of Educate"
simplified_definition: having received much knowledge from teachers, books, or other sources of information, usually through studying in a school over a number of years.

definition: "The act or process of educating; the result of educating  as determined by the knowledge skill or discipline of character acquired; also the act or process of training by a prescribed or customary course of study or discipline; as an education for the bar or the pulpit; he has finished his education."
simplified_definition: the act or work of learning or training.

definition: "Of or pertaining to education."
simplified_definition: having to do with education.

definition: "An elongated fish of many genera and species. The common eels of Europe and America belong to the genus Anguilla. The electrical eel is a species of Gymnotus. The so called vinegar eel is a minute nematode worm. See Conger eel  Electric eel and Gymnotus."
simplified_definition: a long fish that looks like a snake. Eels live in fresh water or salt water.

definition: "Alt. of Eery"
simplified_definition: mysterious and frightening; weird.

definition: "In general: That which is produced by an agent or cause; the event which follows immediately from an antecedent  called the cause; result; consequence; outcome; fruit; as the effect of luxury."
simplified_definition: something produced by a cause.

definition: "Having the power to produce an effect or effects; producing a decided or decisive effect; efficient; serviceable; operative; as  an effective force remedy speech; the effective men in a regiment."
simplified_definition: able to make happen or change something.

definition: "An efficient cause; a prime mover."
simplified_definition: operating or working in a way that gets results, with little wasted effort.

definition: "Flowing out; as  effluent beams."
simplified_definition: sewage or other liquid waste that flows into a body of water such as a river or lake.

definition: "An exertion of strength or power  whether physical or mental in performing an act or aiming at an object; more or less strenuous endeavor; struggle directed to the accomplishment of an object; as an effort to scale a wall."
simplified_definition: the action of physical or mental energy.

definition: "Anything resembling an egg in form."
simplified_definition: to urge or encourage to act .

definition: "A plant   of East Indian origin allied to the tomato and bearing a large smooth edible fruit shaped somewhat like an egg; madapple."
simplified_definition: a plant grown for its dark purple fruit, which is eaten as a vegetable. The fruit is often shaped like an egg or like a tube.

definition: "The conscious and permanent subject of all psychical experiences  whether held to be directly known or the product of reflective thought;  opposed to nonego."
simplified_definition: one's feeling about oneself, especially in comparison with other people.

definition: "A plume or tuft of feathers worn as a part of a headdress  or anything imitating such an ornament; an aigrette."
simplified_definition: a kind of heron that is usually white and grows a long plume of feathers in breeding season. There are several kinds of egrets.

definition: "A gypsy."
simplified_definition: of or having to do with Egypt or its people.

definition: "An island in a river; an ait."
simplified_definition: the word for the number .

definition: "Eight and ten; as  eighteen pounds."
simplified_definition: the name for the number .

definition: "Next in order after the seventeenth."
simplified_definition: coming next after the seventeenth in a series.

definition: "Consisting of one of eight equal divisions of a thing."
simplified_definition: coming next after the seventh in a series.

definition: "The next in order after seventyninth."
simplified_definition: coming next after the seventyninth in a series.

definition: "Eight times ten; fourscore."
simplified_definition: the word for the Arabic numeral  and for the Roman numeral LXXX.

definition: "One of two; the one or the other;  properly used of two things  but sometimes of a larger number for any one."
simplified_definition: one or the other of two.

definition: "To cast out; to evict; to dispossess; as  to eject tenants from an estate."
simplified_definition: to throw out with force.

definition: "To perfect with painstaking; to improve or refine with labor and study  or by successive operations; as to elaborate a painting or a literary work."
simplified_definition: planned or carried out with great care and attention to details.

definition: "To slip or glide away; to pass away silently  as time;  used chiefly in reference to time."
simplified_definition: to go or slip by; pass or come to an end.

definition: "An elastic woven fabric  as a belt braces or suspenders etc. made in part of India rubber."
simplified_definition: able to stretch easily without breaking and then return to original form.

definition: "Power of resistance to  or recovery from depression or overwork."
simplified_definition: the condition or quality of being able to stretch easily without breaking and return to original shape.

definition: "To jut into an angle; to project or to bend after the manner of an elbow."
simplified_definition: the bend or joint between the upper arm and the lower arm.

definition: "An aged person; one who lived at an earlier period; a predecessor."
simplified_definition: born earlier; older.

definition: "Somewhat old; advanced beyond middle age; bordering on old age; as  elderly people."
simplified_definition: old or aging.

definition: "Oldest; longest in duration."
simplified_definition: born first; oldest.

definition: "Chosen; taken by preference from among two or more."
simplified_definition: to choose by means of voting.

definition: "Those who are elected."
simplified_definition: the process of choosing a person for office by voting.

definition: "Alt. of Electrical"
simplified_definition: of or having to do with electricity.

definition: "Capable of occasioning the phenomena of electricity; as  an electric or electrical machine or substance."
simplified_definition: having to do with electricity; electric.

definition: "An investigator of electricity; one versed in the science of electricity."

definition: "Fig.: Electrifying energy or characteristic."
simplified_definition: energy caused by the movement of electrons through matter.

definition: "To execute or put to death by electricity.  Elec`trocu""""tion  n. "
simplified_definition: to kill by electricity.

definition: "The path by which electricity is conveyed into or from a solution or other conducting medium; esp.  the ends of the wires or conductors leading from source of electricity and terminating in the medium traversed by the current."
simplified_definition: a part of an electric or electronic device. An electrode allows electric current to enter or leave a device such as a battery.

definition: "A mass  usually of soft iron but sometimes of some other magnetic metal as nickel or cobalt rendered temporarily magnetic by being placed within a coil of wire through which a current of electricity is passing. The metal is generally in the form of a bar either straight or bent into the shape of a horseshoe."
simplified_definition: an iron or steel core with wire wound around it. It becomes magnetic when an electric current is passed through the wire.

definition: "Amber; also  the alloy of gold and silver called electrum."
simplified_definition: a very small particle that moves outside the nucleus of an atom. Electrons have a negative charge.

definition: "Very choice  and hence pleasing to good taste; characterized by grace propriety and refinement and the absence of every thing offensive; exciting admiration and approbation by symmetry completeness freedom from blemish and the like; graceful; tasteful and highly attractive; as elegant manners; elegant style of composition; an elegant speaker; an elegant structure."
simplified_definition: fine or rich in quality.

definition: "One of the simplest or essential parts or principles of which anything consists  or upon which the constitution or fundamental powers of anything are based."
simplified_definition: a part of any whole.

definition: "Having only one principle or constituent part; consisting of a single element; simple; uncompounded; as  an elementary substance."
simplified_definition: having to do with the most basic or simplest parts of something.

definition: "Ivory; the tusk of the elephant."
simplified_definition: an enormous mammal with a very long nose called a trunk. Elephants have curved tusks, huge, floppy ears, and four long, thick legs. Elephants use their trunks to pick up food, drink water, or lift things. They use their tusks to dig roots. Elephants travel in herds, eating tons of plants every day. African elephants are the largest mammals that live on land. Indian elephants are smaller and can be trained to work with people.

definition: "To exalt; to ennoble; to dignify; as  to elevate the mind or character."
simplified_definition: to raise or lift up to a higher physical position.

simplified_definition: the height to which something rises or is raised, or its height above sea level or ground level.

definition: "A muscle which serves to raise a part of the body  as the leg or the eye."
simplified_definition: a platform or a small room used to raise and lower people or goods from one level or floor to another in a building.

definition: "A symbol representing eleven units  as  or xi."
simplified_definition: the word for the Arabic numeral  and the Roman numeral XI.

definition: "Next after the tenth; as  the eleventh chapter."
simplified_definition: coming next after the tenth in a series.

definition: "of Elves"
simplified_definition: an imaginary small creature that looks like a human and has magical powers.

definition: "That may be selected; proper or qualified to be chosen; legally qualified to be elected and to hold office."
simplified_definition: qualified for something; in a position to be chosen.

definition: "To separate; to expel from the system; to excrete; as  the kidneys eliminate urea the lungs carbonic acid; to eliminate poison from the system."
simplified_definition: to get rid of or destroy.

definition: "A large deer  of several species. The European elk  is closely allied to the American moose. The American elk or wapiti  is closely related to the European stag. See Moose and Wapiti."
simplified_definition: a large deer found in northern Europe and Asia. It has large antlers shaped like a palm with spread fingers. In North America the same kind of animal is called a moose.

definition: "An oval or oblong figure  bounded by a regular curve which corresponds to an oblique projection of a circle or an oblique section of a cone through its opposite sides. simplified_definition: a shape that looks like a flattened circle; oval.

simplified_definition: a large shade tree with spreading branches.

definition: "To run away  or escape privately from the place or station to which one is bound by duty;  said especially of a woman or a man either married or unmarried who runs away with a paramour or a sweetheart."
simplified_definition: to run away and marry in secret.

definition: "Having the power of expressing strong emotions or forcible arguments in an elevated  impassioned and effective manner; as an eloquent orator or preacher."

simplified_definition: different; other.

definition: "In any other place; as  these trees are not to be found elsewhere."

simplified_definition: to get away from or avoid by speed or skill.

definition: "Tending to elude; using arts or deception to escape; adroitly escaping or evading; eluding the grasp; fallacious."
simplified_definition: hard to find or catch.

definition: "of Elf"
simplified_definition: plural of "elf."

definition: "To set free from the power of another; to liberate; as:  To set free  as a minor from a parent; as a father may emancipate a child.  To set free from bondage; to give freedom to; to manumit; as to emancipate a slave or a country."
simplified_definition: to free from slavery or other control.

definition: "The act of surrounding or defending with a bank."
simplified_definition: a mound of earth or stone made to support a road or protect an area from water.

definition: "An edict or order of the government prohibiting the departure of ships of commerce from some or all of the ports within its dominions; a prohibition to sail."
simplified_definition: a government order that restricts trade or the shipment of goods.

definition: "To engage in any affair."

definition: "of Embarrass"

definition: "Difficulty or perplexity arising from the want of money to pay debts."

definition: "The public function of an ambassador; the charge or business intrusted to an ambassador or to envoys; a public message to; foreign court concerning state affairs; hence  any solemn message."
simplified_definition: an ambassador and his or her staff.

definition: "To lay as in a bed; to lay in surrounding matter; to bed; as  to embed a thing in clay mortar or sand."

definition: "Making a circuit of the year of the seasons; recurring in each quarter of the year; as  ember fasts."
simplified_definition: a small piece of glowing wood or coal in a dying fire.

definition: "A picture accompanied with a motto  a set of verse or the like intended as a moral lesson or meditation."

definition: "Of a rich green color  like that of the emerald."
simplified_definition: a clear green stone that is used in jewelry.

definition: "To rise out of a fluid; to come forth from that in which anything has been plunged  enveloped or concealed; to issue and appear; as to emerge from the water or the ocean; the sun emerges from behind the moon in an eclipse; to emerge from poverty or obscurity."
simplified_definition: to rise up from or come into view.

definition: "Sudden or unexpected appearance; an unforeseen occurrence; a sudden occasion."
simplified_definition: a serious situation or sudden crisis that calls for fast action.

simplified_definition: a powder made from a hard mineral. It is used for grinding and polishing.

definition: "Removing from one country to another; emigrating; as  an emigrant company or nation."

simplified_definition: standing above others in fame or achievement; outstanding.

definition: "Pertaining to  or characterized by emotion; excitable; easily moved; sensational; as an emotional nature."
simplified_definition: having to do with the feelings, including how one feels about oneself in relation to others.

definition: "The sovereign or supreme monarch of an empire;  a title of dignity superior to that of king; as  the emperor of Germany or of Austria; the emperor or Czar of Russia."

definition: "One employed by another."

definition: "The act of employing or using; also  the state of being employed."

definition: "To give moral or physical power  faculties or abilities to."

definition: "A female sovereign."

definition: "Having nothing to carry; unburdened."

definition: "On the way or road."

definition: "Having a power of enchantment; charming; fascinating."

definition: "That which captivates the heart and senses; an influence or power which fascinates or highly delights."

definition: "To form a circle about; to inclose within a circle or ring; to surround; as  to encircle one in the arms; the army encircled the city."
simplified_definition: to form a circle around; surround.

simplified_definition: a space that is surrounded, or something that surrounds.

definition: "To circumscribe or go round so as to surround closely; to encircle; to inclose; to environ; as  a ring encompasses the finger; an army encompasses a city; a voyage encompassing the world."
simplified_definition: to surround or enclose.

simplified_definition: to meet or come upon suddenly or by chance.

definition: "To give courage to; to inspire with courage  spirit or hope; to raise or to increase the confidence of; to animate; enhearten; to incite; to help forward;  the opposite of discourage."
simplified_definition: to give hope or courage to; give confidence to.

definition: "The act of encouraging; incitement to action or to practice; as  the encouragement of youth in generosity."
simplified_definition: the act of encouraging or condition of being encouraged.

definition: "Alt. of Encyclopaedia"

definition: "Point beyond which no procession can be made; conclusion; issue; result  whether successful or otherwise; conclusive event; consequence."
simplified_definition: the point at which anything that has length starts or stops.

definition: "To put to hazard; to bring into danger or peril; to expose to loss or injury; as  to endanger life or peace."
simplified_definition: to put in a dangerous situation.

definition: "of Endanger"
simplified_definition: in danger of becoming extinct. When a type of animal is endangered, it means that few of these animals exist now, and it is possible that there will be no more of these animals in the future.

definition: "To exert physical or intellectual strength for the attainment of; to use efforts to effect; to strive to achieve or reach; to try; to attempt."
simplified_definition: to make an effort; try; strive.

definition: "A prefix used frequently in composition  signifying well good advantageous;  the opposite of dys."
simplified_definition: abbreviation of "European Union," an economic and political union of a large number of democratic countries in Europe. Formed in , this union makes trading between the different countries easier and allows freer movement of people from country to country than existed before. The union currently consists of the countries of Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Croatia, Cyprus, the Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, the Netherlands, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, and Sweden. The United Kingdom had been a member of the European Union but left in .

simplified_definition: a prefix that means "out of" or "from."

definition: "F is the sixth letter of the English alphabet  and a nonvocal consonant. Its form and sound are from the Latin. The Latin borrowed the form from the Greek digamma  which probably had the value of English w consonant. The form and value of Greek letter came from the Phoenician the ultimate source being probably Egyptian. Etymologically f is most closely related to p k v and b; as in E. five Gr. pe`nte; E. wolf L. lupus Gr. ly`kos; E. fox vixen ; fragile break; fruit
simplified_definition: symbol of the chemical element fluorine.

simplified_definition: extremely interesting or enchanting; spellbinding.

definition: "The make or form of anything; the style  shape appearance or mode of structure; pattern model; as the fashion of the ark of a coat of a house of an altar etc.; workmanship; execution."
simplified_definition: the style of clothes or way of acting that is popular.

definition: "A person who conforms to the fashions;  used chiefly in the plural."
simplified_definition: conforming to what is currently in style.

definition: "Voluntary abstinence from food  for a space of time as a spiritual discipline or as a token of religious humiliation."
simplified_definition: to eat no food.

definition: "To fix firmly; to make fast; to secure  as by a knot lock bolt etc.; as to fasten a chain to the feet; to fasten a door or window."
simplified_definition: to join or attach firmly to something else or in place.

definition: "One who  or that which makes fast or firm."
simplified_definition: a device that joins together or fastens.

definition: "To grow fat  plump and fleshy."
simplified_definition: a white or yellow oily substance found in some parts of animals or plants. Fat is made of carbon, hydrogen, and oxygen.

definition: "Proceeding from  or appointed by fate or destiny; necessary; inevitable."
simplified_definition: causing or able to cause death.

definition: "The element of chance in the affairs of life; the unforeseen and unestimated conitions considered as a force shaping events; fortune; esp.  opposing circumstances against which it is useless to struggle; as fate was or the fates were against him."
simplified_definition: the power that is often believed to decide what will happen in human life or history.

definition: "One who performs the offices of a parent by maintenance  affetionate care counsel or protection."
simplified_definition: a male parent.

definition: "The father of one's husband or wife;  correlative to soninlaw and daughterinlaw."
simplified_definition: the father of a person's wife or husband.

definition: "The measure or extant of one's capacity; depth  as of intellect; profundity; reach; penetration."
simplified_definition: a unit of length equal to six feet, used to measure the depth of water or mines.

definition: "Weariness from bodily labor or mental exertion; lassitude or exhaustion of strength."
simplified_definition: the condition of being tired in body or mind.

definition: "To make fat; to feed for slaughter; to make fleshy or plump with fat; to fill full; to fat."
simplified_definition: to make fat.

definition: "A fixture for drawing a liquid  as water molasses oil etc. from a pipe cask or other vessel in such quantities as may be desired;  called also tap and cock. It consists of a tubular spout stopped with a movable plug spigot
simplified_definition: a device for turning on and off the flow of liquid from a pipe or container; tap.

definition: "Defect; want; lack; default."
simplified_definition: something wrong with a thing or person that causes problems for someone or something else.

definition: "The animals of any given area or epoch; as  the fauna of America; fossil fauna; recent fauna."
simplified_definition: animals generally, or all the animals that live in a particular place. The word "fauna" contrasts with the word "flora," which refers to plants only.

definition: "Kind regard; propitious aspect; countenance; friendly disposition; kindness; good will."
simplified_definition: a kind or helpful act.

definition: "Beautiful; wellfavored."
simplified_definition: giving a benefit or advantage; helpful.

definition: "The competitor  that is judged most likely to win; the competitor standing highest in the betting."
simplified_definition: a person or thing treated with special favor.

definition: "A young deer; a buck or doe of the first year. See Buck."
simplified_definition: a young deer, especially one that is still drinking its mother's milk.

definition: "That which causes  or which is the object of apprehension or alarm; source or occasion of terror; danger; dreadfulness."
simplified_definition: a strong feeling one gets when one expects danger or pain.

definition: "Inspiring fear or awe; exciting apprehension or terror; terrible; frightful; dreadful."
simplified_definition: feeling fear; afraid.

definition: "Free from fear."
simplified_definition: without fear; brave.

definition: "A festival; a holiday; a solemn  or more commonly a joyous anniversary."
simplified_definition: any large and elaborate meal.

definition: "An act; a deed; an exploit."
simplified_definition: an act or achievement that shows courage, strength, or skill.

definition: "One of the peculiar dermal appendages  of several kinds belonging to birds as contour feathers quills and down."
simplified_definition: one of the soft and light parts of a bird that grows from the skin and covers the body.

definition: "The make  form or outward appearance of a person; the whole turn or style of the body; esp. good appearance."
simplified_definition: a part of the face such as the eyes, nose, or chin.

definition: "The second month in the year  said to have been introduced into the Roman calendar by Numa. In common years this month contains twentyeight days; in the bissextile or leap year it has twentynine days."
simplified_definition: the second month of the year. February usually has twentyeight days, but it has twentynine days in a leap year.

definition: "imp.  p. p. of Feed."
simplified_definition: past tense and past participle of "feed."

definition: "Pertaining to a league or treaty; derived from an agreement or covenant between parties  especially between nations; constituted by a compact between parties usually governments or their representatives."
simplified_definition: having to do with a system of government that unites several states under a central government. The states have their own governments, yet they recognize the rule of the central government as well.

definition: "The act of uniting in a league; confederation."
simplified_definition: a government or league formed by the union of several states, clubs, or other groups.

definition: "A right to the use of a superior's land  as a stipend for services to be performed; also the land so held; a fief."
simplified_definition: an amount of money requested or paid for a service.

definition: "To make feble; to enfeeble."
simplified_definition: without strength; weak in body or mind.

definition: "A grazing or pasture ground."
simplified_definition: to provide food for or give food to.

definition: "To have the sensibilities moved or affected."
simplified_definition: to find out about or perceive by the sense of touch.

definition: "One who  or that which feels."
simplified_definition: a part of an animal's body that is used for touching and feeling. The long, thin feelers that grow on the heads of many insects are called antennae.

definition: "The capacity of the soul for emotional states; a high degree of susceptibility to emotions or states of the sensibility not dependent on the body; as  a man of feeling; a man destitute of feeling."
simplified_definition: the ability to sense things by touch.

definition: "Fact; performance."
simplified_definition: plural of "foot."

definition: "To give a mental existence to  as to something not real or actual; to imagine; to invent; hence to pretend; to form and relate as if true."
simplified_definition: to pretend or fake; put on a false show of.

definition: "Feigned; counterfeit."
simplified_definition: a false movement that is meant to trick an opponent by taking attention away from the real target.

definition: "Catlike; of or pertaining to the genus Felis  or family Felidae; as the feline race; feline voracity."
simplified_definition: having to do with cats, both house cats and cats that live in the wild.

definition: "Cruel; barbarous; inhuman; fierce; savage; ravenous."
simplified_definition: past tense of "fall."

definition: "A man without good breeding or worth; an ignoble or mean man."
simplified_definition: a man or boy.

definition: "A state of being together; companionship; partnership; association; hence  confederation; joint interest."
simplified_definition: the condition of being companions; company or friendship.

definition: "of Feel"
simplified_definition: past tense and past participle of "feel."

definition: "An individual of the sex which conceives and brings forth young  or  which has an ovary and produces ova."
simplified_definition: any person or animal of the sex that produces eggs or gives birth to young.

definition: "Of or pertaining to a woman  or to women; characteristic of a woman; womanish; womanly."
simplified_definition: of or having to do with a woman or girl; of the female sex.

definition: "To fend off danger from; to give security to; to protect; to guard."
simplified_definition: a structure used to mark off an area or to keep animals or people in or out.

definition: "The art or practice of attack and defense with the sword  esp. with the smallsword. See Fence v. i. ."
simplified_definition: the art, sport, or practice of fighting with swords.

definition: "One who or that which defends or protects by warding off harm"
simplified_definition: a metal guard over the wheel of a truck, car, or bicycle.

definition: "Intestine motion; heat; tumult; agitation."
simplified_definition: a substance that causes the chemical change of fermentation.

definition: "The process of undergoing an effervescent change  as by the action of yeast; in a wider sense  the transformation of an organic substance into new compounds by the action of a ferment either formed or unorganized. It differs in kind according to the nature of the ferment which causes it."
simplified_definition: the chemical change of a sugar into alcohol. Fermentation produces gas bubbles.

definition: "Ancient; old.  """"Pilgrimages to . . . ferne halwes."""" ."
simplified_definition: a family of plants with large green leaves shaped like feathers. Ferns do not make flowers or seeds.

definition: "Fierce; savage; wild; indicating cruelty; ravenous; rapacious; as  ferocious look or features; a ferocious lion."
simplified_definition: fierce; savage.

definition: "An animal of the Weasel family   about fourteen inches in length of a pale yellow or white color with red eyes. It is a native of Africa but has been domesticated in Europe. Ferrets are used to drive rabbits and rats out of their holes."
simplified_definition: a European polecat that has been domesticated for use in hunting rabbits and rodents.

definition: "To carry or transport over a river  strait or other narrow water in a boat."
simplified_definition: a boat or ship that carries people or freight back and forth across a river or other body of water.

definition: "Producing fruit or vegetation in abundance; fruitful; able to produce abundantly; prolific; fecund; productive; rich; inventive; as  fertile land or fields; a fertile mind or imagination."
simplified_definition: producing or able to produce farm crops or other plant life.

definition: "To make fertile or enrich; to supply with nourishment for plants; to make fruitful or productive; as  to fertilize land soil ground and meadows."
simplified_definition: to make able to produce babies, seeds, fruit, or eggs.

definition: "One who fertilizes; the agent that carries the fertilizing principle  as a moth to an orchid."
simplified_definition: a natural or chemical substance added to soil to make it better for growing plants.

definition: "Pertaining to a fest; festive; festal; appropriate to a festival; joyous; mirthful."
simplified_definition: a ceremony or celebration that repeats, often once a year, and involves special activities or amusements.

definition: "Pertaining to  or becoming a feast; festal; joyous; gay; mirthful; sportive."
simplified_definition: of, relating to, or intended for a feast or celebration.

definition: "A festival; a festive celebration."
simplified_definition: a celebration; festival.

definition: "To recall from a swoon; to revive;  sometimes with to; as  to fetch a man to."
simplified_definition: to go for  and bring back, or cause  to come; get.

definition: "A combination of kindred to avenge injuries or affronts  done or offered to any of their blood on the offender and all his race."
simplified_definition: anger, unfriendliness, or fighting between families or other related groups that lasts for a long time.

definition: "The feudal system; a system by which the holding of estates in land is made dependent upon an obligation to render military service to the kind or feudal superior; feudal principles and usages."
simplified_definition: a political and economic system in Europe and Japan during the Middle Ages. Royal or noble families owned the land and allowed people to live on and farm the land in return for a share of the crops and their service in war.

definition: "A diseased state of the system  marked by increased heat acceleration of the pulse and a general derangement of the functions including usually thirst and loss of appetite. Many diseases of which fever is the most prominent symptom are denominated fevers; as typhoid fever; yellow fever."
simplified_definition: a body temperature higher than normal that is usually caused by illness.

definition: "Not many; small  limited or confined in number;  indicating a small portion of units or individuals constituing a whole; often by ellipsis of a noun a few people."
simplified_definition: only a small number of.

definition: "To speak falsely."
simplified_definition: a lie about something that is not important.

definition: "Alt. of Fibre"
simplified_definition: a small, thin part of a plant, animal, or mineral that is shaped like a thread.

definition: "A general name for the raw material  such as cotton flax hemp etc. used in textile manufactures."
simplified_definition: a spelling of "fiber" used in Canada and Britain. See "fiber."

definition: "That which is feigned  invented or imagined; especially a feigned or invented story whether oral or written. Hence: A story told in order to deceive; a fabrication;  opposed to fact or reality."
simplified_definition: writing that tells a story made up in a writer's imagination. Fiction is usually written in prose, not poetry. Novels, short stories, and tales are pieces of fiction.

definition: "Pertaining to  or characterized by fiction; fictitious; romantic."
simplified_definition: existing only in a madeup story and not existing in real life.

definition: "A kind of dock  with fiddleshaped leaves;  called also fiddle dock."
simplified_definition: a violin or similar instrument.

definition: "To move uneasily one way and the other; to move irregularly  or by fits and starts."
simplified_definition: to move in a nervous or restless way.

definition: "To catch  stop throw etc.  as a fielder."
simplified_definition: a wide area of open land often used for growing crops.

definition: "A ball payer who stands out in the field to catch or stop balls."
simplified_definition: a player in the field in baseball, softball, or cricket.

definition: "Vehement in anger or cruelty; ready or eager to kill or injure; of a nature to inspire terror; ferocious."
simplified_definition: wild and dangerous; ferocious.

definition: "Consisting of  containing or resembling fire; as the fiery gulf of Etna; a fiery appearance."
simplified_definition: on fire or containing fire; flaming.

definition: "To play on a fife."
simplified_definition: a small wind instrument that looks like a flute and has a high pitch. The fife usually plays along with drums in marching music.

definition: "Five and ten; one more than fourteen."
simplified_definition: the word for the Arabic numeral  and for the Roman numeral XV.

definition: "Next in order after the fourteenth;  the ordinal of fifteen."
simplified_definition: coming next after the fourteenth in a series.

definition: "The interval of three tones and a semitone  embracing five diatonic degrees of the scale; the dominant of any key."
simplified_definition: coming next after the fourth in a series.

definition: "Next in order after the fortyninth;  the ordinal of fifty."
simplified_definition: coming next after the fortyninth in a series.

definition: "Five times ten; as  fifty men."
simplified_definition: the word for the Arabic numeral  and for the Roman numeral L.

definition: "A small fruit tree  with large leaves  known from the remotest antiquity. It was probably native from Syria westward to the Canary Islands."
simplified_definition: a soft fruit, with many small seeds, that grows on a tree native to the Mediterranean, or the tree on which the fruit grows.

definition: "To carry on  or wage as a conflict or battle; to win or gain by struggle as one's way; to sustain by fighting as a cause."
simplified_definition: the use of weapons, bodies, or words to struggle with someone or something; battle; quarrel.

definition: "One who fights; a combatant; a warrior."
simplified_definition: a boxer.

definition: "Distinguished appearance; magnificence; conspicuous representation; splendor; show."
simplified_definition: a number or other written symbol that is not a letter of the alphabet.

definition: "The figure  statue or bust on the prow of a ship."
simplified_definition: a carved figure on the prow, or front, of a ship.

definition: "A thread or threadlike object or appendage; a fiber; esp.   the threadlike part of the stamen supporting the anther."
simplified_definition: a fine thread, wire, or fiber.

definition: "To bring before a court or legislative body by presenting proper papers in a regular way; as  to file a petition or bill."
simplified_definition: a long, thin steel tool with ridges on its surface. A file is used to shape, smooth, or grind down wood, metal, plastic, or other hard material.

definition: "To furnish an abudant supply to; to furnish with as mush as is desired or desirable; to occupy the whole of; to swarm in or overrun."
simplified_definition: to cause to become full; put as much as possible into.

definition: "A narrow flat member; especially  a flat molding separating other moldings; a reglet; also the space between two flutings in a shaft. See Illust. of Base and Column."
simplified_definition: a piece of meat or fish that has no bones.

definition: "of Fill"
simplified_definition: material used to fill a cavity in a tooth.

definition: "A lively  spirited young girl."
simplified_definition: a young female horse, usually one that is five years old or younger.

definition: "A thin skin; a pellicle; a membranous covering  causing opacity; hence any thin slight covering."
simplified_definition: a thin layer or coating.

definition: "To purify or defecate  as water or other liquid by causing it to pass through a filter."
simplified_definition: a device used to remove dirt or other solids from liquids or gases. A filter can be made of paper, charcoal, or other material with tiny holes in it.

definition: "Foul matter; anything that soils or defiles; dirt; nastiness."
simplified_definition: material that is dirty, disgusting, or foul.

definition: "Defiled with filth  whether material or moral; nasty; dirty; polluted; foul; impure; obscene."
simplified_definition: very dirty or foul; nasty.

definition: "A membranous  finlike swimming organ as in pteropod and heteropod mollusks."
simplified_definition: a thin, flat body part of a fish and certain other water animals which is used for swimming or balance.

definition: "Conclusive; decisive; as  a final judgment; the battle of Waterloo brought the contest to a final issue."
simplified_definition: happening at or being the end of something; last.

definition: "The last composition performed in any act of an opera."
simplified_definition: the last part of a piece of music.

definition: "At the end or conclusion; ultimately; lastly; as  the contest was long but the Romans finally conquered."
simplified_definition: after everything else; at the final moment.

definition: "The income of a ruler or of a state; revennue; public money; sometimes  the income of an individual; often used in the plural for funds; available money; resources."
simplified_definition: the management of money or other resources.

definition: "Pertaining to finance."
simplified_definition: having to do with money or those who deal in finance.

definition: "A small singing bird of many genera and species  belonging to the family Fringillidae."
simplified_definition: a small bird with a bill that is excellent at cracking seeds. Sparrows and cardinals are kinds of finches.

definition: "To meet with  or light upon accidentally; to gain the first sight or knowledge of as of something new or unknown; hence to fall in with as a person."
simplified_definition: to come upon or meet by accident.

definition: "Finished; brought to perfection; refined; hence  free from impurity; excellent; superior; elegant; worthy of admiration; accomplished; beautiful."
simplified_definition: very good; excellent.

definition: "To use the fingers in playing on an instrument."
simplified_definition: one of the five jointed parts at the end of the hand. Sometimes the thumb is not counted as a finger.

definition: "The labor required to give final completion to any work; hence  minute detail careful elaboration or the like."
simplified_definition: to reach or cause the end of; complete.

definition: "Polished to the highest degree of excellence; complete; perfect; as  a finished poem; a finished education."
simplified_definition: completed; ended.

definition: "A native of Finland; one of the Finn in the ethnological sense. See Finns."
simplified_definition: a person who was born in or is a citizen of Finland.

definition: "Of or pertaining to Finland  to the Finns or to their language."
simplified_definition: the main language of Finland.

definition: "A narrow inlet of the sea  penetrating between high banks or rocks as on the coasts of Norway and Alaska."
simplified_definition: another spelling of fjord.

definition: "A genus  of coniferous trees  often of large size and elegant shape some of them valued for their timber and others for their resin. The species are distinguished as the balsam fir the silver fir the red fir etc. The Scotch fir is a Pinus."
simplified_definition: a type of evergreen tree. Fir trees bear cones and are related to the pines. There are many different kinds of firs.

definition: "To discharge artillery or firearms; as  they fired on the town."
simplified_definition: the heat, light, and flames produced by burning.

definition: "A gun  pistol or any weapon from a shot is discharged by the force of an explosive substance as gunpowder."
simplified_definition: a small gun, such as a pistol or rifle.

definition: "See Cracker.  n. ."
simplified_definition: a small paper tube filled with gunpowder, which explodes and makes a loud noise when its fuse is lit. Firecrackers are sometimes used during celebrations.

definition: "Any luminous winged insect  esp. luminous beetles of the family Lampyridae."
simplified_definition: an insect whose lower body flashes with light at night. A firefly is a kind of beetle.

definition: "A man whose business is to extinguish fires in towns; a member of a fire company."
simplified_definition: a male firefighter.

definition: "The part a chimney appropriated to the fire; a hearth;  usually an open recess in a wall  in which a fire may be built."
simplified_definition: a brick or stone space in a room for making fires. A fireplace has a chimney, which keeps smoke from building up inside the room.

definition: "Proof against fire; incombustible."
simplified_definition: difficult or impossible to set on fire or to damage or destroy with fire.

definition: "A place near the fire or hearth; home; domestic life or retirement."
simplified_definition: the area near a fireplace.

definition: "Wood for fuel."
simplified_definition: wood that is burned for cooking or heating.

definition: "The name  title or style under which a company transacts business; a partnership of two or more persons; a commercial house; as the firm of Hope  Co."
simplified_definition: hard or solid when pressed; not soft.

definition: "Preceding all others of a series or kind; the ordinal of one; earliest; as  the first day of a month; the first year of a reign."
simplified_definition: before all others in time, importance, or quality.

definition: "Of the best class; of the highest rank; in the first division; of the best quality; firstrate; as  a firstclass telescope."
simplified_definition: of the highest in quality; best.

definition: "Obtained directly from the first or original source; hence  without the intervention of an agent."
simplified_definition: from the source; directly.

definition: "Of the highest excellence; preeminent in quality  size or estimation."
simplified_definition: of the highest quality; excellent.

definition: "A counter  used in various games."
simplified_definition: an animal that lives in water and has fins for swimming and gills for breathing. Fish are coldblooded animals with skeletons inside their bodies. Most fish have scales on their skin. There are many kinds of fish, including salmon, goldfish, tuna, and sharks.

definition: "One whose occupation is to catch fish."
simplified_definition: someone who catches fish either as a sport or as a way to make a living.

definition: "The business or practice of catching fish; fishing."
simplified_definition: a business that catches or sells fish and other seafood.

definition: "A hook for catching fish."
simplified_definition: a metal hook with a barb and sharp tip, used to catch fish.

definition: "The act  practice or art of one who fishes."
simplified_definition: the method, pastime, or occupation of catching or trying to catch fish.

definition: "Consisting of fish; fishlike; having the qualities or taste of fish; abounding in fish."
simplified_definition: like a fish in taste or smell.

definition: "A cleaving  splitting or breaking up into parts."
simplified_definition: the splitting of the nucleus of an atom into two or more nuclei. This makes more atoms of lighter elements and gives off large amounts of energy.

definition: "To strike with the fist."
simplified_definition: a person's hand with the fingers curled tightly into the palm.

definition: "The coincidence of parts that come in contact."
simplified_definition: proper or acceptable; right.

definition: "The state or quality of being fit; as  the fitness of measures or laws; a person's fitness for office."
simplified_definition: the degree to which someone is suitable for a job or role.

definition: "Four and one added; one more than four."
simplified_definition: the word for the Arabic numeral  and the Roman numeral V.

definition: "To become firm  so as to resist volatilization; to cease to flow or be fluid; to congeal; to become hard and malleable as a metallic substance."
simplified_definition: to make stable or steady; fasten firmly; attach.

definition: "of Fix"
simplified_definition: firmly placed, fastened, or positioned; unmoving.

definition: "That which is fixed or attached to something as a permanent appendage; as  the fixtures of a pump; the fixtures of a farm or of a dwelling that is the articles which a tenant may not take away."
simplified_definition: something fixed into place as a permanent part.

definition: "See Fiord."
simplified_definition: a long, narrow ocean inlet that passes between high and rocky banks or steep cliffs.

definition: "To hang loose without stiffness; to bend down  as flexible bodies; to be loose yielding limp."
simplified_definition: a piece of cloth, in the shape of a rectangle or triangle, with colors and designs. Flags are used for signaling or as symbols of a country or organization.

definition: "An instrument for threshing or beating grain from the ear by hand  consisting of a wooden staff or handle at the end of which a stouter and shorter pole or club called a swipe is so hung as to swing freely."
simplified_definition: a farm tool used to separate seeds from grain. A flail has a long handle with a short, swinging bar on one end.

definition: "To separate in flakes; to peel or scale off."
simplified_definition: a small, thin piece that has split off from or peeled off of a surface.

definition: "Ardor of affection; the passion of love."
simplified_definition: the mixture of burning gas and vapor that rises from an object that is on fire. Flame is seen as brightly colored, flickering light.

definition: "Any bird of the genus Phoenicopterus. The flamingoes have webbed feet  very long legs and a beak bent down as if broken. Their color is usually red or pink. The American flamingo is P. ruber; the European is P. antiquorum."
simplified_definition: a large, tropical, wading bird with very long legs, a long neck, and bright pink or red feathers.

definition: "Inflammable."
simplified_definition: able to catch on fire easily.

definition: "To border; to touch."
simplified_definition: the area between the hip and the ribs on either side of the body.

definition: "A soft  nappy woolen cloth of loose texture."
simplified_definition: a soft material made of wool or cotton. Flannel is used for warm clothing and bed covers, among other things.

definition: "Anything broad and limber that hangs loose  or that is attached by one side or end and is easily moved; as the flap of a garment."
simplified_definition: to swing or wave back and forth with a slapping sound.

definition: "A fried dough cake containing fruit; a turnover."
simplified_definition: a flat cake made of batter and cooked in a pan; pancake.

definition: "To shine out with a sudden and unsteady light; to emit a dazzling or painfully bright light."
simplified_definition: to begin to burn brightly .

definition: "To burst or break forth with a sudden and transient flood of flame and light; as  the lighting flashes vividly; the powder flashed."
simplified_definition: a sudden, bright light that shines, then quickly disappears.

definition: "The wooden or iron frame which holds the sand  etc. forming the mold used in a foundry; it consists of two or more parts; viz. the cope or top; sometimes the cheeks or middle part; and the drag or bottom part. When there are one or more cheeks the flask is called a three part flask four part flask etc."
simplified_definition: a rounded bottle with a narrow neck.

definition: "Something broad and flat in form"
simplified_definition: a British word for a group of connected rooms on one floor used as a place to live. "Flat" usually has the same meaning as "apartment."

definition: "Any fish of the family Pleuronectidae; esp.  the winter flounder . The flatfishes have the body flattened swim on the side and have eyes on one side as the flounder turbot and halibut. See Flounder."
simplified_definition: a kind of fish that lives in salt water and has a flat body with both eyes on the top side. Sole, halibut, and flounder are flatfish.

definition: "To reduce to an even surface or one approaching evenness; to make flat; to level; to make plane."
simplified_definition: to make flat.

definition: "A drawplate with a narrow  rectangular orifice for drawing flat strips as watch springs etc."
simplified_definition: to give too much or false praise; try to please by praising.

definition: "The act or practice of flattering; the act of pleasing by artiful commendation or compliments; adulation; false  insincere or excessive praise."
simplified_definition: too much praise; praise that is often not meant.

definition: "To give flavor to; to add something  to  to give character or zest."
simplified_definition: the particular way something tastes.

definition: "of Flavor"
simplified_definition: something added that gives a particular flavor.

definition: "A crack or breach; a gap or fissure; a defect of continuity or cohesion; as  a flaw in a knife or a vase."
simplified_definition: a fault or defect.

definition: "A plant of the genus Linum  esp. the L. usitatissimum which has a single slender stalk about a foot and a half high with blue flowers. The fiber of the bark is used for making thread and cloth called linen cambric lawn lace etc. Linseed oil is expressed from the seed."
simplified_definition: a plant with tiny blue flowers and with seeds from which an oil is pressed.

definition: "An insect belonging to the genus Pulex  of the order Aphaniptera. Fleas are destitute of wings but have the power of leaping energetically. The bite is poisonous to most persons. The human flea  abundant in Europe is rare in America where the dog flea  takes its place. See Aphaniptera and Dog flea. See Illustration in Appendix."
simplified_definition: a tiny insect that does not have wings but can jump far. Fleas feed on the blood of the animals they bite.
