simplified_definition: cheerful and friendly.

definition: "See Genius."
simplified_definition: a spirit, often in human form, that will grant one's wishes. Genies are sometimes written about in Arabian literature.

definition: "Distinguished mental superiority; uncommon intellectual power; especially  superior power of invention or origination of any kind or of forming new combinations; as a man of genius."
simplified_definition: an unusual ability to think or create in ways that go far beyond what most people can do.

definition: "Denoting a race or country; as  a gentile noun or adjective."
simplified_definition: a person who is not Jewish.

definition: "To make kind and docile  as a horse."
simplified_definition: kind; generous; mild.

definition: "A man well born; one of good family; one above the condition of a yeoman."
simplified_definition: a polite and honorable man.

definition: "A woman of good family or of good breeding; a woman above the vulgar."
simplified_definition: a polite and honorable woman.

definition: "In a gentle manner."
simplified_definition: softly or mildly; not harshly.

definition: "Belonging to  or proceeding from the original stock; native; hence not counterfeit spurious false or adulterated; authentic; real; natural; true; pure; as a genuine text; a genuine production; genuine materials."
simplified_definition: true to what is claimed; real.

definition: "A class of objects divided into several subordinate species; a class more extensive than a species; a precisely defined and exactly divided class; one of the five predicable conceptions  or sorts of terms."
simplified_definition: a large group of different but closely related plants and animals. A genus contains more organisms than a species but fewer than a family.

definition: "The science which treats of the world and its inhabitants; a description of the earth  or a portion of the earth including its structure fetures products political divisions and the people by whom it is inhabited."
simplified_definition: the science of the earth's surface and all life on it. When studying geography, one learns about the different countries and people of the earth, its climate, its natural resources, and its oceans, rivers, and mountains.

definition: "The science which treats:  Of the structure and mineral constitution of the globe; structural geology.  Of its history as regards rocks  minerals rivers valleys mountains climates life etc.; historical geology.  Of the causes and methods by which its structure features changes and conditions have been produced; dynamical geology. See Chart of The Geological Series."
simplified_definition: the study of the physical structure of the earth and how it has changed over time. Geologists gain this knowledge by studying rocks. Some geologists study other planets.

definition: "Alt. of Geometrical"
simplified_definition: having to do with geometry.

definition: "A treatise on this science."
simplified_definition: the area of mathematics concerned with the study of shapes and objects. Geometry deals with the measurement and relation of angles, points, lines, planes, and solid figures.

definition: "A genus of plants having a beaklike tours or receptacle  around which the seed capsules are arranged and membranous projections or stipules at the joints. Most of the species have showy flowers and a pungent odor. Called sometimes crane'sbill."
simplified_definition: a garden plant with red, pink, or white flowers that grow in bunches.

definition: "Alt. of Gerbille"
simplified_definition: a very small rodent that looks like a mouse with a furry tail. Gerbils live in burrows in the deserts of Africa and Asia. They are often kept as pets.

definition: "That which is to develop a new individual; as  the germ of a fetus of a plant or flower and the like; the earliest form under which an organism appears."
simplified_definition: a microscopic organism, especially one that causes illness. Bacteria and viruses that cause diseases are called germs.

definition: "A round dance  often with a waltz movement abounding in capriciosly involved figures."
simplified_definition: of or having to do with Germany, or its people, culture, or language.

definition: "Of or pertaining to Germany; as  the Germanic confederacy."
simplified_definition: of or having to do with the language group that includes German, Dutch, English, and some other European languages.

definition: "To sprout; to bud; to shoot; to begin to vegetate  as a plant or its seed; to begin to develop as a germ."
simplified_definition: to start or cause to start growth; sprout.

definition: "To make gestures; to gesticulate."
simplified_definition: a movement of one's body or face that shows feeling or thought.

definition: "Jet  the mineral."
simplified_definition: to receive; come to have; gain; acquire.

definition: "A boiling spring which throws forth at frequent intervals jets of water  mud etc. driven up by the expansive power of steam."
simplified_definition: a spring that shoots a stream of hot water, steam, or mud into the air from time to time.

definition: "In a ghastly manner; hideously."
simplified_definition: causing great fear or terror.

definition: "The Jews'quarter in an Italian town or city."
simplified_definition: a part of a town or city in which people of a particular race or religion are forced by law to live.

definition: "The spirit; the soul of man."
simplified_definition: the spirit of a person who has died, especially one that is believed to haunt a place or living people.

definition: "Of or pertaining to apparitions."
simplified_definition: like a ghost; pale or eerie.

definition: "An imaginary evil being among Eastern nations  which was supposed to feed upon human bodies."
simplified_definition: an evil spirit that is believed to eat people and dead bodies.

definition: "Like a giant; extraordinary in size  strength or power; as giant brothers; a giant son."
simplified_definition: an imaginary being who looks like a person but has enormous size and strength.

definition: "Any arboreal ape of the genus Hylobates  of which many species and varieties inhabit the East Indies and Southern Asia. They are tailless and without cheek pouches and have very long arms adapted for climbing."
simplified_definition: a kind of primate that lives in Asian rain forests. Gibbons are small apes that can weigh up to twentyfive pounds. They have long arms and can swing quickly through trees. All kinds of gibbons are endangered.

definition: "Having in the head a sensation of whirling or reeling about; having lost the power of preserving the balance of the body  and therefore wavering and inclined to fall; lightheaded; dizzy."
simplified_definition: faint or dizzy.

definition: "The act  right or power of giving or bestowing; as the office is in the gift of the President."
simplified_definition: something a person gives without wanting anything in return; a present.

definition: "of Gift"
simplified_definition: having a special talent or ability.

definition: "Of extraordinary size; like a giant."
simplified_definition: like a giant; huge.

definition: "To laugh with short catches of the breath or voice; to laugh in a light  affected or silly manner; to titter with childish levity."
simplified_definition: to laugh in a silly or nervous way.

definition: "A large tuberculated lizard  native of the dry plains of Arizona  New Mexico etc. It is the only lizard known to have venomous teeth."
simplified_definition: a large, poisonous reptile that lives in the southwestern part of the United States and in Mexico. This lizard has a short tail and scales in patterns of black with orange, yellow, or pink.

definition: "To make attractive; to adorn; to brighten."
simplified_definition: to cover or coat with gold.

definition: "An organ for aquatic respiration; a branchia."
simplified_definition: the organ used for breathing by fish and other animals that live in water.

definition: "A female pig  when young."
simplified_definition: a past tense and past participle of "gild."

definition: "A machine for separating the seeds from cotton; a cotton gin."
simplified_definition: an alcoholic drink made from grain flavored with juniper berries.

definition: "The hot and spicy rootstock of Zingiber officinale  which is much used in cookery and in medicine."
simplified_definition: the root of a tropical plant, used as a spice to flavor food.

definition: "A kind of plain sweet cake seasoned with ginger  and sometimes made in fanciful shapes."
simplified_definition: a type of cake or cookie flavored with ginger and molasses.

definition: "A kind of cotton or linen cloth  usually in stripes or checks the yarn of which is dyed before it is woven;  distinguished from printed cotton or prints."
simplified_definition: a strong cotton cloth that often has a pattern, such as checks or stripes.

definition: "An African ruminant  related to the deers and antelopes  but placed in a family by itself; the camelopard. It is the tallest of animals being sometimes twenty feet from the hoofs to the top of the head. Its neck is very long and its fore legs are much longer than its hind legs."
simplified_definition: a mammal with a very long neck, long legs, and hooves. Giraffes have short horns covered with fur. They live in Africa and eat the tops of trees. Male giraffes can be up to eighteen feet tall. They are the tallest animal that lives on land.

definition: "One who girds; a satirist."
simplified_definition: a heavy beam made of steel or wood used to support the floor or framework of a bridge or building.

definition: "A roebuck two years old."
simplified_definition: a female child or teenager.

definition: "State or time of being a girl."
simplified_definition: the state or time of being a girl.

definition: "To bind as with a girth."
simplified_definition: the length around something.

definition: "To move; to recede."
simplified_definition: to present.

definition: "of Give"
simplified_definition: past participle of "give."

definition: "An immense field or stream of ice  formed in the region of perpetual snow and moving slowly down a mountain slope or valley as in the Alps or over an extended area as in Greenland."
simplified_definition: a large mass of ice formed in cold regions from compacted snow and very slowly moving down a slope or across land.

definition: "To make glad; to cheer; to gladden; to exhilarate."
simplified_definition: happy; delighted; pleased or relieved.

definition: "Originally  a swordplayer; hence one who fought with weapons in public either on the occasion of a funeral ceremony or in the arena for public amusement."
simplified_definition: a man in ancient Rome who fought other men or animals, often to the death, to entertain an audience.

definition: "A genus of plants having bulbous roots and gladiate leaves  and including many species some of which are cultivated and valued for the beauty of their flowers; the corn flag; the sword lily."
simplified_definition: a garden plant that has long leaves and colorful flowers growing on tall stems. It is a member of the iris family.

definition: "Any artificial interest in  or association with an object through which it appears delusively magnified or glorified."
simplified_definition: the quality of being exciting, charming, and very attractive.

definition: "An incidental or passing thought or allusion."
simplified_definition: to take a quick look.

definition: "The crosspiece of a bayonet clutch."
simplified_definition: a group of cells or an organ that produces fluids that are released into the body or pass out of the body.

definition: "To shine with a bright  dazzling light."
simplified_definition: a light so strong and bright that it hurts the eyes or makes seeing difficult.

definition: "of Glare"
simplified_definition: extremely bright.

definition: "To smooth or polish anything  as leater by rubbing it with a glass burnisher."
simplified_definition: a hard, clear material that breaks easily. Glass is used to make windows, bottles, mirrors, and the like.

definition: "To become glazed of glassy."
simplified_definition: to give a shiny coating to during cooking or baking.

definition: "A shoot of light; a small stream of light; a beam; a ray; a glimpse."
simplified_definition: a small or brief flash or beam of light.

definition: "Music; minstrelsy; entertainment."
simplified_definition: a feeling of delight or joy.

definition: "A secluded and narrow valley; a dale; a depression between hills."
simplified_definition: a small, narrow valley.

definition: "The glede or kite."
simplified_definition: to move smoothly and without effort.

definition: "One who  or that which glides."
simplified_definition: a light aircraft without a motor that flies on air currents.

definition: "To give feeble or scattered rays of light; to shine faintly; to show a faint  unsteady light; as the glimmering dawn; a glimmering lamp."
simplified_definition: a dim or unsteady light; flicker.

definition: "to appear by glimpses; to catch glimpses."
simplified_definition: a quick look.

definition: "To glance; to peep forth  as a flower from the bud; to glitter."
simplified_definition: a brief flash or flicker of reflected light.

definition: "To sparkle or shine; especially  to shine with a mild subdued and fitful luster; to emit a soft scintillating light; to gleam; as the glistening stars."
simplified_definition: to shine or sparkle with reflected light.

definition: "To sparkle with light; to shine with a brilliant and broken light or showy luster; to gleam; as  a glittering sword."
simplified_definition: to shine brightly; sparkle.

definition: "To look steadfastly; to gaze earnestly;  usually in a bad sense  to gaze with malignant satisfaction passionate desire lust or avarice."
simplified_definition: to feel or show great pride or satisfaction, often when someone else does badly or fails.

definition: "A round or spherical body  solid or hollow; a body whose surface is in every part equidistant from the center; a ball; a sphere."
simplified_definition: the world; planet Earth.

definition: "In gunpowder manufacture  the drying oven."
simplified_definition: lack of light; darkness.

definition: "Affected with  or expressing gloom; melancholy; dejected; as a gloomy temper or countenance."
simplified_definition: dim or dark.

definition: "To make glorious in thought or with the heart  by ascribing glory to; to asknowledge the excellence of; to render homage to; to magnify in worship; to adore."
simplified_definition: to praise, honor, or worship.

definition: "An emanation of light supposed to proceed from beings of peculiar sanctity. It is represented in art by rays of gold  or the like proceeding from the head or body or by a disk or a mere line."
simplified_definition: great honor, praise, or fame.

definition: "of Glossa"
simplified_definition: a shine on a surface.

definition: "A collection of glosses or explanations of words and passages of a work or author; a partial dictionary of a work  an author a dialect art or science explaining archaic technical or other uncommon words."
simplified_definition: a list of unusual or difficult words and their meanings connected with a particular subject or particular piece of writing. A glossary is often placed at the end of a book.

definition: "Smooth and shining; reflecting luster from a smooth surface; highly polished; lustrous; as  glossy silk; a glossy surface."
simplified_definition: having a smooth, shiny surface or appearance.

definition: "A cover for the hand  or for the hand and wrist with a separate sheath for each finger. The latter characteristic distinguishes the glove from the mitten."
simplified_definition: a covering for the hand that has separate parts for each finger and the thumb.

definition: "To shine with an intense or white heat; to give forth vivid light and heat; to be incandescent."
simplified_definition: a steady light, especially the light given off by something very hot.

definition: "A coleopterous insect of the genus Lampyris; esp.  the wingless females and larvae of the two European species  which emit light from some of the abdominal segments."
simplified_definition: a wormshaped insect that can give off light from its body. The larvae and the females of the firefly are kinds of glowworm.

definition: "A hard brittle brownish gelatin  obtained by boiling to a jelly the skins hoofs etc. of animals. When gently heated with water it becomes viscid and tenaceous and is used as a cement for uniting substances. The name is also given to other adhesive or viscous substances."
simplified_definition: a thick, sticky liquid used to join things together.

definition: "To look sullen; to be of a sour countenance; to be glum."
simplified_definition: in low spirits; sad or gloomy.

definition: "Knotty; full of knots or gnarls; twisted; crossgrained."
simplified_definition: bent and twisted; crooked.

definition: "A bloodsucking dipterous fly  of the genus Culex undergoing a metamorphosis in water. The females have a proboscis armed with needlelike organs for penetrating the skin of animals. These are wanting in the males. In America they are generally called mosquitoes. See Mosquito."
simplified_definition: a small flying insect with two wings. Some gnats bite people or animals.

definition: "To bite  as something hard or tough which is not readily separated or crushed; to bite off little by little with effort; to wear or eat away by scraping or continuous biting with the teeth; to nibble at."
simplified_definition: to bite or chew on again and again.

definition: "An imaginary being  supposed by the Rosicrucians to inhabit the inner parts of the earth and to be the guardian of mines quarries etc."
simplified_definition: a creature in fairy tales that lives inside the earth and guards precious treasure. Gnomes are often portrayed as little old men with beards.

definition: "One of two species of large South African antelopes of the genus Catoblephas  having a mane and bushy tail and curved horns in both sexes."
simplified_definition: a large mammal with a large head and long, curving horns. Gnus live in Africa and are a kind of antelope. They have a beard, a mane, and a long tail.

definition: "To proceed or happen in a given manner; to fare; to move on or be carried on; to have course; to come to an issue or result; to succeed; to turn out."
simplified_definition: to move; travel.

definition: "The final purpose or aim; the end to which a design tends  or which a person aims to reach or attain."
simplified_definition: a result or end that a person wants and works for; aim or purpose.

definition: "A hollowhorned ruminant of the genus Capra  of several species and varieties esp. the domestic goat  which is raised for its milk flesh and skin."
simplified_definition: an animal with hooves, hollow horns, and rough hair. Goats are mammals that are raised for their milk, wool, and meat. They are closely related to sheep.

definition: "A part of a man's beard on the chin or lower lip which is allowed to grow  and trimmed so as to resemble the beard of a goat."
simplified_definition: a small pointed beard on a man's chin that looks like the beard of a goat.

definition: "To eat greedily."
simplified_definition: to make a sound like that of a turkey.

definition: "A kind of cup or drinking vessel having a foot or standard  but without a handle."
simplified_definition: a drinking glass with a stem and base, used mainly for wine.

definition: "An evil or mischievous spirit; a playful or malicious elf; a frightful phantom; a gnome."
simplified_definition: a small, ugly creature in fairy tales that does evil or mischief to humans.

definition: "Good."
simplified_definition: a being that is worshipped and believed to have special powers over nature or life. The ancient Greeks and Romans believed in the existence of many gods and goddesses.

definition: "A female god; a divinity  or deity of the female sex."
simplified_definition: a female god.

definition: "To act as godfather to; to take under one's fostering care."
simplified_definition: a male godparent.

definition: "A woman who becomes sponsor for a child in baptism. See Godfather"
simplified_definition: a female godparent.

definition: "A yellow color  like that of the metal; as a flower tipped with gold."
simplified_definition: a soft, heavy, yellow metal that is one of the chemical elements. It is often combined with other metals to make it harder and stronger. Gold is very valuable.

definition: "Made of gold; consisting of gold."
simplified_definition: having a shiny, deep yellow color.

definition: "A tall herb   bearing yellow flowers in a graceful elongated cluster. The name is common to all the species of the genus Solidago."
simplified_definition: a plant with small, yellow flowers on top of tall, stiff stems. It blooms in late summer or early fall.

definition: "A beautiful brightcolored European finch . The name refers to the large patch of yellow on the wings. The front of the head and throat are bright red; the nape  with part of the wings and tail black;  called also goldspink goldie fool's coat drawbird drawwater thistle finch and sweet William."
simplified_definition: a small finch with yellow and black markings, found in North America, Europe, and Asia.

definition: "A small domesticated cyprinoid fish ;  so named from its color. It is native of China  and is said to have been introduced into Europe in . It is often kept as an ornament in small ponds or glass globes. Many varieties are known. Called also golden fish and golden carp. See Telescope fish under Telescope."
simplified_definition: a small fish that lives in fresh water. Goldfish are usually yellow or orange and are often kept in ponds or aquariums.

definition: "A game played with a small ball and a bat or club crooked at the lower end. He who drives the ball into each of a series of small holes in the ground and brings it into the last hole with the fewest strokes is the winner."
simplified_definition: a game played on a large outdoor course with small holes in the ground spaced far apart. Players use a set of special clubs to hit a small white ball into each of the series of holes. There are nine or eighteen holes in a golf course. The object of the game is to get the ball into each hole using as few strokes as possible.

definition: "A flatbottomed boat for freight."
simplified_definition: a long, narrow boat with a flat bottom and high curved ends, propelled by a person standing at the stern using a long pole. Gondolas are used for carrying passengers on the canals of Venice, Italy.

definition: "of Go"
simplified_definition: past participle of "go."

definition: "A flat saucerlike bell  rung by striking it with a small hammer which is connected with it by various mechanical devices; a stationary bell used to sound calls or alarms;  called also gong bell."
simplified_definition: a large piece of metal shaped like a plate that makes a loud ringing sound when struck with a stick or hammer.

definition: "Possessing desirable qualities; adapted to answer the end designed; promoting success  welfare or happiness; serviceable; useful; fit; excellent; admirable; commendable; not bad corrupt evil noxious offensive or troublesome etc."
simplified_definition: having qualities that are desired.

definition: "Farewell; a form of address used at parting. See the last Note under By  prep."
simplified_definition: a word used by or to someone who is leaving or ending a telephone call; farewell.

definition: "Handsome."
simplified_definition: attractive or pleasing in appearance; beautiful or handsome.

definition: "Naturally mild in temper; not easily provoked."
simplified_definition: having or showing a pleasant, cheerful, or friendly character or mood.

definition: "The quality of being good in any of its various senses; excellence; virtue; kindness; benevolence; as  the goodness of timber of a soil of food; goodness of character of disposition of conduct etc."
simplified_definition: the quality or condition of being good.

definition: "See Good  n. ."
simplified_definition: things that belong to someone; possessions; belongings.

definition: "A game played with counters on a board divided into compartments  in some of which a goose was depicted."
simplified_definition: a water bird that looks like a duck but is usually larger, with a longer neck and legs and a more pointed bill. Some geese are raised by farmers, and some are found in the wild.

definition: "A large land tortoise  of the Southern United States  which makes extensive burrows."
simplified_definition: a small rodent with gray or brown fur and a short tail. Gophers live in burrows and tunnel underground to look for food. They are also called pocket gophers, because they have pouches outside their cheeks where they carry food and nesting material. Gophers live in Central and North America.

definition: "A narrow passage or entrance"
simplified_definition: a narrow space between rocky cliffs.

definition: "Imposing through splendid or various colors; showy; fine; magnificent."
simplified_definition: very beautiful; splendid.

definition: "A large  arboreal anthropoid ape of West Africa. It is larger than a man and is remarkable for its massive skeleton and powerful muscles which give it enormous strength. In some respects its anatomy more than that of any other ape except the chimpanzee resembles that of man."
simplified_definition: a very large ape that lives in African forests. Gorillas are the largest of the primates. Male gorillas living in zoos can weigh as much as six hundred pounds. All gorillas living in the wild are in danger of extinction.

definition: "A young or unfledged goose."
simplified_definition: a very young goose.

definition: "Anything propounded or accepted as infallibly true; as  they took his words for gospel."
simplified_definition: the lessons taught by Jesus Christ and his apostles.

definition: "To run about and tattle; to tell idle tales."
simplified_definition: tales or talk about the personal lives and secrets of others when they are not present.

definition: "of Get"
simplified_definition: past tense and a past participle of "get."

definition: "of Get"
simplified_definition: a past participle of "get."

definition: "An incising tool which cuts forms or blanks for gloves  envelopes etc. from leather paper etc."
simplified_definition: a type of chisel with a blade shaped like a scoop, used to carve wood.

definition: "A fleshy  threecelled manyseeded fruit as the melon pumpkin cucumber etc. of the order Cucurbitaceae; and especially the bottle gourd  which occurs in a great variety of forms and when the interior part is removed serves for bottles dippers
simplified_definition: the rounded fruit of a plant related to the squash. Certain kinds of gourds are dried and then used to make containers or decorations.

definition: "A connoisseur in eating and drinking; an epicure."
simplified_definition: a person who loves and knows much about good food and fine wine.

definition: "To direct and control  as the actions or conduct of men either by established laws or by arbitrary will; to regulate by authority."
simplified_definition: to rule or lead.

definition: "The act of governing; the exercise of authority; the administration of laws; control; direction; regulation; as  civil church or family government."
simplified_definition: the making of laws and important decisions that control or affect all the people living in a community, state, or nation.

definition: "One who has the care or guardianship of a young man; a tutor; a guardian."
simplified_definition: a person who leads a government, especially that of a state of the United States.

definition: "A loose  flowing upper garment"
simplified_definition: a dress worn on special occasions.

definition: "A vessel used on the Malabar coast  having two or three masts."
simplified_definition: to take hold of suddenly or with force; snatch.

definition: "To dignify or raise by an act of favor; to honor."
simplified_definition: beauty or charm in form, style, or motion.

definition: "Displaying grace or beauty in form or action; elegant; easy; agreeable in appearance; as  a graceful walk deportment speaker air act speech."
simplified_definition: marked by grace or beauty of movement or manner.

definition: "Abounding in grace or mercy; manifesting love . or bestowing mercy; characterized by grace; beneficent; merciful; disposed to show kindness or favor; condescending; as his most gracious majesty."
simplified_definition: likely to do what is polite, kind, or right.

definition: "One of several American blackbirds  of the family Icteridae; as the rusty grackle ; the boattailed grackle ; the purple grackle . See Crow blackbird under Crow."
simplified_definition: a North American blackbird with a long tail and shiny black feathers.

definition: "A step or degree in any series  rank quality order; relative position or standing; as grades of military rank; crimes of every grade; grades of flour."
simplified_definition: a level, degree, or rank in a scale.

definition: "Proceeding by steps or degrees; advancing  step by step as in ascent or descent or from one state to another; regularly progressive; slow; as a gradual increase of knowledge; a gradual decline."
simplified_definition: happening by degrees that are small and even.

definition: "In a gradual manner."
simplified_definition: by small steps or degrees.

definition: "To prepare gradually; to arrange  temper or modify by degrees or to a certain degree; to determine the degrees of; as to graduate the heat of an oven."
simplified_definition: a person who has finished studying at high school or college. A diploma is given to a graduate to show that all the necessary work has been done.

definition: "The exposure of a liquid in large surfaces to the air  so as to hasten its evaporation."
simplified_definition: the act or process of graduating.

definition: "To insert scions from one tree  or kind of tree etc. into another; to practice grafting."
simplified_definition: a part of a plant that is taken off and placed into a slit on another plant so that the two parts will grow together and become one plant.

definition: "A thin piece of metal  used in a mold to steady a core."
simplified_definition: the small hard seeds of cereal plants such as wheat or rice. Grain is used for food and often ground into flour.

definition: "Angry."
simplified_definition: the basic unit of weight in the metric system, equal to one thousandth of a kilogram or . ounce.

definition: "The science which treats of the principles of language; the study of forms of speech  and their relations to one another; the art concerned with the right use aud application of the rules of a language in speaking or writing."
simplified_definition: the rules for forming the words and sentences of a language. Some of these rules have to be learned. Other rules are already in the head of a native speaker. For example, a native English speaker would not say, "I a cat bitten by was," because the grammar does not make sense. When one learns a new language, most of the rules of its grammar have to be learned.

definition: "According to the rules of grammar; grammatically correct; as  the sentence is not grammatical; the construction is not grammatical."
simplified_definition: of or having to do with grammar.

definition: "Great in size  and fine or imposing in appearance or impression; illustrious dignifled or noble ; majestic splendid magnificent or sublime ; as a grand monarch; a grand lord; a grand general; a grand view; a grand conception."
simplified_definition: splendid in size or appearance.

definition: "A son's or daughter's child; a child in the second degree of descent."
simplified_definition: a child of one's son or daughter.

definition: "The daughter of one's son or daughter."
simplified_definition: a female child of one's son or daughter.

definition: "A father's or mother's father; an ancestor in the next degree above the father or mother in lineal ascent."
simplified_definition: the father of a person's mother or father.

definition: "Alt. of Grandmamma"
simplified_definition: the female parent of one's parent; grandmother.

definition: "The mother of one's father or mother."
simplified_definition: the mother of a person's father or mother.

definition: "Alt. of Grandpapa"
simplified_definition: the male parent of one's parent; grandfather.

definition: "A son's or daughter's son."
simplified_definition: the male child of one's son or daughter.

definition: "A crystalline  granular rock consisting of quartz feldspar and mica and usually of a whitish grayish or fleshred color. It differs from gneiss in not having the mica in planes and therefore in being destitute of a schistose structure."
simplified_definition: a hard stone made by the activity of volcanoes. It is used for making buildings, monuments, and sculptures.

definition: "To give over; to make conveyance of; to give the possession or title of; to convey;  usually in answer to petition."

simplified_definition: a farm tool used to break up and level ground that has been plowed. A harrow has spikes or upright disks mounted on a heavy frame.

definition: "Having violent contrasts of color  or of light and shade; lacking in harmony."

definition: "of Have"
simplified_definition: the present tense of "have," used with "he," "she," or "it," or with singular nouns.

simplified_definition: a bird with a short hooked beak and curved claws. Hawks catch and eat small animals.

definition: "A thorny shrub or tree   having deeply lobed shining leaves small roselike fragrant flowers and a fruit called haw. It is much used in Europe for hedges and for standards in gardens. The American hawthorn is Crataegus cordata which has the leaves but little lobed."
simplified_definition: a shrub or small tree with long thorns that has white or pink flowers and small red berries.

definition: "A hedge."
simplified_definition: grass, clover, or alfalfa that is cut, dried, and stored for animal food.

definition: "A loft or scaffold for hay."

definition: "A game of chance played with dice."

definition: "Exposed to hazard; dangerous; risky."

definition: "Of a light brown color  like the hazelnut."

definition: "The man or male being   previously designated; a pronoun of the masculine gender usually referring to a specified subject already indicated."

definition: "Tiles laid at the eaves of a house."
simplified_definition: the top or leading part of an animal body. In vertebrates the head contains the brain, eyes, nose, ears, and mouth. In invertebrates, the head contains eyes, mouth parts, and other organs.

definition: "Pain in the head; cephalalgia."
simplified_definition: a pain in the head.

simplified_definition: a band worn around the head. Headbands are used to hold back the hair or to soak up wetness.

definition: "A measure of area  or superficies containing a hundred ares or   square meters and equivalent to . acres."

definition: "The Canadian porcupine."

They make tunnels in rows of bushes called hedges. Hedgehogs are insectivores; they are mammals that eat insects. Different kinds of hedgehogs live in Europe, Asia, and Africa.

definition: "To mind; to regard with care; to take notice of; to attend to; to observe."
simplified_definition: to give one's attention to; listen to; take notice of.

simplified_definition: the rounded, back part of the human foot, or a part like it in an animal.

definition: "To make high; to raise higher; to elevate."

definition: "See Halloo."

definition: "A naked shield or protuberance on the top or fore part of the head of a bird."

simplified_definition: an evergreen tree of North America that has short needles and small cones, or the wood of this tree.

simplified_definition: a tall plant first found in Asia. Hemp is an important source of fiber for rope and coarse cloth.

simplified_definition: an adult female chicken or the female of other closely related birds, such as turkeys, pheasants, and peacocks.

definition: "To send away."

definition: "The form of the objective and the possessive case of the personal pronoun she; as  I saw her with her purse out."
simplified_definition: the female person or animal already talked about

definition: "A plant whose stem does not become woody and permanent  but dies at least down to the ground after flowering."

definition: "One of the Herbivora."
simplified_definition: an animal that only feeds on plants.

definition: "Eating plants; of or pertaining to the Herbivora."
simplified_definition: eating only plants; feeding on plants.

definition: "A hero  fabled to have been the son of Jupiter and Alcmena and celebrated for great strength esp. for the accomplishment of his twelve great tasks or """"labors."
simplified_definition: a hero in Greek and Roman mythology. Hercules was half man and half god and known for his amazing strength.

definition: "To form or put into a herd."
simplified_definition: any group of cattle or wild animals that feed and travel together.

definition: "At this point of time  or of an argument; now."

definition: "A future existence or state."
simplified_definition: after this; from this point on.

definition: "By means of this."
simplified_definition: by this means; at this moment.

definition: "Hereditary transmission of the physical and psychical qualities of parents to their offspring; the biological law by which living beings tend to repeat their characteristics in their descendants. See Pangenesis."
simplified_definition: the passing of characteristics from parent to offspring.

definition: "That which is inherited  or passes from heir to heir; inheritance."
simplified_definition: something that one believes, thinks, or does that comes from one's family or ethnic background; tradition.

definition: "See Mercury."
simplified_definition: the messenger of the gods, in Greek mythology. Hermes was also the god of travelers, of trade, of theft, and of skill in speaking. He is often shown with wings on his hat and shoes. In Roman mythology, Hermes is called Mercury.

definition: "A person who retires from society and lives in solitude; a recluse; an anchoret; especially  one who so lives from religious motives."
simplified_definition: a person who lives alone and away from others. Often a person becomes a hermit in order to lead a religious life.

definition: "An illustrious man  supposed to be exalted after death to a place among the gods; a demigod as Hercules."

definition: "Of or pertaining to  or like a hero; of the nature of heroes; distinguished by the existence of heroes; as the heroic age; an heroic people; heroic valor."
simplified_definition: of or having to do with a hero or heroes.

definition: "A woman of an heroic spirit."
simplified_definition: a woman who is looked up to for her good character or fine actions.

definition: "Any wading bird of the genus Ardea and allied genera  of the family Ardeidae. The herons have a long sharp bill and long legs and toes with the claw of the middle toe toothed. The common European heron  is remarkable for its directly ascending flight and was formerly hunted with the larger falcons."
simplified_definition: a wading bird with long legs, a long neck, and a long pointed bill. An egret is a kind of heron.

definition: "One of various species of fishes of the genus Clupea  and allied genera esp. the common round or English herring  of the North Atlantic. Herrings move in vast schools coming in spring to the shores of Europe and America where they are salted and smoked in great quantities."
simplified_definition: a small fish that lives in northern waters. Herring are used for food.

definition: "See the Note under Her  pron."
simplified_definition: that or those belonging to her, done by her, or having to do with her.

simplified_definition: her own self .

definition: "Unready in speech."
simplified_definition: not feeling sure; in doubt.

definition: "To utter with hesitation or to intimate by a reluctant manner."
simplified_definition: to stop or pause because of not feeling sure.

definition: "The act of hesitating; suspension of opinion or action; doubt; vacillation."
simplified_definition: the action of hesitating.

definition: "A plane figure of six angles."
simplified_definition: a flat, closed figure with six straight sides.

definition: "High."
simplified_definition: a word used to draw attention or to show surprise, mild delight, or anger.

definition: "To winter; to pass the season of winter in close quarters  in a torpid or lethargic state as certain mammals reptiles and insects."
simplified_definition: to sleep through the winter in a den or burrow to save energy. Bears, snakes, and certain other animals hibernate.

definition: "An American tree of the genus Carya  of which there are several species. The shagbark is the C. alba and has a very rough bark; it affords the hickory nut of the markets. simplified_definition: a tree of the walnut family, found mostly in North America. The hickory has nuts that can be eaten and wood that is hard and useful.

definition: "imp.  p. p. of Hide. See Hidden."
simplified_definition: past tense and a past participle of "hide."

definition: "from Hide. Concealed; put out of view; secret; not known; mysterious."

simplified_definition: the skin of one of the larger animals such as a buffalo or cow.

definition: "Frightful  shocking or offensive to the eyes; dreadful to behold; as a hideous monster; hideous looks."
simplified_definition: looking very ugly or frightening; disgusting.

definition: "A sacred character; a character in picture writing  as of the ancient Egyptians Mexicans etc. Specifically in the plural the picture writing of the ancient Egyptian priests. It is made up of three or as some say four classes of characters: first the hieroglyphic proper or figurative in which the representation of the object conveys the idea of the object itself; second
simplified_definition: having to do with writing that uses pictures and symbols to stand for words or sounds.

definition: "A hunting watch  or one of which the crystal is protected by a metallic cover."

definition: "The pursuit of game or of wild animals."
simplified_definition: the act or sport of chasing wild animals for the purpose of capturing or killing them.

definition: "An artificial barrier  variously constructed over which men or horses leap in a race."
simplified_definition: a barrier over which a runner or horse must leap in the course of certain races.

definition: "To send whirling or whizzing through the air; to throw with violence; to drive with great force; as  to hurl a stone or lance."
simplified_definition: to throw with force.

definition: "Alt. of Hurra"
simplified_definition: a word used to express joy, approval, victory, or encouragement.

definition: "A violent storm  characterized by extreme fury and sudden changes of the wind and generally accompanied by rain thunder and lightning;  especially prevalent in the East and West Indies. Also used figuratively."
simplified_definition: a powerful storm with heavy rains and winds that blow in a circle at  miles per hour or more. Hurricanes usually form in the West Indian region of the Atlantic Ocean.

definition: "Urged on; hastened; going or working at speed; as  a hurried writer; a hurried life."
simplified_definition: moving or acting quickly; forced to hurry.

definition: "To hasten; to impel to greater speed; to urge on."
simplified_definition: to move or act with speed; to rush .

definition: "To impar the value  usefulness beauty or pleasure of; to damage; to injure; to harm."
simplified_definition: to cause pain, harm, or suffering to.

definition: "To push; to jostle; to hurl."
simplified_definition: to move with great speed and often with great noise.

definition: "To furnish with a husband."
simplified_definition: a man who is married; the man to whom a woman is married.

definition: "To still; to silence; to calm; to make quiet; to repress the noise or clamor of."
simplified_definition: "Be quiet."

definition: "The external covering or envelope of certain fruits or seeds; glume; hull; rind; in the United States  especially applied to the covering of the ears of maize."
simplified_definition: the dry outer covering of some seeds and fruits.

definition: "Abounding with husks; consisting of husks."
simplified_definition: a breed of dog. Huskies are strong, have thick fur, and are often raised to pull sleds in arctic regions.

definition: "To shake together in confusion; to push  jostle or crowd rudely; to handle roughly; as to hustle a person out of a room."
simplified_definition: to work or go swiftly.

definition: "A small house  hivel or cabin; a mean lodge or dwelling; a slightly built or temporary structure."
simplified_definition: a small house or shelter made of grass, mud, or logs.

definition: "To place in huts; to live in huts; as  to hut troops in winter quarters."
simplified_definition: a pen or shelter for small animals such as rabbits.

definition: "The name also given to Scilla Peruviana  a Mediterranean plant one variety of which produces white and another blue flowers;  called also from a mistake as to its origin Hyacinth of Peru."
simplified_definition: a plant that bears tall stalks of colorful flowers that have a sweet smell. The hyacinth grows from a bulb and is related to the lily.

definition: "The offspring of the union of two distinct species; an animal or plant produced from the mixture of two species. See Mongrel."
simplified_definition: the offspring of two plants or animals that are of different species or breeds.

definition: "A discharge pipe with a valve and spout at which water may be drawn from the mains of waterworks; a water plug."
simplified_definition: an upright pipe with a valve from which water can be drawn from a water main.

definition: "Pertaining to  employed in or produced by the evolution of electricity by means of a battery in which water or steam is used."
simplified_definition: having to do with producing electricity by means of the energy created by moving water.

definition: "A gaseous element  colorless tasteless and odorless the lightest known substance being fourteen and a half times lighter than air  and over eleven thousand times lighter than water. It is very abundant being an ingredient of water and of many other substances especially those of animal or vegetable origin. It may by produced in many ways but is chiefly obtained by the action of acids  on metals as zinc iron
simplified_definition: a very light gas that burns easily and is one of the chemical elements. Hydrogen is the most abundant element in the universe. It combines with oxygen to make water, and it is found in all living things. Hydrogen combines with many substances and has many uses.

definition: "Any carnivorous mammal of the family Hyaenidae  of which three living species are known. They are large and strong but cowardly. They feed chiefly on carrion and are nocturnal in their habits."
simplified_definition: a mammal with very long front legs and shorter back legs. Hyenas look like dogs, but are more closely related to cats. They have a cry that sounds like strange human laughter. Most kinds of hyena are nocturnal and eat the remains of dead animals. Hyenas are found in Africa and Asia.

definition: "That department of sanitary science which treats of the preservation of health  esp. of households and communities; a system of principles or rules designated for the promotion of health."
simplified_definition: the practice of keeping clean to stay healthy and prevent disease.

definition: "One versed in hygiene."
simplified_definition: a person skilled in the areas of hygiene, such as a dentist's assistant.

definition: "An ode or song of praise or adoration; especially  a religious ode a sacred lyric; a song of praise or thankgiving intended to be used in religious service; as the Homeric hymns; Watts' hymns."
simplified_definition: a song or poem written in praise of God or a country.

definition: "A collection of hymns; a hymn book."
simplified_definition: a book of church hymns.

definition: "A mark or short dash  thus  placed at the end of a line which terminates with a syllable of a word the remainder of which is carried to the next line; or between the parts of many a compound word; as in fineleaved clearheaded. It is also sometimes used to separate the syllables of words."
simplified_definition: a punctuation mark . It is used to join the parts of a compound word. It is also used at the end of a line to divide a word between syllables.

definition: "Supervention of sleep."
simplified_definition: a condition like sleep that is caused by the direction of another person. People under hypnosis may do or say things as directed or suggested by the person who has put them in this condition.

definition: "To induce hypnotism in; to place in a state of hypnotism."
simplified_definition: to put into a state of hypnosis.

definition: "One who plays a part; especially  one who for the purpose of winning approbation of favor puts on a fair outside seeming; one who feigns to be other and better than he is; a false pretender to virtue or piety; one who simulates virtue or piety."
simplified_definition: a person who pretends to be different or better than he or she really is. Someone who does not act according to his or her stated beliefs is a hypocrite.

definition: "Alt. of Hypothenuse"
simplified_definition: the side opposite the right angle in a right triangle; the longest side of a right triangle.

definition: "A supposition; a proposition or principle which is supposed or taken for granted  in order to draw a conclusion or inference for proof of the point in question; something not proved but assumed for the purpose of argument or to account for a fact or an occurrence; as the hypothesis that head winds detain an overdue steamer."
simplified_definition: a prediction or educated guess that can be tested and can be used to guide further study.

definition: "Of or pertaining to hysteria; affected  or troubled with hysterics; convulsive fitful."
simplified_definition: having or likely to have fits of wild behavior such as laughing or crying.

definition: "The nominative case of the pronoun of the first person; the word with which a speaker or writer denotes himself."

definition: "A contraction from I would or I had."
simplified_definition: shortened form of "I would" or "I had."

definition: "A contraction of I am."

definition: "Relating to the patriarch Abraham."

definition: "To cover with ice; to convert into ice  or into something resembling ice."

definition: "A large mass of ice  generally floating in the ocean."
simplified_definition: a large floating mass of ice that has broken from a glacier.

definition: "A pendent  and usually conical mass of ice formed by freezing of dripping water; as the icicles on the eaves of a house."
simplified_definition: a spike of ice formed by the freezing of dripping water.

definition: "of Ice"
simplified_definition: a sweet substance used for covering or decorating cakes, cookies, or other baked goods; frosting.

definition: "An image or representation; a portrait or pretended portrait."
simplified_definition: on a phone or computer display, a small drawing that is used as a symbol. Clicking on the symbol requests a certain action from the computer, such as opening a file, taking a user to a location, or playing an audio.

definition: "Characterized by coldness  as of manner influence etc.; chilling; frigid; cold."
simplified_definition: made of, covered with, or looking like ice.

definition: "A small freshwater cyprinoid fish  of Europe. A domesticated variety  colored like the goldfish is called orfe in Germany."
simplified_definition: abbreviation of "Idaho."

definition: "The transcript  image or picture of a visible object that is formed by the mind; also a similar image of any object whatever whether sensible or spiritual."

definition: "Existing in idea or thought; conceptional; intellectual; mental; as  ideal knowledge."

definition: "The same; the selfsame; the very same; not different; as  the identical person or thing."

definition: "An image or representation of anything."

definition: "In case that; granting  allowing or supposing that;  introducing a condition or supposition."

definition: "An Eskimo snow house."
simplified_definition: a hut, shaped like a dome and made of blocks of ice or hard snow. Igloos are a traditional type of home made by certain groups of people who live in the Arctic regions of the world.

definition: "Resulting from  or produced by the action of fire; as lavas and basalt are igneous rocks."
simplified_definition: having to do with rocks formed by a volcano or other source of great heat.

definition: "Any species of the genus Iguana  a genus of large American lizards of the family Iguanidae. They are arboreal in their habits usually green in color and feed chiefly upon fruits."
simplified_definition: a large lizard found mostly in the warmer parts of Central and South America. Many iguanas have a ridge of spines down the middle of the back. Unlike other lizards, iguanas eat only plants.

definition: "Ignorant of letters or books; unlettered; uninstructed; uneducated; as  an illiterate man or people."

simplified_definition: a prefix that means "in," "into," or "on." It is used before words beginning with the letters P, B, or M.

definition: "The imperative mood; also  a verb in the imperative mood."

definition: "Not polite; not of polished manners; wanting in good manners; discourteous; uncivil; rude."

definition: "Specifically  to secure against a loss by a contingent event on certain stipulated conditions or at a given rate or premium; to give or to take an insurance on or for; as a merchant insures his ship or its cargo or both against the dangers of the sea; goods and buildings are insured against fire or water; persons are insured against sickness accident or death; and sometimes hazardous debts are insured."

definition: "Untouched  especially by anything that harms defiles or the like; uninjured; undefiled; left complete or entire."

simplified_definition: the act of disturbing or getting in the way of something.

definition: "A space between things; a void space intervening between any two objects; as  an interval between two houses or hills."

simplified_definition: a meeting between a person who has applied for a job and the person who is offering the job. During such an interview, job requirements, qualifications, and pay are discussed.

definition: "The bowels; entrails; viscera."

definition: "Innermost; inward; internal; deepseated; hearty."

definition: "Expressing entrance  or a passing from the outside of a thing to its interior parts;  following verbs expressing motion; as come into the house; go into the church; one stream falls or runs into another; water enters into the fine vessels of plants."

If heated iodine volatilizes in beautiful violet vapors."
simplified_definition: a substance that is one of the chemical elements. Iodine combines easily with other elements. It is found in salt water and seaweed. Iodine is poisonous in its pure crystal form.

definition: "The hard  white opaque finegrained substance constituting the tusks of the elephant. It is a variety of dentine characterized by the minuteness and close arrangement of the tubes as also by their double flexure. It is used in manufacturing articles of ornament or utility."

definition: "A plant of the genus Hedera   common in Europe. Its leaves are evergreen dark smooth shining and mostly fivepointed; the flowers yellowish and small; the berries black or yellow. The stem clings to walls and trees by rootlike fibers."

definition: "J is the tenth letter of the English alphabet. It is a later variant form of the Roman letter I  used to express a consonantal sound that is originally the sound of English y in yet. definition: "A thrust or stab."

definition: "A system of gearing driven by a horse power  for multiplying speed."

definition: "Any one of several species of carnivorous animals inhabiting Africa and Asia  related to the dog and wolf. They are cowardly nocturnal and gregarious. They feed largely on carrion and are noted for their piercing and dismal howling."

Jaguars are closely related to lions, tigers, and other big cats. They are sometimes called panthers.

definition: "A kind of prison; a building for the confinement of persons held in lawful custody  especially for minor offenses or with reference to some future judicial proceeding."

definition: "A kind of frock for children."

definition: "The first month of the year  containing thirtyone days."

definition: "To give a glossy black to  as shoes."

definition: "Confused  unintelligible language; gibberish; hence an artificial idiom or dialect; cant language; slang."

definition: "A morbid condition  characterized by yellowness of the eyes skin and urine whiteness of the faeces constipation uneasiness in the region of the stomach loss of appetite and general languor and lassitude. definition: "Affected with jaundice."

definition: "Airy; showy; finical; hence  characterized by an affected or fantastical manner."

definition: "One of the bones  usually bearing teeth which form the framework of the mouth."

definition: "Zealous; solicitous; vigilant; anxiously watchful."
