definition: "A twilled cotton cloth."
simplified_definition: pants made from a heavy, often blue, cotton cloth.

definition: "Anything brought to a gelatinous condition; a viscous  translucent substance in a condition between liquid and solid; a stiffened solution of gelatin gum or the like."
simplified_definition: a soft food made from fruit juice and sugar. It is usually spread on bread or toast.

definition: "Any one of the acalephs  esp. one of the larger species having a jellylike appearance. See Medusa."
simplified_definition: a water animal with a soft body shaped like a bell. Jellyfish have many tentacles hanging down from their bodies. Most kinds of jellyfish live in the ocean.

definition: "Exposure to death  loss or injury; hazard; danger."
simplified_definition: danger of harm, death, or loss; at risk.

definition: "To cut into long slices or strips and dry in the sun; as  jerk beef. See Charqui."
simplified_definition: any sudden, sharp movement that is not expected or planned.

definition: "Moving by jerks and starts; characterized by abrupt transitions; as  a jerky vehicle; a jerky style."
simplified_definition: having sudden starts and stops or other quick movements that are not expected.

definition: "The finest of wool separated from the rest; combed wool; also  fine yarn of wool."
simplified_definition: a knitted shirt that is often worn by people who play sports. A jersey is pulled on over the head.

definition: "The chief city of Palestine  intimately associated with the glory of the Jewish nation and the life and death of Jesus Christ."
simplified_definition: the capital city of Israel.

definition: "The object of laughter or sport; a laughingstock."
simplified_definition: a funny saying or action; joke.

definition: "A buffoon; a merryandrew; a court fool."
simplified_definition: someone hired to tell jokes in royal courts during the Middle Ages in Europe. Jesters often made fun of court life.

definition: "To shoot forward or out; to project; to jut out."
simplified_definition: a stream of liquid or gas shooting from an opening, usually with great pressure.

definition: "See Jetsam  ."
simplified_definition: to throw from a ship or airplane to make it lighter or more stable.

definition: "A structure of wood or stone extended into the sea to influence the current or tide  or to protect a harbor; a mole; as the Eads system of jetties at the mouth of the Mississippi River."
simplified_definition: a group of rocks or wooden beams built out into a body of water. Jetties are used to control the flow of water and protect the shore from strong waves.

definition: "Originally  one belonging to the tribe or kingdom of Judah; after the return from the Babylonish captivity any member of the new state; a Hebrew; an Israelite."
simplified_definition: a person whose ancestors were the Biblical Hebrews.

definition: "To dress  adorn deck or supply with jewels as a dress a sword hilt or a watch; to bespangle as with jewels."
simplified_definition: a special stone that has been cut and made smooth; gem. Jewels are used to make jewelry and ornaments.

definition: "One who makes  or deals in jewels precious stones and similar ornaments."
simplified_definition: a person who makes, fixes, or sells gems or jewelry.

definition: "The art or trade of a jeweler."
simplified_definition: rings, watches, necklaces, or other ornaments; jewels.

definition: "Of or pertaining to the Jews or Hebrews; characteristic of or resembling the Jews or their customs; Israelitish."
simplified_definition: of or having to do with Jews, their culture, traditions, or religion.

definition: "A triangular sail set upon a stay or halyard extending from the foremast or foretopmast to the bowsprit or the jib boom. Large vessels often carry several jibe; as  inner jib; outer jib; flying jib; etc."
simplified_definition: a sail that is shaped like a triangle and used in the front of a sailing boat.

definition: "A moment; an instant; as  I will be ready in a jiffy."
simplified_definition: a very short time; instant.

definition: "A light  brisk musical movement."
simplified_definition: a fast, lively dance.

definition: "To sound with a fine  sharp rattling clinking or tinkling sound; as sleigh bells jingle."
simplified_definition: to make a sound like light metal objects hitting against each other again and again.

definition: "To carry on the business of a jobber in merchandise or stocks."
simplified_definition: a particular task or piece of work.

definition: "A dealer in horses; a horse trader."
simplified_definition: a person whose work is riding horses in races.

definition: "A rub; a slight stop; an obstruction; hence  an irregularity in motion of from; a hitch; a break in the direction of a line or the surface of a plane."
simplified_definition: to give a little push or shake; nudge.

definition: "To bring together  literally or figuratively; to place in contact; to connect; to couple; to unite; to combine; to associate; to add; to append."
simplified_definition: to put, bring, or fasten together.

definition: "A plane of fracture  or divisional plane of a rock transverse to the stratification."
simplified_definition: a place or point where two or more parts come together or are connected.

definition: "Something said for the sake of exciting a laugh; something witty or sportive ; a jest; a witticism; as  to crack goodnatured jokes."
simplified_definition: a short story, usually with a funny ending, that is told to make people laugh.

definition: "Full of life and mirth; jovial; joyous; merry; mirthful."
simplified_definition: cheerful, full of fun, and merry.

definition: "To shake with short  abrupt risings and fallings as a carriage moving on rough ground; as the coach jolts."
simplified_definition: to shake up or cause to move with a jerk.

definition: "Alt. of Jonquille"
simplified_definition: a white or yellow flower with a pleasant smell. The jonquil is much like the daffodil.

definition: "Alt. of Jorden"
simplified_definition: a country in southwestern Asia. It lies east of Israel. Amman is the capital of Jordan.

definition: "To run against and shake; to push out of the way; to elbow; to hustle; to disturb by crowding; to crowd against."
simplified_definition: to push, crowd, or bump into on purpose.

definition: "An iota; a point; a tittle; the smallest particle. Cf. Bit  n."
simplified_definition: to write in a quick and simple way .

definition: "Daily; diurnal."
simplified_definition: a record of a person's experiences, thoughts, or daily events; diary.

definition: "The keeping of a journal or diary."
simplified_definition: the work of collecting news and information and giving it out to the public through newspapers, magazines, radio, television, or other media.

definition: "One who keeps a journal or diary."
simplified_definition: a person whose work is journalism.

definition: "The travel or work of a day."
simplified_definition: a long trip from one place to another.

definition: "To engage in mock combat on horseback  as two knights in the lists; to tilt."
simplified_definition: a real or pretend fight between two knights on horseback. Each knight tries to knock the other off his horse with a lance.

definition: "Gay; merry; joyous; jolly; mirthinspiring; hilarious; characterized by mirth or jollity; as  a jovial youth; a jovial company; a jovial poem."
simplified_definition: very cheerful, friendly, and merry; jolly.

definition: "The cheek; the jaw."
simplified_definition: skin or flesh that hangs down from the lower jaw.

definition: "To gladden; to make joyful; to exhilarate."
simplified_definition: a great feeling of happiness or pleasure; delight.

definition: "Full of joy; having or causing joy; very glad; as  a joyful heart."
simplified_definition: feeling, showing, or causing great happiness; glad; happy.

definition: "Glad; gay; merry; joyful; also  affording or inspiring joy; with of before the word or words expressing the cause of joy."
simplified_definition: full of joy; happy.

definition: "Uttering songs of triumph; shouting with joy; triumphant; exulting."
simplified_definition: having or showing great joy; having a happy feeling of success.

definition: "Conformity to the Jewish rites and ceremonies."
simplified_definition: the religion of the Jewish people. It is based on the belief in one God and on two holy books, the Old Testament of the Bible and the Talmud.

definition: "A person appointed to decide in atrial of skill  speed etc. between two or more parties; an umpire; as a judge in a horse race."
simplified_definition: a person trained to hear and decide cases brought before a court of law.

definition: "The act of judging; the operation of the mind  involving comparison and discrimination by which a knowledge of the values and relations of thins whether of moral qualities intellectual concepts logical propositions or material facts is obtained; as by careful judgment he avoided the peril; by a series of wrong judgments he forfeited confidence."
simplified_definition: an opinion formed after carefully studying all of the information.

definition: "Judicious."
simplified_definition: having to do with judges, law courts, or their activities.

definition: "A vessel  usually of coarse earthenware with a swelling belly and narrow mouth and having a handle on one side."
simplified_definition: a container for holding liquids. A jug usually has a handle and a narrow spout or opening.

definition: "One of the names under which Vishnu  in his incarnation as Krishna is worshiped by the Hindoos."
simplified_definition: any large, powerful force, group, or object that can overcome or crush anything around it.

definition: "To play tricks by sleight of hand; to cause amusement and sport by tricks of skill; to conjure."
simplified_definition: to keep in motion in the air while tossing and catching.

definition: "To moisten; to wet."
simplified_definition: the natural liquid from plants or meats. The liquid from fruits is used for drinking.

definition: "A bounding with juice; succulent."
simplified_definition: having a great amount of juice.

definition: "The seventh month of the year  containing thirtyone days."
simplified_definition: the seventh month of the year. July has thirtyone days.

definition: "A confused mixture; a mass or collection without order; as  a jumble of words."
simplified_definition: to put or throw together in a confused pile.

definition: "A bodice worn instead of stays by women in the th century."
simplified_definition: to leap into the air.

definition: "A fur garment worn in Arctic journeys."
simplified_definition: a dress without sleeves worn over a shirt or blouse.

definition: "The act of joining  or the state of being joined; union; combination; coalition; as the junction of two armies or detachments; the junction of paths."
simplified_definition: a point or place where things are joined together.

definition: "One of the early discovered asteroids."
simplified_definition: the sixth month of the year. June has thirty days. Summer begins in June for people who live north of the equator.

definition: "A dense growth of brushwood  grasses reeds vines etc.; an almost impenetrable thicket of trees canes and reedy vegetation as in India Africa Australia and Brazil."
simplified_definition: land covered with many trees, vines, and bushes; a tropical rain forest.

definition: "Composed of juniors  whether younger or a lower standing; as the junior class; of or pertaining to juniors or to a junior class. See Junior n. ."
simplified_definition: younger

definition: "Any evergreen shrub or tree  of the genus Juniperus and order Coniferae."
simplified_definition: an evergreen shrub or small tree with cones that produce berries.

definition: "Pieces of old cable or old cordage  used for making gaskets mats swabs etc. and when picked to pieces forming oakum for filling the seams of ships."
simplified_definition: a boat found in China with a high stern and flat bottom, driven by square sails.

definition: "The supreme deity  king of gods and men and reputed to be the son of Saturn and Rhea; Jove. He corresponds to the Greek Zeus."
simplified_definition: the ruler of the gods in Roman mythology. Jupiter controlled the weather and protected the government and its laws. In Greek mythology, Jupiter is called Zeus.

definition: "A member of any jury for awarding prizes  etc."
simplified_definition: a person who is a member of a jury.

definition: "For temporary use;  applied to a temporary contrivance."
simplified_definition: a group of people called to a court of law who listen to the facts of a case and decide its outcome.

definition: "Not transgressing the requirement of truth and propriety; conformed to the truth of things  to reason or to a proper standard; exact; normal; reasonable; regular; due; as a just statement; a just inference."
simplified_definition: fair and honest.

definition: "To administer justice to."
simplified_definition: the upholding of what is fair, just, and right.

definition: "To pronounce free from guilt or blame; to declare or prove to have done that which is just  right proper etc.; to absolve; to exonerate; to clear."
simplified_definition: to show to be true or right; prove.

definition: "To shoot out or forward; to project beyond the main body; as  the jutting part of a building."
simplified_definition: to project or stick out sharply .

definition: "The coarse  strong fiber of the East Indian Corchorus olitorius and C. capsularis; also the plant itself. The fiber is much used for making mats gunny cloth cordage hangings paper etc."
simplified_definition: a thick, strong fiber taken from a plant and used to make rope and rough cloth.

definition: "Young; youthful; as  a juvenile appearance."
simplified_definition: young; not grown up.

definition: "the eleventh letter of the English alphabet  is nonvocal consonant. The form and sound of the letter K are from the Latin which used the letter but little except in the early period of the language. It came into the Latin from the Greek which received it from a Phoenician source the ultimate origin probably being Egyptian. Etymologically K is most nearly related to c g h ."
simplified_definition: symbol of the chemical element potassium.

definition: "An instrument invented by Sir David Brewster  which contains loose fragments of colored glass etc. and reflecting surfaces so arranged that changes of position exhibit its contents in an endless variety of beautiful colors and symmetrical forms. It has been much employed in arts of design."
simplified_definition: a tube with small bits of colored glass and mirrors inside. The tube is held to the eye and turned to see changing forms.

definition: "Any one of numerous species of jumping marsupials of the family Macropodidae. They inhabit Australia  New Guinea and adjacent islands They have long and strong hind legs and a large tail while the fore legs are comparatively short and feeble. The giant kangaroo  is the largest species sometimes becoming twelve or fourteen feet in total length. The tree kangaroos belonging to the genus Dendrolagus live in trees; the rock kangaroos of the genus Petrogale inhabit rocky situations; and the brush kangaroos of the genus Halmaturus inhabit wooded districts. See Wallaby."
simplified_definition: a mammal with long pointed ears, short front legs, and big, powerful back legs. Kangaroos use their large tails for balance when hopping. Kangaroos are marsupials that live in Australia and New Guinea. The females have a pouch in their belly, where they carry their baby for a few months after it is born. Some kinds of kangaroos are as small as rabbits; other kinds are as large as grown humans.

definition: "A tribe of Indians allied to the Winnebagoes and Osages. They formerly inhabited the region which is now the State of Kansas  but were removed to the Indian Territory."
simplified_definition: a state in the midwestern United States. Its capital is Topeka.

definition: "A large  green arboreal orthopterous insect  of the family Locustidae common in the United States. The males have stridulating organs at the bases of the front wings. During the summer and autumn in the evening the males make a peculiar loud shrill sound resembling the combination Katydid whence the name."
simplified_definition: a large, green insect that is related to the grasshopper. Katydids live in trees and are often heard calling on summer nights. The male makes a noise that sounds like "katydid" by rubbing its wings together.

definition: "A light canoe  made of skins stretched over a frame and usually capable of carrying but one person who sits amidships and uses a doublebladed paddle. It is peculiar to the Eskimos and other Arctic tribes."
simplified_definition: a boat, used by the Inuit people, that is slim with a light frame and is pointed at both ends. Kayaks are covered with a waterproof skin that may be pulled tight around the waist of the person inside.

definition: "To traverse with a keel; to navigate."
simplified_definition: a long piece of wood or metal that runs down the length of the bottom of a boat or ship. The keel makes a boat or ship stable in the water.

definition: "To sharpen; to make cold."
simplified_definition: very sharp; able to cut easily into thin, exact pieces.

definition: "To hold; to restrain from departure or removal; not to let go of; to retain in one's power or possession; not to lose; to retain; to detain."
simplified_definition: to hold or continue to hold.

definition: "Harmony or correspondence between the different parts of a work of art; as  the foreground of this painting is not in keeping."
simplified_definition: harmony or agreement.

definition: "A small cask or barrel."
simplified_definition: a small barrel holding less than ten gallons.

definition: "The calcined ashes of seaweed   formerly much used in the manufacture of glass now used in the manufacture of iodine."
simplified_definition: a coarse brown seaweed.

definition: "The water course of a street; a little canal or channel; a gutter; also  a puddle."
simplified_definition: a place where dogs are raised and trained, or cared for while their owners are away.

definition: "One of the United States."
simplified_definition: a state in the east central United States. Its capital is Frankfort.

definition: "of Keep."
simplified_definition: past tense and past participle of "keep."

definition: "A lady who wears a kerchief."
simplified_definition: a square cloth that is tied over the head or around the neck.

definition: "To harden or ripen into kernels; to produce kernels."
simplified_definition: the seed inside a nut or a fruit pit.

definition: "An oil used for illuminating purposes  formerly obtained from the distillation of mineral wax bituminous shale etc. and hence called also coal oil. It is now produced in immense quantities chiefly by the distillation and purification of petroleum. It consists chiefly of several hydrocarbons of the methane series."
simplified_definition: a thin liquid fuel. Kerosene is usually made from petroleum, but can also be made from oil, coal shale, or tar.

definition: "A sauce. See Catchup."
simplified_definition: a thick red sauce for meat or potatoes made with tomatoes and spices.

definition: "A metallic vessel  with a wide mouth often without a cover used for heating and boiling water or other liguids."
simplified_definition: a wide, deep pot used for boiling liquids, such as water or soup.

definition: "A drum made of thin copper in the form of a hemispherical kettle  with parchment stretched over the mouth of it."
simplified_definition: a large, deep drum that is shaped like a bowl and played with soft mallets.

definition: "To fasten or secure firmly; to fasten or tighten with keys or wedges."
simplified_definition: a metal object cut in a special way to open or close locks.

definition: "The whole arrangement  or one range of the keys of an organ typewriter etc."
simplified_definition: a row or rows of keys. Pianos, typewriters, and computers have keyboards.

definition: "a mortise for a key or cotter."
simplified_definition: a hole in a lock into which a key is put to lock and unlock it.

definition: "The central or topmost stone of an arch. This in some styles is made different in size from the other voussoirs  or projects or is decorated with carving. See Illust. of Arch."
simplified_definition: the central stone at the top of an arch.

definition: "To recoil;  said of a musket  cannon etc."
simplified_definition: to strike with the foot.

definition: "See Kiddy  v. t."
simplified_definition: a young goat.

definition: "To take  by force or fear  and against one's will with intent to carry to another place."
simplified_definition: to take by force and hold against a person's will in order to get money or some other valuable thing.

definition: "A glandular organ which excretes urea and other waste products from the animal body; a urinary gland."
simplified_definition: one of a pair of organs in the body which remove water and waste products from the blood. The waste products go from the kidneys to the bladder in the form of urine. The kidneys are found high in the abdomen near the spine.

definition: "To deprive of life  animal or vegetable in any manner or by any means; to render inanimate; to put to death; to slay."
simplified_definition: to cause to die.

definition: "A small American plover ."
simplified_definition: a bird that is a kind of plover, with two black bands on a white breast. Killdeers are native to inland waters and fields of North America and have a loud, shrill cry that sounds like their name.

definition: "Literally  that kills; having power to kill; fatal; in a colloquial sense conquering; captivating; irresistible."
simplified_definition: the act of putting to death.

definition: "A furnace for burning bricks; a brickkiln."
simplified_definition: an oven for burning, baking, and drying. A kiln is used to make pottery and bricks or to dry wood.

definition: "An abbreviation of Kilogram."
simplified_definition: see "kilogram."

definition: "Alt. of Kilogramme"
simplified_definition: a unit of weight equal to one thousand grams or . pounds.

definition: "Alt. of Kilometre"
simplified_definition: a unit of length equal to one thousand meters or . mile.

definition: "A measure of length  being a thousand meters. It is equal to  . feet or  of a mile."
simplified_definition: a spelling of "kilometer" used in Canada and Britain. See "kilometer."

definition: "One thousand watts."
simplified_definition: a unit of electrical power equal to one thousand watts.

definition: "p. p. from Kill."
simplified_definition: a plaid wool skirt that has pleats. Kilts are worn by men in Scotland.

definition: "A diminutive suffix; as  manikin; lambkin."
simplified_definition: the members of an extended family together; relatives.

definition: "Nature; style; character; sort; fashion; manner; variety; description; class; as  there are several kinds of eloquence of style and of music; many kinds of government; various kinds of soil etc."
simplified_definition: a group of things, people, or animals that are thought of together because of like characteristics.

definition: "A school for young children  conducted on the theory that education should be begun by gratifying and cultivating the normal aptitude for exercise play observation imitation and construction;  a name given by Friedrich Froebel a German educator who introduced this method of training in rooms opening on a garden."
simplified_definition: a program for very young children. Kindergarten teaches some of the activities that are done in school.

definition: "To bring forth young."
simplified_definition: to build or start .

definition: "of Kindle"
simplified_definition: dry material that burns easily and is used to start a fire.

definition: "According to the kind or nature; natural."
simplified_definition: showing or having kindness.

definition: "The state or quality of being kind  in any of its various senses; manifestation of kind feeling or disposition beneficence."
simplified_definition: the quality of being kind.

definition: "The title of two historical books in the Old Testament."
simplified_definition: a male head of a royal family who rules a country for life.

definition: "The rank  quality state or attributes of a king; royal authority; sovereign power; rule; dominion; monarchy."
simplified_definition: a country that is ruled by a king or queen.

definition: "Any one of numerous species of birds constituting the family Alcedinidae. Most of them feed upon fishes which they capture by diving and seizing then with the beak; others feed only upon reptiles  insects etc. About one hundred and fifty species are known. They are found in nearly all parts of the world but are particularly abundant in the East Indies."
simplified_definition: a bird with a large head, strong beak, and bright markings. Kingfishers often have a crest on their head. They live near water and eat fish or insects.

definition: "A fit of coughing; also  a convulsive fit of laughter."
simplified_definition: a tight curl or twist.

definition: "To salute with the lips  as a mark of affection reverence submission forgiveness etc."
simplified_definition: to touch or press with the lips as a sign of love, friendship, passion, or respect.

definition: "To cut."
simplified_definition: a collection of items for a particular use.

definition: "A cookroom; the room of a house appropriated to cookery."
simplified_definition: a room where food is stored and cooked.

definition: "Any raptorial bird of the subfamily Milvinae  of which many species are known. They have long wings adapted for soaring and usually a forked tail."
simplified_definition: a light frame covered with paper, plastic, or cloth that is flown in the air at the end of a long string. Some kites are very plain, and some have a lot of color and decoration.

definition: "A young cat."
simplified_definition: a very young cat.

definition: "To speak affectedly."
simplified_definition: a natural talent for something.

definition: "A case of canvas or leather  for carrying on the back a soldier's necessaries or the clothing etc. of a traveler."
simplified_definition: a bag worn on the back to carry things. A knapsack is often made of leather, canvas, or nylon.

definition: "To work and press into a mass  usually with the hands; esp. to work as by repeated pressure with the knuckles into a well mixed mass as the materials of bread cake etc.; as to knead dough."
simplified_definition: to mix by pressing, folding, and pulling.

definition: "To supplicate by kneeling."
simplified_definition: the joint between the upper and lower parts of a human leg.

definition: "The kneepan."
simplified_definition: the flat, round bone in front of the knee.

definition: "To bend the knee; to fall or rest on the knees;  sometimes with down."
simplified_definition: to rest on the knee or knees.

definition: "of Kneel."
simplified_definition: past tense and past participle of "kneel."

definition: "of Know"
simplified_definition: past tense of "know."

definition: "A trifle or toy; a bawble; a gewgaw."
simplified_definition: a small object used to decorate.

definition: "To cut or stab with a knife."
simplified_definition: a tool with a handle and a thin, sharp blade, used for cutting.

definition: "One on whom knighthood  a dignity next below that of baronet is conferred by the sovereign entitling him to be addressed as Sir; as Sir John."
simplified_definition: a soldier on horseback in the Middle Ages. A knight had to serve as an apprentice and follow many rules.

definition: "The whole body of knights."
simplified_definition: the position held by a knight.

definition: "To draw together; to contract into wrinkles."
simplified_definition: to join together loops of yarn by hand with long needles or by machine, in order to make various items such as sweaters, blankets, and shawls.

definition: "of Knife"
simplified_definition: plural of "knife."

definition: "A hard protuberance; a hard swelling or rising; a bunch; a lump; as  a knob in the flesh or on a bone."
simplified_definition: a rounded piece on a door or drawer; a switch on a machine.

definition: "To drive or be driven against something; to strike against something; to clash; as  one heavy body knocks against another."
simplified_definition: to rap, pound, or hit something, such as a door.

definition: "One who  or that which knocks; specifically an instrument or kind of hammer fastened to a door to be used in seeking for admittance."
simplified_definition: a metal piece with a hinge that is attached to the outside of a door. A knocker is used to call for those inside.

definition: "A little round hill; a mound; a small elevation of earth; the top or crown of a hill."
simplified_definition: a small rounded rise of land; hill.

definition: "A fastening together of the pars or ends of one or more threads  cords ropes etc. by any one of various ways of tying or entangling."
simplified_definition: a tying together of material such as rope, string, or yarn that is used to fasten.

definition: "Hard; rugged; as  a knotty head."
simplified_definition: having knots.

definition: "To be assured; to feel confident."
simplified_definition: to perceive directly or have some information about something in your mind.

definition: "Scope of information; cognizance; notice; as  it has not come to my knowledge."
simplified_definition: understanding; awareness.

definition: "of Know."
simplified_definition: past participle of "know."

definition: "To beat with the knuckles; to pommel."
simplified_definition: a joint of a finger.

definition: "A tailless marsupial   found in Australia. The female carries her young on the back of her neck. Called also Australian bear native bear and native sloth."
simplified_definition: a mammal with gray fur, round ears, and a short black nose. Koalas are marsupials and live in trees. The female has a pouch in her belly where she carries her baby. Koalas are only found in Australia. They are sometimes called "koala bears," but they are not related to true bears.

definition: "The Scriptures of the Mohammedans  containing the professed revelations to Mohammed;  called also Alcoran."
simplified_definition: the sacred book of Islam that is the basis of Muslim religion. Muslims believe that Allah gave the words of the Koran to the prophet Muhammad. The Koran is written in Arabic.

definition: "The citadel of a town or city; especially  the citadel of Moscow a large inclosure which contains imperial palaces cathedrals churches an arsenal etc."
simplified_definition: the historic wall with towers that circles around the government offices of Moscow, the capital city of Russia. Inside the wall are also palaces, cathedrals, and churches.

definition: "Kine."
simplified_definition: abbreviation of "Kentucky."

definition: "An extension at right angles to the length of a main building  giving to the ground plan a form resembling the letter L; sometimes less properly applied to a narrower or lower extension in the direction of the length of the main building; a wing."
simplified_definition: the twelfth letter of the English alphabet.

definition: "A syllable applied to the sixth tone of the scale in music in solmization."
simplified_definition: the syllable that indicates the sixth tone of a musical scale.

definition: "To prate; to gossip; to babble; to blab."
simplified_definition: a short form of "laboratory."

definition: "A slip of ribbon  parchment etc. attached to a document to hold the appended seal; also the seal."
simplified_definition: a piece of paper or cloth that is attached to an object. A label gives information about what the object contains, how to use it, or who owns it.

definition: "To be oppressed with difficulties or disease; to do one's work under conditions which make it especially hard  wearisome; to move slowly as against opposition or under a burden; to be burdened;  often with under and formerly with of."
simplified_definition: hard work or effort.

definition: "The workroom of a chemist; also  a place devoted to experiments in any branch of natural science; as a chemical physical or biological laboratory. Hence by extension a place where something is prepared or some operation is performed; as the liver is the laboratory of the bile."
simplified_definition: a place used for scientific investigation and experiments.

definition: "A region of British America on the Atlantic coast  north of Newfoundland."
simplified_definition: a very large peninsula in eastern Canada that contains portions of the province of Quebec and the province of Newfoundland  Labrador.

definition: "That which binds or holds  especially by being interwoven; a string cord or band usually one passing through eyelet or other holes and used in drawing and holding together parts of a garment of a shoe of a machine belt etc."
simplified_definition: a fabric made of fine threads that has holes in it as part of the design.

definition: "Exclamation of regret or surprise."
simplified_definition: the condition of being without.

definition: "To cover with lacquer."
simplified_definition: a liquid used on wood or metal to protect and make it shiny.

definition: "A game of ball  originating among the North American Indians now the popular field sport of Canada and played also in England and the United States. Each player carries a longhandled racket called a """"crosse"""". The ball is not handled but caught with the crosse and carried on it or tossed from it the object being to carry it or throw it through one of the goals placed at opposite ends of the field."
simplified_definition: a game played on a field. The players use sticks with a net on one end to carry the ball and throw it into the other team's goal.

definition: "p. p. of Lead  to guide."
simplified_definition: a boy or young man.

definition: "A frame usually portable  of wood metal or rope for ascent and descent consisting of two side pieces to which are fastened cross strips or rounds forming steps."
simplified_definition: a pair of side pieces joined with horizontal bars called rungs, used for climbing.

definition: "Loaded; freighted; burdened; as  a laden vessel; a laden heart."
simplified_definition: filled with a great weight.

definition: "To take up and convey in a ladle; to dip with  or as with a ladle; as to ladle out soup; to ladle oatmeal into a kettle."
simplified_definition: a spoon with a long handle and a deep bowl used for serving liquids such as soup or punch.

definition: "A woman of social distinction or position. In England  a title prefixed to the name of any woman whose husband is not of lower rank than a baron or whose father was a nobleman not lower than an earl. The wife of a baronet or knight has the title of Lady by courtesy but not by right."
simplified_definition: a polite word for a woman or girl.

definition: "Any one of numerous species of small beetles of the genus Coccinella and allied genera ;  called also ladybug  ladyclock lady cow lady fly and lady beetle. Coccinella seplempunctata in one of the common European species. See Coccinella."
simplified_definition: the British word for a small, round beetle that is red or orange with black spots. "Ladybird" has the same meaning as "ladybug."

definition: "Same as Ladybird."
simplified_definition: a small, round beetle that is red or orange with black spots. Ladybugs eat aphids and other insects that are harmful to plants.

definition: "Coming tardily after or behind; slow; tardy."
simplified_definition: to fall behind an expected pace.

definition: "A shallow sound  channel pond or lake especially one into which the sea flows; as the lagoons of Venice."
simplified_definition: a shallow body of salt water by the sea. A lagoon is separated from the sea by sandbars, coral reefs, or islands.

definition: "of Lay."
simplified_definition: past tense and past participle of "lay."

definition: "of Lie"
simplified_definition: past participle of "lie."

definition: "A burying place."
simplified_definition: a wild animal's shelter; den.

definition: "A pigment formed by combining some coloring matter  usually by precipitation with a metallic oxide or earth esp. with aluminium hydrate; as madder lake; Florentine lake; yellow lake etc."
simplified_definition: a large body of fresh or salt water that is surrounded on all sides by land.

definition: "A simple  unsophisticated person; in the cant of the Stock Exchange one who ignorantly speculates and is victimized."
simplified_definition: a young sheep.

definition: "Hence  hobbling; limping; inefficient; imperfect."
simplified_definition: not able to walk well; disabled.

definition: "Figuratively  anything which enlightens intellectually or morally; anything regarded metaphorically a performing the uses of a lamp."
simplified_definition: a device that gives off light.

definition: "A weapon of war  consisting of a long shaft or handle and a steel blade or head; a spear carried by horsemen and often decorated with a small flag; also a spear or harpoon used by whalers and fishermen."
simplified_definition: a weapon with a long pole and pointed metal head.

definition: "The ground or floor."
simplified_definition: the solid part of the earth's surface.

definition: "Of  pertaining to or used for setting bringing or going on shore."
simplified_definition: the act of one that lands.

definition: "A woman having real estate which she leases to a tenant or tenants."
simplified_definition: a woman who rents property to others.

definition: "Inclosed  or nearly inclosed by land."
simplified_definition: without any access to the sea.

definition: "The lord of a manor  or of land; the owner of land or houses which he leases to a tenant or tenants."
simplified_definition: a man or woman who rents property to others.

definition: "A mark to designate the boundary of land; any   mark or fixed object  by which the limits of a farm a town or other portion of territory may be known and preserved."
simplified_definition: a point in a landscape that is used as a reference or marks a boundary.

definition: "A portion of land or territory which the eye can comprehend in a single view  including all the objects it contains."
simplified_definition: the area that can be seen from one point; view.

definition: "The slipping down of a mass of land from a mountain  hill etc."
simplified_definition: the falling of earth down a steep slope.

definition: "Alone."
simplified_definition: a narrow passage, as between hedges, walls, or buildings.

definition: "The vocabulary and phraseology belonging to an art or department of knowledge; as  medical language; the language of chemistry or theology."
simplified_definition: the system of spoken or written words with which people communicate thoughts, ideas, or feelings.

definition: "Somewhat lank."
simplified_definition: tall, thin, and awkward.

definition: "An open structure of light material set upon a roof  to give light and air to the interior."
simplified_definition: a case or container that is made of a material through which a light can shine and be protected.

definition: "The act of lapping with  or as with the tongue; as to take anything into the mouth with a lap."
simplified_definition: the front of the human body, from the waist to the knees, in a sitting position. The part of clothing that covers this part of the body is also called the lap.

definition: "That part of a garment which is turned back; specifically  the lap or fold of the front of a coat in continuation of collar."
simplified_definition: a front part of a coat or jacket that goes down the chest from the collar and is folded back.

definition: "To surprise in a fault or error; hence  to surprise or catch as an offender."
simplified_definition: a slight failure to meet some accepted standard.

definition: "A genus of coniferous trees  having deciduous leaves in fascicles ."
simplified_definition: A kind of tree that has cones and looks like an evergreen but has needles that turn yellow and are shed in the fall.

definition: "The fat of swine  esp. the internal fat of the abdomen; also this fat melted and strained."
simplified_definition: the fat of pigs that has been melted down, used in cooking.

definition: "A room or place where meat and other articles of food are kept before they are cooked."
simplified_definition: a place or room for keeping or storing food, or the supply of food stored there.

definition: "A musical note  formerly in use equal to two longs four breves or eight semibreves."
simplified_definition: of a size, or amount bigger than normal or average; not small.

definition: "In a large manner."
simplified_definition: in large part; mostly; mainly.

definition: "A long  slender rope made of hemp or strips of hide esp. one with a noose;  used as a lasso for catching cattle horses etc. and for picketing a horse so that he can graze without wandering."
simplified_definition: a long rope with a sliding loop at one end. It is used to catch running animals such as cattle or horses.

definition: "To catch larks; as  to go larking."
simplified_definition: a songbird with a long hind claw and a musical song. There are many kinds of larks.

definition: "A genus of ranunculaceous plants   having showy flowers and a spurred calyx. They are natives of the North Temperate zone. The commonest larkspur of the gardens is D. Consolida. The flower of the bee larkspur  has two petals bearded with yellow hairs and looks not unlike a bee."
simplified_definition: a plant with bright blue, pink, or white flowers on a tall stalk. The flowers have a long projection called a spur.

definition: "Any young insect from the time that it hatches from the egg until it becomes a pupa  or chrysalis. During this time it usually molts several times and may change its form or color each time. The larvae of many insects are much like the adults in form and habits but have no trace of wings the rudimentary wings appearing only in the pupa stage. In other groups of insects the larvae are totally unlike the parents in structure and habits and are called caterpillars grubs maggots etc."
simplified_definition: an insect after it hatches from an egg and before it changes into its adult form. Larvae do not have wings and look like worms. Most kinds of insects spend part of their lives as larvae. Caterpillars are a type of larva.

definition: "Inflammation of the larynx."
simplified_definition: an inflammation of the part of the throat called the larynx. A person with laryngitis might not be able to speak louder than a whisper.

definition: "The expanded upper end of the windpipe or trachea  connected with the hyoid bone or cartilage. It contains the vocal cords which produce the voice by their vibrations when they are stretched and a current of air passes between them. The larynx is connected with the pharynx by an opening the glottis which in mammals is protected by a lidlike epiglottis."
simplified_definition: the structure at the top of the windpipe that contains the vocal cords, which produce the human voice; voice box.

definition: "To strike forcibly and quickly  as with a lash; to beat or beat upon with a motion like that of a lash; as a whale lashes the sea with his tail."
simplified_definition: a whip or the striking part of a whip.

definition: "A youth woman; a girl; a sweetheart."
simplified_definition: a girl or young woman.

definition: "A rope or long thong of leather with  a running noose used for catching horses cattle etc."
simplified_definition: a long rope with a sliding loop on one end; lariat. It is used to catch running animals such as cattle or horses.

definition: "The burden of a ship; a cargo."
simplified_definition: coming after or finishing behind all others.

definition: "In a lasting manner."
simplified_definition: continuing for a long time, not ending.

definition: "A latching."
simplified_definition: a device that fastens or locks with a bar or bolt that goes into a notch or hole. Latches fasten doors, windows, and gates.

definition: "Coming after the time when due  or after the usual or proper time; not early; slow; tardy; long delayed; as a late spring."
simplified_definition: happening after the usual or expected time.

definition: "Not long ago; recently; as  he has lately arrived from Italy."
simplified_definition: of late; recently.

definition: "A brick or tile."
simplified_definition: at some future or following time.

definition: "Directed to the side; as  a lateral view of a thing."
simplified_definition: about, from, or toward a side or sides; sideways.

definition: "A granary; a barn."
simplified_definition: a machine for shaping a piece of wood, metal, or other hard material. The lathe holds and spins the material while another cutting tool is held against it.

definition: "Foam or froth made by soap moistened with water."
simplified_definition: foam made by soap or detergent mixed in water.

definition: "Of or pertaining to Latium  or to the Latins a people of Latium; Roman; as the Latin language."
simplified_definition: the language of ancient Rome. The Romance languages are derived from Latin.

definition: "Extent from side to side  or distance sidewise from a given point or line; breadth; width."
simplified_definition: the distance between the equator and a point north or south on the earth's surface. This distance is measured in degrees.

definition: "Recent; modern."
simplified_definition: the second of two things mentioned.

definition: "To make a lattice of; as  to lattice timbers."
simplified_definition: a flat framework made with strips of wood or other material. The strips cross each other and have open spaces in between. A lattice is often used as a screen on a porch or in a garden.

definition: "To show mirth  satisfaction or derision by peculiar movement of the muscles of the face particularly of the mouth causing a lighting up of the face and eyes and usually accompanied by the emission of explosive or chuckling sounds from the chest and throat; to indulge in laughter."
simplified_definition: to express happiness, amusement, ridicule, or other feelings, by making sounds with the mouth and changing the face to an expression like a smile.

definition: "Fitted to excite laughter; as  a laughable story; a laughable scene."
simplified_definition: causing laughter or ridicule.

definition: "A movement  of the muscles of the face  particularly of the lips with a peculiar expression of the eyes indicating merriment satisfaction or derision and usually attended by a sonorous and interrupted expulsion of air from the lungs. See Laugh v. i."
simplified_definition: the act or sound of laughing.

definition: "The movement of a vessel from land into the water; especially  the sliding on ways from the stocks on which it is built."
simplified_definition: a large open boat with a motor for power.

definition: "A washerwoman."
simplified_definition: to wash, or wash and iron.

definition: "A place or room where laundering is done."
simplified_definition: clothing, sheets, and other things that are cleaned by washing or that are washed and ironed.

definition: "An evergreen shrub  of the genus Laurus  having aromatic leaves of a lanceolate shape with clusters of small yellowish white flowers in their axils;  called also sweet bay."
simplified_definition: an evergreen tree or shrub that has large, shiny leaves and yellow flowers.

definition: "The melted rock ejected by a volcano from its top or fissured sides. It flows out in streams sometimes miles in length. It also issues from fissures in the earth's surface  and forms beds covering many square miles as in the Northwestern United States."
simplified_definition: hot, melted rock that erupts from a volcano.

definition: "Washing  or cleansing by washing."
simplified_definition: a room with sinks and toilets.

definition: "An aromatic plant of the genus Lavandula   common in the south of Europe. It yields and oil used in medicine and perfumery. The Spike lavender  yields a coarser oil  used in the arts."
simplified_definition: a plant of the mint family with pale purple flowers.

definition: "The lark."
simplified_definition: a primarily Scottish word for "lark," a kind of songbird with a long hind claw and a musical song.

definition: "Expending or bestowing profusely; profuse; prodigal; as  lavish of money; lavish of praise."
simplified_definition: generous in using or spending.

definition: "The Jewish or Mosaic code  and that part of Scripture where it is written in distinction from the gospel; hence also the Old Testament."
simplified_definition: the set of rules that people in a society must follow.

definition: "Constituted or authorized by law; rightful; as  the lawful owner of lands."
simplified_definition: allowed by law; legal.

definition: "A legislator; a lawgiver."
simplified_definition: one who makes or approves laws; legislator.

definition: "Ground  covered with grass kept closely mown."
simplified_definition: an area of ground planted with grass and usually mown short.

definition: "An action at law; a suit in equity or admiralty; any legal proceeding before a court for the enforcement of a claim."
simplified_definition: a case brought before a court of law, especially when a person or group has a strong complaint against another.

definition: "One versed in the laws  or a practitioner of law; one whose profession is to conduct lawsuits for clients or to advise as to prosecution or defence of lawsuits or as to legal rights and obligations in other matters. It is a general term comprehending attorneys counselors solicitors barristers sergeants and advocates."
simplified_definition: one whose job is to help people with legal matters and represent them in court; attorney.

definition: "A plan; a scheme."
simplified_definition: to place, put, or spread  over a surface.

definition: "One who  or that which lays."
simplified_definition: a thickness of something that is spread over a surface.

definition: "Wicked; vicious."
simplified_definition: not willing to give much effort or to work.

definition: "The act of leading or conducting; guidance; direction; as  to take the lead; to be under the lead of another."
simplified_definition: a heavy, soft gray metal that is one of the chemical elements. Because it is very heavy and dense, lead is useful for making things such as weights, shot, and shields that protect against radiation.

definition: "One who  or that which leads or conducts; a guide; a conductor."
simplified_definition: one that leads or guides.

definition: "The office of a leader."
simplified_definition: ability or skill as a leader.

definition: "To shoot out leaves; to produce leaves; to leave; as  the trees leaf in May."
simplified_definition: one of the usually green, flat parts of a plant or tree that grows from the stem or branch.

definition: "A little leaf; also  a little printed leaf or a tract."
simplified_definition: a printed piece of paper that is usually given to people free of charge. It contains information or advertisements and is often folded.

definition: "An alliance or combination of two or more nations  parties or persons for the accomplishment of a purpose which requires a continued course of action as for mutual defense or for furtherance of commercial religious or political interests etc."
simplified_definition: a number of countries, groups, or people joined together for a common cause.

definition: "To enter or escape  as a fluid through a hole crevice etc. ; to pass gradually into or out of something;  usually with in or out."
simplified_definition: an opening or crack that lets something pass out or in by accident.

definition: "Permitting water or other fluid to leak in or out; as  a leaky roof or cask."
simplified_definition: letting gas, water, or odors escape.

definition: "Wanting fullness  richness sufficiency or productiveness; deficient in quality or contents; slender; scant; barren; bare; mean;  used literally and figuratively; as the lean harvest; a lean purse; a lean discourse; lean wages."
simplified_definition: to bend or slant.

definition: "Having only one slope or pitch;  said of a roof."
simplified_definition: a shelter that has one side that slopes up and serves as both a wall and a roof. The sloping side is supported by something like logs or posts. A leanto is often open on the other ends or sides.

definition: "A passing from one note to another by an interval  especially by a long one or by one including several other and intermediate intervals."
simplified_definition: to spring into the air, moving straight up or to another position.

definition: "Bissextile; a year containing  days; every fourth year which leaps over a day more than a common year  giving to February twentynine days. See Bissextile."
simplified_definition: a year that has  days, which happens every four years. The extra day is February .

definition: "A play among boys  in which one stoops down and another leaps over him by placing his hands on the shoulders of the former."
simplified_definition: a game in which one player bends over while the other players take turns jumping over.

definition: "of Leap"
simplified_definition: a past tense and past participle of "leap."

definition: "To acquire knowledge or skill; to make progress in acquiring knowledge or skill; to receive information or instruction; as  this child learns quickly."
simplified_definition: to get to know or gain knowledge of through study or experience.

definition: "of Learn"
simplified_definition: having or showing knowledge or learning.

definition: "The knowledge or skill received by instruction or study; acquired knowledge or ideas in any branch of science or literature; erudition; literature; science; as  he is a man of great learning."
simplified_definition: knowledge gained through careful study or experience.

definition: "of Learn"
simplified_definition: a past tense and a past participle of "learn."

definition: "To gather what harvesters have left behind; to glean."
simplified_definition: an agreement for living in or using another person's property in exchange for money or something else of value.

definition: "A string with a loop at the end for lifting warp threads  in a loom."
simplified_definition: a length of leather, chain, or rope attached to the collar of an animal to keep it under control.

definition: "In the smallest or lowest degree; in a degree below all others; as  to reward those who least deserve it."
simplified_definition: superlative of "little."

definition: "The skin of an animal  or some part of such skin tanned tawed or otherwise dressed for use; also dressed hides collectively."
simplified_definition: material made from the skin of an animal by removing the hair and tanning. Leather is used for making shoes, jackets, luggage, and many other things.

definition: "To let remain unremoved or undone; to let stay or continue  in distinction from what is removed or changed."
simplified_definition: to go away from or depart.

definition: "of Leaf"
simplified_definition: plural of "leaf."

definition: "The act of reading; as  the lecture of Holy Scripture."
simplified_definition: a talk given in front of an audience.

definition: "of Lead."
simplified_definition: past tense and past participle of "lead."

definition: "A shelf on which articles may be laid; also  that which resembles such a shelf in form or use as a projecting ridge or part or a molding or edge in joinery."
simplified_definition: a narrow part like a shelf that comes out of a wall.

definition: "To lie; to speak falsely."
simplified_definition: the side that faces away from the wind.

definition: "To treat as a surgeon; to doctor; as  to leech wounds."
simplified_definition: a kind of worm that lives in water or mud and sucks blood from animals. Leeches were once used in medicine to draw blood from people. Leaches are still sometimes used to prevent blood from clotting when reattaching fingers and toes that have been cut off.

definition: "A plant of the genus Allium   having broadly linear succulent leaves rising from a loose oblong cylindrical bulb. The flavor is stronger than that of the common onion."
simplified_definition: a plant related to the onion. It has wide, green leaves and a long white bulb.

definition: "of Leave"
simplified_definition: of, located on, or pertaining to the side of the human body where the heart is located or to the side of any other thing in the same position with respect to its other side; opposite of right.

definition: "Situated on the left; nearer the left hand than the right; as  the lefthand side; the lefthand road."
simplified_definition: on or toward the left.

definition: "Having the left hand or arm stronger and more dexterous than the right; using the left hand and arm with more dexterity than the right."
simplified_definition: using the left hand more easily than the right.

definition: "To run."
simplified_definition: one of the body parts of an animal or human that is used for standing and walking.

definition: "A gift of property by will  esp. of money or personal property; a bequest. Also Fig.; as a legacy of dishonor or disease."
simplified_definition: money, property, or other goods left to someone in a will.

definition: "Created by  permitted by in conformity with or relating to law; as a legal obligation; a legal standard or test; a legal procedure; a legal claim; a legal trade; anything is legal which the laws do not forbid."
simplified_definition: of or having to do with law.

definition: "In a legal manner."
simplified_definition: in a way that obeys the law.

definition: "To tell or narrate  as a legend."
simplified_definition: a story or group of stories that have been handed down from a time long ago and that many people in a society know but cannot prove to be true or untrue.

definition: "Of or pertaining to a legend or to legends; consisting of legends; like a legend; fabulous."
simplified_definition: having to do with or like a legend.

definition: "a.  vb. n.  from Leg v. t."
simplified_definition: a covering for the lower leg or for the whole leg. Leggings may be made of strong cloth or leather.

definition: "Capable of being discovered or understood by apparent marks or indications; as  the thoughts of men are often legible in their countenances."
simplified_definition: able to be understood or read.

definition: "A body of foot soldiers and cavalry consisting of different numbers at different periods   from about four thousand to about six thousand men  the cavalry being about one tenth."
simplified_definition: an army unit in ancient Rome that was made up of soldiers on foot and on horseback.

definition: "The act of legislating; preparation and enactment of laws; the laws enacted."
simplified_definition: a law made by a body of government.

definition: "Of or pertaining to the making of laws; suitable to legislation; as  the transaction of legislative business; the legislative style."
simplified_definition: having to do with the branch of government that has the power to pass laws.

definition: "A lawgiver; one who makes laws for a state or community; a member of a legislative body."
simplified_definition: someone who makes laws.

definition: "The body of persons in a state or kingdom invested with power to make and repeal laws; a legislative body."
simplified_definition: a group of people within a government that has the power to make or change laws.

definition: "To make legitimate  lawful or valid; esp. to put in the position or state of a legitimate person before the law by legal means; as to legitimate a bastard child."
simplified_definition: allowed by the law or by rules; legal.

definition: "A pod dehiscent into two pieces or valves  and having the seed attached at one suture as that of the pea."
simplified_definition: any of the family of plants that grow their seeds and fruit in pods. Beans and peas are legumes.

definition: "Time at one's command  free from engagement; convenient opportunity; hence convenience; ease."
simplified_definition: freedom from work or other duties that take time and effort; free time.

definition: "Any one of several species of small arctic rodents of the genera Myodes and Cuniculus  resembling the meadow mice in form. They are found in both hemispheres."
simplified_definition: a very small mammal that looks like a mouse with a short tail. Lemmings are rodents that live in the far northern parts of Europe, Asia, and North America. Some kinds of lemmings migrate in groups if their population gets very large. Migrating lemmings may drown in bodies of water.

definition: "The tree which bears lemons; the lemon tree."
simplified_definition: a small citrus fruit with yellow skin and sour juice.

definition: "A beverage consisting of lemon juice mixed with water and sweetened."
simplified_definition: a drink made from lemon juice, sugar, and water.

definition: "One of a family  of nocturnal mammals allied to the monkeys  but of small size and having a sharp and foxlike muzzle and large eyes. They feed upon birds insects and fruit and are mostly natives of Madagascar and the neighboring islands one genus  occurring in Africa. The slow lemur or kukang of the East Indies is Nycticebus tardigradus. See Galago Indris and Colugo."
simplified_definition: a small, furry mammal with large, round eyes and a long tail. They are active mainly at night. Lemurs are found in Madagascar, a large island country near the eastern coast of Africa, and in nearby islands.

definition: "To let for hire or compensation; as  to lend a horse or gig."
simplified_definition: to give with the understanding that what has been given will be returned.

definition: "To lengthen."
simplified_definition: the distance from one end of a thing to the other.

definition: "To extent in length; to make longer in extent or duration; as  to lengthen a line or a road; to lengthen life;  sometimes followed by out."
simplified_definition: to make or become longer.

definition: "In the direction of the length; in a longitudinal direction."
simplified_definition: in the direction of the longer or longest side.

definition: "A lenitive; an emollient."
simplified_definition: not strict with rules; tolerant.

definition: "A piece of glass  or other transparent substance ground with two opposite regular surfaces either both curved or one curved and the other plane and commonly used either singly or combined in optical instruments for changing the direction of rays of light and thus magnifying objects or otherwise modifying vision. In practice the curved surfaces are usually spherical
simplified_definition: a piece of clear material such as glass that bends light rays passing through it. The surface of a lens is curved to bend light rays toward or away from a central point.

definition: "Slow; mild; gentle; as  lenter heats."
simplified_definition: past tense and past participle of "lend."

definition: "A leguminous plant of the genus Ervum   of small size common in the fields in Europe. Also its seed which is used for food on the continent."
simplified_definition: a round, flat seed produced by the lentil plant. It is used as food.

definition: "A large  savage carnivorous mammal . It is of a yellow or fawn color with rings or roselike clusters of black spots along the back and sides. It is found in Southern Asia and Africa. By some the panther  is regarded as a variety of leopard."
simplified_definition: a large mammal with short yellow or gray fur and black spots. Leopards with very dark fur are called black leopards or panthers. They live in southern Asia and Africa but are threatened or endangered in all their habitats. Leopards are carnivores and are closely related to lions, tigers, and other big cats that roar.

definition: "A cutaneous disease which first appears as blebs or as reddish  shining slightly prominent spots with spreading edges. These are often followed by an eruption of dark or yellowish prominent nodules frequently producing great deformity. In one variety of the disease anaesthesia of the skin is a prominent symptom. In addition there may be wasting of the muscles falling out of the hair and nails and distortion of the hands and feet with destruction of the bones and joints. It is incurable and is probably contagious."
simplified_definition: a disease of the skin and nerves caused by infection. People with leprosy have sores on their skin and lose feeling in their bodies. They sometimes lose fingers and toes.

definition: "Smaller; not so large or great; not so much; shorter; inferior; as  a less quantity or number; a horse of less size or value; in less time than before."
simplified_definition: a suffix that means "not having."

definition: "To make less; to reduce; to make smaller  or fewer; to diminish; to lower; to degrade; as to lessen a kingdom or a population; to lessen speed rank fortune."
simplified_definition: to become or make smaller in amount or size.

definition: "Less; smaller; inferior."
simplified_definition: a comparative of "little."

definition: "To teach; to instruct."
simplified_definition: a period of instruction in a particular thing, or something that is intended to be learned or studied.

definition: "To allow to be used or occupied for a compensation; to lease; to rent; to hire out;  often with out; as  to let a farm; to let a house; to let out horses."
simplified_definition: to allow; permit.

definition: "Alt. of Lethargical"
simplified_definition: feeling as if one has no energy; not wanting to move or do anything.

definition: "A mark or character used as the representative of a sound  or of an articulation of the human organs of speech; a first element of written language."
simplified_definition: a written mark that stands for a speech sound; specific character of an alphabet.

definition: "The letters made; as  the lettering of a sign."
simplified_definition: the act or art of printing or writing letters.

definition: "A composite plant of the genus Lactuca   the leaves of which are used as salad. Plants of this genus yield a milky juice from which lactucarium is obtained. The commonest wild lettuce of the United States is L. Canadensis."
simplified_definition: a plant with large, crisp leaves that can be eaten.

definition: "The act of rising."
simplified_definition: an embankment built to keep river water from flooding the land.

definition: "Even; flat; having no part higher than another; having  or conforming to the curvature which belongs to the undisturbed liquid parts of the earth's surface; as a level field; level ground; the level surface of a pond or lake."

definition: "An arm on a rock shaft  to give motion to the shaft or to obtain motion from it."
simplified_definition: a basic tool used to lift or pry things open. A crowbar is one type of lever.

definition: "A name formerly given in Pennsylvania  Maryland and Virginia to the Spanish real of one eighth of a dollar  valued at eleven pence when the dollar was rated at s. d."
simplified_definition: the collection by a government of money, property, or troops.

definition: "Bound or obliged in law or equity; responsible; answerable; as  the surety is liable for the debt of his principal."

definition: "A person who knowingly utters falsehood; one who lies."
simplified_definition: a person who tells lies instead of the truth.

definition: "One who favors greater freedom in political or religious matters; an opponent of the established systems; a reformer; in English politics  a member of the Liberal party so called. Cf. Whig."

definition: "To release from restraint or bondage; to set at liberty; to free; to manumit; to disengage; as  to liberate a slave or prisoner; to liberate the mind from prejudice; to liberate gases."
simplified_definition: to free or let out.

definition: "The state of a free person; exemption from subjection to the will of another claiming ownership of the person or services; freedom;  opposed to slavery  serfdom bondage or subjection."

definition: "The Balance; the seventh sign in the zodiac  which the sun enters at the autumnal equinox in September marked thus  in almanacs etc."
simplified_definition: a constellation located between Virgo and Scorpio. Libra is also called the Scales.

definition: "One who copies manuscript books."
simplified_definition: a person trained to work in a library, or who takes care of a particular collection of books.

definition: "A considerable collection of books kept for use  and not as merchandise; as a private library; a public library."
simplified_definition: a place where books, records, and other materials are kept and from which they may be borrowed.

definition: "pl. of Louse."
simplified_definition: plural of "louse."

definition: "Authority or liberty given to do or forbear any act; especially  a formal permission from the proper authorities to perform certain acts or to carry on a certain business which without such permission would be illegal; a grant of permission; as a license to preach to practice medicine to sell gunpowder or intoxicating liquors."
simplified_definition: legal permission to do something, or a paper or card that shows permission.

definition: "One of a class of cellular  flowerless plants  having no distinction of leaf and stem usually of scaly expanded frondlike forms but sometimes erect or pendulous and variously branched. They derive their nourishment from the air and generate by means of spores. The species are very widely distributed and form irregular spots or patches usually of a greenish or yellowish color upon rocks
simplified_definition: a living thing that is a fungus and a form of algae or special bacteria living together. The algae or the bacteria use photosynthesis to make food for the fungus. There are many kinds of lichens with different colors, such as green, gray, black, or red. They can look like scales, crusts, or branches. Lichens live on rocks and other places where there is no soil.

definition: "To draw or pass the tongue over; as  a dog licks his master's hand."
simplified_definition: to pass the tongue over or along the surface of.

definition: "A plant of the genus Glycyrrhiza   the root of which abounds with a sweet juice and is much used in demulcent compositions."
simplified_definition: a plant of the legume family that has a strong, sweet smell and flavor.

definition: "That which covers the opening of a vessel or box  etc.; a movable cover; as the lid of a chest or trunk."
simplified_definition: a cover for a container that can be opened or removed.

definition: "The position or way in which anything lies; the lay  as of land or country."
simplified_definition: an untrue statement made on purpose.

definition: "An officer who supplies the place of a superior in his absence; a representative of  or substitute for another in the performance of any duty."
simplified_definition: a military officer of low rank.

definition: "Something dear to one as one's existence; a darling;  used as a term of endearment."
simplified_definition: the state of being that sets animals and plants apart from rocks, minerals, and other things that are not alive. Things that have life grow, reproduce, and use energy.

definition: "A strong  buoyant boat especially designed for saving the lives of shipwrecked people."
simplified_definition: a boat made for quick rescue of people. It can be carried on a larger boat, or it can be used from shore.

definition: "Destitute of life  or deprived of life; not containing or inhabited by living beings or vegetation; dead or apparently dead; spiritless; powerless; dull; as a lifeless carcass; lifeless matter; a lifeless desert; a lifeless wine; a lifeless story."

definition: "Like a living being; resembling life; giving an accurate representation; as  a lifelike portrait."
simplified_definition: looking like something in real life.

definition: "Lasting or continuing through life."

definition: "The time that life continues."

definition: "A layer of leather in the heel."

definition: "Anything that ties or unites one thing or part to another; a bandage; a bond."
simplified_definition: a band of tough tissue that connects bones or supports muscles or organs.

definition: "To come down suddenly and forcibly; to fall;  with on or upon."

definition: "Free from grief or anxiety; gay; cheerful; merry."

definition: "of Light"
simplified_definition: the type and arrangement of lights in an area.

definition: "Not chastely; wantonly."
simplified_definition: with little weight or force.

definition: "A discharge of atmospheric electricity  accompanied by a vivid flash of light commonly from one cloud to another sometimes from a cloud to the earth. The sound produced by the electricity in passing rapidly through the atmosphere constitutes thunder."
simplified_definition: natural electricity produced in thunderclouds. Lightning appears as a bright flash or streak of light in the sky.

definition: "Such as can be liked; such as to attract liking; as  a likable person."
simplified_definition: liked by others, or easy to like.

definition: "Having the same  or nearly the same appearance qualities or characteristics; resembling; similar to; similar; alike;  often with in and the particulars of the resemblance; as they are like each other in features complexion and many traits of character."
simplified_definition: a suffix that means "similar to" or "like."

definition: "Appearance; show; sign; expression."
simplified_definition: how probable it is that something will happen.

definition: "Having such qualities as make success probable; well adapted to the place; promising; as  a likely young man; a likely servant."

simplified_definition: the condition of looking like or being similar to someone or something else; similarity.

definition: "In like manner; also; moreover; too. See Also."
simplified_definition: as well; also.

definition: "The state of being pleasing; a suiting. See On liking  below."
simplified_definition: a feeling of preferring, enjoying, or being fond of.

definition: "A light purplish color like that of the flower of the purplish lilac."
simplified_definition: a shrub that has large clusters of purple, white, or pink flowers.

simplified_definition: a plant that grows from a bulb and has large flowers shaped like bells or trumpets.

definition: "A border or edge  in certain special uses."
simplified_definition: a main branch of a tree.

definition: "A thong by which a dog is led; a leash."
simplified_definition: a white powder made of calcium oxide. Lime is used in cement, in making steel and paper, and in making some soils better for growing plants.

definition: "A rock consisting chiefly of calcium carbonate or carbonate of lime. It sometimes contains also magnesium carbonate  and is then called magnesian or dolomitic limestone. Crystalline limestone is called marble."
simplified_definition: a rock formed mostly from shells and other animal remains. Limestone is used in building and in making cement, lime, and carbon dioxide.

simplified_definition: the point at which something ends; a boundary or border.

definition: "Of or pertaining to a line; consisting of lines; in a straight direction; lineal."
simplified_definition: having to do with a line; straight.

definition: "Underclothing  esp. the shirt as being in former times chiefly made of linen."
simplified_definition: cloth, yarn, or thread made from flax.

definition: "A large carnivorous feline mammal   found in Southern Asia and in most parts of Africa distinct varieties occurring in the different countries. The adult male in most varieties has a thick mane of long shaggy hair that adds to his apparent size which is less than that of the largest tigers. The length however is sometimes eleven feet to the base of the tail. The color is a tawny yellow or yellowish brown; the mane is darker and the terminal tuft of the tail is black. In one variety called the maneless lion the male has only a slight mane."
simplified_definition: a large, very strong mammal with short tan fur. Male lions have a mane of longer hair around the neck and head. Lions live in parts of Africa and Asia. They are carnivores and are closely related to tigers, leopards, and other big cats that roar.

definition: "A female lion."
simplified_definition: a female lion.

definition: "An edge of an opening; a thin projecting part of anything; a kind of short open spout; as  the lip of a vessel."

definition: "Flowing freely like water; fluid; not solid."

definition: "An Italian coin equivalent in value to the French franc."

definition: "To speak with reserve or concealment; to utter timidly or confidentially; as  to lisp treason."

simplified_definition: a past tense and past participle of "light."

definition: "According to the primary and natural import of words; not figuratively; as  a man and his wife can not be literally one flesh."

simplified_definition: having to do with literature or those who write or read literature.

simplified_definition: writings that have lasting value. Literature includes stories, poems, plays, and essays.

definition: "To give birth to; to bear;  said of brutes  esp. those which produce more than one at a birth and also of human beings in abhorrence or contempt."

simplified_definition: a large, reddish brown organ in the body that has many functions. The liver cleans the blood, stores energy and nutrients, makes bile, and helps the body digest fats. It is found at the top of the abdomen.

definition: "Black and blue; grayish blue; of a lead color; discolored  as flesh by contusion."

definition: "The state of one who  or that which lives; lives; life; existence."

simplified_definition: a reptile with rough, scaly skin, four legs, and a long tapering tail.

simplified_definition: an animal with long legs and a long neck. Llamas are mammals that live in the mountains of South America. They are closely related to camels, but are smaller. Llamas are raised for their meat, milk, and wool.

definition: "Any large macrurous crustacean used as food  esp. those of the genus Homarus; as the American lobster  and the European lobster . The Norwegian lobster  is similar in form. All these have a pair of large unequal claws. The spiny lobsters of more southern waters belonging to Palinurus Panulirus and allied genera have no large claws. The freshwater crayfishes are sometimes called lobsters."
simplified_definition: an animal with a hard, jointed shell that lives in the ocean. Lobsters have four pairs of legs and a pair of large claws. They are a kind of crustacean.

simplified_definition: place or position.

simplified_definition: a mechanical device for keeping others from opening a door, window, or a safe. Locks are usually opened with a key or a combination.

definition: "One who  or that which locks."
