definition: "Moving from place to place; changing place  or able to change place; as a locomotive animal."
simplified_definition: an engine that moves by its own power. It is used to pull or push railroad cars.

definition: "Any one of numerous species of longwinged  migratory orthopterous insects of the family Acrididae allied to the grasshoppers; esp. (Edipoda  Pachytylus migratoria and Acridium perigrinum of Southern Europe Asia and Africa. In the United States the related species with similar habits are usually called grasshoppers. See Grasshopper."
simplified_definition: an insect that travels in large groups called swarms. They damage crops and other plants in their path by eating them. They are a type of grasshopper.

definition: "A metallic vein; any regular vein or course  whether metallic or not."
simplified_definition: a deposit of a mineral that fills a crack in an area of rock.

definition: "Lofty; proud."
simplified_definition: an open space or room just under the roof; attic.

definition: "Fig.: Elevated in character  rank dignity spirit bearing language etc.; exalted; noble; stately; characterized by pride; haughty."

simplified_definition: a large, thick piece of a tree that has been cut down and is ready for sawing, burning, or building.

simplified_definition: a person who works in logging; lumberjack.

simplified_definition: a suffix that means "related to the study of."

simplified_definition: the part of the body on either side of the spine between the ribs and the hip.

definition: "To be slow in moving; to delay; to linger; to be dilatory; to spend time idly; to saunter; to lag behind."
simplified_definition: to stand around idly.

definition: "To let hang from the mouth  as the tongue."

simplified_definition: a piece of hard candy attached to the end of a small stick.

definition: "The capital city of England."

simplified_definition: writing done by hand in which words are written out in full.

definition: "of Long"
simplified_definition: a strong and lasting desire.

definition: "With longing."
simplified_definition: with strong desire that does not go away even though it may be difficult to have what one wishes.

definition: "The distance in degrees  reckoned from the vernal equinox on the ecliptic to a circle at right angles to the ecliptic passing through the heavenly body whose longitude is designated; as the longitude of Capella is �."
simplified_definition: distance on the earth's surface east or west of an imaginary line on the globe that goes from the north pole to the south pole and passes through Greenwich, England. Longitude is usually measured in degrees.

definition: "An old game played with five  or three cards dealt to each player from a full pack. When five cards are used the highest card is the knave of clubs or  the knave of trumps;  formerly called lanterloo."

definition: "Expression of the eyes and face; manner; as  a proud or defiant look."
simplified_definition: to use the eyes to see.

definition: "A careful looking or watching for any object or event."
simplified_definition: the act of keeping watch or searching.

definition: "See Loon  the bird."

definition: "A sorry fellow; a worthless person; a rogue."
simplified_definition: a large black and white water bird with a call that sounds like a loud laugh.

definition: "A small  narrow opening; a loophole."
simplified_definition: the rounded shape made when a piece of string, ribbon, or rope is crossed back over itself or tied so that it forms a circle.

definition: "Free from constraint or obligation; not bound by duty  habit etc. ;  with from or of."
simplified_definition: not joined or attached tightly; free.

simplified_definition: having one side that is larger or heavier than the other; uneven.

definition: "A humpbacked person;  so called sportively."

definition: "A small cart or wagon  as those used on the tramways in mines to carry coal or rubbish; also a barrow or truck for shifting baggage as at railway stations."

definition: "To suffer loss  disadvantage or defeat; to be worse off esp. as the result of any kind of contest."

definition: "The act of losing; failure; destruction; privation; as  the loss of property; loss of money by gaming; loss of health or reputation."

definition: "Occupied with  or under the influence of something so as to be insensible of external things; as to be lost in thought."

definition: "A washing  especially of the skin for the purpose of rendering it fair."

definition: "A scheme for the distribution of prizes by lot or chance; esp.  a gaming scheme in which one or more tickets bearing particular numbers draw prizes and the rest of tickets are blanks. Fig. : An affair of chance."

definition: "A name of several kinds of water lilies; as Nelumbium speciosum  used in religious ceremonies anciently in Egypt and to this day in Asia; Nelumbium luteum the American lotus; and Nymphaea Lotus and N. caerulea the respectively whiteflowered and blueflowered lotus of modern Egypt which with Nelumbium speciosum are figured on its ancient monuments."
simplified_definition: a kind of flowering plant that lives in the water. Some water lilies are lotuses.

definition: "Ostentatious; likely to attract attention; gaudy; as  a loud style of dress; loud colors."

definition: "An idle gait or stroll; the state of reclining indolently; a place of lounging."

definition: "Having qualities that excite  or are fitted to excite love; worthy of love."

definition: "Loving; tender."

simplified_definition: feeling or showing love.

definition: "strong imp. of Laugh."
simplified_definition: close to the ground or bottom; not high.

definition: "A frowning; sullenness."
simplified_definition: to cause to move to a position below; let down.

definition: "Faithful to law; upholding the lawful authority; faithful and true to the lawful government; faithful to the prince or sovereign to whom one is subject; unswerving in allegiance."
simplified_definition: showing devotion and faithfulness to someone or something.

definition: "The state or quality of being loyal; fidelity to a superior  or to duty love etc."
simplified_definition: the condition of being faithful or loyal.

definition: "A diamondshaped figure usually with the upper and lower angles slightly acute  borne upon a shield or escutcheon. Cf. Fusil."
simplified_definition: a small piece of hard candy that contains medicine. A lozenge is held in the mouth and sucked to ease a sore throat or cough.

definition: "To apply a lubricant to  as oil or tallow."
simplified_definition: to coat or supply with grease, oil, or another slippery substance.

definition: "That which happens to a person; an event  good or ill affecting one's interests or happiness and which is deemed casual; a course or series of such events regarded as occurring by chance; chance; hap; fate; fortune; often one's habitual or characteristic fortune; as good bad ill or hard luck. Luck is often used for good luck; as luck is better than skill."
simplified_definition: the force believed to guide things which seem to happen to a person by chance.

definition: "In a lucky manner; by good fortune; fortunately;  used in a good sense; as  they luckily escaped injury."
simplified_definition: by good fortune.

definition: "Producing  or resulting in good by chance or unexpectedly; favorable; auspicious; fortunate; as a lucky mistake; a lucky cast; a lucky hour."
simplified_definition: resulting from or having good fortune.

definition: "A measure of length  being  feet; a rod pole or perch."
simplified_definition: to pull, lift, or carry with a great effort.

definition: "That which is lugged; anything cumbrous and heavy to be carried; especially  a traveler's trunks baggage etc. or their contents."
simplified_definition: suitcases, boxes, and bags for carrying one's things on trips; baggage.

definition: "Moderately warm; neither cold nor hot; tepid; not ardent; not zealous; cool; indifferent."
simplified_definition: only slightly warm; tepid.

definition: "To cause to rest by soothing influences; to compose; to calm; to soothe; to quiet."
simplified_definition: to calm or cause to sleep.

definition: "A song to quiet babes or lull them to sleep; that which quiets."
simplified_definition: a song sung to put a child to sleep.

definition: "To cut logs in the forest  or prepare timber for market."
simplified_definition: logs cut into boards or beams for use in building.

definition: "Enlightened; intelligent; also  clear; intelligible; as a luminous mind."
simplified_definition: giving off light; glowing.

definition: "To take in the gross; to speak of collectively."
simplified_definition: a small mass or pile with no special shape; hunk.

definition: "Resembling the moon; orbed."
simplified_definition: of or having to do with the moon.

definition: "A luncheon; specifically  a light repast between breakfast and dinner."
simplified_definition: a meal eaten in the middle of the day, or any light meal during the day.

definition: "To take luncheon."
simplified_definition: a special meal served at lunch time.

definition: "An organ for aerial respiration;  commonly in the plural."
simplified_definition: one of two organs in the chest that are used in breathing. Lungs are found in mammals, birds, reptiles, and some other animals. They bring oxygen to the body and get rid of carbon dioxide.

definition: "To cause to go round in a ring  as a horse while holding his halter."
simplified_definition: a sudden movement toward something; thrust, leap, or dive.

definition: "To dodge; to shift; to play tricks."
simplified_definition: a sudden sideways motion, as of a boat.

definition: "A contrivance somewhat resembling a bird  and often baited with raw meat;  used by falconers in recalling hawks."
simplified_definition: something that attracts or tempts by promising some reward.

definition: "To lie hid; to lie in wait."
simplified_definition: to be hidden; lie in wait.

definition: "Gratifying a depraved sense; obscene."
simplified_definition: delicious to taste or smell.

definition: "Full of juice or succulence."
simplified_definition: growing thick and healthy.

definition: "To list; to like."
simplified_definition: a strong desire for something .

definition: "Alt. of Lustre"
simplified_definition: the shine of a surface that softly reflects light; glow.

definition: "To play on a lute  or as on a lute."
simplified_definition: a stringed instrument that has a bent neck and a body shaped like a pear.

definition: "Exuberant in growth; rank; excessive; very abundant; as  a luxuriant growth of grass; luxuriant foliage."
simplified_definition: growing thickly and in great numbers; lush.

definition: "Of or pertaining to luxury; ministering to luxury; supplied with the conditions of luxury; as  a luxurious life; a luxurious table; luxurious ease."
simplified_definition: giving great comfort or pleasure.

definition: "A free indulgence in costly food  dress furniture or anything expensive which gratifies the appetites or tastes."
simplified_definition: something very pleasant but not necessary.

definition: "A short side line  connected with the main line; a turnout; a siding."
simplified_definition: a strong substance used in making soap. It was once made from wood ashes.

definition: "of Lie"
simplified_definition: the telling of lies.

definition: "A fibrinous material exuded from the blood vessels in inflammation. In the process of healing it is either absorbed  or is converted into connective tissue binding the inflamed surfaces together."
simplified_definition: a slightly yellowish liquid produced by body tissues. It contains many white blood cells.

definition: "Any one of several species of feline animals of the genus Felis  and subgenus Lynx. They have a short tail and usually a pencil of hair on the tip of the ears."
simplified_definition: a mammal in the cat family with soft, spotted fur, pointed ears, and a short tail. Several kinds of lynx live in Europe, North America, and Asia. They are carnivores and are related to other wild cats. The average lynx is about two to four times the size of a house cat.

definition: "A stringed instrument of music; a kind of harp much used by the ancients  as an accompaniment to poetry."
simplified_definition: a stringed instrument of ancient Greece that is like a harp.

definition: "Alt. of Lyrical"
simplified_definition: relating to poetry that has a musical rhythm and often expresses private feelings and thoughts.

definition: "Of or pertaining to a lyre or harp."
simplified_definition: showing deep feeling.

definition: "A brand or stigma  having the shape of an M formerly impressed on one convicted of manslaughter and admitted to the benefit of clergy."
simplified_definition: the thirteenth letter of the English alphabet.

definition: "A child's word for mother."
simplified_definition: mother.

definition: "Madam; my lady;  a colloquial contraction of madam often used in direct address  and sometimes as an appellation."
simplified_definition: madam.

definition: "Long slender tubes made of a paste chiefly of wheat flour  and used as an article of food; Italian or Genoese paste."
simplified_definition: dried noodles made from flour and water, often shaped into curved, hollow tubes.

definition: "Any mechanical contrivance  as the wooden horse with which the Greeks entered Troy; a coach; a bicycle."
simplified_definition: a device with a system of parts that work together to perform a task. Cars, computers, hair dryers, and vacuum cleaners are all examples of machines.

definition: "Machines  in general or collectively."
simplified_definition: machines in general.

definition: "A person employed to shift scenery in a theater."
simplified_definition: a person who has skill in using, repairing, or building machines.

definition: "Any species of the genus Scomber  and of several related genera. They are finely formed and very active oceanic fishes. Most of them are highly prized for food."
simplified_definition: a fish that has dark marks that look like waves on its back and a silver underside. Mackerel live in the Atlantic Ocean and are used for food.

definition: "A short  straight horizontal mark  placed over vowels to denote that they are to be pronounced with a long sound; as a in dame;  in sam etc."
simplified_definition: a mark . It is placed over a vowel to show that the vowel is long.

definition: "p. p. of Made."
simplified_definition: crazy; insane.

definition: "A gentlewoman;  an appellation or courteous form of address given to a lady  especially an elderly or a married lady;  much used in the address at the beginning of a letter to a woman. The corresponding word in addressing a man is Sir."
simplified_definition: a polite word to use when talking to a woman.

definition: "My lady;  a French title formerly given to ladies of quality; now  in France given to all married women."
simplified_definition: a formal or polite way to address a married woman.

definition: "imp.  p. p. of Make."
simplified_definition: past tense and past participle of "make."

definition: "A marine food fish   of the Southern United States;  called also yellowtail and silver perch."
simplified_definition: a French title for a girl or woman who is not married. The abbreviation is Mlle.

definition: "A pamphlet published periodically containing miscellaneous papers or compositions."
simplified_definition: a printed collection of stories, pictures, articles, and advertisements. Magazines come out weekly, monthly, or at some other regular period of time.

definition: "An aniline dye obtained as an amorphous substance having a green bronze surface color  which dissolves to a shade of red; also the color;  so called from Magenta in Italy in allusion to the battle fought there about the time the dye was discovered. Called also fuchsine roseine etc."
simplified_definition: the color that comes from mixing red and purple paint.

definition: "The footless larva of any fly. See Larval."
simplified_definition: the larva of flies and certain other insects. Maggots do not have legs or wings.

definition: "Alt. of Magical"
simplified_definition: mysterious control of physical forces or events through spells or special ceremonies.

definition: "Pertaining to the hidden wisdom supposed to be possessed by the Magi; relating to the occult powers of nature  and the producing of effects by their agency."
simplified_definition: of or made by magic.

definition: "One skilled in magic; one who practices the black art; an enchanter; a necromancer; a sorcerer or sorceress; a conjurer."
simplified_definition: a person who has skill in magic and entertains people with magic tricks.

definition: "The molten matter within the earth  the source of the material of lava flows dikes of eruptive rocks etc."
simplified_definition: hot, liquid matter beneath the earth's surface that cools to form igneous rock. Magma that reaches the earth's surface, as when a volcano erupts, is called lava.

definition: "A light silverwhite metallic element  malleable and ductile quite permanent in dry air but tarnishing in moist air. It burns forming  magnesia with the production of a blinding light  which is used in signaling in pyrotechny or in photography where a strong actinic illuminant is required. Its compounds occur abundantly as in dolomite talc meerschaum etc. Symbol Mg. Atomic weight .. Specific gravity
simplified_definition: a light, silverwhite metal that is a chemical element. It burns brightly when heated and is used for making fireworks.

definition: "The loadstone; a species of iron ore  which has the property of attracting iron and some of its ores and when freely suspended of pointing to the poles;  called also natural magnet."
simplified_definition: an object that has the power to pull items made of iron, and certain other metals, toward itself.

definition: "Alt. of Magnetical"
simplified_definition: having to do with magnets and the way they work.

definition: "The property  quality or state of being magnetic; the manifestation of the force in nature which is seen in a magnet."
simplified_definition: the power of a magnet to attract.

definition: "To communicate magnetic properties to; as  to magnetize a needle."
simplified_definition: to cause to become a magnet.

definition: "The act of doing what magnificent; the state or quality of being magnificent."
simplified_definition: the quality of being grand or splendid.

definition: "Doing grand things; admirable in action; displaying great power or opulence  especially in building way of living and munificence."
simplified_definition: very grand in size or splendid in beauty.

definition: "To make great  or greater; to increase the dimensions of; to amplify; to enlarge either in fact or in appearance; as the microscope magnifies the object by a thousand diameters."
simplified_definition: to cause to appear larger.

definition: "Extent of dimensions; size;  applied to things that have length  breath and thickness."
simplified_definition: size or extent.

definition: "A genus of American and Asiatic trees  with aromatic bark and large sweetscented whitish or reddish flowers."
simplified_definition: a tree or shrub with large pink, white, or purple flowers. In many species blooms appear before the leaves.

definition: "Any one of numerous species of the genus Pica and related genera  allied to the jays but having a long graduated tail."
simplified_definition: a large black and white bird with a long tail and a noisy, chattering call.

definition: "A large tree of the genus Swietenia   found in tropical America."
simplified_definition: an evergreen tree that grows in tropical North and South America. It has hard, reddish brown wood.

definition: "A female servant."
simplified_definition: a girl or woman who is paid to do housework.

definition: "To act coyly like a maiden;  with it as an indefinite object."
simplified_definition: a young woman or girl who is not married.

definition: "To deliver into the custody of the postoffice officials  or place in a government letter box for transmission by mail; to post; as to mail a letter."
simplified_definition: the system set up to send and deliver letters, packages and other items; postal system.

definition: "To deprive of the use of a limb  so as to render a person on fighting less able either to defend himself or to annoy his adversary."
simplified_definition: to hurt badly by destroying a part of the body or making it useless.

definition: "A hand or match at dice."
simplified_definition: most important; chief; primary.

definition: "One of the New England States."
simplified_definition: a state in the northeastern United States on the Atlantic Coast. Its capital is Augusta.

definition: "The continent; the principal land;  opposed to island  or peninsula."
simplified_definition: the main land mass of a country or continent, not including nearby islands.

definition: "Principally; chiefly."
simplified_definition: for the most part; mostly.

definition: "The stay extending from the foot of the foremast to the maintop."
simplified_definition: a strong rope or cable that holds and steadies the mast of a sailing ship.

definition: "To affirm; to support or defend by argument."
simplified_definition: to continue; keep in existence.

definition: "The act of maintaining; sustenance; support; defense; vindication."
simplified_definition: the act of maintaining.

definition: "A large species of American grass of the genus Zea   widely cultivated as a forage and food plant; Indian corn. Also its seed growing on cobs and used as food for men animals."
simplified_definition: see "Indian corn."

definition: "Possessing or exhibiting majesty; of august dignity  stateliness or imposing grandeur; lofty; noble; grand."
simplified_definition: having majesty; grand; splendid; noble.

definition: "The dignity and authority of sovereign power; quality or state which inspires awe or reverence; grandeur; exalted dignity  whether proceeding from rank character or bearing; imposing loftiness; stateliness;  usually applied to the rank and dignity of sovereigns."
simplified_definition: the greatness, dignity, or power of a royal person.

definition: "Of full legal age."
simplified_definition: the military rank above captain and below lieutenant colonel, or a person who holds this rank.

definition: "The quality or condition of being major or greater; superiority."
simplified_definition: the greater number or amount; a number or amount greater than half.

definition: "To cause to exist; to bring into being; to form; to produce; to frame; to fashion; to create."
simplified_definition: to bring into being by building from separate parts.

definition: "A feigning to believe  as in the play of children; a mere pretense; a fiction; an invention."
simplified_definition: pretending; imagination.

definition: "The person who makes a promissory note."
simplified_definition: someone or something that makes.

definition: "That with which one makes shift; a temporary expedient."
simplified_definition: something used for a short time or in place of the usual thing.

definition: "The way in which the parts of anything are put together; often  the way in which an actor is dressed painted etc. in personating a character."
simplified_definition: lipstick, powder, and other cosmetics put on the face to change the way it looks or to make it look better.

definition: "A morbid condition produced by exhalations from decaying vegetable matter in contact with moisture  giving rise to fever and ague and many other symptoms characterized by their tendency to recur at definite and usually uniform intervals."
simplified_definition: a serious disease carried by mosquitoes that causes chills, fever, and sweating.

definition: "Consisting of males; as  a male choir."
simplified_definition: of or having to do with men or boys.

definition: "Enmity of heart; malevolence; ill will; a spirit delighting in harm or misfortune to another; a disposition to injure another; a malignant design of evil."
simplified_definition: the wish to harm others; ill will.

definition: "With wicked or mischievous intentions or motives; wrongful and done intentionally without just cause or excuse; as  a malicious act."
simplified_definition: having or reflecting a wish to harm.

definition: "Having an evil disposition toward others; harboring violent enmity; malevolent; malicious; spiteful;  opposed to benign."
simplified_definition: to speak badly of or tell harmful lies about.

definition: "One of the adherents of Charles L. or Charles LL.;  so called by the opposite party."
simplified_definition: meant to cause harm; evil.

definition: "A large heavy wooden beetle; a mallet for driving anything with force; a maul."
simplified_definition: a large indoor area that contains shops and restaurants; shopping center. A mall can also be an outdoor shopping area that is closed off to traffic.

definition: "A drake; the male of Anas boschas."
simplified_definition: a common wild duck. The male has a shiny dark green head and neck.

definition: "A small maul with a short handle   used esp. for driving a tool as a chisel or the like; also a light beetle with a long handle  used in playing croquet."
simplified_definition: a hammer with a short handle and a large head shaped like a barrel.

definition: "Faulty or imperfect nutrition."
simplified_definition: the condition of not having enough food or not having the right kind of food for good health.

definition: "Barley or other grain  steeped in water and dried in a kiln thus forcing germination until the saccharine principle has been evolved. It is used in brewing and in the distillation of whisky."
simplified_definition: barley that is allowed to sprout, then used to make beer and ale.

definition: "See Mamma."
simplified_definition: mother.

definition: "One of the Mammalia."
simplified_definition: a warmblooded animal with fur or hair on its skin and a skeleton inside its body. Mammal mothers produce milk to feed their babies. Most mammals have four legs or two arms and two legs. Dogs, cows, elephants, mice, whales, and humans are all mammals.

definition: "An extinct  hairy maned elephant  of enormous size remains of which are found in the northern parts of both continents. The last of the race in Europe were coeval with prehistoric man."
simplified_definition: a very large extinct mammal closely related to elephants. Mammoths were much bigger than elephants, and had shaggy black fur and long tusks that curved upward. Several kinds of mammoths lived in the Northern Hemisphere until the end of the last Ice Age.

definition: "To tame  as a hawk."
simplified_definition: an adult male human being.

definition: "The handling or government of anything  but esp. of a horse; management; administration. See Manege."
simplified_definition: to direct or control.

definition: "The act or art of managing; the manner of treating  directing carrying on or using for a purpose; conduct; administration; guidance; control; as the management of a family or of a farm; the management of state affairs."
simplified_definition: the act or process of managing.

definition: "A person who conducts business or household affairs with economy and frugality; a good economist."
simplified_definition: the person who controls a business or acts as the leader of a plan or project.

definition: "Any species of Trichechus  a genus of sirenians;  called alsosea cow."
simplified_definition: a mammal that lives in the ocean and has flippers for front legs. Manatees eat sea plants and are very gentle. Different kinds of manatees live near the shores or in coastal rivers of Florida, the West Indies, Central America, South America, and West Africa. They are also called sea cows.

definition: "A Chinese public officer or nobleman; a civil or military official in China and Annam."
simplified_definition: a public official, or a person of high rank or influence in imperial China.

definition: "An official or authoritative command; an order or injunction; a commission; a judicial precept."
simplified_definition: the command or message given to an elected official by the votes of the people.

definition: "Alt. of Mandoline"
simplified_definition: a musical instrument in the lute family with four or five pairs of strings that are usually strummed.

definition: "The long and heavy hair growing on the upper side of  or about the neck of some quadrupedal animals as the horse the lion etc. See Illust. of Horse."
simplified_definition: the long hair on the back and sides of the neck of horses, lions, and other animals.

definition: "Alt. of Manoeuvre"
simplified_definition: a planned movement of soldiers, ships, or tanks.

definition: "An element obtained by reduction of its oxide  as a hard grayish white metal fusible with difficulty but easily oxidized. Its ores occur abundantly in nature as the minerals pyrolusite manganite etc. Symbol Mn. Atomic weight .."
simplified_definition: a dense, hard, grayish white metal that is one of the chemical elements. It is used in making steel, and is also used to color glass purple.

definition: "A trough or open box in which fodder is placed for horses or cattle to eat."
simplified_definition: a box or trough from which farm animals eat.

definition: "To smooth with a mangle  as damp linen or cloth."
simplified_definition: to damage badly by cutting, crushing, or tearing apart.

definition: "The fruit of the mango tree. It is rather larger than an apple  and of an ovoid shape. Some varieties are fleshy and luscious and others tough and tasting of turpentine. The green fruit is pickled for market."
simplified_definition: a sweet, juicy fruit with a long shape and smooth yelloworange skin.

definition: "The mango fish."
simplified_definition: a tropical tree that grows near oceans along shorelines or streams and has roots that grow above the ground. Mangroves grow very densely together and serve to prevent erosion of soil along the water. They also support wildlife and serve as barricades that help protect against damage from hurricanes and tsunamis.

definition: "A hole through which a man may descend or creep into a drain  sewer steam boiler parts of machinery etc. for cleaning or repairing."
simplified_definition: an opening in a street large enough for a person to climb into to make repairs underneath the street. A manhole is usually covered by a lid.

definition: "The state of being man as a human being  or man as distinguished from a child or a woman."
simplified_definition: the condition of being an adult male.

definition: "A raving lunatic; a madman."
simplified_definition: a person who is insane.

definition: "A person who makes a business of taking care of people's hands  especially their nails."
simplified_definition: a treatment for the fingernails that includes trimming, shaping, and sometimes polishing.

definition: "The human race; man  taken collectively."
simplified_definition: the whole human race.

definition: "Sort; kind; style;  in this application sometimes having the sense of a plural  sorts or kinds."
simplified_definition: a way of doing something; style.

definition: "Management with address or artful design; adroit proceeding; stratagem."
simplified_definition: a spelling of "maneuver" used in Canada and Britain. See "maneuver" for more information.

definition: "A government vessel employed for the purposes of war  esp. one of large size; a ship of war."
simplified_definition: an old word for warship.

definition: "The land belonging to a lord or nobleman  or so much land as a lord or great personage kept in his own hands for the use and subsistence of his family."
simplified_definition: a large estate and its main house or mansion.

definition: "The house of the lord of a manor; a manor house; hence: Any house of considerable size or pretension."
simplified_definition: a large, grand, expensive home.

definition: "The unlawful killing of a man  either in negligenc or incidentally to the commission of some unlawful act but without specific malice or upon a sudden excitement of anger."
simplified_definition: the crime of killing a person without planning or meaning to do so.

definition: "The finish around a fireplace  covering the chimneybreast in front and sometimes on both sides; especially a shelf above the fireplace and its supports."
simplified_definition: a frame around the sides and top of a fireplace.

definition: "To gather  assume or take on a covering as froth scum etc."
simplified_definition: the layer of the earth that lies between the crust and the core. The crust is the top layer of the earththe layer we live on. The core is the center of our earth. The mantle is very thick and makes up most of the entire planet.

definition: "A keyboard of an organ or harmonium for the fingers  as distinguished from the pedals; a clavier or set of keys."
simplified_definition: having to do with use of the hands.

definition: "The operation of making wares or any products by hand  by machinery or by other agency."
simplified_definition: to make by machine in a large quantity.

definition: "One who manufactures."
simplified_definition: a company that makes things in large quantities, usually in a factory and using machines.

definition: "of Manufacture"
simplified_definition: the process or business of producing a large quantity of products, often from raw materials, using machines and human labor.

definition: "To cultivate by manual labor; to till; hence  to develop by culture."
simplified_definition: the waste matter of animals, such as cows and horses, used to fertilize the soil and help plants grow.

definition: "Written with or by the hand; not printed; as  a manuscript volume."
simplified_definition: a piece of writing prepared by the author before it becomes a printed article or book.

definition: "The populace; the common people; the majority of people  or of a community."
simplified_definition: a large number of.

definition: "A representation of the surface of the earth  or of some portion of it showing the relative position of the parts represented;  usually on a flat surface. Also such a representation of the celestial sphere or of some part of it."
simplified_definition: a picture of a particular area of the earth or sky drawn or printed to scale on a flat surface.

definition: "A tree of the genus Acer  including about fifty species. A. saccharinum is the rock maple or sugar maple from the sap of which sugar is made in the United States in great quantities by evaporation; the red or swamp maple is A. rubrum; the silver maple A. dasycarpum having fruit wooly when young; the striped maple A. Pennsylvanium called also moosewood. The common maple of Europe is A. campestre the sycamore maple is A. Pseudoplatanus
simplified_definition: a tree with notched leaves and hard wood, grown for its beauty, wood, or sweet sap.

definition: "Made of  or resembling marble; as a marble mantel; marble paper."
simplified_definition: a kind of stone that can be cut and polished to a hard, shiny surface. There are many kinds and colors of marble.

definition: "The third month of the year  containing thirtyone days."
simplified_definition: the third month of the year. March has thirtyone days. Spring begins in March for people who live north of the equator.

definition: "The female of the horse and other equine quadrupeds."
simplified_definition: an adult female horse, donkey, zebra, or related animal.

definition: "To enter in the margin of a page."
simplified_definition: an edge or the area near it; border.

definition: "A name for several plants with golden yellow blossoms  especially the Calendula officinalis  and the cultivated species of Tagetes."
simplified_definition: a garden plant that bears yellow, orange, or red and yellow blossoms.

definition: "A picture representing some marine subject."
simplified_definition: having to do with the sea; living in or caused by the sea.

definition: "The buffel duck."
simplified_definition: a puppet whose arms and legs are worked with strings or wires.

definition: "Of or pertaining to the ocean; marine; pertaining to navigation and naval affairs  or to shipping and commerce by sea."
simplified_definition: of or relating to sea ships or navigation of the sea.

definition: "To take particular notice; to observe critically; to note; to remark."
simplified_definition: something, such as a spot or scar, that can be seen on a surface.

definition: "One who or that which marks."
simplified_definition: a pen, usually with a felt tip, that makes thick lines of ink. A marker is used for marking and writing.

definition: "The privelege granted to a town of having a public market."
simplified_definition: a place where goods are sold.

definition: "of Market"
simplified_definition: advertising and other activities involved in getting people to buy a product or service from a company.

definition: "The act of one who  or that which marks; the mark or marks made; arrangement or disposition of marks or coloring; as the marking of a bird's plumage."
simplified_definition: a mark or marks.

definition: "A preserve or confection made of the pulp of fruit  as the quince pear apple orange etc. boiled with sugar and brought to a jamlike consistence."
simplified_definition: a jam that contains bits of fruit and peel.

definition: "An explosive shell. See Marron  ."
simplified_definition: to leave on an island or coast, far from other people; abandon.

definition: "A large field tent; esp.  one adapted to the use of an officer of high rank."
simplified_definition: a canopy or a covering like a roof over the entrance to a building. The marquee over a theater shows the title of the current play or film and sometimes the names of the actors.

definition: "A nobleman in England  France and Germany of a rank next below that of duke. Originally the marquis was an officer whose duty was to guard the marches or frontiers of the kingdom. The office has ceased and the name is now a mere title conferred by patent."
simplified_definition: a nobleman whose rank is above an earl or count and below a duke.

definition: "The wife of a marquis; a marchioness."
simplified_definition: the wife or widow of a marquis.

definition: "The marriage vow or contract."
simplified_definition: the state of two people being joined by law, having pledged to be faithful to one another all their lives as a couple.

definition: "of Marry"
simplified_definition: having a partner in marriage.

definition: "The tissue which fills the cavities of most bones; the medulla. In the larger cavities it is commonly very fatty  but in the smaller cavities it is much less fatty and red or reddish in color."

simplified_definition: a high pole decorated with flowers and ribbons, around which people dance to celebrate May Day.

definition: "One. See Men  pron."

definition: "A tract of low or level land producing grass which is mown for hay; any field on which grass is grown for hay."

Hence metabolism may be either constructive  or destructive ."

definition: "Migratory."

definition: "To remove from one country or region to another  with a view to residence; to change one's place of residence; to remove; as the Moors who migrated from Africa into Spain; to migrate to the West."
simplified_definition: to move from one region into another.

definition: "The act of migrating."
simplified_definition: the act or process of migrating.

definition: "Gentle; pleasant; kind; soft; bland; clement; hence  moderate in degree or quality;  the opposite of harsh severe irritating violent disagreeable etc.;  applied to persons and things; as a mild disposition; a mild eye; a mild air; a mild medicine; a mild insanity."
simplified_definition: gentle or calm.

definition: "To taint with mildew."
simplified_definition: a fungus that grows on plants and materials made from living things. Mildews often look like powder.

definition: "A certain measure of distance  being equivalent in England and the United States to  poles or rods or   feet."
simplified_definition: a unit of length equal to , feet or . kilometers.

definition: "Aggregate length or distance in miles; esp.  the sum of lengths of tracks or wires of a railroad company telegraph company etc."
simplified_definition: distance in miles.

definition: "A stone serving the same purpose as a milepost."
simplified_definition: a stone or mark that shows the distance in miles to a specific place.

definition: "Of or pertaining to soldiers  to arms or to war; belonging to engaged in or appropriate to the affairs of war; as a military parade; military discipline; military bravery; military conduct; military renown."
simplified_definition: having to do with planning, preparing for, or fighting in war.

definition: "In the widest sense  the whole military force of a nation including both those engaged in military service as a business and those competent and available for such service; specifically the body of citizens enrolled for military instruction and discipline but not subject to be called into actual service except in emergencies."
simplified_definition: a group of trained citizens who are not soldiers but can serve as members of the military in an emergency.

definition: "A white fluid secreted by the mammary glands of female mammals for the nourishment of their young  consisting of minute globules of fat suspended in a solution of casein albumin milk sugar and inorganic salts."
simplified_definition: a white liquid produced by female mammals as food for their young.

definition: "To swim under water;  said of airbreathing creatures."
simplified_definition: a place where raw grains are crushed and ground to make flour.

definition: "A thousand years; especially  the thousand years mentioned in the twentieth chapter in the twentieth chapter of Revelation during which holiness is to be triumphant throughout the world. Some believe that during this period Christ will reign on earth in person with his saints."
simplified_definition: a unit of time equal to one thousand years.

definition: "A milling machine."
simplified_definition: a person who owns or works in a mill.

definition: "A prefix denoting a thousandth part of; as  millimeter milligram milliampere."
simplified_definition: a prefix that means "one thousandth."

definition: "Alt. of Milligramme"
simplified_definition: a unit of weight equal to one thousandth of a gram.

definition: "Alt. of Millimetre"
simplified_definition: a unit of length equal to one thousandth of a meter or . inch.

definition: "The number of ten hundred thousand  or a thousand thousand  written   . See the Note under Hundred."
simplified_definition: the word for the number represented by the Arabic numeral ,,.

definition: "One whose wealth is counted by millions of francs  dollars or pounds; a very rich person; a person worth a million or more."
simplified_definition: a person whose money and property amount to at least a million dollars.

definition: "A kind of drama in which real persons and events were generally represented in a ridiculous manner."
simplified_definition: the art or practice of telling a story or acting out a dramatic or comical scene by means of hand and body movements rather than speaking; pantomime.

definition: "An autographic stencil copying device invented by Edison."
simplified_definition: a machine that makes copies of written material using an ink printing process.

definition: "To imitate or ape for sport; to ridicule by imitation."
simplified_definition: to copy or imitate.

definition: "A slender  lofty tower attached to a mosque and surrounded by one or more projecting balconies from which the summon to prayer is cried by the muezzin."
simplified_definition: a tall, thin tower on a mosque. A minaret has a platform near the top from which a person calls Muslims to prayer.

definition: "To walk with short steps; to walk in a prim  affected manner."
simplified_definition: to cut into very small, fine pieces.

definition: "Minced meat; meat chopped very fine; a mixture of boiled meat  suet apples etc. chopped very fine to which spices and raisins are added;  used in making mince pie."
simplified_definition: a mixture of chopped apples, raisins, currants, orange peel, and sometimes meat, that is used as a filling for pies.

definition: "To fix the mind or thoughts on; to regard with attention; to treat as of consequence; to consider; to heed; to mark; to note."
simplified_definition: the part of a person that thinks, understands, remembers, directs, and feels.

definition: "Fig.: A rich source of wealth or other good."
simplified_definition: the one or ones that belong to me, are done by me, or have to do with me.

definition: "One who mines; a digger for metals  etc.; one engaged in the business of getting ore coal or precious stones out of the earth; one who digs military mines; as armies have sappers and miners."
simplified_definition: a person whose job is to obtain coal or other minerals from a mine.

definition: "An inorganic species or substance occurring in nature  having a definite chemical composition and usually a distinct crystalline form. Rocks except certain glassy igneous forms are either simple minerals or aggregates of minerals."
simplified_definition: a substance formed in the earth that is not of an animal or a plant.

definition: "The goddess of wisdom  of war of the arts and sciences of poetry and of spinning and weaving;  identified with the Grecian Pallas Athene."
simplified_definition: the goddess of wisdom and art in Roman myth. In Greek myth, Minerva is called Athena.

definition: "To mix; intermix; to combine or join  as an individual or part with other parts but commonly so as to be distinguishable in the product; to confuse; to confound."
simplified_definition: to come together or join with other people.

definition: "Originally  a painting in colors such as those in mediaeval manuscripts; in modern times any very small painting especially a portrait."
simplified_definition: A miniature is something that is exactly like something else but much smaller in size.

definition: "To reduce to the smallest part or proportion possible; to reduce to a minimum."
simplified_definition: to make as small as possible.

definition: "The least quantity assignable  admissible or possible in a given case; hence a thing of small consequence;  opposed to maximum."
simplified_definition: the smallest or least possible amount, degree, or number.

definition: "of Mine"
simplified_definition: the act or business of digging up coal, ore, or other minerals in a mine.

definition: "To supply or to things needful; esp.  to supply consolation or remedies."
simplified_definition: a person authorized to perform or help at the religious services of some religions.

definition: "A carnivorous mammal of the genus Putorius  allied to the weasel. The European mink is Putorius lutreola. The common American mink  varies from yellowish brown to black. Its fur is highly valued. Called also minx nurik and vison."
simplified_definition: a small mammal with dark brown fur, a long body, short legs, and a bushy tail. Mink live near water, where they hunt water animals. One kind of mink lives in Europe and Asia; another kind lives in North America. Mink are closely related to polecats, ferrets, and other weasels.

definition: "A small European freshwater cyprinoid fish ; sometimes applied also to the young of larger kinds;  called also minim and minny. The name is also applied to several allied American species of the genera Phoxinus Notropis or Minnilus and Rhinichthys."
simplified_definition: a small fish that lives in fresh water.

definition: "A Minorite; a Franciscan friar."
simplified_definition: less important or serious than others of the same kind.

definition: "The state of being a minor  or under age."
simplified_definition: a part or amount that is less than half the total.

definition: "In the Middle Ages  one of an order of men who subsisted by the arts of poetry and music and sang verses to the accompaniment of a harp or other instrument; in modern times a poet; a bard; a singer and harper; a musician."
simplified_definition: a musician and poet who traveled from place to place to entertain people during the Middle Ages.

definition: "The name of several aromatic labiate plants  mostly of the genus Mentha yielding odoriferous essential oils by distillation. See Mentha."
simplified_definition: a plant with a strong, pleasant smell whose leaves are used as a flavoring. Peppermint and spearmint are members of the mint family.

definition: "The number from which another number is to be subtracted."
simplified_definition: a number from which another number is subtracted.

definition: "Less; requiring to be subtracted; negative; as  a minus quantity."
simplified_definition: made less by subtracting.

definition: "To set down a short sketch or note of; to jot down; to make a minute or a brief summary of."
simplified_definition: a unit of time equal to sixty seconds or one sixtieth of an hour.

definition: "A militiaman who was to be ready to march at a moment's notice;  a term used in the American Revolution."
simplified_definition: an American soldier of the Revolutionary War, who was ready to fight on a minute's notice.

definition: "A wonder or wonderful thing."
simplified_definition: an event that cannot be explained by the known laws of nature and is thought to be caused by a power not of the earth.

definition: "Wonderworking."
simplified_definition: of the nature of a miracle.

definition: "An optical effect  sometimes seen on the ocean but more frequently in deserts due to total reflection of light at the surface common to two strata of air differently heated. The reflected image is seen commonly in an inverted position while the real object may or may not be in sight. When the surface is horizontal and below the eye the appearance is that of a sheet of water in which the object is seen reflected; when the reflecting surface is above the eye the image is seen projected against the sky. The fata Morgana and looming are species of mirage."
simplified_definition: an illusion in which something is seen in the distance but is not really there. A mirage often occurs in the desert or on hot pavement, creating the illusion of water. A mirage is caused when light is reflected by air masses of different temperatures.

definition: "To reflect  as in a mirror."
simplified_definition: a smooth surface that reflects an image of whatever is in front of it. A mirror is usually made of glass with a coat of shiny metal on the back.

definition: "A prefix used adjectively and adverbially in the sense of amiss  wrong ill wrongly unsuitably; as misdeed mislead mischief miscreant."
simplified_definition: a prefix that means bad or wrong.

definition: "To behave ill; to conduct one's self improperly;  often used with a reciprocal pronoun."
simplified_definition: to act or behave badly.

definition: "To calculate erroneously; to judge wrongly."
simplified_definition: to calculate or judge incorrectly.

definition: "Mixed; mingled; consisting of several things; of diverse sorts; promiscuous; heterogeneous; as  a miscellaneous collection."
simplified_definition: made up of many different kinds.

definition: "To do harm to."
simplified_definition: bad behavior that is often playful but can be annoying or dangerous to others.

definition: "Causing mischief; harmful; hurtful;  now often applied where the evil is done carelessly or in sport; as  a mischievous child."
simplified_definition: tending to behave in an annoying or mildly harmful way.

definition: "Wrong conduct; bad behavior; mismanagement."
simplified_definition: wrong behavior or conduct.

definition: "To count erroneously."
simplified_definition: to count incorrectly.

definition: "A kind of large earth auger."
simplified_definition: a greedy, stingy person who lives in a poor way in order to save money.

definition: "Very unhappy; wretched."
simplified_definition: very unhappy; wretched.

definition: "Great unhappiness; extreme pain of body or mind; wretchedness; distress; woe."
simplified_definition: a condition in which one is very unhappy or suffers very much.

definition: "Bad fortune or luck; calamity; an evil accident; disaster; mishap; mischance."
simplified_definition: an instance of something very bad or unlucky happening.

definition: "Evil premonition; doubt; distrust."
simplified_definition: a feeling of worry, doubt, or fear.

definition: "Evil accident; ill luck; misfortune; mischance."
simplified_definition: an unlucky event; accident.

definition: "To lay in a place not recollected; to lose."
simplified_definition: to put somewhere and forget where; lose.

definition: "To lead into a wrong way or path; to lead astray; to guide into error; to cause to mistake; to deceive."
simplified_definition: to guide in a wrong direction.

definition: "To put in a wrong place; to set or place on an improper or unworthy object; as  he misplaced his confidence."
simplified_definition: to put in a wrong place; lose.

definition: "A mistake in printing; a deviation from the copy; as  a book full of misprints."
simplified_definition: a mistake in printing.

definition: "To pronounce incorrectly."
simplified_definition: to pronounce the wrong way.

definition: "of Misread"
simplified_definition: to read or understand incorrectly.

definition: "Harm from mistake."
simplified_definition: to fail to hit, catch, reach, cross, or touch.

definition: "Having a bad or ugly form."
simplified_definition: badly formed or shaped.

definition: "Capable of being thrown; adapted for hurling or to be projected from the hand  or from any instrument or rngine so as to strike an object at a distance."
simplified_definition: an object or weapon that is thrown or shot at a target that is far away.

definition: "Absent from the place where it was expected to be found; lost; wanting; not present when called or looked for."
simplified_definition: not where it should be; absent.

definition: "Dismission; discharge from service."
simplified_definition: a group of people sent to a foreign land to set up relations and to start trade or religious work.

definition: "One who is sent on a mission; especially  one sent to propagate religion."
simplified_definition: a person who is sent by a church or religious order to a foreign country to teach, convert, heal, or serve.

definition: "To spell incorrectly."
simplified_definition: to spell in an incorrect way.

definition: "Visible watery vapor suspended in the atmosphere  at or near the surface of the earth; fog."
simplified_definition: a mass or cloud of tiny water drops in the air.

definition: "To substitute in thought or perception; as  to mistake one person for another."
simplified_definition: a thought or action that is not correct; error.

definition: "Erroneous; wrong; as  a mistaken notion."
simplified_definition: being an error.

definition: "To be needful or of use."
simplified_definition: a title of respect placed before a man's last name. It is usually abbreviated as "Mr."

definition: "A parasitic evergreen plant of Europe   bearing a glutinous fruit. When found upon the oak where it is rare it was an object of superstitious regard among the Druids. A bird lime is prepared from its fruit."
simplified_definition: a poisonous, evergreen plant that has white berries and small, yellow flowers. Mistletoe is a parasite that grows on trees.

definition: "of Mistake"
simplified_definition: past tense of "mistake."

definition: "To treat amiss; to abuse."
simplified_definition: to treat badly.

definition: "A woman having power  authority or ownership; a woman who exercises authority is chief etc.; the female head of a family a school etc."
simplified_definition: a woman in charge of something.

definition: "To regard with jealousy or suspicion; to suspect; to doubt the integrity of; to distrust."
simplified_definition: lack of confidence or trust; doubt.

definition: "Accompained with mist; characterized by the presence of mist; obscured by  or overspread with mist; as misty weather; misty mountains; a misty atmosphere."
simplified_definition: made up of mist or looking like mist.

definition: "To misconceive; to mistake; to miscomprehend; to take in a wrong sense."
simplified_definition: to fail to understand correctly; give the wrong meaning to.

definition: "Disagreement; difference of opinion; dissension; quarrel."
simplified_definition: a failure to understand correctly.

definition: "of Misunderstand"
simplified_definition: not understood correctly.

definition: "To treat or use improperly; to use to a bad purpose; to misapply; as  to misuse one's talents."
simplified_definition: a wrong or incorrect use.

definition: "A small weight; one twentieth of a grain."
simplified_definition: a tiny animal that is related to the spider. Most mites are parasites and live on other animals or plants.

definition: "A mitten; also  a covering for the wrist and hand and not for the fingers."
simplified_definition: a baseball glove.

definition: "A covering for the hand  worn to defend it from cold or injury. It differs from a glove in not having a separate sheath for each finger."
simplified_definition: a covering for the hand, worn for warmth. Mittens have one section for the thumb and one section for the four fingers.

definition: "To unite with in company; to join; to associate."
simplified_definition: to put different things together so that the parts become one.

definition: "of Mix"
simplified_definition: blended together; combined.

definition: "One who  or that which mixes."
simplified_definition: a device used for mixing different things together.

definition: "An organ stop  comprising from two to five ranges of pipes used only in combination with the foundation and compound stops;  called also furniture stop. It consists of high harmonics or overtones of the ground tone."
simplified_definition: something that is made from combining different things into one.

definition: adv.   n." "More;  usually more in number."
simplified_definition: abbreviation of "Missouri."

definition: "A low prolonged sound  articulate or not indicative of pain or of grief; a low groan."
simplified_definition: a long, low sound of pain, grief, or sorrow.

definition: "A deep trench around the rampart of a castle or other fortified place  sometimes filled with water; a ditch."
simplified_definition: a deep ditch dug around a castle, fort, or town for protection against enemies. Moats are usually filled with water.

definition: "A mobcap."
simplified_definition: a large crowd of angry or excited people.

definition: "Characterized by an extreme degree of fluidity; moving or flowing with great freedom; as  benzine and mercury are mobile liquids;  opposed to viscous viscoidal or oily."
simplified_definition: able to move or be moved easily from one place or position to another.

definition: "A shoe made of deerskin  or other soft leather the sole and upper part being one piece. It is the customary shoe worn by the American Indians."
simplified_definition: a soft leather shoe or slipper without a heel. Moccasins were first made and worn by American Indians.

definition: "Imitating reality  but not real; false; counterfeit; assumed; sham."
simplified_definition: to make fun of in a mean way.

definition: "Variety; gradation; degree."
simplified_definition: a way of doing something.

definition: "To plan or form after a pattern; to form in model; to form a model or pattern for; to shape; to mold; to fashion; as  to model a house or a government; to model an edifice according to the plan delineated."
simplified_definition: an example that should be copied or an ideal that others are compared to.

definition: "One of a party in the Church of Scotland in the th century  and part of the th professing moderation in matters of church government in discipline and in doctrine."
simplified_definition: not too much or too little; within limits.

definition: "Of or pertaining to the present time  or time not long past; late; not ancient or remote in past time; of recent period; as modern days ages or time; modern authors; modern fashions; modern taste; modern practice."
simplified_definition: having to do with the present or current times.

definition: "To render modern; to adapt to modern person or things; to cause to conform to recent or present usage or taste."
simplified_definition: to make modern; bring up to date.

definition: "Restraining within due limits of propriety; not forward  bold boastful or presumptious; rather retiring than pushing one's self forward; not obstructive; as a modest youth; a modest man."
simplified_definition: not thinking too highly of oneself; humble.

definition: "To change somewhat the form or qualities of; to alter somewhat; as  to modify a contrivance adapted to some mechanical purpose; to modify the terms of a contract."
simplified_definition: to change in some way; alter.

definition: "A model or measure."
simplified_definition: a part of a device or machine that can be separated from the main section.

definition: "One of certain ruffians who infested the streets of London in the time of Addison  and took the name from the Mohawk Indians."
simplified_definition: an important river of New York State. It flows east from central New York toward the Atlantic.

definition: "Moderately wet; damp; humid; not dry; as  a moist atmosphere or air."
simplified_definition: slightly or somewhat wet.

definition: "To make damp; to wet in a small degree."
simplified_definition: to make or become slightly wet.

definition: "That which moistens or makes damp or wet; exuding fluid; liquid in small quantity."
simplified_definition: a small amount of liquid in the air or on a surface.

definition: "Of or pertaining to a mass of matter;  said of the properties or motions of masses  as distinguished from those of molecules or atoms."
simplified_definition: a large tooth located in the back of the mouth, with a broad biting surface used for grinding food.

definition: "The thick  brown or dark colored viscid uncrystallizable sirup which drains from sugar in the process of manufacture; any thick viscid sweet sirup made from vegetable juice or sap as of the sorghum or maple. See Treacle."
simplified_definition: a thick, sweet dark brown syrup made from sugar cane.

definition: "Alt. of Mould"
simplified_definition: a fungus that grows on the surface of plant or animal materials such as food or leather. Some kinds of mold are fuzzy or fluffy. Penicillin is a kind of mold.

definition: "Alt. of Moulding"
simplified_definition: the act of shaping or forming something.

definition: "A spot; a stain; a mark which discolors or disfigures."
simplified_definition: a small, permanent spot on the skin. Moles are usually brown and sometimes slightly raised.

definition: "The smallest part of any substance which possesses the characteristic properties and qualities of that substance  and which can exist alone in a free state."
simplified_definition: the smallest unit of a substance that has all the properties of that substance. A molecule is made up of a single atom or group of atoms.

definition: "One of the Mollusca."
simplified_definition: a member of a group of invertebrate animals that live in water. Most kinds of mollusks live in the ocean and have soft bodies covered by a shell. Snails, clams, squid, and octopuses are examples of mollusks.

definition: "imp. of Melt."
simplified_definition: to shed or cast off skin, feathers, fur, or horns, and grow a new covering.

definition: "Melted; being in a state of fusion  esp. when the liquid state is produced by a high degree of heat; as molten iron."
simplified_definition: made liquid by very high heat.

definition: "Impulsive power; force; momentum."
simplified_definition: a very short amount of time.

definition: "Done in a moment; continuing only a moment; lasting a very short time; as  a momentary pang."
simplified_definition: lasting only a moment.

definition: "Of moment or consequence; very important; weighty; as  a momentous decision; momentous affairs."
simplified_definition: very important.

definition: "The quantity of motion in a moving body  being always proportioned to the quantity of matter multiplied into the velocity; impetus."
simplified_definition: strength of movement.

definition: "Superior to others; preeminent; supreme; ruling."
simplified_definition: a ruler such as a king, queen, or emperor.

definition: "A system of government in which the chief ruler is a monarch."
simplified_definition: government by or in the name of a king, queen, or similar ruler, whose power may be strong or limited.

definition: "A house of religious retirement  or of secusion from ordinary temporal concerns especially for monks;  more rarely applied to such a house for females."
simplified_definition: a community of monks, or the buildings used by such a community.

definition: "The second day of the week; the day following Sunday."
simplified_definition: the second day of the week. Monday comes between Sunday and Tuesday.

definition: "Of or pertaining to money  or consisting of money; pecuniary."
simplified_definition: having to do with currency or money.

definition: "In general  wealth; property; as he has much money in land or in stocks; to make or lose money."
simplified_definition: the coins or paper notes of a country used to buy things or pay for services.

definition: "One of the Mongols."
simplified_definition: a person who was born in or is a citizen of Mongolia.

definition: "Alt. of Mongoos"
simplified_definition: a mammal related to the ferret, known for its ability to kill poisonous snakes.

definition: "The progeny resulting from a cross between two breeds  as of domestic animals; anything of mixed breed."
simplified_definition: a plant or animal that is a mix of two or more breeds or kinds.

definition: "Any large Old World lizard of the genus Varanus; esp.  the Egyptian species  which is useful because it devours the eggs and young of the crocodile. It is sometimes five or six feet long."
simplified_definition: a student given the task of helping to keep order within a school.

definition: "The European bullfinch."
simplified_definition: a man who has joined other men in a religious community and taken vows to live a simple life.

definition: "Any species of Quadrumana  except the lemurs."
simplified_definition: a small mammal that is one of the primates. Monkeys have very flexible hands and feet. Some kinds of monkeys have tails which they use to hang from trees. Different kinds of monkeys live in Central and South America, Africa, and Asia.

definition: "A character or cipher composed of two or more letters interwoven or combined so as to represent a name  or a part of it . Monograms are often used on seals ornamental pins rings buttons and by painters engravers etc. to distinguish their works."
simplified_definition: a design made from two or more initials. A monogram is used to mark or decorate things such as a person's clothing or writing paper.

definition: "A speech uttered by a person alone; soliloquy; also  talk or discourse in company in the strain of a soliloquy; as an account in monologue."
simplified_definition: a long speech or reading given by a single speaker.

definition: "To acquire a monopoly of; to have or get the exclusive privilege or means of dealing in  or the exclusive possession of; to engross the whole of; as to monopolize the coffee trade; to monopolize land."
simplified_definition: to get or keep sole control of; have for oneself alone; take over.

definition: "The exclusive power  or privilege of selling a commodity; the exclusive power right or privilege of dealing in some article or of trading in some market; sole command of the traffic in anything however obtained; as the proprietor of a patented article is given a monopoly of its sale for a limited time; chartered trading companies have sometimes had a monopoly of trade with remote regions; a combination of traders may get a monopoly of a particular product."
simplified_definition: complete control over a service or product within a given area.

definition: "A single unvaried tone or sound."
simplified_definition: speech with little or no change in tone.

definition: "Uttered in one unvarying tone; continued with dull uniformity; characterized by monotony; without change or variety; wearisome."
simplified_definition: not interesting because of having to do the same thing over and over.

definition: "The common title of civility in France in speaking to  or of a man; Mr. or Sir."
simplified_definition: the French title for a man meaning "Mister" or "Sir."

definition: "A wind blowing part of the year from one direction  alternating with a wind from the opposite direction;  a term applied particularly to periodical winds of the Indian Ocean which blow from the southwest from the latter part of May to the middle of September and from the northeast from about the middle of October to the middle of December."
simplified_definition: a wind system of the Indian Ocean that blows from the southwest in the summer and the northeast in the winter. The southwest monsoon brings with it a season of heavy rain.

definition: "To make monstrous."
simplified_definition: a large, frightening imaginary creature.

definition: "Extraordinary on account of ugliness  viciousness or wickedness; hateful; horrible; dreadful."
simplified_definition: so ugly that it is scary.

definition: "One of the twelve portions into which the year is divided; the twelfth part of a year  corresponding nearly to the length of a synodic revolution of the moon  whence the name. In popular use a period of four weeks is often called a month."
simplified_definition: one of the twelve parts of a year.

definition: "Done  happening payable published etc. once a month or every month; as a monthly visit; monthly charges; a monthly installment; a monthly magazine."
simplified_definition: showing up or happening once a month.

definition: "Something which stands  or remains to keep in remembrance what is past; a memorial."
simplified_definition: something built in memory of a person, event, or special deed.

definition: n."  "See Mo."
simplified_definition: to make the long, low sound of a cow.

definition: "Manner; style; mode; logical form; musical style; manner of action or being. See Mode which is the preferable form)."
simplified_definition: the way a person feels at a certain time.

definition: "Subject to varying moods  especially to states of mind which are unamiable or depressed."
simplified_definition: having moods that change often or without a pattern.

definition: "To expose to the rays of the moon."
simplified_definition: the earth's natural satellite. It revolves around the earth from west to east in about  days. The moon joins the earth in its orbit around the sun. The moon does not give off light. Instead, its shine comes from the light it reflects from the sun.

definition: "A ray of light from the moon."
simplified_definition: a ray of light from the moon.

definition: "The light of the moon."
simplified_definition: the light of the moon.

definition: "Fig.: To secure  or fix firmly."
simplified_definition: an area of land that is open and wet. Heather and other plants that need acid soil grow on moors.

definition: "A large cervine mammal  native of the Northern United States and Canada. The adult male is about as large as a horse and has very large palmate antlers. It closely resembles the European elk and by many zoologists is considered the same species. See Elk."
simplified_definition: the largest kind of deer. Male moose have very large antlers that are shaped like a hand with spread fingers. Moose are mammals with hooves. They live in the northern United States and in Canada. Moose also live in northern Europe and Asia, where they are called elk.

definition: "To rub or wipe with a mop  or as with a mop; as to mop a floor; to mop one's face with a handkerchief."
simplified_definition: a tool with rags, a sponge, or yarn attached to one end of a long handle. A mop is used to wash floors or decks.

definition: "To be dull and spiritless."
simplified_definition: to act dull and sad; sulk; pout.

definition: "of Mope"
simplified_definition: a heavy bicycle fitted with a motor that does not have much power.

definition: "To moralize."
simplified_definition: having to do with what is right and what is wrong in how a person acts.

definition: "The moral condition  or the condition in other respects so far as it is affected by or dependent upon moral considerations such as zeal spirit hope and confidence; mental state as of a body of men an army and the like."
simplified_definition: the state of mind of a person or group; spirit.

definition: "The practice of the moral duties; rectitude of life; conformity to the standard of right; virtue; as  we often admire the politeness of men whose morality we question."
simplified_definition: inner beliefs about what is right and what is wrong that make one choose the path of right behavior.

definition: "A root."
simplified_definition: in greater number, amount, or degree.

definition: "Beyond what has been said; further; besides; in addition; furthermore; also; likewise."
simplified_definition: beyond what has already been said; in addition; also.

definition: "Of or pertaining to the Mormons; as  the Mormon religion; Mormon practices."
simplified_definition: a member of the Church of Jesus Christ of Latterday Saints.

definition: "Pertaining to the first part or early part of the day; being in the early part of the day; as  morning dew; morning light; morning service."
simplified_definition: the early part of the day, beginning when the sun rises and ending about noon.

definition: "A fine kind of leather  prepared commonly from goatskin  and tanned with sumac and dyed of various colors;  said to have been first made by the Moors."
simplified_definition: a country in northern Africa. Rabat is the capital of Morocco.

definition: "A small quantity; a little piece; a fragment."
simplified_definition: a small piece that is the right size for one bite; bit.

definition: "A being subject to death; a human being; man."
simplified_definition: not living forever; having to die some day.

definition: "A strong vessel  commonly in form of an inverted bell in which substances are pounded or rubbed with a pestle."
simplified_definition: a heavy bowl in which things are ground or pounded into powder with a tool called a pestle.

definition: "Hence: To pledge  either literally or figuratively; to make subject to a claim or obligation."
simplified_definition: a written agreement by which a bank or other institution agrees to lend money so that one can buy a property. The bank holds a claim to this property until the money is paid back.

definition: "Of or pertaining to Moses  the leader of the Israelites or established through his agency; as the Mosaic law rites or institutions."
simplified_definition: a picture or design made with many small colored pieces of glass, tile, or stone. These pieces are fitted together and cemented into place.

definition: "Of or pertaining to the Mohammedans; Mohammedan; as  Moslem lands; the Moslem faith."
simplified_definition: another spelling for Muslim.

definition: "A Mohammedan church or place of religious worship."
simplified_definition: a Muslim place of worship.

definition: "Any one of various species of gnats of the genus Culex and allied genera. The females have a proboscis containing  within the sheathlike labium six fine sharp needlelike organs with which they puncture the skin of man and animals to suck the blood. These bites when numerous cause in many persons considerable irritation and swelling with some pain. The larvae and pupae called wigglers are aquatic."
simplified_definition: an insect with a thin body and two wings. The females bite and suck the blood of animals and people. Some mosquitoes spread disease.

definition: "A cryptogamous plant of a cellular structure  with distinct stem and simple leaves. The fruit is a small capsule usually opening by an apical lid and so discharging the spores. There are many species collectively termed Musci growing on the earth on rocks and trunks of trees etc. and a few in running water."
simplified_definition: a small, green plant without flowers that grows in soft, thick clumps. Moss grows in mats on rocks, trees, and wet ground.

definition: "Consisting of the greatest number or quantity; greater in number or quantity than all the rest; nearly all."
simplified_definition: in the greatest number, amount, or degree .

definition: "For the greatest part; for the most part; chiefly; in the main."
simplified_definition: for the most part; mainly.

definition: "Anything which gradually and silently eats  consumes or wastes any other thing."
simplified_definition: an insect that has broad wings and flies mostly at night. Moths look like butterflies, but they usually have thicker bodies and bushy antennae and are less colorful.

definition: "To become like  or full of mother or thick matter as vinegar."
simplified_definition: a female parent.

definition: "The mother of one's husband or wife."
simplified_definition: the mother of a person's husband or wife.

definition: "In a manner of a mother."
simplified_definition: of or like a mother.

definition: "The act  process or state of changing place or position; movement; the passing of a body from one place or position to another whether voluntary or involuntary;  opposed to rest."
simplified_definition: the process, manner, or continuous action of moving; movement.

definition: "To prompt or incite by a motive or motives; to move."
simplified_definition: an idea, need, desire, or impulse that causes a person to act in a particular way or do a particular thing; reason.

definition: "A prime mover; a machine by means of which a source of power  as steam moving water electricity etc. is made available for doing mechanical work."
simplified_definition: a machine that causes motion or power.

definition: "A sentence  phrase or word prefixed to an essay discourse chapter canto or the like suggestive of its subject matter; a short suggestive expression of a guiding principle; a maxim."
simplified_definition: a short saying used as a reminder of a belief or rules of behavior.

definition: "of Mould"
simplified_definition: a spelling of "molding" used in Canada and Britain. See "molding" for more information.

definition: "A ball or globe forming part of the regalia of an emperor or other sovereign. It is encircled with bands  enriched with precious stones and surmounted with a cross;  called also globe."
simplified_definition: a raised pile; heap.

definition: "The cardboard or cloth on which a drawing  photograph or the like is mounted; a mounting."
simplified_definition: a mountain or high hill.

definition: "Like a mountain; mountainous; vast; very great."
simplified_definition: a land mass with great height and steep sides that is higher than a hill.

definition: "An inhabitant of a mountain; one who lives among mountains."
simplified_definition: a person who climbs mountains for sport.

definition: "Full of  or containing mountains; as the mountainous country of the Swiss."
simplified_definition: having many mountains.

definition: "To express or to feel grief or sorrow; to grieve; to be sorrowful; to lament; to be in a state of grief or sadness."
simplified_definition: to feel or act very sad because of a death or great loss; grieve.

definition: "Grieving; sorrowing; lamenting."
simplified_definition: acts or feelings that express great sadness.

definition: "To watch for and catch mice."
