simplified_definition: a very small mammal with gray or brown fur. Mice are rodents. They have pointed faces, round ears, and long tails with no fur. Different kinds of mice are found in many parts of the world.

definition: "Mustache."
simplified_definition: another spelling of mustache.

definition: "A wry face; a grimace; a mow."
simplified_definition: the opening in the face through which one eats, breathes, and makes sounds.

definition: "Hence  a small quantity."
simplified_definition: the amount taken into the mouth at one time; bite or sip.

definition: "The part of a musical or other instrument to which the mouth is applied in using it; as  the mouthpiece of a bugle or of a tobacco pipe."
simplified_definition: a part of an object that is put into or near the mouth. Mouthpieces may be used to help pass speech and other sounds from one person to another or to make music.

definition: "Property not attached to the soil."
simplified_definition: able to be moved; not stuck in place.

definition: "To apply to  as for aid."
simplified_definition: to change position or place.

definition: "A system of mechanism for transmitting motion of a definite character  or for transforming motion; as the wheelwork of a watch."
simplified_definition: change in position or location.

definition: "One who  or that which excites instigates or causes movement change etc.; as movers of sedition."
simplified_definition: a person or company whose business is to move furniture from one home or business to another.

definition: "Changing place or posture; causing motion or action; as  a moving car or power."
simplified_definition: that changes place or position.

definition: "To make mouths."
simplified_definition: to cut down with a blade or machine.

definition: "One who  or that which mows; a mowing machine; as a lawn mower."
simplified_definition: a machine for mowing grass or a person who mows.

definition: "of Mow"
simplified_definition: a past participle of "mow."

definition: "The customary abbreviation of Mister in writing and printing. See Master  ."
simplified_definition: abbreviation of "Mister," which is often used as a title of respect before a man's last name.

definition: "The customary abbreviation of Mistress when used as a title of courtesy  in writing and printing."
simplified_definition: abbreviation of "Mistress," which is a title of respect used before a married woman's name.

definition: "To a great degree or extent; greatly; abundantly; far; nearly."
simplified_definition: great in degree, number, or amount.

definition: "A gummy or gelatinous substance produced in certain plants by the action of water on the cell wall  as in the seeds of quinces of flax etc."
simplified_definition: a sticky substance used as glue.

definition: "Any other animal fluid of a viscid quality  as the synovial fluid which lubricates the cavities of the joints;  improperly so used."
simplified_definition: a slimy, slightly sticky material that coats and protects certain parts of the body, such as the inside of the nose and throat.

definition: "To make muddy or turbid."
simplified_definition: wet earth that has been turned soft and sticky.

definition: "A state of being turbid or confused; hence  intellectual cloudiness or dullness."
simplified_definition: to cause to be confused; mix up.

definition: "Abounding in mud; besmeared or dashed with mud; as  a muddy road or path; muddy boots."
simplified_definition: covered with or full of mud.

definition: "A blown cylinder of glass which is afterward flattened out to make a sheet."
simplified_definition: a tube made of warm, heavy cloth or fur. People hold their hands inside the muff to keep them warm.

definition: "A light  spongy cylindrical cake used for breakfast and tea."
simplified_definition: a small roll that is similar to a cake but usually less sweet. Muffins are usually shaped like a cupcake and often contain nuts or bits of fruit. Muffins are a single serving and are often eaten warm or toasted.

definition: "A small oven for baking and fixing the colors of painted or printed pottery  without exposing the pottery to the flames of the furnace or kiln."
simplified_definition: to wrap or cover so as to protect or keep warm .

definition: "Anything used in muffling; esp.  a scarf for protecting the head and neck in cold weather; a tippet."
simplified_definition: clothing that is wrapped around the neck for warmth; scarf.

definition: "The face or mouth."
simplified_definition: a drinking cup with a handle. Mugs are made of glass, plastic, metal, and pottery.

definition: "Moist; damp; moldy; as  muggy straw."
simplified_definition: warm and damp so as to make breathing difficult.

definition: "The berry or fruit of any tree of the genus Morus; also  the tree itself. See Morus."
simplified_definition: any of several shade trees that have broad leaves and berrylike fruits.

definition: "A hybrid animal; specifically  one generated between an ass and a mare sometimes a horse and a sheass. See Hinny."
simplified_definition: the offspring of a male donkey and a female horse. Mules are as large as horses, with the longer ears of a donkey. Mules cannot produce young. People breed mules to use for riding or for pulling loads.

definition: "A quantity containing another quantity a number of times without a remainder."
simplified_definition: having or made of more than one part; many.

definition: "The number which is to be multiplied by another number called the multiplier. See Note under Multiplication."
simplified_definition: a number that is to be multiplied by another.

definition: "The act or process of multiplying  or of increasing in number; the state of being multiplied; as the multiplication of the human species by natural generation."
simplified_definition: an arithmetic operation that combines two numbers to give one number, called a product.

definition: "One who  or that which multiplies or increases number."
simplified_definition: a number by which another number is multiplied.

definition: "To add  to itself a certain number of times; to find the product of by multiplication; thus  multiplied by  produces the number ; to multiply two numbers. See the Note under Multiplication."
simplified_definition: to increase the number, degree, or amount of.

definition: "A great number of persons collected together; a numerous collection of persons; a crowd; an assembly."
simplified_definition: a large number of people, animals, or things.

definition: "Silent; not speaking."
simplified_definition: an informal British word for mother. "Mum" has the same meaning as "mom."

definition: "To utter with a low  inarticulate voice."
simplified_definition: to speak low and in a way that is not easy to understand; mutter.

definition: "To embalm and dry as a mummy; to make into  or like a mummy."
simplified_definition: to make a dead body into a mummy by using special chemicals and wrapping it tightly in cloth. This process preserves the body.

definition: "A dead body embalmed and dried after the manner of the ancient Egyptians; also  a body preserved by any means in a dry state from the process of putrefaction."
simplified_definition: a dead body that has been preserved with special chemicals and wrapped in cloth. The ancient Egyptians are famous for their mummies.

definition: "A specific infectious febrile disorder characterized by a nonsuppurative inflammation of the parotid glands; epidemic or infectious parotitis."
simplified_definition: a disease that children get that causes the glands to swell.

definition: "To chew with a grinding  crunching sound as a beast chews provender; to chew deliberately or in large mouthfuls."
simplified_definition: to chew in a noisy way, making a crunching sound.

definition: "Of or pertaining to a city or a corporation having the right of administering local government; as  municipal rights; municipal officers."
simplified_definition: of or having to do with a local government or unit of government.

definition: "Of or pertaining to a wall; being on  or in a wall; growing on or against a wall; as a mural quadrant."
simplified_definition: a large picture painted on or made a part of a wall or ceiling.

definition: "To kill with premediated malice; to kill  willfully  deliberately and unlawfully. See Murder n."
simplified_definition: the deliberate and unlawful killing of a person.

definition: "Dark; obscure; gloomy."
simplified_definition: dark or gloomy.

definition: "A low  confused and indistinct sound like that of running water."
simplified_definition: a sound that is soft, muffled, and ongoing, like the sound made by quiet conversation.

definition: "An organ which  by its contraction produces motion."
simplified_definition: tissue in the body of animals and humans that moves parts of the body. Muscle is made up of bundles of fibers that move the body by tightening and relaxing.

definition: "Well furnished with muscles; having welldeveloped muscles; brawny; hence  strong; powerful; vigorous; as a muscular body or arm."
simplified_definition: having to do with muscle.

definition: "To wonder."
simplified_definition: to think about something silently or for a long time.

definition: "A repository or a collection of natural  scientific or literary curiosities or of works of art."
simplified_definition: a building where collections of objects that are important to history, art, or science are kept and shown to the public.

definition: "To notch  cut or indent as cloth with a stamp."
simplified_definition: a thick, soft cereal that is made of corn meal boiled in water or milk.

definition: "Any large fungus  especially one of the genus Agaricus; a toadstool. Several species are edible; but many are very poisonous."
simplified_definition: a fungus with a stalk and a cap that looks like a small umbrella. Some kinds of mushrooms can be eaten; other kinds are poisonous. Mushrooms live in damp places and are the fruiting bodies of certain kinds of fungi.

definition: "Soft like mush; figuratively  goodnaturedly weak and effusive; weakly sentimental."
simplified_definition: soft and thick, like mush.

definition: "Melody; a rhythmical and otherwise agreeable succession of tones."
simplified_definition: sound with tones and rhythm that can be listened to and enjoyed. Music can be made by voices or instruments.

definition: "Of or pertaining to music; having the qualities of music; or the power of producing music; devoted to music; melodious; harmonious; as  musical proportion; a musical voice; musical instruments; a musical sentence; musical persons."
simplified_definition: like music rather than noise; having qualities similar to melody or harmony.

definition: "One skilled in the art or science of music; esp.  a skilled singer or performer on a musical instrument."
simplified_definition: a person skilled at playing, singing, or writing music.

definition: "A substance of a reddish brown color  and when fresh of the consistence of honey obtained from a bag being behind the navel of the male musk deer. It has a slightly bitter taste but is specially remarkable for its powerful and enduring odor. It is used in medicine as a stimulant antispasmodic. The term is also applied to secretions of various other animals having a similar odor."
simplified_definition: a substance with a strong smell made by the gland of a certain kind of male deer. Musk is used in making some perfumes.

definition: "The male of the sparrow hawk."
simplified_definition: a heavy gun with a long barrel. Muskets were carried on the shoulder. They were used over three hundred years ago, before rifles were invented.

definition: "A soldier armed with a musket."
simplified_definition: a soldier who carried and used a musket.

definition: "The fruit of a cucubritaceous plant   having a peculiar aromatic flavor and cultivated in many varieties the principal sorts being the cantaloupe of oval form and yellowish flesh and the smaller nutmeg melon with greenish flesh. See Illust. of Melon."
simplified_definition: a round melon with juicy, sweet flesh that ranges in color from almost white to light orange or green. A cantaloupe is a kind of muskmelon.

definition: "The desman."
simplified_definition: a North American rodent that lives in and near water. Muskrats are about one foot long with brown fur and a long tail. They make burrows in the banks of streams or build reed huts in marshes and ponds.

definition: "See Moslem."
simplified_definition: having to do with the religion of Islam.

definition: "A thin cotton  white dyed or printed. The name is also applied to coarser and heavier cotton goods; as shirting and sheeting muslins."
simplified_definition: a sturdy cotton cloth used for sheets and clothing.

definition: "To disarrange  as clothing; to rumple."
simplified_definition: to make a mess of; put into disorder .

definition: "Any one of many species of marine bivalve shells of the genus Mytilus  and related genera of the family Mytidae. The common mussel  and the larger or horse mussel  inhabiting the shores both of Europe and America are edible. The former is extensively used as food in Europe."
simplified_definition: an animal with a soft body and a hard shell made of two hinged pieces that open and close. Many kinds of mussels live in the ocean and in fresh water. Mussels are mollusks and are closely related to clams and oysters. People eat some kinds of mussels.

definition: "The expressed juice of the grape  or other fruit before fermentation."
simplified_definition: to be forced to; have to or need to.

definition: "That part of the beard which grows on the upper lip; hair left growing above the mouth."
simplified_definition: the hair that grows above a human's upper lip. This hair is often allowed to grow and then is cut or trimmed into shape.

definition: "The halfwild horse of the plains in Mexico  California etc. It is small hardy and easily sustained."
simplified_definition: a wild horse of the western plains of North America.

definition: "The name of several cruciferous plants of the genus Brassica   as white mustard  black mustard  wild mustard or charlock ."
simplified_definition: a group of plants native to Europe and Asia. Mustard plants have yellow flowers and seeds that grow in pods.

definition: "Something shown for imitation; a pattern."
simplified_definition: to cause to come together; assemble.

definition: "Dull; heavy; spiritless."
simplified_definition: having a taste or smell of mold; damp or stale.

definition: "A little utensil made of brass  ivory or other material so formed that it can be fixed in an erect position on the bridge of a violin or similar instrument in order to deaden or soften the tone."
simplified_definition: not able or willing to speak; silent.

definition: "Deprived of  or having lost an important part; mutilated."
simplified_definition: to destroy by cutting or tearing off a necessary part.

definition: "One guilty of mutiny."
simplified_definition: one who openly goes against the person or group in charge; one who takes part in a mutiny.

definition: "Insurrection against constituted authority  particularly military or naval authority; concerted revolt against the rules of discipline or the lawful commands of a superior officer; hence generally forcible resistance to rightful authority; insubordination."
simplified_definition: open disobeying or fighting against the leaders in charge; open rebellion against lawful authority.

definition: "To utter words indistinctly or with a low voice and lips partly closed; esp.  to utter indistinct complaints or angry expressions; to grumble; to growl."
simplified_definition: to speak in a low tone that is hard to understand; mumble.

definition: "A sheep."
simplified_definition: the meat of an adult sheep.

definition: "Reciprocally acting or related; reciprocally receiving and giving; reciprocally given and received; reciprocal; interchanged; as  a mutual love advantage assistance aversion etc."
simplified_definition: felt, said, or done by each for the other; shared by two or more people; given and received.

definition: "To bring the mouth or muzzle near."
simplified_definition: the part of the head of some animals that contains the nose, jaws, and mouth.

definition: "Of or belonging to me;  used always attributively; as  my body; my book;  mine is used in the predicate; as the book is mine. See Mine."
simplified_definition: belonging to me, done by me, or having to do with me.

definition: "A species of the genus Myrtus  especially Myrtus communis. The common myrtle has a shrubby upright stem eight or ten feet high. Its branches form a close full head thickly covered with ovate or lanceolate evergreen leaves. It has solitary axillary white or rosy flowers followed by black severalseeded berries. The ancients considered it sacred to Venus. The flowers leaves and berries are used variously in perfumery and as a condiment and the beautifully mottled wood is used in turning."
simplified_definition: a kind of shrub that has evergreen leaves and bears pink or white flowers and fragrant dark blue berries. Myrtle is found in the Mediterranean region and western Asia.

definition: "I or me in person;  used for emphasis  my own self or person; as I myself will do it; I have done it myself;  used also instead of me as the object of the first person of a reflexive verb without emphasis; as I will defend myself."
simplified_definition: used to emphasize "me" or "I."

definition: "Of or pertaining to mystery; containing a mystery; difficult or impossible to understand; obscure not revealed or explained; enigmatical; incomprehensible."
simplified_definition: full of or relating to mystery.

definition: "A dramatic representation of a Scriptural subject  often some event in the life of Christ; a dramatic composition of this character; as the Chester Mysteries consisting of dramas acted by various craft associations in that city in the early part of the th century."
simplified_definition: a matter that is secret or that cannot be known or explained.

definition: "To involve in mystery; to make obscure or difficult to understand; as  to mystify a passage of Scripture."
simplified_definition: to confuse or puzzle, often on purpose.

definition: "A story of great but unknown age which originally embodied a belief regarding some fact or phenomenon of experience  and in which often the forces of nature and of the soul are personified; an ancient legend of a god a hero the origin of a race etc.; a wonder story of prehistoric origin; a popular fable which is or has been received as historical."
simplified_definition: a story or group of stories that form part of the traditional knowledge of a society. Myths often use imaginative plots and characters to explain how the world began and why nature and people behave the way they do.

definition: "Of or relating to myths; described in a myth; of the nature of a myth; fabulous; imaginary; fanciful."
simplified_definition: having to do with or appearing in a myth.

definition: "A body of myths; esp.  the collective myths which describe the gods of a heathen people; as the mythology of the Greeks."
simplified_definition: a collection of myths.

definition: "A measure of space equal to half an M ; an en."
simplified_definition: symbol of the chemical element nitrogen.

definition: "No  not. See No."
simplified_definition: symbol of the chemical element sodium.

definition: "The summit of an eminence."
simplified_definition: to catch or seize; arrest.

definition: "A small horse; a pony; hence  any horse."
simplified_definition: a horse that has little value and cannot be used for hard work.

definition: "The terminal horny plate on the beak of ducks  and other allied birds."
simplified_definition: a slim, pointed metal rod with a flat top. A nail is hammered into pieces of wood or other material in order to fasten them together.

definition: "Having no clothes on; uncovered; nude; bare; as  a naked body; a naked limb; a naked sword."
simplified_definition: wearing no clothing; bare.

definition: "A suffix signifying dominion  jurisdiction; as bishopric the district over which a bishop exercises authority."
simplified_definition: a word or group of words by which something or someone is known.

definition: "By name; by particular mention; specifically; especially; expressly."
simplified_definition: that is to say; in other words. Used before stating more exactly who or what one is talking about.

definition: "A diminutive of Ann or Anne  the proper name."
simplified_definition: a person who is hired to take care of another person's children.

definition: "To have a short sleep; to be drowsy; to doze."
simplified_definition: the soft, fuzzy, or furry surface on cloth or leather.

definition: "A little towel  or small cloth esp. one for wiping the fingers and mouth at table."
simplified_definition: a piece of cloth or paper used to protect the clothing and to wipe the mouth and hands while eating.

definition: "Tending to cause sleepiness; serving to make sleepy; strong; heady; as  nappy ale."
simplified_definition: a British word for a baby's underwear of soft cloth or paper folded between the legs and fastened at the waist. "Nappy" has the same meaning as "diaper."

definition: "A genus of endogenous bulbous plants with handsome flowers  having a cupshaped crown within the sixlobed perianth and comprising the daffodils and jonquils of several kinds."
simplified_definition: a kind of plant that has yellow or white flowers and long, thin leaves. The narcissus grows from a bulb planted in the soil. Its flowers are shaped like a tube.

definition: "Having the properties of a narcotic; operating as a narcotic."
simplified_definition: a drug that causes a person to become sleepy or unconscious and that may be used as a medicine to dull pain or cause sleep. Narcotics can be dangerous when not used as a medicine and can become hard to give up.

definition: "To tell  rehearse or recite as a story; to relate the particulars of; to go through with in detail as an incident or transaction; to give an account of."
simplified_definition: to tell the tale or give an account of; relate.

definition: "Apt or inclined to relate stories  or to tell particulars of events; storytelling; garrulous."
simplified_definition: a story, description, or account of events.

definition: "One who narrates; one who relates a series of events or transactions."
simplified_definition: a person or character who tells a story.

definition: "To lessen the breadth of; to contract; to draw into a smaller compass; to reduce the width or extent of."
simplified_definition: not wide or broad.

definition: "One of the nasal bones."
simplified_definition: of the nose.

definition: "A genus of cruciferous plants  having white or yellowish flowers including several species of cress. They are found chiefly in wet or damp grounds and have a pungent biting taste."
simplified_definition: a kind of garden plant that grows close to the ground and has bright yellow, orange, or red flowers. Nasturtium leaves and flowers can be eaten.

definition: "Characterized by obcenity; indecent; indelicate; gross; filthy."
simplified_definition: disgusting to sight, smell, or taste; foul or filthy.

definition: "A part  or division of the people of the earth distinguished from the rest by common descent language or institutions; a race; a stock."
simplified_definition: a people living in the same region of the world and having a common history, language, and culture.

definition: "Of or pertaining to a nation; common to a whole people or race; public; general; as  a national government language dress custom calamity etc."
simplified_definition: of or having to do with an entire nation.

definition: "An idiom  trait or character peculiar to any nation."
simplified_definition: devotion to one's own nation; desire for one's nation to be successful or independent; patriotism.

definition: "The quality of being national  or strongly attached to one's own nation; patriotism."
simplified_definition: the condition of belonging to a particular nation by having been born there or by becoming a citizen.

definition: "Any of the live stock found in a region  as distinguished from such as belong to pure and distinct imported breeds."
simplified_definition: being the place of birth or origin.

definition: "Belonging to  to be taken in or referred to some system in which the base is ;  said or certain functions or numbers; as natural numbers those commencing at ; natural sines cosines etc. those taken in arcs whose radii are ."
simplified_definition: of or produced by nature; not made by humans.

definition: "One versed in natural science; a student of natural history  esp. of the natural history of animals."
simplified_definition: a person who studies the natural world, especially plants and animals.

definition: "To make natural; as  custom naturalizes labor or study."
simplified_definition: to make a citizen of; grant the rights of a citizen to.

definition: "In a natural manner or way; according to the usual course of things; spontaneously."
simplified_definition: in accordance with nature.

definition: "Constitution or quality of mind or character."
simplified_definition: basic character and qualities of a person or thing.

definition: "Nothing."
simplified_definition: the number zero.

definition: "Mischievous; perverse; froward; guilty of disobedient or improper conduct; as  a naughty child."
simplified_definition: not behaving or obeying; mischievous.

definition: "Seasickness; hence  any similar sickness of the stomach accompanied with a propensity to vomit; qualm; squeamishness of the stomach; loathing."
simplified_definition: a sick feeling in the stomach with the need to vomit.

definition: "Of or pertaining to seamen  to the art of navigation or to ships; as nautical skill."
simplified_definition: having to do with the sea, sailing, or sailors.

definition: "Having to do with shipping; of or pertaining to ships or a navy; consisting of ships; as  naval forces successes stores etc."
simplified_definition: having to do with a navy or its ships.

definition: "A mark or depression in the middle of the abdomen; the umbilicus. See Umbilicus."
simplified_definition: a round scar or hollow just below a person's waist. The navel is the spot where the umbilical cord was attached before the person's birth.

definition: "To joirney by water; to go in a vessel or ship; to perform the duties of a navigator; to use the waters as a highway or channel for commerce or communication; to sail."
simplified_definition: to plan, manage, or control the course of .

definition: "The act of navigating; the act of passing on water in ships or other vessels; the state of being navigable."
simplified_definition: the act or practice of setting a course for or finding one's way to a destination, especially by ship, aircraft, or other vehicle; the act or practice of navigating.

definition: "One who navigates or sails; esp.  one who direct the course of a ship or one who is skillful in the art of navigation; also a book which teaches the art of navigation; as Bowditch's Navigator."
simplified_definition: a person who charts, sets, and steers the course of a ship or aircraft.

definition: "A fleet of ships; an assemblage of merchantmen  or so many as sail in company."
simplified_definition: the part of a nation's military organization that conducts war on or over the sea.

definition: "Not this merely  but also; not only so but;  used to mark the addition or substitution of a more explicit or more emphatic phrase."
simplified_definition: no. The word "nay" used to be part of common speech but now is only used to say "no" in voting.

definition: "Nor."
simplified_definition: abbreviation of "Nebraska."

definition: "At a little distance  in place time manner or degree; not remote; nigh."
simplified_definition: to, at, or within a short distance from a person or thing.

definition: "In a near manner; not remotely; closely; intimately; almost."
simplified_definition: almost; just about but not quite.

definition: "Seeing distinctly at short distances only; shortsighted."
simplified_definition: able to see objects clearly only when they are near.

definition: "Cattle of the genus Bos  as distinguished from horses sheep and goats; an animal of the genus Bos; as a neat's tongue; a neat's foot."
simplified_definition: clean and in proper order, or liking to keep things that way; tidy.

definition: "A faint  cloudlike selfluminous mass of matter situated beyond the solar system among the stars. True nebulae are gaseous; but very distant star clusters often appear like them in the telescope."
simplified_definition: a cloud of dust or gas found between the stars. A nebula may seem either bright or dark, depending on how it reacts with light.

definition: "In a necessary manner; by necessity; unavoidably; indispensably."
simplified_definition: certain to be.

definition: "Such as must be; impossible to be otherwise; not to be avoided; inevitable."
simplified_definition: needed; essential.

definition: "The negation of freedom in voluntary action; the subjection of all phenomena  whether material or spiritual to inevitable causation; necessitarianism."
simplified_definition: a person or thing that is needed.

definition: "The part of an animal which connects the head and the trunk  and which in man and many other animals is more slender than the trunk."
simplified_definition: the part of the body of both human beings and animals that connects the head with the body.

definition: "A kerchief for the neck;  called also neck handkerchief."
simplified_definition: a square of cloth folded and tied about the neck.

definition: "A string of beads  etc. or any continuous band or chain worn around the neck as an ornament."
simplified_definition: jewelry worn around the neck. A necklace can be made of beads, precious stones, metals, or other materials.

definition: "A scarf  band or kerchief of silk etc. passing around the neck or collar and tied in front; a bow of silk etc. fastened in front of the neck."
simplified_definition: a strip of cloth worn around the neck, usually by men. A necktie is tucked under the collar of a shirt and knotted at the throat.

definition: "The drink of the gods ; hence  any delicious or inspiring beverage."
simplified_definition: the sweet liquid a plant makes that attracts insects and birds.

definition: "Nectareous."
simplified_definition: a type of peach with a smooth skin.

definition: "Of necessity. See Needs."
simplified_definition: something that one wants or must have.

definition: "A small instrument of steel  sharply pointed at one end with an eye to receive a thread  used in sewing."
simplified_definition: a thin instrument made of steel with a hole at one end for thread and a sharp point at the other. A needle is used for sewing cloth or closing wounds.

definition: "Having no need."
simplified_definition: of no use; not wanted.

definition: "The combination of timber and plaster making the outside framework of some houses."
simplified_definition: work done with a needle and thread as decoration; embroidery.

definition: "Distressed by want of the means of living; very por; indigent; necessitous."
simplified_definition: needing things such as food, money, family, or love.

definition: "To prove unreal or intrue; to disprove."
simplified_definition: saying or meaning "no."

definition: "Omission if attention or civilities; slight; as  neglect of strangers."
simplified_definition: to pay too little or no attention to.

definition: "Apt to neglect; customarily neglectful; characterized by negligence; careless; heedless; culpably careless; showing lack of attention; as  disposed in negligent order."
simplified_definition: not showing proper concern; careless.

definition: "To carry on negotiations concerning; to procure or arrange for by negotiation; as  to negotiate peace or an exchange."
simplified_definition: to bargain or come to an agreement with another person.

definition: "The act or process of negotiating; a treating with another respecting sale or purchase. etc."
simplified_definition: discussions meant to help people agree on something.

definition: "A black man; especially  one of a race of black or very dark persons who inhabit the greater part of tropical Africa and are distinguished by crisped or curly hair flat noses and thick protruding lips; also any black person of unmixed African blood wherever found."
simplified_definition: a former term for black or African American.

definition: "To utter the cry of the horse; to whinny."
simplified_definition: to make the sound of a horse; whinny.

definition: "To associate intimately with."
simplified_definition: a person who lives close to someone else.

definition: "The quality or condition of being a neighbor; the state of being or dwelling near; proximity."
simplified_definition: a small area or district in a city or town that is set off from other areas because it is a community or has a special character.

definition: "Living or being near; adjacent; as  the neighboring nations or countries."
simplified_definition: located close by or next to something.

definition: "In a neigborly manner."
simplified_definition: like a kind neighbor; friendly or helpful.

definition: "Not either; not the one or the other."
simplified_definition: not one or the other of two; not either .

definition: "A grandson or grandchild  or remoter lineal descendant."
simplified_definition: the son of one's brother or sister; the son of one's brotherinlaw or sisterinlaw.

definition: "The remotest known planet of our system  discovered  as a result of the computations of Leverrier of Paris  by Galle of Berlin September  . Its mean distance from the sun is about     miles and its period of revolution is about   years."
simplified_definition: the god of the sea in Roman mythology. Neptune had control of the tides. In Greek mythology, Neptune is called Poseidon.

definition: "One of the principal fibrovascular bundles or ribs of a leaf  especially when these extend straight from the base or the midrib of the leaf."
simplified_definition: any of the fibers that carry messages to and from the brain and other parts of the body. Nerves are bundled together into a complicated system that connects all parts of the body to the spinal cord and brain.

definition: "Possessing or manifesting vigor of mind; characterized by strength in sentiment or style; forcible; spirited; as  a nervous writer."
simplified_definition: of or having to do with the nerves.

definition: "A promontory; a cape; a headland."
simplified_definition: a suffix that means "condition."

definition: "The bed or receptacle prepared by a fowl for holding her eggs and for hatching and rearing her young."
simplified_definition: a structure used by a bird to lay eggs and rear young. Nests are built in trees and other protected places using materials such as twigs and mud.

definition: "To cherish  as a bird her young."
simplified_definition: to lie close or curled next to.

definition: "To take in a net; to capture by stratagem or wile."
simplified_definition: a fabric woven or knotted together to leave open spaces of even size.

definition: "To fret or sting; to irritate or vex; to cause to experience sensations of displeasure or uneasiness not amounting to violent anger."
simplified_definition: a plant whose leaves and stems are covered with hairs that sting the skin when touched.

definition: "A fabric of threads  cords or wires crossing each other at certain intervals and knotted or secured at the crossings thus leaving spaces or meshes between them."
simplified_definition: a system that involves a number of persons or groups.

definition: "A disease seated in the nerves."
simplified_definition: suffering from needless fears and worries.

definition: "Not engaged on either side; not taking part with or assisting either of two or more contending parties; neuter; indifferent."
simplified_definition: not taking any side in an argument or contest.

definition: "To render neutral; to reduce to a state of neutrality."
simplified_definition: to cause to have no effect or become useless.

definition: "Not ever; not at any time; at no time  whether past present or future."
simplified_definition: not on any occasion; not at any time.

definition: "Not the less; notwithstanding; in spite of that; yet."
simplified_definition: however; still.

definition: "Having existed  or having been made but a short time; having originated or occured lately; having recently come into existence or into one's possession; not early or long in being; of late origin; recent; fresh; modern;  opposed to old as a new coat; a new house; a new book; a new fashion."
simplified_definition: having recently arrived, been produced, or come into being.

definition: "the first day of a calendar year; the first day of January. Often colloquially abbreviated to New year's or new year."
simplified_definition: the first day of the new year, January .

definition: "A group of islands in the South Pacific Ocean."
simplified_definition: a country on two large islands and a number of small islands in the South Pacific, southeast of Australia. Wellington is the capital of New Zealand.

definition: "Recently born."
simplified_definition: just born.

definition: "One who has lately come."
simplified_definition: one who arrived not long ago.

definition: "Newmade; formed with the affectation of novelty."
simplified_definition: new and different, but not always better.

definition: "An island on the coast of British North America  famed for the fishing grounds in its vicinity."
simplified_definition: an eastern province of Canada, including the island of Newfoundland in the Atlantic Ocean. The full name of the province is Newfoundland  Labrador. Its capital is St. John's.

definition: "Lately; recently."
simplified_definition: not long ago.

definition: "A report of recent occurences; information of something that has lately taken place  or of something before unknown; fresh tindings; recent intelligence."
simplified_definition: a report of recent important events, read out on the television or radio, or printed in a newspaper, magazine, or Web site.

definition: "A sheet of paper printed and distributed  at stated intervals for conveying intelligence of passing events advocating opinions etc.; a public print that circulates news advertisements proceedings of legislative bodies public announcements etc."
simplified_definition: a publication made of several large sheets of folded paper printed with news, opinions, advertisements, and other information. Most newspapers come out either every day or once a week.

definition: "Any one of several species of small aquatic salamanders. The common British species are the crested newt  and the smooth newt . In America  Diemictylus viridescens is one of the most abundant species."
simplified_definition: a small animal with a long, slender body and tail, and four legs. Newts have smooth, moist skin. They are a kind of small salamander and are amphibians. They spend part of their lives in water and part on land.

definition: "Nearest in place; having no similar object intervening."
simplified_definition: coming immediately after; following.

definition: "To bite by little at a time; to seize gently with the mouth; to eat slowly or in small bits."
simplified_definition: to eat in small bites.

definition: "Apprehending slight differences or delicate distinctions; distinguishing accurately or minutely; carefully discriminating; as  a nice taste or judgment."
simplified_definition: pleasant; attractive.

definition: "A cavity  hollow or recess generally within the thickness of a wall for a statue bust or other erect ornament. hence any similar position literal or figurative."
simplified_definition: a hollow place set into a wall to hold a statue or some other object.

definition: "A particular point or place considered as marked by a nick; the exact point or critical moment."
simplified_definition: a shallow cut or chip in a surface.

definition: "A bright silverwhite metallic element. It is of the iron group  and is hard malleable and ductile. It occurs combined with sulphur in millerite with arsenic in the mineral niccolite and with arsenic and sulphur in nickel glance. Symbol Ni. Atomic weight .."
simplified_definition: a dense, hard, silverwhite metal that is one of the chemical elements. It is sometimes combined with other metals to make alloys such as stainless steel. .

definition: "To give a nickname to; to call by a nickname."
simplified_definition: a name given to a person, place, or thing in place of the real name.

definition: "An alkaloid which is the active principle of tobacco. It is a colorless  transparent oily liquid having an acrid odor and an acrid burning taste. It is intensely poisonous."
simplified_definition: a poisonous substance found in the tobacco plant. Nicotine is what causes people to become addicted to cigarettes.

definition: "A relative  in general; especially a descendant whether male or female; a granddaughter or a grandson."
simplified_definition: a daughter of one's brother or sister; a daughter of one's brotherinlaw or sisterinlaw.

definition: "The period after the close of life; death."
simplified_definition: the hours of darkness between sunset and dawn.

definition: "The close of the day."
simplified_definition: the time when day ends and night begins.

definition: "A loose gown used for undress; also  a gown used for a sleeping garnment."
simplified_definition: a long loose gown that is worn in bed.

definition: "A small  plain brown and gray European song bird . It sings at night and is celebrated for the sweetness of its song."
simplified_definition: a small bird that lives in Europe and is known for its beautiful song. A nightingale is a kind of thrush.

definition: "Of or pertaining to the night  or to every night; happening or done by night or every night; as nightly shades; he kept nightly vigils."
simplified_definition: happening or done every night.

definition: "A fiend or incubus formerly supposed to cause trouble in sleep."
simplified_definition: a frightening dream.

definition: "The time from dusk to dawn;  opposed to daytime."
simplified_definition: the time between sunset and dawn.

definition: "The great river of Egypt."
simplified_definition: the longest river in the world. It flows north from Uganda in East Africa through Sudan and Egypt into the Mediterranean Sea.

definition: "Light and quick in motion; moving with ease and celerity; lively; swift."
simplified_definition: quick and light in movement.

definition: "Eight and one more; one less than ten; as  nine miles."
simplified_definition: the word for the Arabic numeral  and by the Roman numeral IX.

definition: "The number greater than eighteen by a unit; the sum of ten and nine; nineteen units or objects."
simplified_definition: the word for the Arabic numeral  and by the Roman numeral XIX.

definition: "An interval of two octaves and a fifth."
simplified_definition: coming next after the eighteenth in a series.

definition: "Next in order after the eightyninth."
simplified_definition: coming next after the eightyninth in a series.

definition: "A symbol representing ninety units  as  or xc."
simplified_definition: the number that is equal to nine times ten; .

definition: "Following the eight and preceding the tenth; coming after eight others."
simplified_definition: coming next after the eighth in a series.

definition: "A seizing or closing in upon; a pinching; as  in the northern seas the nip of masses of ice."
simplified_definition: to press sharply between two points; bite or pinch.

definition: "The protuberance through which milk is drawn from the breast or mamma; the mammilla; a teat; a pap."
simplified_definition: the rounded tip at the center of a mammal's breast.

definition: "A colorless nonmetallic element  tasteless and odorless comprising four fifths of the atmosphere by volume. It is chemically very inert in the free state and as such is incapable of supporting life ; but it forms many important compounds as ammonia nitric acid the cyanides etc and is a constituent of all organized living tissues animal or vegetable. Symbol N. Atomic weight . It was formerly regarded as a permanent noncondensible gas but was liquefied in  by Cailletet of Paris and Pictet of Geneva."
simplified_definition: a gas with no color or smell that is one of the chemical elements. Nitrogen makes up about eighty percent of the earth's atmosphere, and it is also found in all living things.

definition: "Nay; not; not at all; not in any respect or degree;  a word expressing negation  denial or refusal. Before or after another negative no is emphatic."
simplified_definition: used to say that you refuse or that you do not agree with or accept something.

definition: "The state of being of high rank or noble birth; patrician dignity; antiquity of family; distinction by rank  station or title whether inherited or conferred."
simplified_definition: a class of people of noble rank.

definition: "Possessing eminence  elevation dignity etc.; above whatever is low mean degrading or dishonorable; magnanimous; as a noble nature or action; a noble heart."
simplified_definition: belonging to a class of people with a high rank or title.

definition: "One of the nobility; a noble; a peer; one who enjoys rank above a commoner  either by virtue of birth by office or by patent."
simplified_definition: a man of high rank or title.

definition: "A female of noble rank; a peeress."
simplified_definition: a woman of high rank or title.

definition: "No person; no one; not anybody."
simplified_definition: no one; no person; not anybody.

definition: "Of  pertaining to done or occuring in the night; as nocturnal darkness cries expedition etc.;  opposed to diurnal."
simplified_definition: happening in the night.

definition: "A quick or slight downward or forward motion of the head  in assent in familiar salutation in drowsiness or in giving a signal or a command."
simplified_definition: to move the head up and down as to show greeting or approval.

definition: "Sound of any kind."
simplified_definition: sound or a sound.

definition: "Making a noise  esp. a loud sound; clamorous; vociferous; turbulent; boisterous; as the noisy crowd."
simplified_definition: making a lot of noise.

definition: "One of a race or tribe that has no fixed location  but wanders from place to place in search of pasture or game."
simplified_definition: a member of a group or tribe that has no fixed home and moves from place to place.

definition: "Of or pertaining to nomads  or their way of life; wandering; moving from place to place for subsistence; as a nomadic tribe."
simplified_definition: living like a nomad.

definition: "To set down in express terms; to state."
simplified_definition: to choose as a candidate for election.

definition: "The denomination  or name."
simplified_definition: the act of choosing a person to run for office.

definition: "A person named  or designated by another to any office duty or position; one nominated or proposed by others for office or for election to office."
simplified_definition: a person or thing that has been nominated for an office or honor.

definition: "A prefix used in the sense of not; un; in; as in nonattention  or nonattention nonconformity nonmetallic nonsuit."
simplified_definition: a prefix that means "not," "not having," or "failure to."

definition: "No one; not one; not anything;  frequently used also partitively  or as a plural not any."
simplified_definition: no single person or thing; not one.

definition: "That which is not sense  or has no sense; words or language which have no meaning or which convey no intelligible ideas; absurdity."
simplified_definition: words or actions that have no meaning or make no sense.

definition: "A simpleton; a blockhead; a stupid person; a ninny."
simplified_definition: a flat, narrow strip of dough that has been dried. Noodles are boiled in water to make them soft for eating.

definition: "A narrow place formed by an angle in bodies or between bodies; a corner; a recess; a secluded retreat."
simplified_definition: a corner of a room or a small area set off from a main room.

definition: "No. See the Note under No."
simplified_definition: twelve o'clock in the daytime; midday.

definition: "A running knot  or loop which binds the closer the more it is drawn."
simplified_definition: a loop that passes through a knot in the end of a rope or other line. When the rope is pulled, the loop becomes smaller.

definition: "A negative connective or particle  introducing the second member or clause of a negative proposition following neither or not in the first member or clause . Nor is also used sometimes in the first member for neither and sometimes the neither is omitted and implied by the use of nor."
simplified_definition: used to introduce a negative statement, especially after a phrase using "neither."

definition: "A straight line or plane drawn from any point of a curve or surface so as to be perpendicular to the curve or surface at that point."
simplified_definition: close to what is usual, average, or standard.

definition: "In a normal manner."
simplified_definition: in a normal way; to the usual degree.

definition: "Of or pertaining to ancient Scandinavia  or to the language spoken by its inhabitants."
simplified_definition: of or having to do with ancient Scandinavia, or its people or languages; Scandinavian.

definition: "That one of the four cardinal points of the compass  at any place which lies in the direction of the true meridian and to the left hand of a person facing the east; the direction opposite to the south."
simplified_definition: the direction to the left of a person facing the rising sun.

definition: "The point between the north and east  at an equal distance from each; the northeast part or region."
simplified_definition: a point on the compass halfway between north and east.

definition: "Of or pertaining to the northeast; northeasterly."
simplified_definition: of, located in, or coming from the northeast.

definition: "Of or pertaining to the north; toward the north  or from the north; northern."
simplified_definition: of or toward the north.

definition: "Of or pertaining to the north; being in the north  or nearer to that point than to the east or west."
simplified_definition: in, to, from, or having to do with the north.

definition: "One born or living in the north."
simplified_definition: a person born or living in the northern part of a region.

definition: "Alt. of Northwards"
simplified_definition: toward the north.

definition: "The point in the horizon between the north and west  and equally distant from each; the northwest part or region."
simplified_definition: a point on the compass halfway between north and west.

definition: "Of  pertaining to or being in the northwest; in a direction toward the northwest; coming from the northwest; northwesterly; as a northwestern course."
simplified_definition: of, located in, or coming from the northwest.

definition: "A native of Norway."
simplified_definition: of or having to do with Norway, or its people or language.

definition: "The prominent part of the face or anterior extremity of the head containing the nostrils and olfactory cavities; the olfactory organ. See Nostril  and Olfactory organ under Olfactory."
simplified_definition: the part of the face on people and certain animals through which they breathe and smell.

definition: "A bleeding at the nose."
simplified_definition: bleeding from the nose.

definition: "Homesickness; esp.  a severe and sometimes fatal form of melancholia due to homesickness."
simplified_definition: a longing for the past.

definition: "One of the external openings of the nose  which give passage to the air breathed and to secretions from the nose and eyes; one of the anterior nares."
simplified_definition: one of the two outside openings in the nose.

definition: "A word used to express negation  prohibition denial or refusal."
simplified_definition: in no way; to no degree; at no time.

definition: "One of a number of persons  before the revolution of  chiefly of the higher orders appointed by the king to constitute a representative body."
simplified_definition: worthy of special attention; remarkable.

definition: "The act or practice of recording anything by marks  figures or characters."
simplified_definition: a system of signs used to stand for numbers, words, or musical notes.

definition: "To fit the notch of  to the string."
simplified_definition: a cut shaped like a V in an edge or object.

definition: "To butt; to push with the horns."
simplified_definition: a short letter.

definition: "A book in which notes or memorandums are written."
simplified_definition: a book of blank pages to keep notes in.

definition: "of Note"
simplified_definition: well known; famous.

definition: "Nonexistence; nonentity; absence of being; nihility; nothingness."
simplified_definition: not anything; no thing.

definition: "To observe; to see to mark; to take note of; to heed; to pay attention to."
simplified_definition: warning, news, or sign of something, especially in written or printed form.

definition: "Capable of being observed; worthy of notice; likely to attract observation; conspicous."
simplified_definition: easily noticed.

definition: "To make known; to declare; to publish; as  to notify a fact to a person."
simplified_definition: to tell about; give notice of.

definition: "An invention; an ingenious device; a knickknack; as  Yankee notions."
simplified_definition: an idea, opinion, or view.

definition: "The quality or condition of being notorious; the state of being generally or publicly known;  commonly used in an unfavorable sense; as  the notoriety of a crime."
simplified_definition: the condition or quality of being widely known or spoken of, especially for something that is not good.

definition: "Generally known and talked of by the public; universally believed to be true; manifest to the world; evident;  usually in an unfavorable sense; as  a notorious thief; a notorious crime or vice."
simplified_definition: known for something bad.

definition: "A word used as the designation or appellation of a creature or thing  existing in fact or in thought; a substantive."
simplified_definition: a word that names a person, place, thing, or condition. A noun may be the subject of a sentence or the object of a verb or preposition.

definition: "To feed and cause to grow; to supply with matter which increases bulk or supplies waste  and promotes health; to furnish with nutriment."
simplified_definition: to supply with food needed for life and growth.

definition: "The act of nourishing  or the state of being nourished; nutrition."
simplified_definition: something needed for life and growth; food.

definition: "Of recent origin or introduction; not ancient; new; hence  out of the ordinary course; unusual; strange; surprising."
simplified_definition: a long work of fiction, usually having a plot and characters.

definition: "The quality or state of being novel; newness; freshness; recentness of origin or introduction."
simplified_definition: the quality of being new or unusual.

definition: "The eleventh month of the year  containing thirty days."
simplified_definition: the eleventh month of the year. November has thirty days.

definition: "One who is new in any business  profession or calling; one unacquainted or unskilled; one yet in the rudiments; a beginner; a tyro."
simplified_definition: a person with little or no experience at a particular job or activity.

definition: "At the present time; at this moment; at the time of speaking; instantly; as  I will write now."
simplified_definition: at this time or in these times.

definition: "In these days; at the present time."
simplified_definition: during these present times.

definition: "Not anywhere; not in any place or state; as  the book is nowhere to be found."
simplified_definition: not anywhere; in no place.

definition: "A short tube  usually tapering forming the vent of a hose or pipe."
simplified_definition: a narrow spout fitted to the end of a hose or pipe. A nozzle is used to control the flow or spray of a liquid or gas.

definition: "Of or pertaining to a nucleus; as  the nuclear spindle  or the nuclear fibrils of a cell; the nuclear part of a comet etc."
simplified_definition: of, or having to do with, or being the nucleus of an atom or a cell.

definition: "of Nucleus"
simplified_definition: plural of "nucleus."

definition: "A kernel; hence  a central mass or point about which matter is gathered or to which accretion is made; the central or material portion;  used both literally and figuratively."
simplified_definition: the central, essential, or most active part around which other parts are grouped.

definition: "Bare; naked; unclothed; undraped; as  a nude statue."
simplified_definition: not wearing clothes.

definition: "A gentle push  or jog as with the elbow."
simplified_definition: to push gently or touch with the elbow to attract attention.

definition: "A lump; a mass  esp. a native lump of a precious metal; as a nugget of gold."
simplified_definition: a small, solid lump.

definition: "That which annoys or gives trouble and vexation; that which is offensive or noxious."
simplified_definition: a person or thing that is annoying.

definition: "To make numb; to deprive of the power of sensation or motion; to render senseless or inert; to deaden; to benumb; to stupefy."
simplified_definition: not able to feel; lacking in feeling or movement.

definition: "Quantity  regarded as made up of an aggregate of separate things."
simplified_definition: a unit in math with a fixed value that is used in counting or to tell the position of something in a series. "Four," "four tenths," and "four hundred" are all ways of saying numbers. Numbers can also be represented by numerals, such as , ., and .

definition: "A figure or character used to express a number; as  the Arabic numerals    etc.; the Roman numerals I V X L etc."
simplified_definition: one or more symbols or marks used to express or represent a number.

definition: "The term in a fraction which indicates the number of fractional units that are taken."
simplified_definition: the number in a fraction that is above the division line, over the denominator.

definition: "Belonging to number; denoting number; consisting in numbers; expressed by numbers  and not letters; as numerical characters; a numerical equation; a numerical statement."
simplified_definition: of or having to do with numbers.

definition: "Consisting of a great number of units or individual objects; being many; as  a numerous army."
simplified_definition: being in great number; many.

definition: "A woman devoted to a religious life  who lives in a convent under the three vows of poverty chastity and obedience."
simplified_definition: a woman who is a member of a religious order. Nuns promise to live simply, not marry, and obey God. Many nuns live in convents.

definition: "One who  or that which brings up rears causes to grow trains fosters or the like."
simplified_definition: a person who is trained to care for sick and injured people.

definition: "The place where nursing is carried on"
simplified_definition: a room where babies or young children sleep or play.

definition: "The fruit of certain trees and shrubs  consisting of a hard and indehiscent shell inclosing a kernel."
simplified_definition: a dry seed or fruit made up of a kernel contained in a hard, tough shell. The kernel of a nut is often used as food. The kernal is often called the "meat" of the nut.

definition: "An instrument for cracking nuts."
simplified_definition: a tool for cracking the shell of a nut.

definition: "Any one of several species of birds of the genus Sitta  as the European species . The whitebreasted nuthatch  the redbreasted nuthatch  the pygmy nuthatch  and others are American."
simplified_definition: a small bird with a short tail and a long, narrow beak. It climbs about on trees in search of insects, moving down the trunk head first.

definition: "The kernel of the fruit of the nutmeg tree   a native of the Molucca Islands but cultivated elsewhere in the tropics."
simplified_definition: the seed of an evergreen tree of East India. Nutmeg is made into a powder and used as a spice.

definition: "The fur of the coypu. See Coypu."
simplified_definition: a small mammal with thick brown fur and a long thin tail. Nutrias are rodents closely related to guinea pigs and porcupines. They build burrows near wet areas such as swamps. Nutrias used to only live in South America, but they have spread to much of the United States and Europe.

definition: "Nutritious; nourishing; promoting growth."
simplified_definition: something in food that helps people, animals, and plants live and grow.

definition: "In the broadest sense  a process or series of processes by which the living organism as a whole  is maintained in its normal condition of life and growth."
simplified_definition: the act or process of eating and using the nutrients in food for living and growing.

definition: "Nourishing; promoting growth  or preventing decay; alimental."
simplified_definition: having a large amount of vitamins, minerals, or other nutrients.

definition: "The shell or hard external covering in which the kernel of a nut is inclosed."
simplified_definition: the hard cover of a nut.

definition: "To noursle or nurse; to foster; to bring up."
simplified_definition: to touch, push, or rub the nose against.

definition: "Not I; nor I."
simplified_definition: abbreviation of "New York."

definition: "A goddess of the mountains  forests meadows or waters."
simplified_definition: one of the goddesses in Greek or Roman mythology who live in rivers, mountains, or trees.

definition: "An exclamation used in calling or directly addressing a person or personified object; also  as an emotional or impassioned exclamation expressing pain grief surprise desire fear etc."
simplified_definition: symbol of the chemical element oxygen.

definition: "Any tree or shrub of the genus Quercus. The oaks have alternate leaves  often variously lobed and staminate flowers in catkins. The fruit is a smooth nut called an acorn which is more or less inclosed in a scaly involucre called the cup or cupule. There are now recognized about three hundred species of which nearly fifty occur in the United States the rest in Europe Asia and the other parts of North America a very few barely reaching the northern parts of South America and Africa. Many of the oaks form forest trees of grand proportions and live many centuries. The wood is usually hard and tough and provided with conspicuous medullary rays forming the silver grain."
simplified_definition: a tree that belongs to the beech family and bears acorns.

definition: "An oarlike swimming organ of various invertebrates."
simplified_definition: a long pole that is wide and flat at one end. Oars are used to row or steer a boat.

definition: "A fertile or green spot in a waste or desert  esp. in a sandy desert."
simplified_definition: an area in a desert where plants can grow. The plants are fed by water from a spring or well.

definition: "A wellknown cereal grass   and its edible grain;  commonly used in the plural and in a collective sense."
simplified_definition: a grain plant that is grown in cool regions.

definition: "A careless and blasphemous use of the name of the divine Being  or anything divine or sacred by way of appeal or as a profane exclamation or ejaculation; an expression of profane swearing."
simplified_definition: a serious promise.

definition: "Meal made of oats."
simplified_definition: meal made by grinding or rolling oats.

definition: "Subject in will or act to authority; willing to obey; submissive to restraint  control or command."
simplified_definition: likely or willing to obey rules or orders.

definition: "Excessively corpulent; fat; fleshy."
simplified_definition: very fat.

definition: "To give ear to; to execute the commands of; to yield submission to; to comply with the orders of."
simplified_definition: to follow or carry out the command, instruction, or wishes of.

definition: "A charm or fetich."
simplified_definition: a wide sash worn at the waist over a Japanese kimono.

definition: "Opposed; presented in opposition; also  exposed."
simplified_definition: anything that has shape or form and can be seen or touched.

definition: "Cause of trouble; sorrow."
simplified_definition: a statement of not liking or not agreeing with something.

definition: "Liable to objection; likely to be objected to or disapproved of; offensive; as  objectionable words."
simplified_definition: causing someone to object or disagree; offensive.

definition: "Of or pertaining to an object."
simplified_definition: a goal or purpose that a person works to achieve; aim.

definition: "To bind or firmly hold to an act; to compel; to constrain; to bind to any act of duty or courtesy by a formal pledge."
simplified_definition: to make someone do something because of a law or moral principle.

definition: "Any act by which a person becomes bound to do something to or for anouther  or to forbear something; external duties imposed by law promise or contract by the relations of society or by courtesy kindness etc."
simplified_definition: something that someone should or should not do because of a law or moral principle.

definition: "To attach  as by a bond."
simplified_definition: to make  feel bound to do something or to act in a certain way.

definition: "of Oblige"
simplified_definition: ready to help or do favors.

definition: "Having greater length than breadth  esp. when rectangular."
simplified_definition: longer than it is wide.

definition: "Subject; liable; exposed; answerable; amenable;  with to."
simplified_definition: offensive or not pleasant.

definition: "One of the higher wind instruments in the modern orchestra  yet of great antiquity having a penetrating pastoral quality of tone somewhat like the clarinet in form but more slender and sounded by means of a double reed; a hautboy."
simplified_definition: a woodwind instrument with a high tone. It has a long, thin body with finger holes or keys, and is played by blowing into a mouthpiece.

definition: "Offensive to chastity or modesty; expressing of presenting to the mind or view something which delicacy  purity and decency forbid to be exposed; impure; as obscene language; obscene pictures."
simplified_definition: offensive and not decent.

definition: "To render obscure; to darken; to make dim; to keep in the dark; to hide; to make less visible  intelligible legible glorious beautiful or illustrious."
simplified_definition: hard to see or not distinct.

definition: "The act or the faculty of observing or taking notice; the act of seeing  or of fixing the mind upon anything."
simplified_definition: the act or an instance of perceiving the environment through one of the senses.

definition: "A place or building for making observations on the heavenly bodies."
simplified_definition: a building that has equipment for studying the sun, moon, planets, and stars.

definition: "To express as what has been noticed; to utter as a remark; to say in a casual or incidental way; to remark."
simplified_definition: to notice or see.

definition: "One who observes  or pays attention to anything; especially one engaged in or trained to habits of close and exact observation; as an astronomical observer."
simplified_definition: someone who watches and listens at an event such as a meeting but does not participate in it.

definition: "No longer in use; gone into disuse; disused; neglected; as  an obsolete word; an obsolete statute;  applied chiefly to words writings or observances."
simplified_definition: no longer in use.

definition: "That which stands in the way  or opposes; anything that hinders progress; a hindrance; an obstruction physical or moral."
simplified_definition: something that stops forward movement or progress.

definition: "Pertinaciously adhering to an opinion  purpose or course; persistent; not yielding to reason arguments or other means; stubborn; pertinacious;  usually implying unreasonableness."
simplified_definition: not willing to change one's ideas; stubborn.

definition: "To block up; to stop up or close  as a way or passage; to place an obstacle in or fill with obstacles or impediments that prevent or hinder passing; as to obstruct a street; to obstruct the channels of the body."
simplified_definition: to block or clog.

definition: "That which obstructs or impedes; an obstacle; an impediment; a hindrance."
simplified_definition: something that blocks the way or prevents progress.

definition: "To become held; to gain or have a firm footing; to be recognized or established; to subsist; to become prevalent or general; to prevail; as  the custom obtains of going to the seashore in summer."
simplified_definition: to get; gain.

definition: "Exposed; subject; open; liable."
simplified_definition: easily seen or understood; clear.

definition: "A falling out  happening or coming to pass; hence that which falls out or happens; occurrence; incident."
simplified_definition: an event or the time at which it happens.

definition: "Produced by accident; as  the occasional origin of a thing."
simplified_definition: happening now and then or not too often.

definition: "In an occasional manner; on occasion; at times  as convenience requires or opportunity offers; not regularly."
simplified_definition: at times; now and then; not frequently.

definition: "One who occupies  or takes possession; one who has the actual use or possession or is in possession of a thing."
simplified_definition: someone who lives or works in a place or fills a position.

definition: "The act or process of occupying or taking possession; actual possession and control; the state of being occupied; a holding or keeping; tenure; use; as  the occupation of lands by a tenant."
simplified_definition: the work a person does to earn a living; profession.

definition: "To use; to expend; to make use of."
simplified_definition: to take and control.

definition: "To meet; to clash."
simplified_definition: to take place; happen.

definition: "A coming or happening; as  the occurence of a railway collision."
simplified_definition: the process or fact of taking place or happening.

definition: "Of or pertaining to the main or great sea; as  the ocean waves; an ocean stream."
simplified_definition: the vast body of salt water covering about three quarters of the earth's surface.

definition: "A description of the ocean."
simplified_definition: the science that studies the oceans and the animals and plants that live in oceans.

definition: "An American feline carnivore . It ranges from the Southwestern United States to Patagonia. It is covered with blackish ocellated spots and blotches  which are variously arranged. The ground color varies from reddish gray to tawny yellow."
simplified_definition: a wild cat with yellow or brown fur and black spots or stripes. Ocelots look like leopards but are smaller. They live in South and Central America, sometimes as far north as Texas. They are carnivorous mammals that eat birds, snakes, and small mammals.

definition: "A plane figure of eight sides and eight angles."
simplified_definition: a flat closed figure with eight straight sides.

definition: "The eighth tone in the scale; the interval between one and eight of the scale  or any interval of equal length; an interval of five tones and two semitones."
simplified_definition: a musical tone with the same name as another, higher or lower tone. When a tone is played with its octave, the tones blend together and sound almost like a single note. The higher of the tones in an octave always has twice as many vibrations per second as the lower note.

definition: "Alt. of Octa"
simplified_definition: a prefix that means "eight."

definition: "The tenth month of the year  containing thirtyone days."
simplified_definition: the tenth month of the year. October has thirtyone days.

definition: "A genus of eightarmed cephalopods
simplified_definition: a sea animal with a soft, rounded body and eight long tentacles. Octopuses are carnivores that eat crabs, lobsters, and other small sea animals. They are mollusks and are closely related to squids.

definition: "Not paired with another  or remaining over after a pairing; without a mate; unmatched; single; as an odd shoe; an odd glove."
simplified_definition: different from what is expected or usual; strange.

definition: "The quality or state of being odd; singularity; queerness; peculiarity; as  oddity of dress manners and the like."
simplified_definition: a strange or unusual thing, person, or event.

definition: "Difference in favor of one and against another; excess of one of two things or numbers over the other; inequality; advantage; superiority; hence  excess of chances; probability."
simplified_definition: the probability that one thing is more likely to happen than another.

definition: "Any smell  whether fragrant or offensive; scent; perfume."
simplified_definition: smell or scent.

definition: "Denoting nearness or distance  either in space or time; from; as within a league of the town; within an hour of the appointed time."
simplified_definition: used to show distance or separation from.

definition: "Denoting a leaving  abandonment departure abatement interruption or remission; as the fever goes off; the pain goes off; the game is off; all bets are off."
simplified_definition: away from a surface.

definition: "The act of offending in any sense; esp.  a crime or a sin an affront or an injury."
simplified_definition: a spelling of "offense" used in Canada and Britain. See "offense" for more information.

definition: "To displease; to make angry; to affront."
simplified_definition: to cause to be angry, annoyed, or insulted.

definition: "Alt. of Offence"
simplified_definition: the act of breaking a law or rule or doing something wrong; crime; sin.

definition: "The state or posture of one who offends or makes attack; aggressive attitude; the act of the attacking party;  opposed to defensive."
simplified_definition: not pleasant; disagreeable.

definition: "Attempt; endeavor; essay; as  he made an offer to catch the ball."
simplified_definition: to present to be accepted or refused.

definition: "of Offer"
simplified_definition: that which is offered, either as a gift or for sale.

definition: "Instant; ready; extemporaneous; as  an offhand speech; offhand excuses."
simplified_definition: done without thinking or preparing ahead of time.

definition: "A special duty  trust charge or position conferred by authority and for a public purpose; a position of trust or authority; as an executive or judical office; a municipal office."
simplified_definition: a place where business or professional work is done.

definition: "One who holds an office; a person lawfully invested with an office  whether civil military or ecclesiastical; as a church officer; a police officer; a staff officer."
simplified_definition: a person holding a position of trust and responsibility in a business, organization, or government agency.

definition: "One who holds an office; esp.  a subordinate executive officer or attendant."
simplified_definition: a person who holds an office in a business organization or a government.

definition: "of Offset"
simplified_definition: to make up for or balance.

definition: "That which shoots off or separates from a main stem  channel family race etc.; as the offshoots of a tree."
simplified_definition: a branch or shoot from the main stem of a plant.

definition: "From the shore; as  an offshore wind; an offshore signal."
simplified_definition: away from the shore.

definition: "That which is produced; a child or children; a descendant or descendants  however remote from the stock."
simplified_definition: the child or young of a particular human, animal, or plant.

definition: "Frequent; common; repeated."
simplified_definition: at many times; frequently.

definition: "An imaginary monster  or hideous giant of fairy tales who lived on human beings; hence any frightful giant; a cruel monster."
simplified_definition: an ugly giant or monster in folk tales and children's stories. Ogres are said to eat people.

definition: "An exclamation expressing various emotions  according to the tone and manner especially surprise pain sorrow anxiety or a wish. See the Note under O."
simplified_definition: abbreviation of "Ohio."

definition: "To smear or rub over with oil; to lubricate with oil; to anoint with oil."
simplified_definition: any one of the greasy liquids that come from minerals, animals, plants or chemicals. Oil can be dissolved in alcohol, but not water.

definition: "Consisting of oil; containing oil; having the nature or qualities of oil; unctuous; oleaginous; as  oily matter or substance."
simplified_definition: of or like oil.

definition: "That which serves to anoint; any soft unctuous substance used for smearing or anointing; an unguent."
simplified_definition: a soft, oily substance made to be rubbed into the skin. Ointment may be used as medicine or to soften the skin.

definition: "An annual plant  whose green pods abounding in nutritious mucilage are much used for soups stews or pickles; gumbo."
simplified_definition: a green vegetable that is shaped like a tube. Okra becomes sticky when cooked and is used in soups or fried.

definition: "Long practiced; hence  skilled; experienced; cunning; as an old offender; old in vice."
simplified_definition: having lived for many years; not young.

definition: "To grow old; to age."
simplified_definition: of or having to do with ancient times.

definition: "Formed according to old or obsolete fashion or pattern; adhering to old customs or ideas; as  an oldfashioned dress girl."
simplified_definition: looking or being like past styles, manners, or ways of behaving.

definition: "A liquid oil made from animal fats  by separating the greater portion of the solid fat or stearin  by crystallization. It is mainly a mixture of olein and palmitin with some little stearin."
simplified_definition: a food like butter made from vegetable oil instead of milk; margarine.

definition: "The fruit of the olive. It has been much improved by cultivation  and is used for making pickles. Olive oil is pressed from its flesh."
simplified_definition: a small green or black fruit with a pit. Olives are eaten raw or used to make olive oil.

definition: "Of or pertaining to Olympus  a mountain of Thessaly fabled as the seat of the gods or to Olympia a small plain in Elis."
simplified_definition: of or relating to the Olympic Games.

definition: "Eggs beaten up with a little flour  etc. and cooked in a frying pan; as a plain omelet."
simplified_definition: a food made from beaten eggs that are cooked into a single sheet and often folded over a filling of vegetables, meat, or cheese.

definition: "To divine or to foreshow by signs or portents; to have omens or premonitions regarding; to predict; to augur; as  to omen ill of an enterprise."
simplified_definition: something that is believed to be a sign of future good or evil.

definition: "Of or pertaining to an omen or to omens; being or exhibiting an omen; significant; portentous;  formerly used both in a favorable and unfavorable sense; now chiefly in the latter; foreboding or foreshowing evil; inauspicious; as  an ominous dread."
