simplified_definition: giving a sign of future evil or trouble.

definition: "To pass by; to forbear or fail to perform or to make use of; to leave undone; to neglect."
simplified_definition: to leave out; not include.

definition: "Alldevouring; eating everything indiscriminately; as  omnivorous vanity; esp.  eating both animal and vegetable food."
simplified_definition: living on a diet of both plant and animal food.

definition: "Toward; for;  indicating the object of some passion; as  have pity or compassion on him."
simplified_definition: above and supported by.

definition: "At any one time;  often nearly equivalent to ever  if ever or whenever; as once kindled it may not be quenched."
simplified_definition: at one time in the past; formerly.

definition: "To cause to become one; to gather into a single whole; to unite; to assimilite."
simplified_definition: being a single thing or person.

definition: "A reflexive form of the indefinite pronoun one. Commonly writen as two words  one's self."
simplified_definition: a person's own self .

definition: "Having one side only  or one side prominent; hence limited to one side; partial; unjust; unfair; as a onesided view or statement."
simplified_definition: giving only one side or position.

definition: "The act of going forward; progress;  affairs; business; current events."
simplified_definition: continuing from sometime in the past into the present.

definition: "A liliaceous plant of the genus Allium   having a strongflavored bulb and long hollow leaves; also its bulbous root much used as an article of food. The name is often extended to other species of the genus."
simplified_definition: a round bulb with a sharp taste and smell. Onions are used in cooking and as a flavoring.

definition: "Hence  figuratively: Alone by reason of superiority; preeminent; chief."
simplified_definition: as the single instance.

definition: "A rushing or setting upon; an attack; an assault; a storming; especially  the assault of an army."
simplified_definition: the early stage; beginning.

definition: "On the top of; upon; on. See On to  under On prep."
simplified_definition: to a position on or on top of.

definition: "Moving in a forward direction; tending toward a contemplated or desirable end; forward; as  an onward course progress etc."
simplified_definition: toward a point or position ahead in space or time.

definition: "Soft mud or slime; earth so wet as to flow gently  or easily yield to pressure."
simplified_definition: to leak out slowly. Liquids, gases, and sounds may ooze.

definition: "A mineral consisting  like quartz of silica but inferior to quartz in hardness and specific gravity."
simplified_definition: a mineral that is white, black, blue, or yellow. Opals are used as gems.

definition: "That which is opaque; opacity."
simplified_definition: not letting light pass through.

definition: "Not drawn together  closed or contracted; extended; expanded; as an open hand; open arms; an open flower; an open prospect."
simplified_definition: allowing something or someone to pass through or to get to the inside; not shut or closed.

definition: "One who  or that which opens."
simplified_definition: someone or something that opens.

definition: "of Open"
simplified_definition: the act, process, or result of making open or causing to become open.

definition: "In an open manner; publicly; not in private; without secrecy."
simplified_definition: in a way that involves no hiding or lying.

definition: "A drama  either tragic or comic of which music forms an essential part; a drama wholly or mostly sung consisting of recitative arials choruses duets trios etc. with orchestral accompaniment preludes and interludes
simplified_definition: a play in which all or most of the words are sung and the music is played by an orchestra.

definition: "To produce  as an effect; to cause."
simplified_definition: to work or run.

definition: "The act or process of operating; agency; the exertion of power  physical mechanical or moral."
simplified_definition: the act or process of working or running.

definition: "The symbol that expresses the operation to be performed;  called also facient."
simplified_definition: someone who controls the working of a machine or the activities of a business.

definition: "A short  light musical drama."
simplified_definition: a short, funny opera, with words that are spoken as well as sung.

definition: "One skilled in ophthalmology; an oculist."
simplified_definition: a doctor who works in the branch of medicine that studies and treats diseases of the eye.

definition: "The science which treats of the structure  functions and diseases of the eye."
simplified_definition: the branch of medicine that studies and treats diseases of the eye.

definition: "That which is opined; a notion or conviction founded on probable evidence; belief stronger than impression  less strong than positive knowledge; settled judgment in regard to any point of knowledge or action."
simplified_definition: what one thinks about something or somebody; viewpoint. An opinion is not necessarily based on facts. Feelings and experiences usually help a person form an opinion.

definition: "Any American marsupial of the genera Didelphys and Chironectes. The common species of the United States is Didelphys Virginiana."
simplified_definition: a small mammal with gray fur, a pointed nose, and a long tail, which it uses to hang from tree branches. The common opossum is the only marsupial that lives in North America. Several other kinds of opossums live in Central and South America. The female opossum carries her young in a pouch in her belly.

definition: "Situated in front; opposite; hence  opposing; adverse; antagonistic."
simplified_definition: one who fights, plays, or takes a position against another.

definition: "Fit or convenient time; a time or place favorable for executing a purpose; a suitable combination of conditions; suitable occasion; chance."
simplified_definition: a chance for a better situation.

definition: "To act adversely or in opposition;  with against or to; as  a servant opposed against the act."
simplified_definition: to think, act, or be against; resist.

definition: "of Oppose"
simplified_definition: not in favor of; against.

definition: "Placed over against; standing or situated over against or in front; facing;  often with to; as  a house opposite to the Exchange."
simplified_definition: located at or on the sides across from each other; facing.

definition: "Repugnance; contrariety of sentiment  interest or purpose; antipathy."
simplified_definition: the act or state of being against, or the state of having someone against another.

definition: "To impose excessive burdens upon; to overload; hence  to treat with unjust rigor or with cruelty."
simplified_definition: to treat in a way that is cruel or not fair.

definition: "Of or pertaining to vision or sight."
simplified_definition: of or having to do with the sense of sight or the eye.

definition: "One who deals in optical glasses and instruments."
simplified_definition: a person who makes or sells eyeglasses and contact lenses.

definition: "The opinion or doctrine that everything in nature  being the work of God is ordered for the best or that the ordering of things in the universe is such as to produce the highest good."
simplified_definition: the belief that things will turn out well or that there is always hope for something good to happen.

definition: "Of or pertaining to optimism; tending  or conforming to the opinion that all events are ordered for the best."
simplified_definition: likely to be hopeful that things will work out well.

definition: "The power of choosing; the right of choice or election; an alternative."
simplified_definition: the right, power, or freedom to choose.

definition: "Involving an option; depending on the exercise of an option; left to one's discretion or choice; not compulsory; as  optional studies; it is optional with you to go or stay."
simplified_definition: left to someone's choice; not required.

definition: "A particle that marks an alternative; as  you may read or may write  that is you may do one of the things at your pleasure but not both. It corresponds to either. You may ride either to London or to Windsor. It often connects a series of words or propositions presenting a choice of either; as he may study law or medicine or divinity or he may enter into trade."
simplified_definition: See "er"

definition: "Uttered by the mouth  or in words; spoken not written; verbal; as oral traditions; oral testimony; oral law."
simplified_definition: spoken, rather than written; carried out by speaking.

definition: "Of or pertaining to an orange; of the color of an orange; reddish yellow; as  an orange ribbon."
simplified_definition: a round fruit with a reddish yellow peel. It is sweet and juicy on the inside.

definition: "A drink made of orange juice and water  corresponding to lemonade; orange sherbet."
simplified_definition: a soft drink made with orange juice or orange flavoring.

definition: "The path described by a heavenly body in its periodical revolution around another body; as  the orbit of Jupiter of the earth of the moon."
simplified_definition: the curved path in which a planet, satellite, or spacecraft moves in a circle around another body.

definition: "An inclosure containing fruit trees; also  the fruit trees collectively;  used especially of apples peaches pears cherries plums or the like less frequently of nutbearing trees and of sugar maple trees."
simplified_definition: a piece of land planted with fruit or nut trees.

definition: "The instruments employed by a full band  collectively; as an orchestra of forty stringed instruments with proper complement of wind instruments."
simplified_definition: a group of musicians who play different kinds of instruments and perform together.

definition: "Any plant of the order Orchidaceae. See Orchidaceous."
simplified_definition: a plant that bears showy flowers. Most orchids are found in the tropics.

definition: "To set in order; to arrange according to rule; to regulate; to set; to establish."
simplified_definition: to admit to the clergy as a priest, minister, or rabbi in a formal ceremony.

definition: "An ancient form of test to determine guilt or innocence  by appealing to a supernatural decision  once common in Europe and still practiced in the East and by savage tribes."
simplified_definition: a painful, difficult experience, or test of one's character.

definition: "Regular arrangement; any methodical or established succession or harmonious relation; method; system"
simplified_definition: a direction or command.

definition: "Being on duty; keeping order; conveying orders."
simplified_definition: arranged in a neat way; in order.

definition: "According to established rules or settled method; as a rule; commonly; usually; in most cases; as  a winter more than ordinarily severe."
simplified_definition: as a rule; usually.

definition: "Anything which is in ordinary or common use."
simplified_definition: usual or normal.

definition: "Metal; as  the liquid ore."
simplified_definition: a rock or mineral from which a metal or other useful substance can be removed.

definition: "To supply with an organ or organs; to fit with organs; to organize."
simplified_definition: a musical instrument with a keyboard. It is played by pressing keys attached to a device that forces air through pipes.

definition: "Pertaining to  or denoting any one of the large series of substances which in nature or origin are connected with vital processes and include many substances of artificial production which may or may not occur in animals or plants;  contrasted with inorganic."
simplified_definition: having to do with or coming from living things.

definition: "Organic structure; organization."
simplified_definition: an individual living thing, such as a plant, an animal, or a germ.

definition: "The state of being organized; also  the relations included in such a state or condition."
simplified_definition: the act or process of organizing.

definition: "To arrange or constitute in parts  each having a special function act office or relation; to systematize; to get into working order;  applied to products of the human intellect or to human institutions and undertakings as a science a government an army a war etc."
simplified_definition: to set in order; arrange in an orderly way.

definition: "of Organize"
simplified_definition: tending to organize one's tasks, surroundings, and the like.

definition: "Fig.: To correct or set right by recurring to first principles; to arrange in order; to orientate."
