simplified_definition: to treat or please with too much care or attention; spoil.

definition: "To write a pamphlet or pamphlets."
simplified_definition: a thin book that has a paper cover, written to give information on some topic.

definition: "Alt. of Panto"
simplified_definition: the god of woods and fields in Greek mythology, who protects shepherds and sheep. Pan has the legs and sometimes the horns and ears of a goat.

definition: "A thin cake of batter fried in a pan or on a griddle; a griddlecake; a flapjack."
simplified_definition: a flat round cake of batter fried on both sides in a frying pan or a griddle.

definition: "The sweetbread  a gland connected with the intestine of nearly all vertebrates. It is usually elongated and lightcolored and its secretion called the pancreatic juice is discharged often together with the bile into the upper part of the intestines and is a powerful aid in digestion. See Illust. of Digestive apparatus."
simplified_definition: a large gland near the stomach. The pancreas makes digestive juices and insulin.

definition: "A small Asiatic mammal  having fine soft fur. It is related to the bears  and inhabits the mountains of Northern India."
simplified_definition: a large blackandwhite mammal that is related to bears. They live in the mountains of western China and eat only bamboo plants. They are also called giant pandas.

definition: "A beautiful woman   whom Jupiter caused Vulcan to make out of clay in order to punish the human race because Prometheus had stolen the fire from heaven. Jupiter gave Pandora a box containing all human ills which when the box was opened escaped and spread over the earth. Hope alone remained in the box. Another version makes the box contain all the blessings of the gods which were lost to men when Pandora opened it."
simplified_definition: the first woman, according to Greek mythology. Pandora opened the lid of a box out of curiosity and let all the evils fly out into the world.

definition: "The narrow edge of a hammer head. See Peen."
simplified_definition: a sheet of glass in a window or door.

definition: "A heap of dressed ore."
simplified_definition: a section of a door, wall, or other surface that is set apart from the area around it by being raised, sunken, or decorated.

definition: "A paroxysm of extreme pain or anguish; a sudden and transitory agony; a throe; as  the pangs of death."
simplified_definition: a sudden, sharp pain.

definition: "By extension: A sudden widespread fright or apprehension concerning financial affairs."
simplified_definition: a sudden terror that often causes wild behavior and spreads to many other individuals.

definition: "A picture presenting a view of objects in every direction  as from a central point."
simplified_definition: a full, wide view of a large area.

definition: "A plant of the genus Viola  and its blossom  originally purple and yellow. Cultivated varieties have very large flowers of a great diversity of colors. Called also heart'sease loveinidleness and many other quaint names."
simplified_definition: a garden flower that has flat, rounded petals that feel like velvet. Pansies grow in many colors.

definition: "Hence: To long eagerly; to desire earnestly."
simplified_definition: to breathe in quick, short breaths; gasp.

definition: "A large darkcolored variety of the leopard  by some zoologists considered a distinct species. It is marked with large ringlike spots the centers of which are darker than the color of the body."
simplified_definition: a leopard or jaguar, especially a black one with no spots that show. Leopards live in Africa and Asia. Jaguars live in South or Central America. Panthers are carnivorous mammals and are closely related to lions, tigers, and other large cats that roar.

definition: "A universal mimic; an actor who assumes many parts; also  any actor."
simplified_definition: a type of play in which stories are by told by gestures and facial expressions. Talking is not allowed in pantomime.

definition: "An apartment or closet in which bread and other provisions are kept."
simplified_definition: a small room near a kitchen, for keeping food, dishes, and other supplies.

definition: "A child's word for father."
simplified_definition: father; dad.

definition: "A substance in the form of thin sheets or leaves intended to be written or printed on  or to be used in wrapping. It is made of rags straw bark wood or other fibrous material which is first reduced to pulp then molded pressed and dried."
simplified_definition: a thin material made from wood, rags, or grasses. Paper is used for writing, wrapping, and covering walls.

definition: "A babe or young child of Indian parentage in North America."
simplified_definition: a North American Indian baby or young child.

definition: "A tall rushlike plant  of the Sedge family  formerly growing in Egypt and now found in Abyssinia Syria Sicily etc. The stem is triangular and about an inch thick."
simplified_definition: a tall water plant of the Nile valley in Egypt grown as an ornamental plant and once used to make a material like paper.

definition: "See Parr."
simplified_definition: normal or average in amount or degree; standard.

definition: "Procurable."
simplified_definition: a very short story told to teach a moral or religious lesson.

definition: "A contrivance somewhat in the form of an umbrella  by means of which a descent may be made from a balloon or any eminence."
simplified_definition: a large device made of strong, thin cloth that opens up like an umbrella. A parachute slows the fall of a person who jumps from an airplane. It can also be used in the same way for something that is dropped from an airplane.

definition: "The ground where a military display is held  or where troops are drilled."
simplified_definition: a public procession of people, marching bands, or vehicles in front of spectators as part of a celebration or ceremony.

definition: "To affect or exalt with visions of felicity; to entrance; to bewitch."
simplified_definition: a place where good people go after death; heaven.

definition: "Alt. of Paraffine"
simplified_definition: a white substance like wax that is made from petroleum. It is used for candles, sealing materials, and waxed paper.

definition: "To divide into paragraphs; to mark with the character ."
simplified_definition: a part of something written made up of one or more sentences that develop a certain idea. A paragraph begins on a new line which is usually indented from the other lines.

definition: "Any one of numerous species of small parrots having a graduated tail  which is frequently very long;  called also paroquet and paraquet."
simplified_definition: a small parrot with a long, pointed tail and brightly colored feathers.

definition: "To produce or adduce as a parallel."
simplified_definition: lying or moving in the same direction and being the same distance apart at every point. Parallel lines never meet or cross each other.

definition: "A rightlined quadrilateral figure  whose opposite sides are parallel and consequently equal;  sometimes restricted in popular usage to a rectangle or quadrilateral figure which is longer than it is broad and with right angles."
simplified_definition: a flat closed figure with four straight sides. The opposite sides are parallel and equal to each other.

definition: "Same as Paralyze."
simplified_definition: a spelling of "paralyze" used in Canada and Britain. See "paralyze" for more information.

definition: "Abolition of function  whether complete or partial; esp. the loss of the power of voluntary motion with or without that of sensation in any part of the body; palsy. See Hemiplegia and Paraplegia. Also used figuratively."
simplified_definition: a loss of feeling in or the ability to move a body part. Paralysis is caused by injury or disease of the nervous system.

definition: "Fig.: To unnerve; to destroy or impair the energy of; to render ineffective; as  the occurrence paralyzed the community; despondency paralyzed his efforts."
simplified_definition: to make unable to move or to feel any sensation.

definition: "of Paralyze"
simplified_definition: unable to move or unable to feel any sensation.

definition: "Having the highest rank or jurisdiction; superior to all others; chief; supreme; preeminent; as  a paramount duty."
simplified_definition: most important; chief; highest.

definition: "An animal which habitually uses the nest of another  as the cowbird and the European cuckoo."
simplified_definition: a plant, animal, or fungus that lives on or in another living thing, called the host. A parasite gets its food and energy from the host organism.

definition: "A kind of small umbrella used by women as a protection from the sun."
simplified_definition: a light umbrella used especially by women to protect against the sun.

definition: "To divide and distribute by parts or portions;  often with out or into."
simplified_definition: something wrapped or packed for carrying or shipping; package.

definition: "To become scorched or superficially burnt; to be very dry."
simplified_definition: to make very dry by heating.

definition: "The skin of a lamb  sheep goat young calf or other animal prepared for writing on. See Vellum."
simplified_definition: a material like paper made of the skins of sheep or goats.

definition: "A release  by a sovereign or officer having jurisdiction from the penalties of an offense being distinguished from amenesty which is a general obliteration and canceling of a particular line of past offenses."
simplified_definition: forgiveness for a small disturbance.

definition: "Fig.: To diminish the bulk of; to reduce; to lessen."
simplified_definition: to cut off the outside layer or ends from.

definition: "That which produces; cause; source; author; begetter; as  idleness is the parent of vice."
simplified_definition: a mother or a father.

definition: "Of or pertaining to a parent or to parents; as  parental authority; parental obligations."
simplified_definition: of, relating to, or characteristic of a parent or parents.

definition: "A word  phrase or sentence by way of comment or explanation inserted in or attached to a sentence which would be grammatically complete without it. It is usually inclosed within curved lines  or dashes."
simplified_definition: either of a pair of punctuation marks . They are used to enclose information that is not part of the main sentence. They are also used to set apart mathematical quantities to be treated as a unit.

definition: "A plant common in Europe ; herb Paris; truelove. It has been used as a narcotic."
simplified_definition: the capital city of France.

definition: "An ecclesiastical society  usually not bounded by territorial limits but composed of those persons who choose to unite under the charge of a particular priest clergyman or minister; also loosely the territory in which the members of a congregation live."
simplified_definition: a district of a Christian religion that has its own church and priest or minister.

definition: "To inclose in a park  or as in a park."
simplified_definition: an area of public land, as in a city, that is set aside for rest and enjoyment.

definition: "A parleying; a discussion; a conference."
simplified_definition: a group of people who make the laws for a country.

definition: "The apartment in a monastery or nunnery where the inmates are permitted to meet and converse with each other  or with visitors and friends from without."
simplified_definition: a room in a house, hotel, restaurant, or the like for conversation or for entertaining guests.

definition: "Of or pertaining to a parish; restricted to a parish; as  parochial duties."
simplified_definition: having to do with or in a church parish.

definition: "To set at liberty on parole; as  to parole prisoners."
simplified_definition: the release of a prisoner before the time of punishment is finished. Prisoners who are given parole have behaved well in prison. When on parole, they must obey certain rules.

definition: "In a general sense  any bird of the order Psittaci."
simplified_definition: a tropical bird with a short, hooked bill and brightly colored feathers. Parrots can often imitate spoken words and other sounds.

definition: "An aromatic umbelliferous herb   having finely divided leaves which are used in cookery and as a garnish."
simplified_definition: a garden herb used to season or decorate food.

definition: "The aromatic and edible spindleshaped root of the cultivated form of the Pastinaca sativa  a biennial umbelliferous plant which is very poisonous in its wild state; also the plant itself."
simplified_definition: a plant like a carrot. The parsnip has yellow flowers and a large, pale root that can be eaten.

definition: "Any clergyman having ecclesiastical preferment; one who is in orders  or is licensed to preach; a preacher."
simplified_definition: a pastor in a Protestant church; minister.

definition: "An equal constituent portion; one of several or many like quantities  numbers etc. into which anything is divided or of which it is composed; proportional division or ingredient."
simplified_definition: a separate piece or section of a whole.

definition: "Of  pertaining to or affecting a part only; not general or universal; not total or entire; as a partial eclipse of the moon."
simplified_definition: not complete.

definition: "In part; not totally; as  partially true; the sun partially eclipsed."
simplified_definition: partly; not completely.

definition: "A participator; a partaker."
simplified_definition: a person who takes part.

definition: "To partake of; to share in; to receive a part of."
simplified_definition: to take part; share .

definition: "community; fellowship; association."
simplified_definition: the act or an instance of participating.

definition: "Anything that partakes of the nature of different things."
simplified_definition: a form of a verb that can also sometimes be used as an adjective. In the sentence "The broken machine was very tiring to fix," the words "broken," and "tiring" are participles.

definition: "The smaller hosts distributed in the communion of the laity."
simplified_definition: a tiny amount or small piece; speck; trace.

definition: "Special or personal peculiarity  trait or character; individuality; interest etc."
simplified_definition: of or having to do with a single person, thing, or event and not any other.

definition: "In a particular manner; expressly; with a specific reference or interest; in particular; distinctly."
simplified_definition: to an unusual degree; more than other things in a group.

definition: "To divide into distinct parts by lines  walls etc.; as to partition a house."
simplified_definition: a wall or partial wall that separates or divides space.

definition: "In part; in some measure of degree; not wholly."
simplified_definition: in some degree or measure; in part.

definition: "One who has a part in anything with an other; a partaker; an associate; a sharer. """"Partner of his fortune."""" Shak. Hence:  A husband or a wife.  Either one of a couple who dance together.  One who shares as a member of a partnership in the management  or in the gains and losses of a business."
simplified_definition: a person who shares in an activity with another person.

definition: "A division or sharing among partners; joint possession or interest."
simplified_definition: a business that is owned by two or more persons.

definition: "Any one of several species of quaillike birds belonging to Colinus  and allied genera."
simplified_definition: a plump game bird with brown or gray feathers that make a whirring sound when the bird is rising to fly. The grouse and bobwhite are kinds of partridges.

definition: "The plaintiff or the defendant in a lawsuit  whether an individual a firm or corporation; a litigant."
simplified_definition: a gathering of people to celebrate or have fun.

definition: "To put in circulation; to give currency to; as  to pass counterfeit money."
simplified_definition: to go past; move beyond.

definition: "A pass or en encounter; as  a passage at arms."
simplified_definition: a way through which something can pass; corridor; channel.

definition: "A way for passage; a hall. See Passage  ."
simplified_definition: a hall or other way along which people or things may pass.

definition: "A passer or passerby; a wayfarer."
simplified_definition: a person who is not driving, but travels in an automobile, bus, train, or other vehicle.

definition: "Exceedingly; excessively; surpassingly; as  passing fair; passing strange."
simplified_definition: going by, in position or time.

definition: "Passion week. See Passion week  below."
simplified_definition: any strong feeling or emotion.

definition: "To express feelingly or sorrowfully."
simplified_definition: having or showing strong emotions.

definition: "Inactive; inert; not showing strong affinity; as  red phosphorus is comparatively passive."
simplified_definition: receiving an action without acting in return, or not responding to something that might affect one.

definition: "A feast of the Jews  instituted to commemorate the sparing of the Hebrews in Egypt when God smiting the firstborn of the Egyptians passed over the houses of the Israelites which were marked with the blood of a lamb."
simplified_definition: a Jewish holiday that celebrates the escape of the ancient Hebrews from Egypt.

definition: "A license granted in time of war for the removal of persons and effects from a hostile country; a safeconduct."
simplified_definition: an official document that shows that the holder is a citizen of a country. A passport gives one the right to travel in other countries and return to one's own country.

definition: "A word to be given before a person is allowed to pass; a watchword; a countersign."
simplified_definition: a secret word or phrase that allows one to enter a place, or get information that is given only to those who use the password.

definition: "By; beyond; as  he ran past."
simplified_definition: gone by in time; ended.

definition: "The mineral substance in which other minerals are imbedded."
simplified_definition: a mixture used to stick paper or other light materials together. Paste can be made of water and flour. Paste bought in a store will have other ingredients.

definition: "A crayon made of a paste composed of a color ground with gum water."
simplified_definition: a pale, soft color.

definition: "To subject to pasteurization."
simplified_definition: to heat for a certain length of time. Food and drinks are pasteurized in order to kill most of the harmful bacteria.

definition: "To sport; to amuse one's self."
simplified_definition: an activity that makes the time pass in a pleasant way.

definition: "A shepherd; one who has the care of flocks and herds."
simplified_definition: a minister or priest in charge of a church or congregation.

definition: "The place where pastry is made."
simplified_definition: a dough of flour, shortening, and water that is baked and used for pie crusts.

definition: "To feed  esp. to feed on growing grass; to supply grass as food for; as the farmer pastures fifty oxen; the land will pasture forty cows."
simplified_definition: a piece of land on which animals are put to graze.

definition: "Exactly suitable; fit; convenient; timely."
simplified_definition: to strike or tap softly with something flat, such as the open palm or fingers.

definition: "To adorn  as the face with a patch or patches."
simplified_definition: a small piece of material used to cover a hole or tear or to make a weak place stronger.

definition: "Work composed of pieces sewed together  esp. pieces of various colors and figures; hence anything put together of incongruous or illadapted parts; something irregularly clumsily composed; a thing putched up."
simplified_definition: pieces of cloth or leather sewn together in a pattern.

definition: "Open; expanded; evident; apparent; unconcealed; manifest; public; conspicuous."
simplified_definition: a government grant that gives someone the right to make, use, or sell an invention. A patent is given for a certain number of years.

definition: "Of or pertaining to a father; fatherly; showing the disposition of a father; guiding or instructing as a father; as  paternal care."
simplified_definition: having to do with or typical of a father.

definition: "To walk or go."
simplified_definition: a track beaten by the feet of people or animals.

definition: "Expressing or showing anger; passionate."
simplified_definition: causing feelings of pity or sorrow.

definition: "Sufferance; permission."
simplified_definition: the ability to calmly put up with pain or trouble without getting upset or angry.

definition: "To compose  to calm."
simplified_definition: a person or animal that is getting medical treatment.

definition: "A paved yard or floor where ores are cleaned and sorted  or where ore salt mercury etc. are trampled by horses to effect intermixture and amalgamation."
simplified_definition: a paved area next to a house that is used for dining or relaxing outdoors.

definition: "The father and ruler of a family; one who governs his family or descendants by paternal right;  usually applied to heads of families in ancient history  especially in Biblical and Jewish history to those who lived before the time of Moses."
simplified_definition: a man who is the leader of a family or tribe.

definition: "Becoming to a patriot; patriotic."
simplified_definition: one who loves, supports, and defends his or her country.

definition: "Inspired by patriotism; actuated by love of one's country; zealously and unselfishly devoted to the service of one's country; as  a patriotic statesman vigilance."
simplified_definition: feeling or showing love for and loyalty to one's country.

definition: "Love of country; devotion to the welfare of one's country; the virtues and actions of a patriot; the passion which inspires one to serve one's country."
simplified_definition: love for and loyalty to one's country.

definition: "A movement  by a small body of troops beyond the line of outposts to explore the country and gain intelligence of the enemy's whereabouts."
simplified_definition: to guard by making regular trips along or through.

definition: "One who has gift and disposition of a benefice."
simplified_definition: a regular customer of a shop, restaurant, or some other business.

definition: "To trade with customarily; to frequent as a customer."
simplified_definition: to shop at or use the services of regularly.

definition: "Anything cut or formed to serve as a guide to cutting or forming objects; as  a dressmaker's pattern."
simplified_definition: an arrangement of shapes, lines, letters, numbers, or colors that can be repeated or used again and again.

definition: "A little pie."
simplified_definition: a small, flat, round cake of ground meat or other food.

definition: "A poor person; especially  one development on private or public charity. Also used adjectively; as pouper immigrants pouper labor."
simplified_definition: a very poor person who must live on public money.

definition: "To be intermitted; to cease; as  the music pauses."
simplified_definition: a short stop.

definition: "To lay or cover with stone  brick or other material so as to make a firm level or convenient surface for horses carriages or persons on foot to travel on; to floor with brick stone or other solid material; as to pave a street; to pave a court."
simplified_definition: to cover with concrete, asphalt, stones, or some other material to make a hard flat surface.

definition: "That with which anythingis paved; a floor or covering of solid material  laid so as to make a hard and convenient surface for travel; a paved road or sidewalk; a decorative interior floor of tiles or colored bricks."
simplified_definition: a hard surface for a road, driveway, or sidewalk.

definition: "Same as Tent "
simplified_definition: a light building with open sides used for shelter or recreation.

definition: "The hand."
simplified_definition: the foot of an animal that has four legs and claws.

definition: "See Pan  the masticatory."
simplified_definition: one of the eight pieces in the game of chess. The pawn has the lowest value and is placed in the front rank at the beginning of a game.

definition: "To discharge  as a debt demand or obligation by giving or doing what is due or required; to deliver the amount or value of to the person to whom it is owing; to discharge a debt by delivering ."
simplified_definition: to give money to.

definition: "Punishment; chastisement."
simplified_definition: the act or an instance of giving money in return for something.

definition: "The sliding weight on a steelyard."
simplified_definition: a small, round, green seed grown in a pod on a climbing plant. Peas are eaten as a vegetable.

definition: "To make or become quiet; to be silent; to stop."
simplified_definition: a state of freedom from war or conflict.

definition: "Possessing or enjoying peace; not disturbed by war  tumult agitation anxiety or commotion; quiet; tranquil; as a peaceful time; a peaceful country; a peaceful end."
simplified_definition: quiet; calm.

definition: "A wellknown highflavored juicy fruit  containing one or two seeds in a hard almondlike endocarp or stone; also the tree which bears it . In the wild stock the fruit is hard and inedible."
simplified_definition: a fruit that has yellow or reddish skin covered with a soft fuzz. It has sweet, juicy flesh and a large, rough pit.

definition: "The male of any pheasant of the genus Pavo  of which at least two species are known native of Southern Asia and the East Indies."
simplified_definition: a male peafowl. It has a long, colorful tail, which it can raise and spread like a fan.

definition: "The peacock or peahen; any species of Pavo."
simplified_definition: a large Asian pheasant. The males have long colorful tails, which they can raise and spread like a fan.

definition: "A point; the sharp end or top of anything that terminates in a point; as  the peak or front of a cap."
simplified_definition: the top part of a mountain that rises to a point, or such a mountain itself.

definition: "To assail with noise or loud sounds."
simplified_definition: a loud ringing of bells of different tones.

definition: "The fruit of a trailing leguminous plant ; also  the plant itself which is widely cultivated for its fruit."
simplified_definition: a seed like a nut that grows in a dry pod under the ground. Peanuts can be prepared and eaten in many ways.

definition: "The fleshy pome  or fruit of a rosaceous tree  cultivated in many varieties in temperate climates; also the tree which bears this fruit. See Pear family below."
simplified_definition: a sweet, juicy fruit that is shaped like a bell.

definition: "Of or pertaining to pearl or pearls; made of pearls  or of motherofpearl."
simplified_definition: a smooth, round gem that is formed inside the shells of oysters. A pearl forms to cover something, such as a grain of sand, that gets stuck in an oyster and irritates it.

definition: "Rustic  rural."
simplified_definition: a member of the class of farm workers and small farmers in Europe and Asia.

definition: "A substance of vegetable origin  consisting of roots and fibers moss etc. in various stages of decomposition and found as a kind of turf or bog usually in low situations where it is always more or less saturated with water. It is often dried and used for fuel."
simplified_definition: soil from a wet area that is made up of decayed plants. Peat can be used as a fuel or fertilizer.

definition: "A small roundish stone or bowlder; especially  a stone worn and rounded by the action of water; a pebblestone."
simplified_definition: a small, smooth rock rounded by the action of water.

definition: "A species of hickory   growing in North America chiefly in the Mississippi valley and in Texas where it is one of the largest of forest trees; also its fruit a smooth oblong nut an inch or an inch and a half long with a thin shell and wellflavored meat."
simplified_definition: a nut that has a thin, smooth, oval shell.

definition: "A pachyderm of the genus Dicotyles."
simplified_definition: a mammal that looks like a pig. Peccaries are smaller than true pigs, but have tusks and large heads. Wild peccaries are the only pig relative native to North and South America. Peccaries are omnivores that eat many kinds of foods. They live in many habitats, from deserts to rain forests.

definition: "To make strokes with the beak  or with a pointed instrument."
simplified_definition: to strike, or pick up quickly with the beak.

definition: "That which is peculiar; a sole or exclusive property; a prerogative; a characteristic."
simplified_definition: odd, strange, or unusual.

definition: "Exclusive possession or right."
simplified_definition: the state or fact of being odd or strange.

definition: "Of or pertaining to a pedal; having pedals."
simplified_definition: a lever pushed by the foot to run or control a machine.

definition: "To travel about with wares for sale; to go from place to place  or from house to house for the purpose of retailing goods; as to peddle without a license."
simplified_definition: to offer for sale on the street or from door to door.

definition: "An iron socket  or support for the foot of a brace at the end of a truss where it rests on a pier."
simplified_definition: a support or base for a column, statue, or some other object.

definition: "Going on foot; performed on foot; as  a pedestrian journey."
simplified_definition: a person who is walking.

definition: "A line of ancestors; descent; lineage; genealogy; a register or record of a line of ancestors."
simplified_definition: a list or table of the ancestors of an animal or person.

definition: "To look slyly  or with the eyes half closed or through a crevice; to peep."
simplified_definition: to look quickly or secretly.

definition: "A small tower  fort or castle; a keep."
simplified_definition: to pull, tear, or cut the outer covering from.

definition: "The European meadow pipit ."
simplified_definition: to look quickly or secretly through a narrow opening or from a hiding place.

definition: "One of the same rank  quality endowments character etc.; an equal; a match; a mate."
simplified_definition: a person of the same rank, age group, or ability as another person; equal.

definition: "To score with a peg  as points in the game; as she pegged twelwe points."
simplified_definition: a small piece of wood or other material used to hold things together, fill a hole, or mark a place.

definition: "Any large webfooted bird of the genus Pelecanus  of which about a dozen species are known. They have an enormous bill to the lower edge of which is attached a pouch in which captured fishes are temporarily stored."
simplified_definition: a large water bird that lives in warm areas. It has a pouch in the lower half of its long bill for catching and holding fish.

definition: "To form into small balls."
simplified_definition: a small bullet or small piece of shot.

definition: "See Pallmall."
simplified_definition: in a quick, confused, jumbled manner.

definition: "The skin of a beast with the hair on; a raw or undressed hide; a skin preserved with the hairy or woolly covering on it. See th Fell."
simplified_definition: to attack by throwing things or by repeated blows.

definition: "A small inclosure; as  a pen for sheep or for pigs."
simplified_definition: a long, thin tool used for writing or drawing in ink.

definition: "To put a penalty on. See Penalty  ."
simplified_definition: to give penalty or punishment to.

definition: "A handicap."
simplified_definition: a punishment given for breaking a law, rule, or agreement.

definition: "of Penny"
simplified_definition: plural form of penny, used in the United Kingdom.

definition: "A small medicated bougie."
simplified_definition: a long, thin tool used for writing or drawing. Pencils are made of a narrow stick of graphite held within a case of wood.

definition: "The stem and ring of a watch  by which it is suspended."
simplified_definition: something hanging as an ornament on a chain around the neck or on an earring.

definition: "A body so suspended from a fixed point as to swing freely to and fro by the alternate action of gravity and momentum. It is used to regulate the movements of clockwork and other machinery."
simplified_definition: a weight hung on a long cord, wire, or lever so that it swings back and forth. Pendulums are used to control the movements of some clocks.

definition: "To affect profoundly through the senses or feelings; to touch with feeling; to make sensible; to move deeply; as  to penetrate one's heart with pity."
simplified_definition: to pierce or go into or through.

definition: "Any bird of the order Impennes  or Ptilopteri. They are covered with short thick feathers almost scalelike on the wings which are without true quills. They are unable to fly but use their wings to aid in diving in which they are very expert. See King penguin under Jackass."
simplified_definition: a large water bird with webbed feet that lives in colder regions of the Southern Hemisphere. Penguins do not fly, but use their wings like flippers for swimming.

definition: "A portion of land nearly surrounded by water  and connected with a larger body by a neck or isthmus."
simplified_definition: a piece of land surrounded on nearly all sides by water. It is connected to a larger body of land by a usually narrow strip of land.

definition: "The male member  or organ of generation."
simplified_definition: the male sex organ through which sperm is transferred to a female. The penis is also used to dispose of urine.

definition: "One who does penance."
simplified_definition: a prison for people who have been found guilty of serious crimes.

definition: "A small pocketknife; formerly  a knife used for making and mending quill pens."
simplified_definition: a small folding knife.

definition: "The use of the pen in writing; the art of writing; style or manner of writing; chirography; as  good or bad penmanship."
simplified_definition: the art, skill, or manner of handwriting.

definition: "A rope or strap to which a purchase is hooked."
simplified_definition: a long flag shaped like a triangle. Pennants are used on ships for signaling or as a sign for a school, team, or some other group.

definition: "Destitute of money; impecunious; poor."
simplified_definition: having no money at all; very poor.

definition: "An English coin  formerly of copper now of bronze the twelfth part of an English shilling in account value and equal to four farthings or about two cents;  usually indicated by the abbreviation d. ."
simplified_definition: a coin of the United States and Canada equal to one cent.

definition: "A stated allowance to a person in consideration of past services; payment made to one retired from service  on account of age disability or other cause; especially a regular stipend paid by a government to retired public officers disabled soldiers the families of soldiers killed in service or to meritorious authors or the like."
simplified_definition: money paid at regular times by a former employer to a person who has retired, or by the government to a person who is not able to work.

definition: "A plane figure having five angles  and consequently five sides; any figure having five angles."
simplified_definition: a flat closed figure with five straight sides.

definition: "A shed or roof sloping from the main wall or building  as over a door or window; a leanto. Also figuratively."
simplified_definition: an apartment or house built on the top floor or roof of a tall building.

definition: "A plant  and its flower of the ranunculaceous genus Paeonia. Of the four or five species one is a shrub; the rest are perennial herbs with showy flowers often double in cultivation."
simplified_definition: a garden plant with large pink, red, or white flowers.

definition: "The body of persons who compose a community  tribe nation or race; an aggregate of individuals forming a whole; a community; a nation."
simplified_definition: human beings; persons.

definition: "To fire numerous shots ."
simplified_definition: a spice that comes from the dried berries of tropical vines in southeast Asia.

definition: "An aromatic and pungent plant of the genus Mentha   much used in medicine and confectionery."
simplified_definition: a kind of mint plant that has small pink or white flowers and is grown for its oil. Peppermint is used in medicine and as a flavoring for toothpaste, gum, and candy.

definition: "A prefix used to signify through  throughout by for or as an intensive as perhaps by hap or chance; perennial that lasts throughout the year; perforce through or by force; perfoliate perforate; perspicuous evident throughout or very evident; perplex literally to entangle very much."
simplified_definition: for each.

definition: "To obtain knowledge of through the senses; to receive impressions from by means of the bodily organs; to take cognizance of the existence  character or identity of by means of the senses; to see hear or feel; as to perceive a distant ship; to perceive a discord."
simplified_definition: to become aware of through the senses.

definition: "A certain rate per cent; the allowance  duty rate of interest discount or commission on a hundred."
simplified_definition: some part of a whole based on a total of one hundred parts.

definition: "An idea; a notion."
simplified_definition: the ability to become aware of or know through the senses.

definition: "To occupy as a perch."
simplified_definition: a branch or bar on which birds sit.

definition: "The act of tapping or striking the surface of the body in order to learn the condition of the parts beneath by the sound emitted or the sensation imparted to the fingers. Percussion is said to be immediate if the blow is directly upon the body; if some interventing substance  as a pleximeter is used it is called mediate."
simplified_definition: the striking of one hard object against another with force so that sound is produced.

definition: "Continuing without cessation or intermission; perpetual; unceasing; never failing."
simplified_definition: lasting throughout the year or for many years.

definition: "Hermaphrodite; having both stamens and pistils;  said of flower."
simplified_definition: free from mistakes or faults.

definition: "The quality or state of being perfect or complete  so that nothing requisite is wanting; entire development; consummate culture skill or moral excellence; the highest attainable state or degree of excellence; maturity; as perfection in an art in a science or in a system; perfection in form or degree; fruits in perfection."
simplified_definition: the state or condition of being without a fault or mistake.

definition: "In a perfect manner or degree; in or to perfection; completely; wholly; throughly; faultlessly."
simplified_definition: in a manner that is without a fault or mistake.

definition: "To bore through; to pierce through with a pointed instrument; to make a hole or holes through by boring or piercing; to pierce or penetrate the surface of."
simplified_definition: to make a hole in.

definition: "To represent; to act; to play; as in drama."
simplified_definition: to carry out; do.

definition: "The act of performing; the carrying into execution or action; execution; achievement; accomplishment; representation by action; as  the performance of an undertaking of a duty."
simplified_definition: the act of performing .

definition: "One who performs  accomplishes or fulfills; as a good promiser but a bad performer; especially one who shows skill and training in any art; as a performer of the drama; a performer on the harp."
simplified_definition: a person who sings, acts, or does some form of entertainment for an audience; one who performs.

definition: "A substance that emits an agreeable odor."
simplified_definition: a liquid, made from flowers, herbs, or other substances that has a pleasant smell. Perfume is put on the body.

definition: "By chance; peradventure; perchance; it may be."
simplified_definition: maybe; possibly.

definition: "Danger; risk; hazard; jeopardy; exposure of person or property to injury  loss or destruction."
simplified_definition: the condition of being in danger or at risk.

definition: "The outer boundary of a body or figure  or the sum of all the sides."
simplified_definition: the boundary or border of a figure or area.

definition: "A portion of time as limited and determined by some recurring phenomenon  as by the completion of a revolution of one of the heavenly bodies; a division of time as a series of years months or days in which something is completed and ready to recommence and go on in the same order; as the period of the sun or the earth or a comet."
simplified_definition: a section of time with a set beginning and end.

definition: "Pertaining to  derived from or designating the highest oxygen acid  of iodine."
simplified_definition: happening or appearing at regular times.

definition: "Of or pertaining to a period or periods  or to division by periods."
simplified_definition: a magazine that is printed every week, month, or at some other regular time.

definition: "A general or comprehensive view."
simplified_definition: an instrument on a submarine that is made up of a long tube with mirrors and prisms that allow one to see ships and other things above the surface of the water.

definition: "To be destroyed; to pass away; to become nothing; to be lost; to die; hence  to wither; to waste away."
simplified_definition: to die or be destroyed by violence or in some other way that is not natural.

definition: "Liable to perish; subject to decay  destruction or death; as perishable goods; our perishable bodies."
simplified_definition: likely to spoil or rot in a short time.

definition: "At common law  a willfully false statement in a fact material to the issue made by a witness under oath in a competent judicial proceeding. By statute the penalties of perjury are imposed on the making of willfully false affirmations."
simplified_definition: the crime of telling a lie in a court after promising under oath to tell the truth.

definition: "Continuing in the same state  or without any change that destroys form or character; remaining unaltered or unremoved; abiding; durable; fixed; stable; lasting; as a permanent impression."
simplified_definition: lasting or meant to last for a very long time; everlasting.

definition: "The act of permitting or allowing; formal consent; authorization; leave; license or liberty granted."
simplified_definition: the act of permitting.

definition: "To consent to; to allow or suffer to be done; to tolerate; to put up with."
simplified_definition: to allow  to go into or be in a place.

definition: "A line at right angles to the plane of the horizon; a vertical line or direction."
simplified_definition: at a right angle to.

definition: "Neverceasing; continuing forever or for an unlimited time; unfailing; everlasting; continuous."
simplified_definition: lasting forever.

definition: "To make perpetual; to cause to endure  or to be continued indefinitely; to preserve from extinction or oblivion; to eternize."
simplified_definition: to cause to last or be remembered.

definition: "of Perplex"
simplified_definition: puzzled, confused, or uncertain.

definition: "To harass with importunity; to pursue with persistent solicitations; to annoy."
simplified_definition: to continually treat in a cruel or harsh way because of race, religion, political ideas, or some other difference.

definition: "The state or condition of being persecuted."
simplified_definition: the act of continually treating others in a cruel way because of race, religion, politics, or some other difference; or the condition of being treated in this way.

definition: "A native or inhabitant of Persia."
simplified_definition: of or having to do with the country of Iran, or its people or language.

definition: "An American tree  and its fruit  found from New York southward. The fruit is like a plum in appearance but is very harsh and astringent until it has been exposed to frost when it becomes palatable and nutritious."
simplified_definition: a sweet, juicy, orange or yellow fruit whose skin and pulp is like that of a plum.

definition: "To stand firm; to be fixed and unmoved; to stay; to continue steadfastly; especially  to continue fixed in a course of conduct against opposing motives; to persevere;  sometimes conveying an unfavorable notion as of doggedness or obstinacy."
simplified_definition: to continue in a firm, steady way without stopping or lessening.

definition: "Alt. of Persistency"
simplified_definition: the act of continuing steadily in a course of action.

definition: "Inclined to persist; having staying qualities; tenacious of position or purpose."
simplified_definition: continuing, lasting, or holding on in a firm, steady way.

definition: "A character or part  as in a play; a specific kind or manifestation of individual character whether in real life or in literary or dramatic representation; an assumed character."
simplified_definition: a human being.

definition: "Of or pertaining to a particular person; relating to  or affecting an individual or each of many individuals; peculiar or proper to private concerns; not public or general; as personal comfort; personal desire."
simplified_definition: of, relating to, or belonging to a particular person.

definition: "That quality of a law which concerns the condition  state and capacity of persons."
simplified_definition: all of the qualities of a person that make that person different from others.

definition: "In a personal manner; by bodily presence; in person; not by representative or substitute; as  to deliver a letter personally."
simplified_definition: in person; without the aid of others.

definition: "The body of persons employed in some public service  as the army navy etc.;  distinguished from materiel."
simplified_definition: all of the people who work for a business or other organization.

definition: "The effect of distance upon the appearance of objects  by means of which the eye recognized them as being at a more or less measurable distance. Hence aerial perspective the assumed greater vagueness or uncertainty of outline in distant objects."
simplified_definition: a way of showing objects on the flat surface of a picture so that they seem the correct size and distance from one another.

definition: "That which is excreted through the skin; sweat."
simplified_definition: the act or process of giving off moisture through the pores of the skin; sweating. Perspiration is the body's way of cooling off when it gets too hot.

definition: "To excrete matter through the skin; esp.  to excrete fluids through the pores of the skin; to sweat."
simplified_definition: to give off moisture through the pores of the skin; sweat.

definition: "To use persuasion; to plead; to prevail by persuasion."
simplified_definition: to cause to do something by using reason or argument.

definition: "The act of persuading; the act of influencing the mind by arguments or reasons offered  or by anything that moves the mind or passions or inclines the will to a determination."
simplified_definition: the act of convincing someone to believe something or do something.

definition: "To belong; to have connection with  or dependence on something as an appurtenance attribute etc.; to appertain; as saltness pertains to the ocean; flowers pertain to plant life."
simplified_definition: to relate to or have to do with something.

definition: "Belonging or related to the subject or matter in hand; fit or appropriate in any way; adapted to the end proposed; apposite; material; relevant; as  pertinent illustrations or arguments; pertinent evidence."
simplified_definition: having to do with or connected to a subject; relevant.

definition: "A Spanish dollar; also  an Argentine Chilian Colombian etc. coin equal to from  cents to a dollar; also a pound weight."
simplified_definition: the main unit of money of Mexico, Cuba, and several other countries.

definition: "Of or pertaining to pessimism; characterized by pessimism; gloomy; foreboding."
simplified_definition: feeling in a negative way about things; expecting the worst to happen.

definition: "A fatal epidemic disease; a pestilence; specif.  the plague."
simplified_definition: an insect or animal that causes damage to crops or is harmful in other ways.

definition: "To crowd together in an annoying way; to overcrowd; to infest."
simplified_definition: to bother again and again.

definition: "A constable's or bailiff's staff;  so called from its shape."
simplified_definition: a tool used for grinding or pounding substances into powder in a bowl called a mortar.

definition: "To treat as a pet; to fondle; to indulge; as  she was petted and spoiled."
simplified_definition: a tame animal people keep in their homes as a companion or for pleasure.

definition: "One of the expanded ambulacra which form a rosette on the black of certain Echini."
simplified_definition: one of the separate leaves that form the outer part of a flower head. Petals are usually a different color from the plant's other leaves.

definition: "A prayer; a supplication; an imploration; an entreaty; especially  a request of a solemn or formal kind; a prayer to the Supreme Being or to a person of superior power rank or authority; also a single clause in such a prayer."
simplified_definition: a formal, written request by many people that is made to a person in authority.

definition: "To convert  as any animal or vegetable matter into stone or stony substance."
simplified_definition: to turn into stone. Minerals left behind by water petrify wood by replacing woods cells when they die.

definition: "Petroleum."
simplified_definition: the British word for the flammable liquid used mainly as fuel for engines. "Petrol" has the same meaning as "gasoline."

definition: "Rock oil  mineral oil or natural oil a dark brown or greenish inflammable liquid which at certain points exists in the upper strata of the earth from whence it is pumped or forced by pressure of the gas attending it. It consists of a complex mixture of various hydrocarbons largely of the methane series but may vary much in appearance composition
simplified_definition: a thick oil found by drilling beneath the earth's surface. Petroleum is made into gasoline, heating oil, and other products.

definition: "A loose undergarment worn by women  and covering the body below the waist."
simplified_definition: a skirt worn under an outer skirt; slip.

definition: "Little; trifling; inconsiderable; also  inferior; subordinate; as a petty fault; a petty prince."
simplified_definition: of little importance or interest.

definition: "A genus of solanaceous herbs with funnelform or salvershaped corollas. Two species are common in cultivation  Petunia violacera with reddish purple flowers and P. nyctaginiflora with white flowers. There are also many hybrid forms with variegated corollas."
simplified_definition: a common garden plant that has flowers shaped like trumpets.

definition: "Any structure shaped like a church pew  as a stall formerly used by money lenders etc.; a box in theater; a pen; a sheepfold."
simplified_definition: a church bench with a back and arms at the ends. Pews are arranged in rows facing the front of the church.

definition: "A hard  tough but easily fusible alloy originally consisting of tin with a little lead but afterwards modified by the addition of copper antimony or bismuth."
simplified_definition: a metal made from tin, copper, and other metals. Pewter looks like silver and is used to make plates, candlesticks, and other objects that are both useful and beautiful.

definition: "That which has only an apparent existence; an apparition; a specter; a phantasm; a sprite; an airy spirit; an ideal image."
simplified_definition: a ghost or something else that seems real, but is not real.

definition: "A title by which the sovereigns of ancient Egypt were designated."
simplified_definition: a king of ancient Egypt.

definition: "One skilled in pharmacy; a pharmaceutist; a druggist."
simplified_definition: a person who is trained to prepare and sell drugs and medicine in keeping with the orders of a doctor.

definition: "The art or practice of preparing and preserving drugs  and of compounding and dispensing medicines according to prescriptions of physicians; the occupation of an apothecary or a pharmaceutical chemist."
simplified_definition: a place in a store or hospital in which drugs are prepared and sold; drugstore.

definition: "That which is exhibited to the eye; the appearance which anything manifests  especially any one among different and varying appearances of the same object."
simplified_definition: a particular stage in a cycle of development or process of change.

definition: "Any one of numerous species of large gallinaceous birds of the genus Phasianus  and many other genera of the family Phasianidae found chiefly in Asia."
simplified_definition: a large bird with a long tail and bright feathers.

definition: "Relating to  or of the nature of a phenomenon; hence extraordinary; wonderful; as a phenomenal memory."
simplified_definition: amazing or extraordinary.

definition: "An appearance; anything visible; whatever  in matter or spirit is apparent to or is apprehended by observation; as the phenomena of heat light or electricity; phenomena of imagination or memory."
simplified_definition: a happening or fact that can be seen or known through the senses.

definition: "An alchemist."
simplified_definition: one who studies the nature of life, truth, knowledge, and other important human matters.

definition: "Practical wisdom; calmness of temper and judgment; equanimity; fortitude; stoicism; as  to meet misfortune with philosophy."
simplified_definition: the study of the nature of life, truth, knowledge, and other important human matters,

definition: "A genus of American herbs  having showy red white or purple flowers."
simplified_definition: a North American plant that bears groups of white, purple, or red flowers.

definition: "A genus of palms including the date tree."
simplified_definition: a beautiful bird in Egyptian mythology that lives for five hundred years, then sets itself on fire and rises alive again from the ashes. The phoenix is a symbol of immortality.

definition: "Of or pertaining to the voice  or its use."
simplified_definition: relating to the method of representing speech sounds by symbols.

definition: "A character or symbol used to represent a sound  esp. one used in phonography."
simplified_definition: a machine that reproduces sound that has been recorded in the grooves of a disk; record player.

definition: "The morning star; Phosphor."
simplified_definition: a substance that is a chemical element. One of the common forms of phosphorus is a poisonous yellow solid that glows in moist air. Phosphorus is important to living things. It is used in fertilizers to help plants grow.

definition: "A contraction of Photograph."
simplified_definition: a prefix that means "light."

definition: "To practice photography; to take photographs."
simplified_definition: a picture made by using a camera that records an image on a surface that is sensitive to light.

definition: "One who practices  or is skilled in photography."
simplified_definition: a person whose job is to take photographs.

definition: "The science which relates to the action of light on sensitive bodies in the production of pictures  the fixation of images and the like."
simplified_definition: the art or practice of taking and making photographs.

definition: "To group notes into phrases; as  he phrases well. See Phrase n. ."
simplified_definition: a part of a sentence that has meaning and grammatical order but does not have both a subject and a verb. "Wants to see" and "the horror movie" are both phrases in the sentence "Bert wants to see the horror movie again."

definition: "Of or pertaining to physic  or the art of medicine; medicinal; curative; healing; also cathartic; purgative."
simplified_definition: of the body.

definition: "In a physical manner; according to the laws of nature or physics; by physical force; not morally."
simplified_definition: in, with, or by means of the body.

definition: "A person skilled in physic  or the art of healing; one duty authorized to prescribe remedies for and treat diseases; a doctor of medicine."
simplified_definition: a doctor of medicine who is qualified and licensed to treat illness and injury.

definition: "One versed in physics."
simplified_definition: a scientist who works in physics.

definition: "The science of nature  or of natural objects; that branch of science which treats of the laws and properties of matter and the forces acting upon it; especially that department of natural science which treats of the causes  that modify the general properties of bodies; natural philosophy."
simplified_definition: the science that deals with matter and energy, their qualities, and the relationships between them. Physics includes the study of light, heat, sound, electricity, and force.

definition: "A mass of type confusedly mixed or unsorted."
simplified_definition: a number equal to the ratio of the circumference of a circle to its diameter. The value of pi is approximately . or .

definition: "A performer  esp. a skilled performer on the piano."
simplified_definition: a person who plays the piano.

definition: "Alt. of Pianoforte"
simplified_definition: a musical instrument with a keyboard and many wire strings. A piano is played by pressing keys that cause small hammers to strike the strings.

definition: "An organ stop  with a high piercing tone."
simplified_definition: a small flute with a pitch that is an octave higher than that of the standard flute.

definition: "Choice; right of selection; as  to have one's pick."
simplified_definition: a sharp, pointed tool used for digging or breaking up rocks or other hard substances.

definition: "Alt. of Pickaxe"
simplified_definition: a pick that has one pointed end and a blade that is shaped liked a chisel on the other end.

definition: "A young or small pike."
simplified_definition: a fish that is related to pike. Pickerel are used for food or sport.

definition: "To tether to  or as to a picket; as to picket a horse."
simplified_definition: a pointed post fixed into the ground, used to make a fence or hold something in place.

definition: "Any article of food which has been preserved in brine or in vinegar."
simplified_definition: a cucumber or another vegetable or fruit that has been preserved in salt water, vinegar, and seasonings.

definition: "One who steals purses or other articles from pockets."
simplified_definition: a person who steals from pockets or purses in crowded or public places.

definition: "To go on a picnic  or pleasure excursion; to eat in public fashion."
simplified_definition: a social gathering at which food is eaten outdoors.

definition: "The art of painting; representation by painting."
simplified_definition: a painting, drawing, or photograph.

definition: "Forming  or fitted to form a good or pleasing picture; representing with the clearness or ideal beauty appropriate to a picture; expressing that peculiar kind of beauty which is agreeable in a picture natural or artificial; graphic; vivid; as a picturesque scene or attitude; picturesque language."
simplified_definition: as pleasing or interesting to look at as a picture or painting.

definition: "See Pi."
simplified_definition: a pastry shell filled with fruit, meat, or other filling, and baked.

definition: "A fragment or part of anything separated from the whole  in any manner as by cutting splitting breaking or tearing; a part; a portion; as a piece of sugar; to break in pieces."
simplified_definition: a section or part separated from the whole.

definition: "Any detached mass of masonry  whether insulated or supporting one side of an arch or lintel as of a bridge; the piece of wall between two openings."
simplified_definition: a long, flat structure built out from land over water that is used for landing boats; dock.

definition: "Fig.: To penetrate; to affect deeply; as  to pierce a mystery."
simplified_definition: to pass or go through with or as if with something sharp; penetrate.

definition: "A piggin."
simplified_definition: an animal with a wide, flat nose, four short legs, a thick body, and a short, curly tail. Pigs are mammals with hooves. Wild pigs often have tusks. Domestic pigs are raised for their meat, which is called pork. Adult pigs are also called hogs.

definition: "Any bird of the order Columbae  of which numerous species occur in nearly all parts of the world."
simplified_definition: a bird with a plump body, small head, and short legs. Some kinds of pigeons are also called rock doves.

definition: "Any one of the colored substances found in animal and vegetable tissues and fluids  as bilirubin urobilin chlorophyll etc."
simplified_definition: anything that is used to or serves to provide color.

definition: "A pen  or sty for pigs."
simplified_definition: a yard or cage where pigs are kept.

definition: "A pigpen."
simplified_definition: an enclosed area or cage where pigs are kept; pigpen.

definition: "The tail of a pig."
simplified_definition: a braid of hair that hangs from the head.

definition: "A foot soldier's weapon  consisting of a long wooden shaft or staff with a pointed steel head. It is now superseded by the bayonet."
simplified_definition: a fish that lives in fresh water and has a long, flat snout. Pike are used for food or sport.

definition: "A hair; hence  the fiber of wool cotton and the like; also the nap when thick or heavy as of carpeting and velvet."
simplified_definition: a number of things on top of each other; heap; stack.

definition: "To journey; to wander; to ramble."
simplified_definition: someone who takes a trip to a holy place for a religious purpose.

definition: "The journey of a pilgrim; a long journey; especially  a journey to a shrine or other sacred place. Fig. the journey of human life."
simplified_definition: a usually long trip undertaken for religious purposes, such as to visit a holy place.

definition: "To be peeled; to peel off in flakes."
simplified_definition: a small tablet of medicine that is taken by mouth.

definition: "Having a support in the form of a pillar  instead of legs; as a pillar drill."
simplified_definition: a tall column shaped like a cylinder that is used to support a structure or to serve as a decoration or monument.

definition: "A frame of adjustable boards erected on a post  and having holes through which the head and hands of an offender were thrust so as to be exposed in front of it."
simplified_definition: a wooden structure that had holes for holding a person's head and hands. Pillories were used in early America to punish people who had broken the law by having them displayed in this way and be laughed at by the public.

definition: "To rest or lay upon  or as upon a pillow; to support; as to pillow the head."
simplified_definition: a soft pad filled with stuffing and used for resting the head on while sleeping.

definition: "A removable case or covering for a pillow  usually of white linen or cotton cloth."
simplified_definition: a cloth cover for a pillow that can be removed for cleaning.

definition: "Figuratively: A guide; a director of another through a difficult or unknown course."
simplified_definition: the operator of an aircraft.

definition: "Fig.: A swelling or protuberance like a pimple."
simplified_definition: a small, painful swelling of the skin that is filled with pus.

definition: "A peg in musical instruments  for increasing or relaxing the tension of the strings."
simplified_definition: a small, stiff wire with a sharp point and usually a flat head. Pins are used to fasten or attach cloth, paper, or other materials.

definition: "An apron for a child to protect the front part of dress; a tier."
simplified_definition: the British word for a sleeveless dress worn over a blouse or shirt. "Pinafore" has the same meaning as "jumper."

definition: "To press hard or squeeze between the ends of the fingers  between teeth or claws or between the jaws of an instrument; to squeeze or compress as between any two hard bodies."
simplified_definition: to press hard between two surfaces, such as the finger and thumb.

definition: "A small cushion  in which pins may be stuck for use."
simplified_definition: a small padded cushion used to store pins and needles that are stuck into it.

definition: "A pineapple."
simplified_definition: an evergreen tree with cones and leaves shaped like needles.

definition: "A tropical plant ; also  its fruit;  so called from the resemblance of the latter in shape and external appearance to the cone of the pine tree. Its origin is unknown though conjectured to be American."
simplified_definition: a large, juicy fruit, shaped like an egg, with sweet yellow flesh. The pineapple grows on a tropical plant.

definition: "Resembling the garden pink in color; of the color called pink ; as a pink dress; pink ribbons."
simplified_definition: the color that comes from mixing white and red.

definition: "One of the Pinnipedia; a seal."
simplified_definition: a mammal with front and back limbs that look like fins. Pinnipeds have a round head and a round body that gets thinner towards the end. They spend much of their life in the ocean, but raise their young on land. Walruses, sea lions, and seals are kinds of pinnipeds.

definition: "A measure of capacity  equal to half a quart or four gills  used in liquid and dry measures. See Quart."
simplified_definition: a unit of measure equal to sixteen fluid ounces or one half quart.

definition: "A soldier detailed or employed to form roads  dig trenches and make bridges as an army advances."
simplified_definition: someone who is one of the first in a culture to explore or live in a place.

definition: "Of or pertaining to piety; exhibiting piety; reverential; dutiful; religious; devout; godly."
simplified_definition: showing love for a god or gods in thought and action; religious.

definition: "A wind instrument of music  consisting of a tube or tubes of straw reed wood or metal; any tube which produces musical sounds; as a shepherd's pipe; the pipe of an organ."
simplified_definition: a tube of metal, plastic, or other material, through which a gas or liquid may flow.

definition: "The act or crime of a pirate."
simplified_definition: robbery or attack at sea.

definition: "A robber on the high seas; one who by open violence takes the property of another on the high seas; especially  one who makes it his business to cruise for robbery or plunder; a freebooter on the seas; also one who steals in a harbor."
simplified_definition: someone who attacks or robs ships at sea.

definition: "The twelfth sign of the zodiac  marked  in almanacs."
simplified_definition: a constellation located between Aquarius and Aries. Pisces is also called the Fish.

definition: "The nut of the Pistacia vera  a tree of the order Anacardiaceae containing a kernel of a pale greenish color which has a pleasant taste resembling that of the almond and yields an oil of agreeable taste and odor;  called also pistachio nut. It is wholesome and nutritive. The tree grows in Arabia Persia Syria and Sicily."
simplified_definition: a green nut with a tan shell that is sometimes dyed red. Pistachios have a sweet taste.

definition: "An epistle."
simplified_definition: the portion of a flower where seeds grow. It is the female part of a flower.

definition: "The smallest firearm used  intended to be fired from one hand  now of many patterns and bearing a great variety of names. See Illust. of Revolver."
simplified_definition: a small gun that is held and fired with one hand.

definition: "A sliding piece which either is moved by  or moves against fluid pressure. It usually consists of a short cylinder fitting within a cylindrical vessel along which it moves back and forth. It is used in steam engines to receive motion from the steam and in pumps to transmit motion to a fluid; also for other purposes."
simplified_definition: a part of an engine or some other machine that moves up and down within a tight sleeve in order to make the machine work.

definition: "A large cavity or hole in the ground  either natural or artificial; a cavity in the surface of a body; an indentation"
simplified_definition: the hard seed at the center of a cherry, plum, or certain other fruits.

definition: "The distance between the centers of holes  as of rivet holes in boiler plates."
simplified_definition: a thick, black, sticky material made from coal or wood tar. Pitch is used for paving roads and covering roofs to protect them from water.

definition: "A tubular or cuplike appendage or expansion of the leaves of certain plants."

definition: "A fork  or farming utensil used in pitching hay sheaves of grain or the like."
simplified_definition: a long, sharp tool that is shaped like a fork and is used to move hay or straw.

definition: "The soft spongy substance in the center of the stems of many plants and trees  especially those of the dicotyledonous or exogenous classes. It consists of cellular tissue."
simplified_definition: the soft central part of certain plant stems and feathers or other animal parts.

definition: "Full of pity; tenderhearted; compassionate; kind; merciful; sympathetic."
simplified_definition: causing pity or sympathy.

definition: "Piety."

definition: "The officer or soldier who simply turns in his place whike the company or line moves around him in wheeling;  called also pivot man."
simplified_definition: a rod or pin upon which another part rotates, swings, or moves back and forth.

definition: "Alt. of Pixie"
simplified_definition: a fairy or elf who is playful or full of mischief.

definition: "To assign a place to; to put in a particular spot or place  or in a certain relative position; to direct to a particular place; to fix; to settle; to locate; as to place a book on a shelf; to place balls in tennis."
simplified_definition: a certain area of space that is taken up by something.

definition: "The act of placing  or the state of being placed."

definition: "Pleased; contented; unruffied; undisturbed; serene; peaceful; tranquil; quiet; gentle."
simplified_definition: calm, smooth, or peaceful.

definition: "Fig.: To vex; to tease; to harass."
simplified_definition: a deadly disease, sudden invasion of harmful insects, or any terrible thing that harms many people.

definition: "A rectangular garment or piece of cloth  usually made of the checkered material called tartan but sometimes of plain gray or gray with black stripes. It is worn by both sexes in Scotland."
simplified_definition: a cloth with a pattern of stripes of different widths and colors, crossing at right angles.

definition: "Without beauty; not handsome; homely; as  a plain woman."
simplified_definition: easily seen or heard; clear; visible.

definition: "A draught or form; properly  a representation drawn on a plane as a map or a chart; especially a top view as of a machine or the representation or delineation of a horizontal section of anything as of a building; a graphic representation; a diagram."
simplified_definition: an action one intends to take; aim.

definition: "Any tree of the genus Platanus."
simplified_definition: a hand tool with a blade, used to make the surface of wood smooth or even.

definition: "A celestial body which revolves about the sun in an orbit of a moderate degree of eccentricity. It is distinguished from a comet by the absence of a coma  and by having a less eccentric orbit. See Solar system."
simplified_definition: a large body in outer space that circles around the sun or another star. Mercury, Venus, Earth, Mars, Jupiter, Saturn, Uranus, Neptune, and Pluto are all planets in our solar system.

definition: "An orrery. See Orrery."
simplified_definition: a device that projects images of the sun, moon, stars, and planets on a ceiling that is shaped like a dome.

definition: "To splice together the ends of slivers of wool  for subsequent drawing."
simplified_definition: a length of wood thicker than a board.

definition: "One who plans; a projector."
simplified_definition: a person who plans, especially a person who plans things such as towns and cities.

definition: "of Plan"
simplified_definition: the act of figuring out how to do something ahead of time.

definition: "To engender; to generate; to set the germ of."
simplified_definition: one of a large group of living things that use sunlight to make their own food. Most plants have leaves, stems, roots and either flowers or cones. Plants use a green pigment called chlorophyll to absorb energy from sunlight. Grasses, trees, vines, vegetables, cactuses, ferns and mosses are plants.

definition: "A treelike perennial herb  of tropical regions  bearing immense leaves and large clusters of the fruits called plantains. See Musa."
simplified_definition: a fruit similar to the banana, but larger, firmer, and less sweet. Plantains have a lot of starch and are eaten as a cooked vegetable.

definition: "An original settlement in a new country; a colony."
simplified_definition: a large farm or estate used for growing rubber, cotton, or other crops to sell.

definition: "Any flat  thin piece of metal clay ivory or the like used for ornament or for painting pictures upon as a slab plate dish or the like hung upon a wall; also
simplified_definition: a flat plate or tablet, with writing or decoration on it, that is hung on a wall.

definition: "Unorganized material; elementary matter."
simplified_definition: the clear, liquid part of blood. Blood cells are suspended in the plasma.

definition: "Fig.: To smooth over; to cover or conceal the defects of; to hide  as with a covering of plaster."
simplified_definition: a paste of sand, lime, and water that becomes hard when it dries. Plaster is used to cover walls and ceilings.

definition: "Capable of being molded  formed or modeled as clay or plaster;  used also figuratively; as the plastic mind of a child."
simplified_definition: an artificial substance made from certain kinds of chemicals that can be easily shaped when soft. Plastic is formed into many materials and products.

definition: "That part of an artificial set of teeth which fits to the mouth  and holds the teeth in place. It may be of gold platinum silver rubber celluloid etc."
simplified_definition: a flat, round dish from which food is served or eaten; the food on such a dish.

definition: "A flat surface; especially  a broad level elevated area of land; a tableland."
simplified_definition: a high, level area of land.

definition: "A declaration of the principles upon which a person  a sect or a party proposes to stand; a declared policy or system; as the Saybrook platform; a political platform."
simplified_definition: a raised, level surface used as a place to work, perform, or speak to an audience.

definition: "A metallic element  intermediate in value between silver and gold occurring native or alloyed with other metals also as the platinum arsenide . It is heavy tinwhite metal which is ductile and malleable but very infusible and characterized by its resistance to strong chemical reagents. It is used for crucibles for stills for sulphuric acid rarely for coin and in the form of foil and wire for many purposes. Specific gravity .. Atomic weight .. Symbol Pt. Formerly called platina."
simplified_definition: a soft, heavy, silverwhite metal that is one of the chemical elements. Platinum is very valuable and is used in making jewelry. It can be combined with other metals to form alloys.

definition: "Formerly  a body of men who fired together; also a small square body of soldiers to strengthen the angles of a hollow square."
simplified_definition: a military unit of two or more squads that is led by a lieutenant and has its own headquarters.

definition: "A large plate or shallow dish on which meat or other food is brought to the table."
simplified_definition: a large shallow dish used for serving food.

definition: "The duck mole. See under Duck."
simplified_definition: a mammal with a wide bill, a long, flat tail, and webbed feet for swimming. Platypuses live near streams in Australia. They are one of only two kinds of mammals that lay eggs. They are sometimes called duckbilled platypuses.

definition: "To engage in  or go together with as a contest for amusement or for a wager or prize; as to play a game at baseball."
simplified_definition: activity that is meant to relax or amuse.

definition: "One who plays any game."
simplified_definition: someone who takes part in a game or sport.

definition: "Sportive; gamboling; frolicsome; indulging a sportive fancy; humorous; merry; as  a playful child; a playful writer."
simplified_definition: cheerful and having a lot of energy.

definition: "A piece of ground used for recreation; as  the playground of a school."
simplified_definition: an outdoor area where children can play. Many playgrounds have equipment such as swings and slides.

definition: "A companion in diversions; a playfellow."
simplified_definition: a child who plays with another child.

definition: "A thing to play with; a toy; anything that serves to amuse."
simplified_definition: something that is played with; toy.

definition: "A maker or adapter of plays."

definition: "A public square in a city or town."
simplified_definition: a public square or open space in the center of a town.

definition: "A cause in court; a lawsuit; as  the Court of Common Pleas. See under Common."
simplified_definition: a serious or sincere call for help; appeal.

simplified_definition: to ask for something in a sincere or serious way.

definition: "Cheerful; enlivening; gay; sprightly; humorous; sportive; as  pleasant company; a pleasant fellow."

definition: "To give pleasure to; to excite agreeable sensations or emotions in; to make glad; to gratify; to content; to satisfy."
simplified_definition: to make content or give pleasure to; make happy.

definition: "To take pleasure; to seek pursue pleasure; as  to go pleasuring."
