definition: "The preposition to primarily indicates approach and arrival  motion made in the direction of a place or thing and attaining it access; and also motion or tendency without arrival; movement toward;  opposed to from."
simplified_definition: in the direction of; toward.

definition: "Any one of numerous species of batrachians belonging to the genus Bufo and allied genera  especially those of the family Bufonidae. Toads are generally terrestrial in their habits except during the breeding season when they seek the water. Most of the species burrow beneath the earth in the daytime and come forth to feed on insects at night. Most toads have a rough warty skin in which are glands that secrete an acrid fluid."
simplified_definition: a small animal that looks like a frog and has dry, rough skin. Toads are amphibians, but live mostly on land rather than in or near water.

definition: "A name given to many umbrellashaped fungi  mostly of the genus Agaricus. The species are almost numberless. They grow on decaying organic matter."
simplified_definition: a mushroom shaped like an umbrella. Toadstools are often poisonous.

definition: "Bread dried and browned before a fire  usually in slices; also a kind of food prepared by putting slices of toasted bread into milk gravy etc."
simplified_definition: a call on other people to drink in honor of someone or something, or the words of praise before this call.

definition: "One who toasts."
simplified_definition: an electric appliance used to heat and brown bread or rolls.

definition: "An American plant  of the Nightshade family  much used for smoking and chewing and as snuff. As a medicine it is narcotic emetic and cathartic. Tobacco has a strong peculiar smell and an acrid taste."
simplified_definition: a plant with large, sticky leaves that are smoked or chewed.

definition: "A kind of sledge made of pliable board  turned up at one or both ends used for coasting down hills or prepared inclined planes; also a sleigh or sledge to be drawn by dogs or by hand over soft and deep snow."
simplified_definition: a long, narrow, wooden sled that curves up in front. Toboggans have no blades underneath and are difficult to steer.

definition: "On this day; on the present day."
simplified_definition: the present day.

definition: "One who toddles; especially  a young child."
simplified_definition: a young child who has just learned to walk.

definition: "To hold or carry the toes ."
simplified_definition: one of the parts of the body that extend from the end of the foot in humans and other animals with backbones. Humans have five toes on each foot.

definition: "Alt. of Toffy"
simplified_definition: a hard candy made from butter and brown sugar.

definition: "In or into union; into junction; as  to sew knit or fasten two things together; to mix things together."
simplified_definition: in or into one gathering, group, mass, or place.

definition: "To weary; to overlabor."
simplified_definition: something in which one becomes trapped or tangled; snare.

definition: "A covering of linen  silk or tapestry spread over a table in a chamber or a dressing room."
simplified_definition: a bowl that is filled with water and that has a seat and a drain. A toilet is used for receiving and disposing of human waste.

definition: "To betoken."
simplified_definition: a symbol that stands for something larger and greater in value

definition: "of Tell"
simplified_definition: past tense and past participle of "tell."

definition: "The power possessed or acquired by some persons of bearing doses of medicine which in ordinary cases would prove injurious or fatal."
simplified_definition: willingness to accept people whose race, religion, opinions, or habits are different from one's own.

definition: "Inclined to tolerate; favoring toleration; forbearing; indulgent."
simplified_definition: willing to accept or respect what is different in others, especially their beliefs and customs.

definition: "To suffer to be  or to be done without prohibition or hindrance; to allow or permit negatively by not preventing; not to restrain; to put up with; as to tolerate doubtful practices."
simplified_definition: to allow or accept; not oppose or attack.

definition: "To sound or ring  as a bell with strokes uniformly repeated at intervals as at funerals or in calling assemblies or to announce the death of a person."
simplified_definition: to cause to ring with slow, even strokes.

definition: "A kind of war hatchet used by the American Indians. It was originally made of stone  but afterwards of iron."
simplified_definition: a light ax with a stone head, once used by some native North American peoples as a weapon or tool.

definition: "The fruit of a plant of the Nightshade family ; also  the plant itself. The fruit which is called also love apple is usually of a rounded flattened form but often irregular in shape. It is of a bright red or yellow color and is eaten either cooked or uncooked."
simplified_definition: a red or yellow fruit with a juicy pulp. A tomato is eaten either raw or cooked as a vegetable.

definition: "A pit in which the dead body of a human being is deposited; a grave; a sepulcher."
simplified_definition: a hole in which a dead body is buried; grave.

definition: "A stone erected over a grave  to preserve the memory of the deceased."
simplified_definition: a piece of stone that marks a grave and may give the dead person's name and dates of birth and death; gravestone.

definition: "The day after the present; the morrow."
simplified_definition: the day after today.

definition: "See Tamtam."
simplified_definition: a small or narrow drum, usually played by beating with the hands.

definition: "A certain weight or quantity of merchandise  with reference to transportation as freight; as six hundred weight of ship bread in casks seven hundred weight in bags eight hundred weight in bulk; ten bushels of potatoes; eight sacks or ten barrels of flour; forty cubic feet of rough or fifty cubic feet of hewn timber etc."
simplified_definition: a unit of weight equal to  pounds or . kilograms, used in the United States and Canada; short ton.

definition: "A mode or tune or plain chant; as  the Gregorian tones."
simplified_definition: a single sound that is thought of as having pitch, strength, or length.

definition: "A drug useful in neuralgia  derived from a Fijian plant supposed to be of the aroid genus Epipremnum."
simplified_definition: an island country in the southwestern Pacific Ocean. It lies to the east of the country of Fiji. The capital of Tonga is Nuku'alofa.

definition: "An instrument  usually of metal consisting of two parts or long shafts jointed together at or near one end or united by an elastic bow used for handling things especially hot coals or metals;  often called a pair of tongs."
simplified_definition: a tool used to grasp small objects. Tongs have two arms that are held together by a hinge and are usually made of metal.

definition: "To use the tongue in forming the notes  as in playing the flute and some other wind instruments."
simplified_definition: the movable organ in the bottom of the mouth, used for licking, tasting, swallowing, and human speech.

definition: "A medicine that increases the strength  and gives vigor of action to the system."
simplified_definition: something that brings back or refreshes strength or energy.

definition: "On this present or coming night."
simplified_definition: this present or coming night.

definition: "One of the two glandular organs situated in the throat at the sides of the fauces. The tonsils are sometimes called the almonds  from their shape."
simplified_definition: either of two spongy parts which hang in the throat near the back of the tongue.

definition: "Likewise; also; in addition."
simplified_definition: as well; also; in addition.

definition: "of Take"
simplified_definition: past tense of "take."

definition: "To drive  as a coach."
simplified_definition: an instrument that is usually held with the hands and helps one to do something.

definition: "To see; to spy."
simplified_definition: to make the quick, short sound of a horn or whistle.

definition: "To lock into each other. See Tooth  n. ."
simplified_definition: one of the hard, white, bony objects that grow in rows in the jaws of people and animals. Teeth are used for biting and chewing.

definition: "Pain in a tooth or in the teeth; odontalgia."
simplified_definition: a pain in or close to a tooth.

definition: "A brush for cleaning the teeth."
simplified_definition: a brush with a short, narrow head and a long handle used to clean the teeth.

definition: "A pointed instument for clearing the teeth of substances lodged between them."
simplified_definition: a short, thin, pointed piece of wood that is used to remove tiny pieces of food from between the teeth.

definition: "To take off the or upper part of; to crop."
simplified_definition: the highest area, point, or surface.

definition: "Either one of two species of large  brilliantly colored humming birds of the Topaza of South America and the West Indies."
simplified_definition: a clear, crystal stone that is yellow or brown and used in jewelry.

definition: "An external local application or remedy  as a plaster a blister etc."
simplified_definition: a subject of discussion or conversation.

definition: "The description of a particular place  town manor parish or tract of land; especially the exact and scientific delineation and description in minute detail of any place or region."
simplified_definition: the shape of the earth's surface across an area or region. The topography of an area includes the size and location of hills and dips in the land.

definition: "To fall forward; to pitch or tumble down."
simplified_definition: to sway and fall down; tumble.

definition: "In an inverted posture; with the top or head downward; upside down; as  to turn a carriage topsyturvy."
simplified_definition: upside down.

definition: "A flashlight."
simplified_definition: a stick or rod with a burning material on one end that is lit and carried for light.

definition: "The solid inclosed by such a surface;  sometimes called an anchor ring."
simplified_definition: past tense of "tear."

definition: "To put into great agitation."
simplified_definition: to cause to feel great pain or distress.

definition: "of Tear"
simplified_definition: the past participle of "tear."

definition: "A violent whirling wind; specifically   a tempest distinguished by a rapid whirling and slow progressive motion usually accompaned with severe thunder lightning and torrents of rain and commonly of short duration and small breadth; a small cyclone."
simplified_definition: a storm of very strong winds that form a cloud shaped like a funnel. Although it does not last long, a tornado destroys everything in its path.

definition: "A kind of shell or cartridge buried in earth  to be exploded by electricity or by stepping on it."
simplified_definition: a long missile that is shaped like a cigar and is used to destroy ships. A torpedo travels through the water under its own power and explodes when it hits something.

definition: "Rolling or rushing in a rapid stream."
simplified_definition: a heavy flow of water with a strong current, such as a rushing stream, a flood, or a heavy rainfall.

definition: "The human body  as distinguished from the head and limbs; in sculpture the trunk of a statue mutilated of head and limbs; as the torso of Hercules."
simplified_definition: the human body from neck to hips; trunk.

definition: "An unleavened cake  as of maize flour baked on a heated iron or stone."
simplified_definition: a Mexican flat bread or thin pancake made of cornmeal. Tortillas are often served hot and filled with beans, meat, or other foods.

definition: "a tortoiseshell cat."

simplified_definition: a brass wind instrument. The trombone is a long tube bent in two loops that ends in a bell shape. It is played with valves or a slide that moves to change tones.

definition: "To sound loudly  or with a tone like a trumpet; to utter a trumplike cry."

definition: "To subject to severe trial; to put to the test; to cause suffering or trouble to."

definition: "A box or bucket in which coal or ore is sent up a shaft;  so called by miners."

definition: "The third day of the week  following Monday and preceding Wednesday."
simplified_definition: the third day of the week. Tuesday comes between Monday and Wednesday.

definition: "To grow in  or form a tuft or tufts."
simplified_definition: a group or clump of long strands that are attached at one end and loose at the other. Yarn, hair, and grass are some strands that can form tufts.

definition: "An iron hook of a hoisting tub  to which a tackle is affixed."
simplified_definition: to pull at in a strong way.

definition: "See Tug  n. ."
simplified_definition: a small, powerful boat used to guide, push, or pull larger ships into and out of harbors.

definition: "Superintending care over a young person; the particular watch and care of a tutor or guardian over his pupil or ward; guardianship."
simplified_definition: the charge for being taught at a college or private school.

definition: "Any plant of the liliaceous genus Tulipa. Many varieties are cultivated for their beautiful  often variegated flowers."
simplified_definition: a plant that grows from a bulb. Tulips have large leaves shaped like lances and flowers that are shaped like cups.

definition: "To roll over  or to and fro; to throw one's self about; as a person on pain tumbles and tosses."
simplified_definition: to roll end over end while falling or while in flight.

definition: "Any plant which habitually breaks away from its roots in the autumn  and is driven by the wind as a light rolling mass over the fields and prairies; as witch grass wild indigo Amarantus albus etc."
simplified_definition: a plant whose rounded, branched tops break off in autumn and are rolled about by the wind.

definition: "A morbid swelling  prominence or growth on any part of the body; especially a growth produced by deposition of new tissue; a neoplasm."
simplified_definition: a mass of extra tissue that grows in or on the body. Some tumors are harmful.

definition: "The tunny."
simplified_definition: a large fish that lives in the ocean. Tuna are used for food.

definition: "A rolling  marshy mossy plain of Northern Siberia."
simplified_definition: one of the huge plains in the arctic regions of North America, Europe, and Asia. Trees do not grow on tundra.

definition: "A sound; a note; a tone."
simplified_definition: a specific series of pleasing musical tones; melody.

definition: "Same as Tunicle."
simplified_definition: an article of clothing that is loose and hangs to the knees. Tunics sometimes do not have sleeves and are sometimes belted. The ancient Greeks and Romans wore tunics.

definition: "To make an opening  or a passageway through or under; as to tunnel a mountain; to tunnel a river."
simplified_definition: an underground or underwater passage used by cars, trains, or other vehicles.

definition: "A kind of headdress worn by women."
simplified_definition: a man's head covering worn by Sikhs and Muslims. A turban is a long piece of cloth that is wrapped several times around the head.

definition: "Peat  especially when prepared for fuel. See Peat."
simplified_definition: the surface layer of the soil that is held together in a thick mat by grass and other plant roots.

definition: "An empire in the southeast of Europe and southwest of Asia."
simplified_definition: a country in western Asia and southeastern Europe between the Mediterranean and Black Seas. Ankara is the capital of Turkey.

definition: "The language spoken by Turks  esp. that of the people of Turkey."
simplified_definition: of or having to do with Turkey, or its people or language.

definition: "To be disquieted or confused; to be in commotion."
simplified_definition: a state of great confusion or anxiety; commotion.

definition: "To bring down the feet of a child in the womb  in order to facilitate delivery."
simplified_definition: to cause to move around a center point.

definition: "The edible  fleshy roundish or somewhat conical root of a cruciferous plant ; also the plant itself."
simplified_definition: a plant that is safe to eat and that has a large white root and hairy leaves that are sometimes used as greens.

definition: "A frame consisting of two bars crossing each other at right angles and turning on a post or pin  to hinder the passage of beasts but admitting a person to pass between the arms; a turnstile. See Turnstile ."
simplified_definition: a highway on which drivers are charged a toll.

definition: "A revolving frame in a footpath  preventing the passage of horses or cattle but admitting that of persons; a turnpike. See Turnpike n. ."
simplified_definition: a device with rotating arms that allows people to pass through one at a time. Turnstiles control movement from one area to another.

definition: "A large revolving platform  for turning railroad cars locomotives etc. in a different direction;  called also turnplate."
simplified_definition: the round plate that holds and rotates the record on a record player.

definition: "A semifluid or fluid oleoresin  primarily the exudation of the terebinth or turpentine tree  a native of the Mediterranean region. It is also obtained from many coniferous trees especially species of pine larch and fir."
simplified_definition: a mixture of oil and resin from certain pines and other related trees.

definition: "Alt. of Turquois"
simplified_definition: a blue or bluish green mineral that is cut and polished for use in jewelry.

definition: "A little tower  frequently a merely ornamental structure at one of the angles of a larger structure."
simplified_definition: a small tower on a larger building such as a castle.

definition: "The turtledove."
simplified_definition: a reptile with a soft body covered by a hard shell that lives in water or on land. A turtle pulls its head, legs, and tail into its shell for protection.

definition: "Same as Torsk."
simplified_definition: a long, large, pointed tooth that sticks out from the mouth of some animals. Tusks grow in pairs and may be used to find food or fight. Elephants, walruses, and wild boars have tusks.

definition: "An instructor of a lower rank than a professor."
simplified_definition: a person who gives private instruction to a student.

definition: "A soft and flexible fabric for men's wear  made wholly of wool except in some inferior kinds the wool being dyed usually in two colors before weaving."
simplified_definition: a rough, wool cloth woven with at least two colors. Tweed is used to make coats and suits.

definition: "Small pinchers used to pluck out hairs  and for other purposes."
simplified_definition: a small metal tool that has two arms, used for picking up or plucking out small objects such as hairs or splinters.

definition: "Next in order after the eleventh; coming after eleven others;  the ordinal of twelve."
simplified_definition: coming next after the eleventh in a series.

definition: "A symbol representing twelve units  as  or xii."
simplified_definition: the word for the Arabic numeral  and for the Roman numeral XII.

definition: "Next in order after the nineteenth; tenth after the tenth; coming after nineteen others;  the ordinal of twenty."
simplified_definition: coming next after the nineteenth in a series.

definition: "An indefinite number more or less that twenty."
simplified_definition: the word for the Arabic numeral  and for the Roman numeral XX.

definition: "Two times; once and again."
simplified_definition: two times; in two instances.

definition: "To understand the meaning of; to comprehend; as  do you twig me"
simplified_definition: a small branch of a tree or shrub.

definition: "The light perceived before the rising  and after the setting of the sun or when the sun is less than  below the horizon occasioned by the illumination of the earth's atmosphere by the direct rays of the sun and their reflection on the earth."
simplified_definition: the faint light in the sky when the sun is below the horizon before sunrise and after sunset.

definition: "One of two produced at a birth  especially by an animal that ordinarily brings forth but one at a birth;  used chiefly in the plural and applied to the young of beasts as well as to human young."
simplified_definition: either of two children or animals born at the same time to one mother.

definition: "To ascend in spiral lines about a support; to climb spirally; as  many plants twine."
simplified_definition: sturdy string that is made by twisting two or more strands together.

definition: "A sudden sharp pain; a darting local pain of momentary continuance; as  a twinge in the arm or side."
simplified_definition: a sudden, sharp pain that does not last long.

definition: "To open and shut the eye rapidly; to blink; to wink."
simplified_definition: to shine with a light that flickers or is not steady.

definition: "To move or turn round rapidly; to whirl round; to move and turn rapidly with the fingers."
simplified_definition: to cause to spin or revolve quickly; rotate.

definition: "A kind of closely twisted  strong sewing silk used by tailors saddlers and the like."
simplified_definition: to combine by winding together in order to make a single thread.

definition: "A girder."
simplified_definition: a tornado or cyclone; whirlwind.

definition: "To pull with a sudden jerk; to pluck with a short  quick motion; to snatch; as to twitch one by the sleeve; to twitch a thing out of another's hand; to twitch off clusters of grapes."
simplified_definition: to move or pull with a quick, sudden motion; jerk.

definition: "The act of twittering; a small  tremulous intermitted noise as that made by a swallow."
simplified_definition: to make a series of short, light sounds like a small bird; chirp.

definition: "One and one; twice one."
simplified_definition: the word for the Arabic numeral  and for the Roman numeral II.

definition: "The title by which the shogun  or former commander in chief of the Japanese army was known to foreigners."
simplified_definition: a rich, powerful person in business or industry.

definition: "p. pr. of Tie."
simplified_definition: the present participle of "tie."

definition: "To represent by a type  model or symbol beforehand; to prefigure."
simplified_definition: a group of things that share certain features or properties that set the group apart from others; kind.

definition: "An instrument for writing by means of type  a typewheel or the like in which the operator makes use of a sort of keyboard in order to obtain printed impressions of the characters upon paper."
simplified_definition: a machine that produces type similar to that of print. Keys are pressed with the fingers to activate letters, numbers, or characters.

definition: "A violent whirlwind; specifically  a violent whirlwind occurring in the Chinese seas."
simplified_definition: a hurricane that occurs in the western Pacific area and the China Sea.

definition: "Of the nature of a type; representing something by a form  model or resemblance; emblematic; prefigurative."
simplified_definition: having the distinctive qualities of a particular type of person or thing.

definition: "Cruel government or discipline; as  the tyranny of a schoolmaster."
simplified_definition: a government in which a single person rules absolutely and in a cruel way.

definition: "To act like a tyrant; to play the tyrant; to tyrannical."
simplified_definition: a ruler who governs absolutely with unfairness and cruelty.

definition: "The emperor of Russia. See Czar."
simplified_definition: another spelling of czar.

definition: "the twentyfirst letter of the English alphabet  is a cursive form of the letter V with which it was formerly used interchangeably both letters being then used both as vowels and consonants. U and V are now however differentiated U being used only as a vowel or semivowel and V only as a consonant. The true primary vowel sound of U in AngloSaxon was the sound which it still retains in most of the languages of Europe that of long oo as in tool
simplified_definition: the twentyfirst letter of the English alphabet.

definition: "The glandular organ in which milk is secreted and stored;  popularly called the bag in cows and other quadrupeds. See Mamma."
simplified_definition: a large organ with two or more glands, each with its own nipple. Udders are the organs in mammals such as cows and goats from which the offspring drink milk.

definition: "To make ugly."
simplified_definition: unpleasant to look at; not attractive.

definition: "A solution of continuity in any of the soft parts of the body  discharging purulent matter found on a surface especially one of the natural surfaces of the body and originating generally in a constitutional disorder; a sore discharging pus. It is distinguished from an abscess which has its beginning at least in the depth of the tissues."
simplified_definition: an open sore on the body. Ulcers produce pus and are found on the skin or in the stomach or small intestine.

definition: "A prefix from the Latin ultra beyond   having in composition the signification beyond on the other side chiefly when joined with words expressing relations of place; as ultramarine ultramontane ultramundane ultratropical etc. In other relations it has the sense of excessively exceedingly beyond what is common natural
simplified_definition: a prefix that means "above" or "beyond."

definition: "A shade  screen or guard carried in the hand for sheltering the person from the rays of the sun or from rain or snow. It is formed of silk cotton or other fabric extended on strips of whalebone steel or other elastic material inserted or fastened to
simplified_definition: a screen made of fabric stretched over a folding frame. An umbrella is used to shield against the rain or sun.

definition: "A third person  who is to decide a controversy or question submitted to arbitrators in case of their disagreement."
simplified_definition: a person who rules on plays in a game; referee.

definition: "Un is prefixed to nouns to express the absence of  or the contrary of that which the noun signifies; as unbelief unfaith unhealth unrest untruth and the like."
simplified_definition: abbreviation of "United Nations."

definition: "Not able; not having sufficient strength  means knowledge skill or the like; impotent' weak; helpless; incapable;  now usually followed by an infinitive or an adverbial phrase; as unable for work; unable to bear fatigue."
simplified_definition: not having the power, skill, or means needed to do something; not able.

definition: "Being of one mind; agreeing in opinion  design or determination; consentient; not discordant or dissentient; harmonious; as the assembly was unanimous; the members of the council were unanimous."
simplified_definition: in complete agreement.

definition: "Not aware; not noticing; giving no heed; thoughtless; inattentive."
simplified_definition: not knowing or realizing; not conscious of.

definition: "Without design or preparation; suddenly; without premeditation  unexpectedly."
simplified_definition: by surprise or in a way that was not expected.

definition: "Not becoming; unsuitable; unfit; indecorous; improper."
simplified_definition: not attractive or proper on a particular person.

definition: "Not canny; unsafe; strange; weird; ghostly."
simplified_definition: beyond ordinary human or natural means or ability.

definition: "To make uncertain."
simplified_definition: not known for sure; not definite.

definition: "The brother of one's father or mother; also applied to an aunt's husband;  the correlative of aunt in sex  and of nephew and niece in relationship."
simplified_definition: the brother or brotherinlaw of one's father or mother.

definition: "Feeling discomfort; uneasy; as  to be uncomfortable on account of one's position."
simplified_definition: feeling discomfort; not comfortable.

definition: "Not common; unusual; infrequent; rare; hence  remarkable; strange; as an uncommon season; an uncommon degree of cold or heat; uncommon courage."
simplified_definition: unusual or rare.

definition: "Not known or apprehended by consciousness; as  an unconscious cerebration."
simplified_definition: not conscious or aware.

definition: "Not constitutional; not according to  or consistent with the terms of a constitution of government; contrary to the constitution; as an unconstitutional law or act of an officer."
simplified_definition: not according to the constitution of a state or country.

definition: "To take the cover from; to divest of covering; as  to uncover a box bed house or the like; to uncover one's body."
simplified_definition: to remove the cover from.

definition: "Not daunted; not subdued or depressed by fear."
simplified_definition: not discouraged; not giving up even though something is difficult or frightening.

definition: "Below or lower  in place or position with the idea of being covered; lower than; beneath;  opposed to over; as he stood under a tree; the carriage is under cover; a cellar extends under the whole house."
simplified_definition: below; beneath.

definition: "Clothes worn under others  especially those worn next the skin for warmth."
simplified_definition: clothing worn next to the skin under other clothing; underwear.

definition: "To undertake; to engage in; to hazard."
simplified_definition: to have the experience of; receive; endure.

definition: "Being below the surface of the ground; as  an underground story or apartment."
simplified_definition: located, living, or taking place beneath the earth's surface.

definition: "That which grows under trees; specifically  shrubs or small trees growing among large trees."
simplified_definition: low plant growth beneath and around taller trees.

definition: "By secret means; in a clandestine manner; hence  by fraud; unfairly."
simplified_definition: done with the hand below shoulder level.

definition: "To mark a line below  as words; to underscore."
simplified_definition: to draw a line under.

definition: "Under; beneath; below."
simplified_definition: below or beneath; under.

definition: "A shirt worn next the skin  under another shirt;  called also undervest."
simplified_definition: a sleeveless shirt worn next to the skin, usually under other clothes.

definition: "The lower or lowest side of anything."
simplified_definition: the under or lower side or surface; bottom.

definition: "To be informed; to have or receive knowledge."
simplified_definition: to get the meaning, nature, or importance of.

definition: "Knowing; intelligent; skillful; as  he is an understanding man."
simplified_definition: the ability to understand; thinking; intelligence.

definition: "imp.  p. p. of Understand."
simplified_definition: past tense and past participle of "understand."

definition: "To take upon one's self  or assume any business duty or province."
simplified_definition: to decide or start to do.

definition: "One who undertakes; one who engages in any project or business."
simplified_definition: a person whose job is to prepare dead bodies for burial and make arrangements for funerals.

definition: "The current that sets seaward near the bottom when waves are breaking upon the shore."
simplified_definition: a strong current of ocean water moving in the opposite direction from the waves moving toward shore.

definition: "That which is worn under the outside clothing; underclothes."
simplified_definition: clothing worn next to the skin under other clothing.

definition: "The inferior part of mankind."
simplified_definition: the criminal class of society.

definition: "imp. of Undo."
simplified_definition: the past tense of "undo."

definition: "To reverse  as what has been done; to annul; to bring to naught."
simplified_definition: to release from or remove wrapping or fastening from.

definition: "p. p. of Undo."
simplified_definition: the past participle of "undo."

definition: "To divest of clothes; to strip."
simplified_definition: to remove the clothing or covering from.

definition: "Not right; not lawful or legal; improper; as  an undue proceeding."
simplified_definition: too much; more than is right or appropriate.

definition: "To drive or draw from the earth; hence  to uncover; to bring out from concealment; to bring to light; to disclose; as to unearth a secret."
simplified_definition: to dig up out of the earth.

definition: "Occasioning want of ease; constraining; cramping; disagreeable; unpleasing."
simplified_definition: not comfortable; nervous.

definition: "Not employed in manual or other labor; having no regular work."
simplified_definition: having no job; not employed.

definition: "Not adequate or sufficient; inferior; as  the man was unequal to the emergency; the timber was unequal to the sudden strain."
simplified_definition: of two or more things, not having the same amount, value, or quality; not equal.

definition: "Not equal; not of equal length."
simplified_definition: not smooth, regular, or flat; rough or jagged.

definition: "Not fair; not honest; not impartial; disingenuous; using or involving trick or artifice; dishonest; unjust; unequal."
simplified_definition: not just or right; treating people in manner that is too harsh or that is unequal with the way others are treated.

definition: "To loose; to unfix; to unbind; to untie."
simplified_definition: to release from; undo; separate.

definition: "To release from a fold or pen; as  to unfold sheep."
simplified_definition: to open or spread out from a folded condition.

definition: "Not fortunate; unsuccessful; not prosperous; unlucky; attended with misfortune; unhappy; as  an unfortunate adventure; an unfortunate man; an unfortunate commander; unfortunate business."
simplified_definition: having bad luck; unlucky.

definition: "Not friendly; not kind or benevolent; hostile; as  an unfriendly neighbor."
simplified_definition: not friendly; distant, unpleasant, or mean to other people.

definition: "Mischievous; wanton; wicked."
simplified_definition: not glad or cheerful; sad; full of gloom.

definition: "New; unprecedented; unparalleled."
simplified_definition: never before known or considered; completely new.

definition: "A prefix signifying one  once; as in uniaxial unicellular."
simplified_definition: a prefix that means "one" or "single."

definition: "A howitzer."
simplified_definition: a mythical animal having the body of a horse and a single, long horn extending from its forehead.

definition: "Of the same form with others; agreeing with each other; conforming to one rule or mode; consonant."
simplified_definition: always the same; never changing.

definition: "To cause to be one; to make into a unit; to unite; to view as one."
simplified_definition: to make into a single unit or thing; bring together; unite.

definition: "Not interested; not having any interest or property in; having nothing at stake; as  to be uninterested in any business."
simplified_definition: having no interest; indifferent.

definition: "The act of uniting or joining two or more things into one  or the state of being united or joined; junction; coalition; combination."
simplified_definition: the act of uniting.

definition: "Being without a like or equal; unmatched; unequaled; unparalleled; single in kind or excellence; sole."
simplified_definition: being the only one of its type; sole; single.

definition: "Harmony; agreement; concord; union."
simplified_definition: speaking all at the same time, or singing at the same time in the same pitch.

definition: "A single thing  as a magnitude or number regarded as an undivided whole."
simplified_definition: a single thing that is one of a group of similar things.

definition: "United; joint; as  unite consent."
simplified_definition: to join together into a whole; combine.

definition: "of Unite"
simplified_definition: joined into or made to act as a whole.

definition: "The state of being one; oneness."
simplified_definition: the condition of being united or of acting as one.

definition: "Constituting or considered as a whole; total; entire; whole; as  the universal world."
simplified_definition: of, having to do with, or characteristic of the whole world or the world's population.

definition: "All created things viewed as constituting one system or whole; the whole body of things  or of phenomena; the   of the Greeks the mundus of the Latins; the world; creation."
simplified_definition: all matter and energy; all existing things, including the earth and heavens.

definition: "An institution organized and incorporated for the purpose of imparting instruction  examining students and otherwise promoting education in the higher branches of literature science art etc. empowered to confer degrees in the several arts and faculties as in theology law medicine music etc. A university may exist without having any college connected with it
simplified_definition: a large school, where people both learn and do research. A student must finish high school before attending a university. Universities offer several levels of degrees.

definition: "Not kind; contrary to nature  or the law of kind or kindred; unnatural."
simplified_definition: not kind or sympathetic; harsh.

definition: "Not known; not apprehended."
simplified_definition: not known; not familiar.

definition: "Not lawful; contrary to law."
simplified_definition: not allowed by law; illegal.

definition: "Upon any less condition than ; if not; supposing that not; if it be not; were it not that; except; as  we shall fail unless we are industrious."
simplified_definition: except on the condition that.

definition: "Not like; dissimilar; diverse; having no resemblance; as  the cases are unlike."
simplified_definition: not alike or equal; different; unequal.

definition: "Unconfined; not restrained; unrestricted."
simplified_definition: having no limits, bounds, or restrictions.

definition: "To take the load from; to discharge of a load or cargo; to disburden; as  to unload a ship; to unload a beast."
simplified_definition: to remove the load from.

definition: "To unfasten  as what is locked; as to unlock a door or a chest."
simplified_definition: to open the lock of by turning a key or mechanism.

definition: "Not lucky; not successful; unfortunate; illfated; unhappy; as  an unlucky man; an unlucky adventure; an unlucky throw of dice; an unlucky game."
simplified_definition: marked by or involving ill fortune or bad luck.

definition: "Deprived of manly qualities; deficient in vigor  strength courage etc.; weak; effeminate."
simplified_definition: not having a human pilot or crew.

definition: "Not natural; contrary  or not conforming to the order of nature; being without natural traits; as unnatural crimes."
simplified_definition: not according to natural laws or processes.

definition: "To relieve of a pack or burden."
simplified_definition: to take out of a package, suitcase, or container.

definition: "Not pleasant; not amiable or agreeable; displeasing; offensive."
simplified_definition: not pleasant or agreeable; distasteful.

definition: "To become unraveled  in any sense."
simplified_definition: to undo; reduce from cloth to threads; cause to come apart.

definition: "Not reasonable; irrational; immoderate; exorbitant."
simplified_definition: not acting or behaving with good sense; not guided by good judgment or sound thinking.

definition: "Not reliable; untrustworthy. See Reliable."
simplified_definition: not able to be relied on.

definition: "Want of rest or repose; unquietness; sleeplessness; uneasiness; disquietude."
simplified_definition: a state of trouble, disturbance, or lack of satisfaction.

definition: "Not submissive to rule; disregarding restraint; disposed to violate; turbulent; ungovernable; refractory; as  an unruly boy; unruly boy; unruly conduct."
simplified_definition: not easy to restrict; difficult or impossible to control; wild.

definition: "Not seen or discovered."
simplified_definition: not seen, observed, or discovered; invisible; not noticed.

definition: "Not stable; not firm  fixed or constant; subject to change or overthrow."
simplified_definition: likely to change suddenly.

definition: "To loose from tangles or intricacy; to disentangle; to resolve; as  to untangle thread."
simplified_definition: to free from a tangled or snarled condition.

definition: "To resolve; to unfold; to clear."
simplified_definition: to free from being tied or bound.

definition: "To; unto; towards;  used of material objects."
simplified_definition: up to the time when.

definition: "Not faithful; inconstant; false; disloyal."
simplified_definition: not correct or accurate; false.

definition: "Not usual; uncommon; rare; as  an unusual season; a person of unusual grace or erudition."
simplified_definition: not usual or ordinary; not common; remarkable.

definition: "Not well; indisposed; not in good health; somewhat ill; ailing."
simplified_definition: in poor health; sick; ill.

definition: "To wind off; to loose or separate  as what or convolved; to untwist; to untwine; as to unwind thread; to unwind a ball of yarn."
simplified_definition: to undo from a wound or twisted state; remove the twists from.

definition: "From a lower to a higher position  literally or figuratively; as from a recumbent or sitting position; from the mouth toward the source of a river; from a dependent or inferior condition; from concealment; from younger age; from a quiet state or the like;  used with verbs of motion expressed or implied."
simplified_definition: to, toward, at, or in a higher place or position.

definition: "The act of upheaving  or the state of being upheaved; esp. an elevation of a portion of the earth's crust."
simplified_definition: an act, instance, or condition of being raised or heaved upward.

definition: "Upwards on  or as on a hillside; as to walk uphill."
simplified_definition: on an upward slope or in an upward direction.

definition: "To keep erect; to support; to sustain; to keep from falling; to maintain."
simplified_definition: to support or decide in favor of, when faced with a challenge.

definition: "The articles or goods supplied by upholsterers; the business or work of an upholsterer."
simplified_definition: materials used to cover furniture.

definition: "Of or pertaining to uplands; being on upland; high in situation; as  upland inhabitants; upland pasturage."
simplified_definition: the raised or higher parts of land in a region.

definition: "On;  used in all the senses of that word  with which it is interchangeable."
simplified_definition: on.

definition: "The upper leather for a shoe; a vamp."
simplified_definition: higher in place, rank, position, or level.

definition: "Highest in place  position rank power or the like; upmost; supreme."
simplified_definition: highest in place, rank, importance, or influence.

definition: "Stretched out face upward; flat on the back."
simplified_definition: in a vertical or standing position.

definition: "Act of rising; also  a steep place; an ascent."
simplified_definition: the act or an instance of rebelling or rising up against authority.

definition: "Great tumult; violent disturbance and noise; noisy confusion; bustle and clamor."
simplified_definition: a loud, confused disturbance; commotion.

definition: "To root up; to tear up by the roots  or as if by the roots; to remove utterly; to eradicate; to extirpate."
simplified_definition: to pull up or tear out of the ground by the roots.

definition: "The act of upsetting  or the state of being upset; an overturn; as the wagon had an upset."
simplified_definition: to tip or turn over.

definition: "Up the stairs; in or toward an upper story."
simplified_definition: on or toward an upper floor; up the stairs.

definition: "The upper part; the top."
simplified_definition: toward or to a higher position or place.

definition: "An element of the chromium group  found in certain rare minerals as pitchblende uranite etc. and reduced as a heavy hard nickelwhite metal which is quite permanent. Its yellow oxide is used to impart to glass a delicate greenishyellow tint which is accompanied by a strong fluorescence and its black oxide is used as a pigment in porcelain painting. Symbol U. Atomic weight ."
simplified_definition: a heavy, silverwhite radioactive metal that is one of the chemical elements. It is used to produce nuclear energy.

definition: "The son or husband of Gaia   and father of Chronos  and the Titans."
simplified_definition: the third largest planet in the solar system and seventh in distance from the sun.

definition: "Of or belonging to a city or town; as  an urban population."
simplified_definition: of or having to do with a city or town.

definition: "The language more generally called Hindustanee."
simplified_definition: the main language of Pakistan and one of the important languages spoken in India. Spoken Urdu is similar to Hindi, a major language of India, but its way of writing is completely different and not all of the words are the same.

definition: "To be pressing in argument; to insist; to persist."
simplified_definition: to push or drive forward or onward.

definition: "Urging; pressing; besetting; plying  with importunity; calling for immediate attention; instantly important."

definition: "In mammals  a fluid excretion from the kidneys; in birds and reptiles a solid or semisolid excretion."
simplified_definition: a substance made by the kidneys to carry waste out of the body. Urine comes out as a yellow liquid in mammals and as a partially solid substance in reptiles and birds.

definition: "A tea urn. See under Tea."

definition: "of I"
simplified_definition: the person speaking or writing together with another or others

definition: "Capable of being used."
simplified_definition: able or fit for being used.

definition: "The act of using; mode of using or treating; treatment; conduct with respect to a person or a thing; as  good usage; ill usage; hard usage."
simplified_definition: way or manner of using or treating something.

definition: "To make use of; to convert to one's service; to avail one's self of; to employ; to put a purpose; as  to use a plow; to use a chair; to use time; to use flour for food; to use water for irrigation."
simplified_definition: to bring into service.

definition: "of Use"
simplified_definition: having been owned by someone else; not new.

definition: "Full of use  advantage or profit; producing or having power to produce good; serviceable for any end or object; helpful toward advancing any purpose; beneficial; profitable; advantageous; as vessels and instruments useful in a family; books useful for improvement; useful knowledge; useful arts."
simplified_definition: able to be used in a helpful, practical, or effective way.

definition: "Having  or being of no use; unserviceable; producing no good end; answering no valuable purpose; not advancing the end proposed; unprofitable; ineffectual; as a useless garment; useless pity."

definition: "One who uses."
simplified_definition: one that uses.

definition: "An officer or servant who has the care of the door of a court  hall chamber or the like; hence an officer whose business it is to introduce strangers or to walk before a person of rank. Also one who escorts persons to seats in a church theater etc."
simplified_definition: a person who shows people to their seats in a house of worship, theater, or stadium.

definition: "Such as is in common use; such as occurs in ordinary practice  or in the ordinary course of events; customary; ordinary; habitual; common."

definition: "The first note in Guido's musical scale  now usually superseded by do. See Solmization."

definition: "That which is used; an instrument; an implement; especially  an instrument or vessel used in a kitchen or in domestic and farming business."

definition: "The organ of a female mammal in which the young are developed previous to birth; the womb."

definition: "Happiness; the greatest good  or happiness of the greatest number  the foundation of utilitarianism."

definition: "As a numeral  V stands for five in English and Latin."

definition: "Unengaged with business or care; unemployed; unoccupied; disengaged; free; as  vacant hours."

definition: "The act of vacating; a making void or of no force; as  the vacation of an office or a charter."

definition: "To inoculate with the cowpox by means of a virus  called vaccine taken either directly or indirectly from cows."
simplified_definition: to give a vaccine to, so as to protect from a disease.

definition: "The virus of vaccinia used in vaccination."
simplified_definition: a substance used to protect people and animals from very serious diseases. Vaccines contain germs of a particular diseasethese germs been killed or changed in a certain way in a laboratory to make them safe. A vaccine goes into a person's body in a shot that is given by a doctor or nurse. After a vaccine is put into a person's body, that person will not get that disease or will get only a mild case.

definition: "A space entirely devoid of matter ; hence in a more general sense a space as the interior of a closed vessel which has been exhausted to a high or the highest degree by an air pump or other artificial means; as water boils at a reduced temperature in a vacuum."
simplified_definition: a space empty of all matter.

definition: "A sheath; a theca; as  the vagina of the portal vein."
simplified_definition: in most female mammals, the passage leading from the uterus to the opening through which a baby is conceived and born; birth canal.

definition: "A wandering; a vagary."
simplified_definition: just barely visible or able to be perceived.

definition: "Proud of petty things  or of trifling attainments; having a high opinion of one's own accomplishments with slight reason; conceited; puffed up; inflated."
simplified_definition: not leading to a desirable or lasting effect.

definition: "A sweetheart chosen on St. Valentine's Day."
simplified_definition: a greeting card or gift sent on Valentine's Day.

definition: "Strong; powerful; efficient."
simplified_definition: based on truth, fact, or logic.

definition: "The space inclosed between ranges of hills or mountains; the strip of land at the bottom of the depressions intersecting a country  including usually the bed of a stream with frequently broad alluvial plains on one or both sides of the stream. Also used figuratively."
simplified_definition: a long area of low land between mountains or hills. A stream or river often runs through a valley.

definition: "Having value or worth; possessing qualities which are useful and esteemed; precious; costly; as  a valuable horse; valuable land; a valuable cargo."
simplified_definition: having a great value in money; expensive.

definition: "Precise signification; import; as  the value of a word; the value of a legal instrument"
simplified_definition: the worth, importance, or usefulness of something.

definition: "A door; especially  one of a pair of folding doors or one of the leaves of such a door."
simplified_definition: a device that controls the flow of a liquid or gas through a pipe or tube.

definition: "A bloodsucking ghost; a soul of a dead person superstitiously believed to come from the grave and wander about by night sucking the blood of persons asleep  thus causing their death. This superstition is now prevalent in parts of Eastern Europe and was especially current in Hungary about the year ."
simplified_definition: a creature in folk tales that is said to have died but come back to life. Vampires suck blood from people in order to stay among the living.

definition: "To fan  or to cleanse by fanning; to winnow."
simplified_definition: a closed truck or car used to move people or goods.

definition: "Alt. of Vandalic"
simplified_definition: a person who destroys or damages property on purpose.

definition: "The spirit or conduct of the Vandals; ferocious cruelty; hostility to the arts and literature  or willful destruction or defacement of their monuments."
simplified_definition: destruction or damage of property that is done on purpose.

definition: "Any flat  extended surface attached to an axis and moved by the wind; as the vane of a windmill; hence a similar fixture of any form moved in or by water air or other fluid; as the vane of a screw propeller a fan blower an anemometer etc."
simplified_definition: a device set up to turn in the wind. Vanes show the direction of the wind.

definition: "A genus of climbing orchidaceous plants  natives of tropical America."
simplified_definition: a tropical flower, a type of orchid, that bears a fruit used for flavoring.

definition: "The brief terminal part of vowel or vocal element  differing more or less in quality from the main part; as a as in ale ordinarily ends with a vanish of i as in ill o as in old with a vanish of oo as in foot."
simplified_definition: to disappear suddenly from sight.

definition: "The quality or state of being vain; want of substance to satisfy desire; emptiness; unsubstantialness; unrealness; falsity."
simplified_definition: too much pride in oneself or in how one looks.

definition: "To send off in vapor  or as if in vapor; as to vapor away a heated fluid."
simplified_definition: tiny particles of a liquid or solid in a gas.

definition: "Liable to vary; too susceptible of change; mutable; fickle; unsteady; inconstant; as  the affections of men are variable; passions are variable."
simplified_definition: likely to change; not constant.

definition: "An individual  or group of individuals of a species differing from the rest in some one or more of the characteristics typical of the species and capable either of perpetuating itself for a period or of being perpetuated by artificial means; hence a subdivision or peculiar form of a species."
simplified_definition: change or difference; diversity.

definition: "Different; diverse; several; manifold; as  men of various names; various occupations; various colors."
simplified_definition: of different kinds; diverse.

definition: "A viscid liquid  consisting of a solution of resinous matter in an oil or a volatile liquid laid on work with a brush or otherwise. When applied the varnish soon dries either by evaporation or chemical action and the resinous part forms thus a smooth hard surface with a beautiful gloss capable of resisting to a greater or less degree the influences of air and moisture."
simplified_definition: a liquid that is brushed on wood or other surfaces to protect them with a hard, shiny coat.

definition: "Alteration; change."
simplified_definition: to change; to make different.

definition: "The body  or naked ground of the Corinthian and Composite capital;  called also tambour and drum."
simplified_definition: an open container of glass or pottery that is usually taller than it is wide. A vase is used as a decoration or to hold cut flowers.

definition: "The grantee of a fief  feud or fee; one who holds land of superior and who vows fidelity and homage to him; a feudatory; a feudal tenant."
simplified_definition: a person in the Middle Ages who was given the use of land in return for loyalty and service to a lord.

definition: "A waste region; boundless space; immensity."
simplified_definition: very large in size or area.

definition: "A large vessel  cistern or tub especially one used for holding in an immature state chemical preparations for dyeing or for tanning or for tanning leather or the like."
simplified_definition: a very large barrel, tub, or tank, used for holding liquids.

definition: "To form with a vault  or to cover with a vault; to give the shape of an arch to; to arch; as vault a roof; to vault a passage to a court."
simplified_definition: an arch made of stone, brick, or concrete that forms a roof or ceiling.

definition: "The flesh of a calf when killed and used for food."
simplified_definition: the flesh of a calf, used as meat.

definition: "To direct to a different course; to turn; to wear; as  to veer or wear a vessel."
simplified_definition: to change direction; turn quickly.

definition: "Of or pertaining to plants; having the nature of  or produced by plants; as a vegetable nature; vegetable growths juices etc."
simplified_definition: a plant or part of a plant, such as carrots, beans, or lettuce, that is used for food.

definition: "Of or pertaining to vegetarianism; as  a vegetarian diet."
simplified_definition: a person who eats no meat or fish but only vegetables, fruits, nuts, and grains.

definition: "The act or process of vegetating  or growing as a plant does; vegetable growth."
simplified_definition: plants or plant life in a particular place.

definition: "That in or on which any person or thing is  or may be carried as a coach carriage wagon cart car sleigh bicycle etc.; a means of conveyance; specifically a means of conveyance upon land."
simplified_definition: something used to carry and move people or things.

definition: "Fig.: To invest; to cover; to hide; to conceal."
simplified_definition: a thin piece of fabric or net worn over the face, head, or shoulders, or over some combination of these. A veil is used as a decoration or to hide a person's face.

definition: "Peculiar temper or temperament; tendency or turn of mind; a particular disposition or cast of genius; humor; strain; quality; also  manner of speech or action; as a rich vein of humor; a satirical vein."

definition: "Quickness of motion; swiftness; speed; celerity; rapidity; as  the velocity of wind; the velocity of a planet or comet in its orbit or course; the velocity of a cannon ball; the velocity of light."

definition: "Made of velvet; soft and delicate  like velvet; velvety."
simplified_definition: a fine cloth made from silk, rayon, or cotton. Velvet has a soft, fuzzy feel on one side.

definition: "To transfer to another person for a pecuniary equivalent; to make an object of trade; to dispose of by sale; to sell; as  to vend goods; to vend vegetables."
simplified_definition: to sell or offer for sale in person or through a machine.

definition: "A vender; a seller; the correlative of vendee."

definition: "Matter fatal or injurious to life; poison; particularly  the poisonous the poisonous matter which certain animals such as serpents scorpions bees etc. secrete in a state of health and communicate by thing or stinging."
simplified_definition: the poison that certain snakes, insects, scorpions, and other animals produce. Venom is put into prey by biting or stinging.

definition: "Having a poison gland or glands for the secretion of venom  as certain serpents and insects."
simplified_definition: producing a fluid, called venom, that is a poison to humans and animals. A venomous animal, such as a venomous snake or scorpion, produces venom that the animal can put into another animal or human with its bite or sting.

definition: "A baiting place; an inn."
simplified_definition: an opening through which a gas or vapor can enter, pass through, or exit.

definition: "The act of giving vent or expression."
simplified_definition: the circulation of air, or change of air.

definition: "Fig.: Any cavity  or hollow place in which any function may be conceived of as operating."
simplified_definition: either of the two lower compartments of the heart. Ventricles receive blood from the upper compartments, called atria, and pump it to the lungs and throughout the body.

definition: "The act  art or practice of speaking in such a manner that the voice appears to come not from the person speaking but from some other source as from the opposite side of the room from the cellar etc."
simplified_definition: the skill or act of speaking without moving the lips so that the voice seems to come from a source other than the speaker.

definition: "To put or send on a venture or chance; as  to venture a horse to the West Indies."
simplified_definition: an activity or undertaking in which there is risk or the result is not certain.

definition: "The metal copper;  probably so designated from the ancient use of the metal in making mirrors  a mirror being still the astronomical symbol of the planet Venus."
simplified_definition: the goddess of love and beauty in Roman mythology. In Greek mythology, Venus is called Aphrodite.

definition: "An open  roofed gallery or portico adjoining a dwelling house forming an outofdoor sitting room. See Loggia."
simplified_definition: a large, open porch attached to a house. Verandas have roofs and are used for social activities.

definition: "A word which affirms or predicates something of some person or thing; a part of speech expressing being  action or the suffering of action."

definition: "Expressed in words  whether spoken or written but commonly in spoken words; hence spoken; oral; not written; as a verbal contract; verbal testimony."
simplified_definition: having to do with words.

simplified_definition: the decision of a judge or jury in a law case.

definition: "The shaft of a column  or a small ornamental shaft."
simplified_definition: the border or edge of something.

definition: "To make into a verb; to use as a verb; to verbalize."

definition: "A bright red pigment consisting of mercuric sulphide  obtained either from the mineral cinnabar or artificially. It has a fine red color and is much used in coloring sealing wax in printing etc."

definition: "An animal  in general."

definition: "Capable of being turned round."

definition: "To make verses; to versify."

definition: "Against; as  John Doe versus Richard Roe;  chiefly used in legal language and abbreviated to v. or vs."

simplified_definition: one of the small bones that form the spinal column.

definition: "A turning point; the principal or highest point; top; summit; crown; apex."

definition: "True; real; actual; veritable."

definition: "The exercise of such authority; an act of prohibition or prevention; as  a veto is probable if the bill passes."

definition: "Of or pertaining to victory  or a victor' being a victor; bringing or causing a victory; conquering; winning; triumphant; as a victorious general; victorious troops; a victorious day."

definition: "The act of seeing or beholding; sight; look; survey; examination by the eye; inspection."

definition: "One who views or examines."

definition: "Attentive to discover and avoid danger  or to provide for safety; wakeful; watchful; circumspect; wary."
simplified_definition: alert and careful about danger.

definition: "Active strength or force of body or mind; capacity for exertion  physically intellectually or morally; force; energy."

definition: "One belonging to the pirate crews from among the Northmen  who plundered the coasts of Europe in the eighth ninth and tenth centuries."
simplified_definition: any of the Scandinavian sea warriors and traders who were active from around A.D.  to . The Vikings raided the coasts of Europe and settled parts of Britain, western Europe, Russia, and elsewhere.

definition: "A country seat; a country or suburban residence of some pretensions to elegance."

definition: "One who holds lands by a base  or servile tenure or in villenage; a feudal tenant of the lowest class a bondman or servant."

definition: "An inclosure or yard for grapevines; a plantation of vines producing grapes."
simplified_definition: an area where grapes are farmed.

definition: "The hypothetical radical CH  regarded as the characteristic residue of ethylene and that related series of unsaturated hydrocarbons with which the allyl compounds are homologous."

definition: "Dark blue  inclining to red; bluish purple; having a color produced by red and blue combined."

definition: "A small instrument with four strings  played with a bow; a fiddle."
simplified_definition: a musical instrument with four strings and no frets. It is held between the chin and shoulder and is played with a bow.

definition: "A dangerous  treacherous or malignant person."
simplified_definition: a poisonous snake with long, hollow fangs.

definition: "A woman who has had no carnal knowledge of man; a maid."

definition: "Of or pertaining to the State of Virginia."

definition: "A sign of the zodiac which the sun enters about the st of August  marked thus  in almanacs."

definition: "Manly strength or courage; bravery; daring; spirit; valor."
simplified_definition: right action or thoughts; goodness.

definition: "Contagious or poisonous matter  as of specific ulcers the bite of snakes etc.;  applied to organic poisons."

definition: "An indorsement made on a passport by the proper authorities of certain countries on the continent of Europe  denoting that it has been examined and that the person who bears it is permitted to proceed on his journey; a visa."
simplified_definition: a tool used to grip objects. Vises have two jaws that are opened and closed by a lever or screw.

definition: "Perceivable by the eye; capable of being seen; perceptible; in view; as  a visible star; the least spot is visible on white paper."

definition: "To see in a vision; to dream."

definition: "To go or come to see  as for the purpose of friendship business curiosity etc.; to attend; to call upon; as the physician visits his patient."
simplified_definition: to go or come to see.

simplified_definition: one who makes a visit.

definition: "A part of a helmet  arranged so as to lift or open and so show the face. The openings for seeing and breathing are generally in it."

definition: "A view; especially  a view through or between intervening objects as trees; a view or prospect through an avenue or the like; hence the trees or other objects that form the avenue."

definition: "That can be seen; visible."
simplified_definition: having to do with sight or seeing.

definition: "To make visual  or visible; to see in fancy."
simplified_definition: to form a picture of in the mind.

definition: "Belonging or relating to life  either animal or vegetable; as vital energies; vital functions; vital actions."
simplified_definition: having to do with life.

definition: "True to the life; exhibiting the appearance of life or freshness; animated; spirited; bright; strong; intense; as  vivid colors."
