definition: "A list or collection of words arranged in alphabetical order and explained; a dictionary or lexicon  either of a whole language a single work or author a branch of science or the like; a wordbook."
simplified_definition: the words of a language.

definition: "Of or pertaining to the voice or speech; having voice; endowed with utterance; full of voice  or voices."
simplified_definition: having to do with or produced by the voice.

definition: "A call to special religious work  as to the ministry."
simplified_definition: a job or career; occupation.

definition: "The way or fashion of people at any particular time; temporary mode  custom or practice; popular reception for the time;  used now generally in the phrase in vogue."
simplified_definition: a popular fashion or style.

definition: "To clamor; to cry out."
simplified_definition: the sounds produced through the mouth by a human being.

definition: "To remove the contents of; to make or leave vacant or empty; to quit; to leave; as  to void a table."
simplified_definition: not containing anything; empty.

definition: "Of or pertaining to a volcano or volcanoes; as  volcanic heat."
simplified_definition: of, characterized by, or relating to a volcano or volcanoes.

definition: "A mountain or hill  usually more or less conical in form from which lava cinders steam sulphur gases and the like are ejected;  often popularly called a burning mountain."
simplified_definition: an opening in the earth's crust through which melted rock, ash, and gases are forced out.

definition: "Any one of numerous species of micelike rodents belonging to Arvicola and allied genera of the subfamily Arvicolinae. They have a thick head  short ears and a short hairy tail."
simplified_definition: a small rodent with gray or brown fur, short legs, and a short tail. Voles are rodents closely related to lemmings and mice. Many kinds of voles are found in Europe, Asia, North America, and northern Africa. In North America, voles are sometimes called field mice.

definition: "To send the ball full to the top of the wicket."
simplified_definition: the firing of a number of guns or other weapons at the same time.

definition: "The unit of electromotive force;  defined by the International Electrical Congress in  and by United States Statute as  that electromotive force which steadily applied to a conductor whose resistance is one ohm will produce a current of one ampere. It is practically equivalent to  the electromotive force of a standard Clark's cell at a temperature of  C."
simplified_definition: a unit of force for measuring electric current.

definition: "Electric potential or potential difference  expressed in volts."
simplified_definition: the force of an electric current as measured in volts.

definition: "A roll; a scroll; a written document rolled up for keeping or for use  after the manner of the ancients."
simplified_definition: a collection of pages of writing or print bound together; book.

definition: "Proceeding from the will; produced in or by an act of choice."
simplified_definition: acting from or done by choice.

definition: "To offer or bestow voluntarily  or without solicitation or compulsion; as to volunteer one's services."
simplified_definition: a person who offers to work or help without pay.

definition: "To eject the contents of the stomach by the mouth; to puke; to spew."
simplified_definition: to throw up food and other contents of the stomach through the mouth.

definition: "To enact  establish grant determine etc. by a formal vote; as the legislature voted the resolution."
simplified_definition: a formal expression of a choice in an election or other group decision.

definition: "One who votes; one who has a legal right to vote  or give his suffrage; an elector; a suffragist; as an independent voter."
simplified_definition: one who votes.

definition: "To warrant; to maintain by affirmations; to attest; to affirm; to avouch."
simplified_definition: to promise to be true, real, or correct .

definition: "To make a vow  or solemn promise."
simplified_definition: a serious promise or pledge.

definition: "A vocal  or sometimes a whispered sound modified by resonance in the oral passage the peculiar resonance in each case giving to each several vowel its distinctive character or quality as a sound of speech;  distinguished from a consonant in that the latter whether made with or without vocality derives its character in every case from some kind of obstructive action by the mouth organs. Also a letter or character which represents such a sound. See Guide to Pronunciation   ."
simplified_definition: in the English alphabet, any of the letters "a," "e," "i," "o," "u," and sometimes "y."

definition: "Formerly  a passage either by sea or land; a journey in general; but not chiefly limited to a passing by sea or water from one place port or country to another; especially a passing or journey by water to a distant place or country."
simplified_definition: a long journey by air, land, sea, or outer space.

definition: "The vernacular  or common language."
simplified_definition: without good taste or manners.

definition: "Capable of being wounded; susceptible of wounds or external injuries; as  a vulnerable body."
simplified_definition: able to be hurt or injured.

definition: "Any one of numerous species of rapacious birds belonging to Vultur  Cathartes Catharista and various other genera of the family Vulturidae."
simplified_definition: a large bird that usually has dark feathers and a bald head and neck. There are many kinds of vulture. These birds are related to hawks and feed on dead animals.

definition: "the twentythird letter of the English alphabet  is usually a consonant but sometimes it is a vowel forming the second element of certain diphthongs as in few how. It takes its written form and its name from the repetition of a V this being the original form of the Roman capital letter which we call U. Etymologically it is most related to v and u. See V and U. Some of the uneducated classes in England especially in London confuse w and v substituting the one for the other as weal for veal
simplified_definition: abbreviation of "west."

definition: "Woad."
simplified_definition: a small mass or ball.

definition: "To walk with short steps  swaying the body from one side to the other like a duck or very fat person; to move clumsily and totteringly along; to toddle; to stumble; as a child waddles when he begins to walk; a goose waddles."
simplified_definition: to walk using short steps while rocking from side to side.

definition: "Hence  to move with difficulty or labor; to proceed lowly among objects or circumstances that constantly inder or embarrass; as to wade through a dull book."
simplified_definition: to walk in water or something else that makes movement slower or more difficult.

definition: "A thin cake baked and then rolled; a wafer."
simplified_definition: a flat cake cooked in a device that leaves a pattern of squares on the cake.

definition: "A man full of sport and humor; a ludicrous fellow; a humorist; a wit; a joker."
simplified_definition: to cause to move quickly up and down or from side to side.

definition: "To give security for the performance of."
simplified_definition: money paid in a regular way to a person for doing work or giving help.

definition: "A wheeled carriage; a vehicle on four wheels  and usually drawn by horses; especially one used for carrying freight or merchandise."
simplified_definition: a vehicle with four wheels that is used to carry heavy loads. Wagons are usually drawn by horses, tractors, or trucks.

definition: "Hence  anything found or without an owner; that which comes along as it were by chance."
simplified_definition: a child without a home or friends.

definition: "To choose; to select."
simplified_definition: to make a long, loud cry out of sadness or pain.

definition: "That part of the human body which is immediately below the ribs or thorax; the small part of the body between the thorax and hips."
simplified_definition: the part of the human body between the chest and hips.

definition: "To watch; to observe; to take notice."
simplified_definition: to stay in one place until an expected event happens .

definition: "A vessel or tray on which something is carried  as dishes etc.; a salver."
simplified_definition: a man who serves or waits on customers in a bar, restaurant, or cafe.

definition: "A female waiter or attendant; a waiting maid or waiting woman."
simplified_definition: a woman who serves or waits on customers in a bar, restaurant, or cafe.

definition: "The sitting up of persons with a dead body  often attended with a degree of festivity chiefly among the Irish."
simplified_definition: to come out of sleep .

definition: "To excite; to rouse; to move to action; to awaken."
simplified_definition: to cause to stop sleeping; awake.

definition: "Conduct; course of action; behavior."
simplified_definition: to move at a steady pace by steps.

definition: "A fuller of cloth."
simplified_definition: a person who walks.

definition: "of Walk"
simplified_definition: the act or movement of someone or something that walks.

definition: "To close or fill with a wall  as a doorway."
simplified_definition: a structure that forms the side of a building or divides or shuts off a space.

definition: "A pocketbook for keeping money about the person."
simplified_definition: a pocketbook that is small and flat; billfold. Wallets are used to hold money, cards, or other small personal items.

definition: "To roll; esp.  to roll in anything defiling or unclean."
simplified_definition: to roll the body in mud, sand, dirt, or water.

definition: "The fruit or nut of any tree of the genus Juglans; also  the tree and its timber. The seven or eight known species are all natives of the north temperate zone."
simplified_definition: a tree that grows nuts and is a source of useful wood.

definition: "A very large marine mammal  of the Seal family  native of the Arctic Ocean. The male has long and powerful tusks descending from the upper jaw. It uses these in procuring food and in fighting. It is hunted for its oil ivory and skin. It feeds largely on mollusks. Called also morse."
simplified_definition: a large mammal with tusks and thick, brown skin. Walruses are the largest pinnipeds or mammals with four flippers instead of feet. They spend much of their time on beaches or on frozen ocean in Arctic regions. Walruses are closely related to sea lions and seals.

definition: "A dance performed by two persons in circular figures with a whirling motion; also  a piece of music composed in triple measure for this kind of dance."
simplified_definition: a round dance for two people. The waltz is a dance with three beats.

definition: "Beads made of shells  used by the North American Indians as money and also wrought into belts etc. as an ornament."
simplified_definition: white and dark beads made from polished shells. Some American Indian peoples used wampum as money or decoration.

definition: "of Win"
simplified_definition: very pale.

definition: "A small stick; a rod; a verge."
simplified_definition: a thin stick or rod used by people such as magicians.

definition: "To ramble here and there without any certain course or with no definite object in view; to range about; to stroll; to rove; as  to wander over the fields."
simplified_definition: to move about with no purpose, aim, or plan; roam.

definition: "Decline; failure; diminution; decrease; declension."
simplified_definition: to become slowly less in size.

definition: "That which is needed or desired; a thing of which the loss is felt; what is not possessed  and is necessary for use or pleasure."
simplified_definition: to desire; wish for.

definition: "To carry on  as a contest; to wage."
simplified_definition: a state or time of armed fighting between countries, states, or other groups of people.

definition: "One who  or that which warbles; a singer; a songster;  applied chiefly to birds."
simplified_definition: a small American songbird that eats insects. There are many kinds of warblers and some are brightly colored.

definition: "A notch or slit in a key corresponding to a ridge in the lock which it fits; a ward notch."
simplified_definition: a suffix that means "in the direction of."

definition: "A large  hard pear chiefly used for baking and roasting."
simplified_definition: a person who is responsible for or guards someone or something.

definition: "A room or apartment where clothes are kept  or wearing apparel is stored; a portable closet for hanging up clothes."
simplified_definition: a tall closet or cabinet, or a small room where clothes are kept.

definition: "To wear  or veer. See Wear."
simplified_definition: a thing or things offered for sale.

definition: "To place in the warehouse of the government or customhouse stores  to be kept until duties are paid."
simplified_definition: a large building or other place where products or private goods are stored.

definition: "To lead a military life; to carry on continual wars."
simplified_definition: the act of fighting a war.

definition: "The act of warming  or the state of being warmed; a warming; a heating."
simplified_definition: having or giving off some heat.

definition: "Having warm blood;  applied especially to those animals  as birds and mammals which have warm blood or more properly the power of maintaining a nearly uniform temperature whatever the temperature of the surrounding air. See Homoiothermal."
simplified_definition: having a body temperature that remains steady and warm, no matter what the outside temperature is.

definition: "A state of lively and excited interest; zeal; ardor; fervor; passion; enthusiasm; earnestness; as  the warmth of love or piety; he replied with much warmth."
simplified_definition: the condition of being warm; heat.

definition: "To refuse."
simplified_definition: to tell of a possible danger; alert.

definition: "Giving previous notice; cautioning; admonishing; as  a warning voice."
simplified_definition: the words, sound, or act of a person or thing that warns.

definition: "To turn  twist or be twisted out of shape; esp. to be twisted or bent out of a flat plane; as a board warps in seasoning or shrinking."
simplified_definition: to bend or twist out of shape.

definition: "To make secure; to give assurance against harm; to guarantee safety to; to give authority or power to do  or forbear to do anything by which the person authorized is secured or saved harmless from any loss or damage by his action."
simplified_definition: a document issued by a judge that gives a police officer the right to make searches, seize property, or make arrests.

definition: "A man engaged or experienced in war  or in the military life; a soldier; a champion."
simplified_definition: a person who fights or has experience in battle; soldier.

definition: "The jewfish;  called also guasa."
simplified_definition: the capital city of Poland.

definition: "A small  usually hard tumor on the skin formed by enlargement of its vascular papillae and thickening of the epidermis which covers them."
simplified_definition: a small, hard, raised growth on the skin that is caused by a virus. Warts usually grow on hands or feet.

definition: "Characterized by caution; guarded; careful."
simplified_definition: on guard against threat or danger.

definition: "The first and third persons singular of the verb be  in the indicative mood preterit  tense; as I was; he was."
simplified_definition: a past tense of the verb "be" which is used with "I," "he," "she," "it," and with singular nouns.

definition: "A mixture of dunder  molasses water and scummings used in the West Indies for distillation."
simplified_definition: to make clean by using water or soap.

definition: "Capable of being washed without damage to fabric or color."
simplified_definition: able to be washed without damage.

definition: "One who  or that which washes."
simplified_definition: a person or thing that washes.

definition: "Any one of numerous species of stinging hymenopterous insects  esp. any of the numerous species of the genus Vespa which includes the true or social wasps some of which are called yellow jackets."
simplified_definition: an insect that has four wings and a slender body with a very narrow waist. Some wasps can give a painful sting.

definition: "To damage  impair or injure as an estate voluntarily or by suffering the buildings fences etc. to go to decay."
simplified_definition: to use or spend in a careless way or for little or no return.

definition: "A basket used in offices  libraries etc. as a receptacle for waste paper."
simplified_definition: an open container for holding trash. A wastebasket is used inside a home or other building.

definition: "Expending  or tending to expend property or that which is valuable in a needless or useless manner; lavish; prodigal; as a wasteful person; a wasteful disposition."
simplified_definition: using more than is needed.

definition: "To be expectant; to look with expectation; to wait; to seek opportunity."
simplified_definition: to look closely or carefully.

definition: "A dog kept to watch and guard premises or property  and to give notice of the approach of intruders."
simplified_definition: a dog that is trained to guard property.

definition: "Full of watch; vigilant; attentive; careful to observe closely; observant; cautious;  with of before the thing to be regulated or guarded; as  to be watchful of one's behavior; and with against before the thing to be avoided; as to be watchful against the growth of vicious habits."
simplified_definition: watching closely or carefully; alert.

definition: "Specifically  one who guards a building or the streets of a city by night."
simplified_definition: a person who keeps watch over or guards something.

definition: "To add water to   thereby extending the quantity or bulk while reducing the strength or quality; to extend; to dilute; to weaken."
simplified_definition: a clear liquid that has no taste or odor. Water takes the form of rain, rivers, oceans, and lakes and is a requirement for most forms of life.

definition: "The European buffalo."
simplified_definition: a large buffalo with dark gray fur that lives mainly in the southern parts of Asia. Water buffalo have curved horns that can span six feet from one tip to the other. Water buffalo weigh up to one ton. They are very strong, and people often use them to pull heavy loads.

definition: "A blossom or plant of any species of the genus Nymphaea  distinguished for its large floating leaves and beautiful flowers. See Nymphaea."
simplified_definition: a plant that grows in a pond or lake. Water lilies have large, flat, floating leaves and pretty flowers in various colors.

definition: "A venomous North American snake  allied to the rattlesnake but destitute of a rattle. It lives in or about pools and ponds  and feeds largely of fishes. Called also water snake water adder water viper."
simplified_definition: a venomous snake found in swamps or wet areas of the southern United States. The water moccasin is brown or olive in color and shows the white inside of its mouth when threatened.

definition: "A certain kind of neck scarf."
simplified_definition: a stream of water that falls from a higher place; cascade.

definition: "Filled or saturated with water so as to be heavy  unmanageable or loglike;  said of a vessel when by receiving a great quantity of water into her hold she has become so heavy as not to be manageable by the helm."
simplified_definition: flooded so as to be heavy and difficult to manage.

definition: "The very large ovoid or roundish fruit of a cucurbitaceous plant  of many varieties; also  the plant itself. The fruit sometimes weighs many pounds; its pulp is usually pink in color and full of a sweet watery juice. It is a native of tropical Africa but is now cultivated in many countries. See Illust. of Melon."
simplified_definition: a large, round fruit with a green rind and sweet pulp that is red or pink. Watermelons have many seeds.

definition: "Proof against penetration or permeation by water; impervious to water; as  a waterproof garment; a waterproof roof."
simplified_definition: not letting water through; not absorbent.

definition: "The whole region or extent of country which contributes to the supply of a river or lake."
simplified_definition: the area of land from which water drains into a river, river system, or lake.

definition: "Heavy plank or timber extending fore and aft the whole length of a vessel's deck at the line of junction with the sides  forming a channel to the scuppers which are cut through it. In iron vessels the waterway is variously constructed."
simplified_definition: a long body of water large enough for boats to travel on.

definition: "Hence  abounding in thin tasteless or insipid fluid; tasteless; insipid; vapid; spiritless."
simplified_definition: having to do with or made of water.

definition: "A unit of power or activity equal to  C.G.S. units of power  or to work done at the rate of one joule a second. An English horse power is approximately equal to  watts."
simplified_definition: a unit for measuring the force of electric power.

definition: "To raise into inequalities of surface; to give an undulating form a surface to."
simplified_definition: a moving ridge or swell on the surface of a body of water.

definition: "Playing to and fro; undulating; as  wavy flames."
simplified_definition: having a shape that repeatedly curves one way and then another.

definition: "Cerumen  or earwax."
simplified_definition: to grow or increase in amount, size or strength.

definition: "Determined course; resolved mode of action or conduct; as  to have one's way."
simplified_definition: a road or path leading from one place to another.

definition: "The plural nominative case of the pronoun of the first person; the word with which a person in speaking or writing denotes a number or company of which he is one  as the subject of an action expressed by a verb."
simplified_definition: the person speaking or writing and one or more others.

definition: "Contraction for we will or we shall."
simplified_definition: shortened form of "we will."

definition: "To make or become weak; to weaken."
simplified_definition: not having much physical strength or power.

definition: "To make weak; to lessen the strength of; to deprive of strength; to debilitate; to enfeeble; to enervate; as  to weaken the body or the mind; to weaken the hands of a magistrate; to weaken the force of an objection or an argument."
simplified_definition: to make weak or weaker; to cause  to be less strong.

definition: "A weak or feeble creature."
simplified_definition: a person who is weak in body or character, or an animal that is weak in body.

definition: "The quality or state of being weak; want of strength or firmness; lack of vigor; want of resolution or of moral strength; feebleness."
simplified_definition: the quality or condition of being weak.

definition: "Weal; welfare; prosperity; good."
simplified_definition: a large amount of money or property or the state of having such.

definition: "Having wealth; having large possessions  or larger than most men as lands goods money or securities; opulent; affluent; rich."
simplified_definition: rich; having wealth.

definition: "An instrument of offensive of defensive combat; something to fight with; anything used  or designed to be used in destroying defeating or injuring an enemy as a gun a sword etc."
simplified_definition: an object or device used to attack or defend.

definition: "To impair  waste or diminish by continual attrition scraping percussion on the like; to consume gradually; to cause to lower or disappear; to spend."
simplified_definition: to have or carry on one's person.

definition: "To grow tired; to become exhausted or impatient; as  to weary of an undertaking."
simplified_definition: tired in body or mind; fatigued.

definition: "Any one of various species of small carnivores belonging to the genus Putorius  as the ermine and ferret. They have a slender elongated body and are noted for the quickness of their movements and for their bloodthirsty habit in destroying poultry rats etc. The ermine and some other species are brown in summer and turn white in winter; others are brown at all seasons."
simplified_definition: a small mammal with brown fur, a long body and neck, and short legs. Various kinds of weasels are found in the northern parts of Europe, Asia, Africa, and North America. Weasels hunt at night for rabbits and rodents. Polecats, ferrets, and mink are closely related to true weasels. Weasels living in very cold regions grow white fur and are called ermine.

definition: "Being toward the wind  or windward  opposed to lee; as weather bow weather braces weather gauge weather lifts weather quarter weather shrouds etc."
simplified_definition: the conditions outside at a particular place and time. Sunshine, clouds, temperature, and rain are some of the changing conditions that make up the weather.

definition: "To form  as cloth by interlacing threads; to compose as a texture of any kind by putting together textile materials; as to weave broadcloth; to weave a carpet; hence to form into a fabric; to compose; to fabricate; as to weave the plot of a story."
simplified_definition: to make by passing threads or strips over and under each other.

definition: "One who weaves  or whose occupation is to weave."
simplified_definition: a person who weaves, especially for a living.

definition: "To unite or surround with a web  or as if with a web; to envelop; to entangle."
simplified_definition: a thin structure spun by spiders and the larvae of certain insects.

definition: "of Web"
simplified_definition: having or joined by a web.

definition: "A foot the toes of which are connected by a membrane."
simplified_definition: a foot with the toes connected by skin or a web.

definition: "To join in marriage; to give in wedlock."
simplified_definition: to take as husband or wife in a ceremony; marry.

definition: "of Wed"
simplified_definition: a ceremony of marriage.

definition: "To cut  as clay into wedgelike masses and work by dashing together in order to expel air bubbles etc."
simplified_definition: a piece of wood or metal shaped like a triangle with a thin edge. A wedge is driven or forced between objects to split, lift, or make them stronger.

definition: "The fourth day of the week; the next day after Tuesday."
simplified_definition: the fourth day of the week. Wednesday comes between Tuesday and Thursday.

definition: "A little; a bit  as of space time or distance."
simplified_definition: very small or tiny.

definition: "To reject as unfit for breeding purposes."
simplified_definition: any plant that grows wild where it is not wanted, especially in gardens or among farm crops.

definition: "A period of seven days  usually that reckoned from one Sabbath or Sunday to the next."
simplified_definition: a unit of time equal to seven days.

definition: "A publication issued once in seven days  or appearing once a week."
simplified_definition: done, happening, or printed once a week.

definition: "To flow in drops; to run in drops."
simplified_definition: to show strong feelings by crying.

definition: "To examine or test as if by the balance; to ponder in the mind; to consider or examine for the purpose of forming an opinion or coming to a conclusion; to estimate deliberately and maturely; to balance."
simplified_definition: to measure the weight of by using a scale.

definition: "The quantity of heaviness; comparative tendency to the center of the earth; the quantity of matter as estimated by the balance  or expressed numerically with reference to some standard unit; as a mass of stone having the weight of five hundred pounds."
simplified_definition: the quality of being heavy.

definition: "Having no weight; imponderable; hence  light."
simplified_definition: having, or seeming to have, little or no weight; not controlled by gravity.

definition: "To foretell the fate of; to predict; to destine to."
simplified_definition: strange or odd; puzzlingly unusual.

definition: "Free to have or enjoy gratuitously; as  you are welcome to the use of my library."
simplified_definition: used to express warm greetings to someone who has just arrived.

definition: "To wield."
simplified_definition: to join metal or plastic by using heat, followed either by pressure or by adding a melted material.

definition: "Welldoing or wellbeing in any respect; the enjoyment of health and the common blessings of life; exemption from any evil or calamity; prosperity; happiness."
simplified_definition: a state of health, happiness, and good fortune.

definition: "Suitably to one's condition  to the occasion or to a proposed end or use; suitably; abundantly; fully; adequately; thoroughly."
simplified_definition: in a good, proper, or acceptable way.

definition: "The state or condition of being well; welfare; happiness; prosperity; as  virtue is essential to the wellbeing of men or of society."
simplified_definition: the condition of being healthy, happy, and comfortable.

definition: "Fully known; generally known or acknowledged."
simplified_definition: known by many; famous; familiar.

definition: "Polite; wellbred; complaisant; courteous."
simplified_definition: polite and considerate.

definition: "Of extensive reading; deeply versed;  often followed by in."
simplified_definition: having read much in one or a wide range of subjects; knowledgeable.

definition: "The natives or inhabitants of Wales."
simplified_definition: of or having to do with Wales, or its people or language.

definition: "of Wend"
simplified_definition: past tense of "go."

definition: "imp.  p. p. of Weep."
simplified_definition: past tense and past participle of "weep."

definition: "To wear. See d Wear."
simplified_definition: a past tense of the verb "be" that is used with the pronouns "you," "we," or "they." It is also used with plural nouns.

definition: "A person transformed into a wolf in form and appetite  either temporarily or permanently whether by supernatural influences by witchcraft or voluntarily; a lycanthrope. Belief in werewolves formerly general is not now extinct."
simplified_definition: in folklore, a human who has changed into or is capable of changing into a wolf and back into a human again.

definition: "Formerly  that part of the United States west of the Alleghany mountains; now commonly the whole region west of the Mississippi river; esp. that part which is north of the Indian Territory New Mexico etc. Usually with the definite article."
simplified_definition: the direction behind a person facing the rising sun.

definition: "Toward the west; westward."
simplified_definition: of or toward the west.

definition: "Of or pertaining to the west; situated in the west  or in the region nearly in the direction of west; being in that quarter where the sun sets; as the western shore of France; the western ocean."
simplified_definition: in, to, from, or having to do with the west.

definition: "A native or inhabitant of the west."
simplified_definition: a person born in, or living in, the western part of the United States, or in a western area or region.

definition: "Alt. of Westwards"
simplified_definition: toward the west.

definition: "To fill or moisten with water or other liquid; to sprinkle; to cause to have water or other fluid adherent to the surface; to dip or soak in a liquid; as  to wet a sponge; to wet the hands; to wet cloth."
simplified_definition: soaked, made moist, or covered with water or another liquid.

definition: "A smart resounding blow."
simplified_definition: to hit or smack with a sharp blow.

definition: "Any aquatic mammal of the order Cetacea  especially any one of the large species some of which become nearly one hundred feet long. Whales are hunted chiefly for their oil and baleen or whalebone."
simplified_definition: a very large mammal that lives in the water. Most kinds of whales live in the ocean. They have a body shaped like a dolphin or porpoise, flippers for front limbs, and a flat, triangular tail. Some kinds of whales have teeth; others feed with baleen.

definition: "Pertaining to  or employed in the pursuit of whales; as a whaling voyage; a whaling vessel."
simplified_definition: the business or work of hunting and killing whales and selling their parts.

definition: "The bank of a river  or the shore of the sea."
simplified_definition: a structure built along a shore, and often into the water, where boats and ships dock; pier.

definition: "Why For what purpose On what account"
simplified_definition: which thing or kind of thing.

definition: "Anything soever which; the thing or things of any kind; being this or that; of one nature or another; one thing or another; anything that may be; all that; the whole that; all particulars that;  used both substantively and adjectively."
simplified_definition: anything or everything that.

definition: "A cereal grass  and its grain  which furnishes a white flour for bread and next to rice is the grain most largely used by the human race."
simplified_definition: the grain obtained from certain grasses and used in making flour and other foods.

definition: "The burden or refrain of a song."
simplified_definition: a round frame that turns on the axle. Wheels are found on cars, trucks, bikes, wagons and other things.

definition: "A light vehicle for conveying small loads. It has two handles and one wheel  and is rolled by a single person."
simplified_definition: a small cart with one or two wheels in front, two legs at the rear, and handles for pushing. Wheelbarrows are used to carry rocks, soil, leaves, and other materials short distances.

definition: "An ordinary whisper exaggerated so as to produce the hoarse sound known as the """"stage whisper."""" It is a forcible whisper with some admixture of tone."
simplified_definition: to breathe with a hoarse or whistling sound.

definition: "At what time;  used interrogatively."
simplified_definition: at what time.

definition: "At whatever time."
simplified_definition: any time that.

definition: "Whether."
simplified_definition: at, in, or to what location.

definition: "About where; near what or which place;  used interrogatively and relatively; as  whereabouts did you meet him"
simplified_definition: in or near what location; about where.

definition: "Considering that; it being the case that; since;  used to introduce a preamble which is the basis of declarations  affirmations commands requests or like that follow."
simplified_definition: while in contrast.

definition: "Upon which; in consequence of which; after which."
simplified_definition: after which; as a consequence.

definition: "At or in whatever place; wheresoever."
simplified_definition: in, at, or toward whatever place or situation.

definition: "Which ; which one ;  used interrogatively and relatively."
simplified_definition: used to introduce one choice or alternative.

definition: "The serum  or watery part of milk separated from the more thick or coagulable part esp. in the process of making cheese."
simplified_definition: the watery part of milk that is left when the curds are separated out in making cheese.

definition: "Of what sort or kind; what; what a; who."
simplified_definition: what one or ones.

definition: "Alt. of Whichsoever"
simplified_definition: whatever or any one that.

definition: "The marysole  or sail fluke."
simplified_definition: a faint smell carried on the air.

definition: "During the time that; as long as; whilst; at the same time that; as  while I write you sleep."
simplified_definition: a period of time.

definition: "A sudden turn or start of the mind; a temporary eccentricity; a freak; a fancy; a capricious notion; a humor; a caprice."
simplified_definition: a sudden desire, thought, or change of mind.

definition: "To utter in alow  whining tone."
simplified_definition: to cry in weak, broken sounds.

definition: "To utter a plaintive cry  as some animals; to moan with a childish noise; to complain or to tell of sorrow distress or the like in a plaintive nasal tone; hence to complain or to beg in a mean unmanly way; to moan basely."
simplified_definition: to make a long, high cry that expresses pain, complaint, or fear.

definition: "To utter the ordinary call or cry of a horse; to neigh."

definition: "To sew lightly; specifically  to form  into gathers by loosely overcasting the rolled edge and drawing up the thread; as to whip a ruffle."

definition: "As an auxiliary  will is used to denote futurity dependent on the verb. Wolves used to be common in Europe, Asia, and North America, but are now extinct or endangered in most areas.

They live in the northern parts of North America, Europe, and Asia.

simplified_definition: a percussion instrument composed of a series of metal or wooden bars. It is played by hitting the bars with small wooden mallets.

definition: "A prefix of obscure meaning  originally used with verbs adverbs adjectives nouns and pronouns. In the Middle English period it was little employed except with verbs being chiefly used with past participles though occasionally with the infinitive Ycleped or yclept is perhaps the only word not entirely obsolete which shows this use."
simplified_definition: a suffix that means "full of" or "made of."

definition: "A light and elegantly furnished vessel  used either for private parties of pleasure or as a vessel of state to convey distinguished persons from one place to another; a seagoing vessel used only for pleasure trips racing etc."
simplified_definition: a small ship used for private trips or racing.

definition: "A bovine mammal  native of the high plains of Central Asia. Its neck  the outer side of its legs and its flanks are covered with long flowing fine hair. Its tail is long and bushy often white and is valued as an ornament and for other purposes in India and China. There are several domesticated varieties some of which lack the mane and the long hair on the flanks. Called also chauri gua grunting cow grunting ox sarlac
simplified_definition: a large, heavy mammal with long hair. Yaks are closely related to cattle. They live in Tibet and Central Asia. People raise yaks to carry loads and for their milk, fur, and leather. Very few yaks are left in the wild.

definition: "A large  esculent farinaceous tuber of various climbing plants of the genus Dioscorea; also the plants themselves. Mostly natives of warm climates. The plants have nettedveined petioled leaves and pods with three broad wings. The commonest species is D. sativa but several others are cultivated."
simplified_definition: the root of a tropical climbing plant, or the plant itself. The root is eaten as a cooked vegetable.

definition: "An abbreviation of Yankee."
simplified_definition: to pull or take out suddenly; jerk.

definition: "A nickname for a native or citizen of New England  especially one descended from old New England stock; by extension an inhabitant of the Northern States as distinguished from a Southerner; also applied sometimes by foreigners to any inhabitant of the United States."
simplified_definition: a person who was born or lives in New England.

definition: "To bark; to yelp."
simplified_definition: to bark with sharp, high sounds.

definition: "To confine  to the yard; to shut up  or keep in a yard; as to yard cows."
simplified_definition: an open area next to a house or other building.

definition: "A stick three feet  or a yard in length used as a measure of cloth etc."
simplified_definition: a measuring stick three feet long.

definition: "Spun wool; woolen thread; also  thread of other material as of cotton flax hemp or silk; material spun and prepared for use in weaving knitting manufacturing sewing thread or the like."
simplified_definition: a strand of twisted fibers made from silk, cotton, wool, or other materials and used for knitting or weaving.

definition: "To open the mouth involuntarily through drowsiness  dullness or fatigue; to gape; to oscitate."
simplified_definition: to open the mouth wide while breathing in deeply. Yawning can show tiredness or boredom.

definition: "Yea; yes."
simplified_definition: you. Ye was in common use during the Middle Ages, but today is used mainly in religious and literary writings.

definition: "The time in which any planet completes a revolution about the sun; as  the year of Jupiter or of Saturn."
simplified_definition: a unit of time equal to  days or, every fourth year,  days, from January through December; twelve months.

definition: "Annually; once a year to year; as  blessings yearly bestowed."
simplified_definition: happening once a year or every year.

definition: "The foam  or troth  or the sediment  of beer or other in fermentation which contains the yeast plant or its spores and under certain conditions produces fermentation in saccharine or farinaceous substances; a preparation used for raising dough for bread or cakes and making it light and puffy; barm; ferment."
simplified_definition: tiny, single cells of certain fungi that are used to make bread, alcohol, and some medicines.

definition: "To cry out  or shriek with a hideous noise; to cry or scream as with agony or horror."
simplified_definition: to scream out loudly, as in pain, anger, fear, surprise, or excitement.

definition: "To become yellow or yellower."
simplified_definition: the color of an egg yolk or ripe lemon; the color between orange and green on the color spectrum.

definition: "To boast."
simplified_definition: to cry out or bark quickly and sharply.

definition: "of Ye"
simplified_definition: the main unit of money in Japan.

definition: "Ay; yea;  a word which expresses affirmation or consent;  opposed to no."
simplified_definition: it is as you say or ask .

definition: "The day last past; the day next before the present."
simplified_definition: on the day before today.

definition: "Nevertheless; notwithstanding; however."
simplified_definition: so far; at this time.

definition: "The wood of the yew. It is light red in color  compact finegrained and very elastic. It is preferred to all other kinds of wood for bows and whipstocks the best for these purposes coming from Spain."
simplified_definition: an evergreen tree or shrub that has sharp, flat needles and poisonous red berries.

definition: "To comply with; to assent; as  I yielded to his request."
simplified_definition: to give forth or produce.

definition: "Alt. of Yodle"
simplified_definition: to sing or call out with quick changes of the voice so that sounds range in an instant from low or medium pitch, with sounds coming from the chest, to very high pitch. Yodeling is popular among the mountain people of the Alps.

definition: "A species of asceticism among the Hindoos  which consists in a complete abstraction from all worldly objects by which the votary expects to obtain union with the universal spirit and to acquire superhuman faculties."
simplified_definition: a Hindu practice made up of a system of physical and mental exercises that free the self from the body and mind to find spiritual peace.

definition: "To enslave; to bring into bondage; to restrain; to confine."
simplified_definition: a device used to join together a pair of work animals. A yoke is made up of a wooden bar with two Ushaped ends that fit around the animals' heads.

definition: "An oily secretion which naturally covers the wool of sheep."
simplified_definition: the yellow part of an egg. The yolk feeds the baby bird until it is hatched. People use egg yolks in many food dishes.

definition: "At a distance  but within view."
simplified_definition: somewhat distant, but within sight.

definition: "The pronoun of the second person  in the nominative dative and objective case indicating the person or persons addressed. See the Note under Ye."
simplified_definition: the person or persons being spoken or written to.

definition: "The offspring of animals  either a single animal or offspring collectively."
simplified_definition: at an early stage of life or growth.

definition: "A young person; a youngling; a lad."
simplified_definition: a young person; child.

definition: "The form of the possessive case of the personal pronoun you."
simplified_definition: belonging to, done by, or having to do with the person being spoken or written to.

definition: "See the Note under Your."
simplified_definition: that or those belonging to you, done by you, or having to do with you.

definition: "An emphasized or reflexive form of the pronoun of the second person;  used as a subject commonly with you; as  you yourself shall see it; also alone in the predicate either in the nominative or objective case; as you have injured yourself."
simplified_definition: used to emphasize "you"; your own self.

definition: "Young persons  collectively."
simplified_definition: the quality or state of being young.

definition: "To utter a loud  long and mournful cry as a dog; to howl; to yell."
simplified_definition: to make a loud, sad cry.

definition: "Christmas or Christmastide; the feast of the Nativity of our Savior."
simplified_definition: Christmas or the Christmas season.

definition: "Christmas time; Christmastide; the season of Christmas."
simplified_definition: the Christmas holiday season.

definition: "Z  the twentysixth and last letter of the English alphabet is a vocal consonant. It is taken from the Latin letter Z which came from the Greek alphabet this having it from a Semitic source. The ultimate origin is probably Egyptian. Etymologically it is most closely related to s y and j; as in glass glaze; E. yoke Gr.  L. yugum; E. zealous jealous. See Guide to Pronunciation
simplified_definition: the twentysixth and last letter of the English alphabet.

definition: "Passionate ardor in the pursuit of anything; eagerness in favor of a person or cause; ardent and active interest; engagedness; enthusiasm; fervor."
simplified_definition: great enthusiasm for a person or cause.

definition: "Either one of two species of South African wild horses remarkable for having the body white or yellowish white  and conspicuously marked with dark brown or brackish bands."
simplified_definition: a large mammal with a striped coat, long legs, and hooves. Zebras are closely related to horses but have shorter manes. They live in large herds in Africa. Several kinds of zebras are in danger of becoming extinct.

definition: "hence  figuratively the point of culmination; the greatest height; the height of success or prosperity."
simplified_definition: the point in the sky that is directly over the head of the person looking at it.

definition: "A cipher; nothing; naught."
simplified_definition: the number represented by the Arabic numeral .

definition: "To give a relish or flavor to; to heighten the taste or relish of; as  to zest wine."
simplified_definition: a sense of great pleasure or enjoyment.

definition: "The chief deity of the Greeks  and ruler of the upper world . He was identified with Jupiter."
simplified_definition: the ruler of the gods, in Greek mythology. In Roman mythology, Zeus is called Jupiter.

definition: "Something that has short turns or angles."
simplified_definition: a line or course that moves back and forth to form a series of sharp angles.

definition: "An abundant element of the magnesiumcadmium group  extracted principally from the minerals zinc blende smithsonite calamine and franklinite as an easily fusible bluish white metal which is malleable especially when heated. It is not easily oxidized in moist air and hence is used for sheeting coating galvanized iron etc. It is used in making brass britannia
simplified_definition: a bluish white metal that is one of the chemical elements. Zinc does not rust easily. It can be combined with other metals to form alloys. Zinc is also used in making batteries.

definition: "Any plant of the composite genus Zinnia  Mexican herbs with opposite leaves and large gaycolored blossoms. Zinnia elegans is the commonest species in cultivation."
simplified_definition: a plant with colorful flowers that is related to the daisy. The zinnia is found in North and South America.

definition: "An instrument of music used in Austria and Germany. It has from thirty to forty wires strung across a shallow soundingboard  which lies horizontally on a table before the performer who uses both hands in playing on it. "
simplified_definition: a stringed instrument that has a flat sound box and thirty or forty strings. Zithers are played by plucking the strings.

definition: "An imaginary belt in the heavens   or  broad in the middle of which is the ecliptic or sun's path. It comprises the twelve constellations which one constituted and from which were named the twelve signs of the zodiac."
simplified_definition: an imaginary belt in the heavens that includes the paths of the sun, moon, and planets as seen from the earth. The zodiac is divided into twelve equal signs or parts. Each part is named for a constellation that appears within the belt.

definition: "Circuit; circumference."
simplified_definition: an area that is divided from other areas because of a particular use or some other special quality.

definition: "A combining form from Gr. zwo n an animal as in zoogenic zoology etc."
simplified_definition: a place where living animals, especially wild ones, are kept for people to look at. The word "zoo" is short for "zoological garden."

definition: "That part of biology which relates to the animal kingdom  including the structure embryology evolution classification habits and distribution of all animals both living and extinct."
simplified_definition: the science and study of animals.
